story: Jeffrey was a very happy boy, but he didn't have many friends. He wanted to have a friend so badly, but he didn't know to get one. One day Jeffrey was at the park and he spotted a boy that was his age. He went up to the boy and asked him if he wanted to play.
original_ending: Just as quick as that, Jeffrey had a new friend!

endings.ending: The boy told Jeffrey he liked being alone and didn't want new friends.
The boy said he didn't live in town and then his mother scooped him away so they could continue to their destination a few states away.
The boy told Jeffrey no, and spent all afternoon making fun on him.
The boy played with him, and introduced him to all his friends, so Jeffrey was never lonely again.
The boy ran away quickly, which made Jeffrey sad.
Jeffrey and the boy played that afternoon and every day for the rest of the Summer !
The boy looked scared, shook his head no, and pointed at the dogs in the park.
The boy's mom wouldn't let him play with Jeffrey, and took him by the hand, out of the park.

story: I woke up to the sound of my alarm going off. I closed my eyes and rolled over before I remembered it was Sunday. Jumping out of bed I got dressed and ran from the room. My dad was already up with his Sunday paper waiting on me.
original_ending: Without even saying a word I sat down beside him to have breakfast.

endings.ending: He told me I was in trouble for not waking up earlier.
We decided to do the crossword together.
He started laughing seeing me all dressed up in school uniform.
I quitely walked back to my room to change my clothes after realizing it was sunday.
My dad told me to go back to bed and sleep in, so I did.
I sprained my ankle running down for breakfast and had to go to the emergency room.
We got in the car and went to church.
We watched TV and waited for the rest of the family to wake up.

story: Karen took her dog for a walk. The dog collar was too big, and her little dog got loose. Her dog ran off, and Karen lost her. Karen put up signs about her lost dog in her neighborhood.
original_ending: A neighbor found her dog, called Karen, and returned her dog.

endings.ending: She went to the shelter and spotted her dog in one of the cages.
She sued the company that made the collar.
Years later she opened the door and her little dog was on her porch.
She never saw her dog again.
After months of not being able to find her dog Karen goes to the pound to adopt a new one and sees her dog there.
Someone finds her dog but refuses to return it.
On the way back from posting signs around the neighborhood, she found the dog waiting for her back at home.
After almost giving up hope, the dog finally returned home one day, but to Karen's delightful surprise, with puppies.

story: After cooking one night, Jason realizes that his knives are very dull. The next day he buys a knife sharpener. He spends one hour diligently sharpening each of his knives. Finally they are all very sharp.
original_ending: Now Jason cooks with a great set of sharp knives.

endings.ending: Sadly, he cut his finger really bad the next day.
Now, Jason can cut his fruit with ease.
He found the task very tedious and just bought a new knife the next time one became dull.
Jason passed on the sharpening skills he learned to a friend who commented on the sharp knives.
However, he accidentally nicks his finger and has to get three stitches
After telling his friends about the knife sharpener he lends it out as a favor and never sees it again.
Ironically he decided that he no longer likes cooking and he never got to use his sharp knives.
He spent the whole night cutting vegetables into intricate designs.

story: Ben was having a rough time at high school. Louis, the bully, always shoved Ben in the hallway. He also made a habit of taking his lunch money. One day, Ben stood up to Louis.
original_ending: He ended up with a black eye, but he got the point across.

endings.ending: He ended up becoming friends with Louis.
He ended up fighting with Louis and was never disturbed again.
Louis was shocked and realized he made a mistake and decided to stop bullying people.
They came to blows and were both suspended from school.
He ended up having to give his lunch money to Louis.
He fought with Louis and even took his lunch money.
He punched Louis and took his lunch money instead.
Louis realized that Ben wasn't a pushover after all and they ate lunch together.

story: Jordyn played in a soccer game today. Both teams were very good and it was a tough game. Jordyn scored the winning goal and was very proud. Jordyn's mom ran up to her and gave her a big hug.
original_ending: Jordyn went out for ice cream after the big win.

endings.ending: Jordyn was very embarrassed by his mom's affection, he went red as a beet.
This was the highlight of Jordyn's soccer career and a day he will never forget.
When she was hugging Jordyn, her mom got ketchup on her shirt.
Jordyn was embarrassed to be hugged by her mom in public.
Jordan was emotional about his big and they both shared the happy tears.
Then Jordan went to a restaurant  to celebrate his win.
Jordan ran home to play video games.
Jordan then argued with his mother who was late and didn't see his goal.

story: Joey was in a rush to leave the house for work. He rushed down the steps, and fell to the bottom. Joey's leg was broken in three places. He needed to call an ambulance.
original_ending: Joey is going to miss plenty of work while in the hospital.

endings.ending: His neighbor stopped by and helped him get to the hospital instead.
Luckily, his phone was nearby and help arrived shortly thereafter.
He ended up losing his job due to ending up in the hospital.
Joey ended up in a wheel chair for the rest of his life.
His arm was broken in multiple place too, and needed a cast.
Joey knocked all the potted plants off the porch when he fell.
Joey's job let him work remotely from his hospital bed, and he didn't get behind.
Joey also hit his head and passed out, but his neighbor called the ambulance for him.

story: My family saw on the news that a hurricane was going to hit our city. We were scared about being harmed by the storm. The whole family prepared for the storm and put boards on the windows. The hurricane came and even knocked down a tree in the front yard.
original_ending: We had a big mess to clean up but we were so glad that we were safe.

endings.ending: We were lucky as the roof was taken off the house next door.
We were very grateful the damage was relatively minor.
Unfortunately the tree landed right on my car we had left behind and it was totaled.
It gave me a new found respect for mother nature and I started to live more green from then on.
We were annoyed at the mess the hurricane left behind.
Some of or family and friends are now missing.
We were safe but my father was devastated because that tree was planted by my grandpa 4 decades ago.
The fallen tree hit our neighbor's new car and my dad was happy because he hated that neighbor.

story: Bobby mom called to him three times that lunch was ready. He ignored her because he was playing. He finally realized he was starving. He sat down at the kitchen table where a bowl of soup was waiting.
original_ending: It was cold but he ate it anyway because he was so hungry.

endings.ending: He slapped the bowl from the table in frustration and left the house in a huff.
Bobby placed the bowl of soup in the microwave where it proceeded to erupt and make a horrible mess.
He didn't eat because the food was cold.
He ate even though he hated soup and thus satiated his hunger.
He called his mom and asked her if she could warm the soup.
When he tasted the soup it was sour, and then he called his mom for food.
The delicious smell made him realize that he was hungrier than he thought.
But it was a type of soup that he didn't like, so he only pretended to eat it.

story: Mary's favorite holiday used to be Thanksgiving. This year, however, she got some bad news during the holiday. Her parents told her they were getting divorced. Mary felt like someone had just broken her heart.
original_ending: Ever since, Mary hates Thanksgiving and the bad memories of that day.

endings.ending: Mary did not celebrate the thanksgiving this year.
but still she celebrated her thanksgiving for the sake of her mother.
Mary began to concoct a plan to get her parents back together during this year's Thanksgiving get together.
Mary decided to not invite either of her parents to Thanksgiving this year because she was mad at them for ruining it that time.
She decided to never celebrate Thanksgiving again.
Mary cried and called her best friend to talk about it.
In the morning, her parents told her they had changed their minds and would stay together as a family.
Mary was so upset so decided to divorce her parents!

story: Nell was new in school and wanted to make friends. Nell told the class that her parents ran a candy store. On the playground, kids flocked around Nell. They asked Nell to bring them some candy.
original_ending: Nell snuck into the store and grabbed candy for her friends.

endings.ending: Nell failed to bring them candy so other kids laughed at her.
Nell spent all of her pocket money buying candies for her class and was reprimanded by her mom.
Nell charged them each a dollar for candy.
Nell said they had to agree to be her friends before they get free stuff.
She got more than she bargained for when the other kids would never stop asking for candy.
She told them she wasn't allowed to get free candy, but they could visit the store with her after school if they wanted.
Nell explained that his parents didn't allow him to get candy from the store.
Nell promised that the next day she would bring candy to everyone.

story: The boy liked to daydream about her. He did not know her but only saw her at school. He wanted to talk to her but knew he was too shy. One day he was daydreaming about her while at school.
original_ending: Suddenly she came right up to him and said hello.

endings.ending: His friend, knowing of the boy's crush, went over and told him the girl's name.
Gathering his courage, the boy went over to talk to the girl himself.
His teacher walked up to him and told him that needs to start paying attention if he wants to pass the class.
The girl, who had been paying attention to the boy's infatuation, told the principal she was afraid of the boy.
At the time his parents was came to the school.
He was very happy to saw her in his dream.
Then he came to know that the girl was also daydreaming about him.
Then his friends started teasing him with her name everyday.

story: Johnny wasn't sure what made red velvet cake red. He just knew it was delicious! He watched as his mother made one. He was going to find out the big secret at last!
original_ending: He was disappointed that the secret was a few drops of food coloring.

endings.ending: He found out that the secret ingredient was beets and he was so disgusted.
But, then his mother saw him watching her and told him to get out of the room as she didn't want an audience.
His mom used beet juice to moisten the cake and make it red.
Johnny saw it was just food coloring and decided chocolate cake was better.
Unfortunately, as his mother was putting ingredients into the bowl, it fell off the counter and shattered into several pieces.
His mother still wanted to keep it a "magical" secret, so she quickly turned her back to Johnny as she added the food coloring.
Johnny needed to use the restroom during the cake making process and while he was gone, his mother turned the cake red.
His mother let him add the food coloring, which is when he discovered that's how it turned red.

story: I was singing for a wedding this summer. The wedding took place an hour away from my home. I left two hours before the ceremony was to start. I was stuck in traffic for one hour.
original_ending: I almost didn't make it to sing at the wedding!

endings.ending: Just as I was losing hope, the accident that was stopping traffic cleared and I made it with 15 minutes to spare.
An hour later I was still stuck in traffic, the wedding started without me and I didn't get to sing.
Once traffic finally started moving I was rear ended by someone.
When I got to the wedding I realized it was the wrong date.
When I finally made it there, I realized I was still wearing my pajamas.
When I arrived I had to pee so bad as I held it in for so long.
I called and rented a helicopter, which plucked me from traffic and delivered me to the wedding.
I made it to the wedding, but the stress made me forget all the words to the songs I was meant to sing.

story: Tanya always wanted a kitten. One day, she saw a lonely kitty walking alone. She brought the kitten home and named it Chloe. Tanya's parents let her keep Chloe as long as Tanya took care of her.
original_ending: Tanya loved Chloe very much and they became best friends.

endings.ending: Tanya kept Chloe up until she went to college.
One day Chloe's real owners spotted her behind a fence and stole her back!
Taking care of Chloe taught Tanya a sense of responsibility that stayed with her for the rest of her life.
Even though Tanya took care of the kitten, it decided that it loved her Dad and slept on his pillow each night.
She realized the difficulties of having a pet on the first day, when the pet started pooping on the living room floor and she was forced to clean everything.
With the parents agreeing, she immediately took the kitten to the vet for an appointment.
Tanya, however, was irresponsible, and after failing to take care of the cat, was forced to give it away.
The kitten turned into an awful adult cat that Tanya hated.

story: Ezra has lived far away from his parents for Years. Although he grew up in New York, he lives in Los Angeles now. However, one year his mother becomes ill. Ezra decides he needs to be closer to his family.
original_ending: He is sad to leave Los Angeles, but happy to be nearby his mother.

endings.ending: His mother passed away shortly after.
His mother is able to witness to the birth of his first child.
His mother recovered, but he still decided to remain in New York.
Moving home ended up being a great move because his high school crush was recently divorced and they hit it off.
Ezra sells his house and moves in with his mother as a full time care giver.
Ezra wins the lottery and is able to move his whole family to Los Angeles.
When he told his employer about having to leave, they offered him the opportunity to work remotely from New York, allowing him to keep his job.
His sisters also moved back home, so it was a big tearful reunion for a few weeks before their mother passed away.

story: I bought a new phone today. At night, I dropped it in my bowl of cereal. After I cleaned it, I put it in my back pocket. I sat down outside my house and forgot it was in my pocket.
original_ending: I heard a crack but when I checked the phone it still worked perfect.

endings.ending: I heard a crack and checked my phone to see it wouldn't turn on anymore.
My phone screen cracked, and the battery had exploded in my pocket, rendering it useless.
I jumped up when it started to ring.
I was angry when it wouldn't turn back on.
It popped apart, but I snapped it back together.
Fortunately since I'm skinny I didn't do any damage to the phone.
I didn't feel it and when I went inside and got ready for bed, the phone was still in my pocket and I accidently ended up washing it with my laundry the next day and destroying my phone anyway.
I heard this muffled ringing sound and couldn't figure out where it was coming from. I looked around and then remembered I had put it in my back pocket and I wasn't actually going crazy!

story: Nicole was a very smart girl who always worked hard. She thought it was very important to always do her best. One day, she wasn't really feeling like doing her best. Instead of working, she played and talked with friends.
original_ending: When she saw the consequences of this, she never did it again.

endings.ending: She got fired from her job and had to go on unemployment due to her laziness.
Nicole and her friends snuck out of school early and went to lunch instead of going to class.
When she came back she was great again!
She felt so good that she decided to do this every week.
He friends helped her to make a fun YouTube video while they were joking around, and she became a rich YouTube star.
Nicole's parents banned her from seeing her friends because they were such a bad influence.
Unbeknownst to her, her brother surreptitiously recorded them talking and posted it online, inadvertently creating the first episode of what would go on to become one of the top podcasts in America!
After taking the time to recharge and have a little fun, she threw herself back into her work with a new-found passion and confidence.

story: Sarah was giving her cat a bath. Her cat squirmed as she put him in the bathtub. All of a sudden, her cat jumped out of the bathtub. Her cat scratched Sarah's arm on his way down.
original_ending: Sarah had to bandage her arm in order to stop the bleeding.

endings.ending: Sarah looked shocked at her cat and saw a pair of entirely black glowing eyes she had never seen before.
Sarah started bleeding too much and in the hospital discovered her cat had rabies.
Sarah came down with a horrible case of cat scratch fever.
Sarah struck her cat in response and they avoided one another the whole week after.
Sarah threw the cat out of her house.
Later the cat apologized to Sarah by licking the scratched arm.
Sarah decided her cat no longer needed a bath and the cat could remain dirty.
She developed cat scratch fever and required hospitalization.

story: There was a little boy who liked to collect rocks. He went to his favorite collecting place. He could not find any rocks. So he got a shovel and dug a three foot hole.
original_ending: It is too bad that his favorite place for rocks was mom's garden.

endings.ending: He ended up finding so many rocks that he didn't know what to do with them all.
In the hole there were tons of bugs and the boy ran away.
He ended up falling in the hole and screamed for someone to help him get out.
Inside the hole the boy was shocked to find some treasure!
He didn't find any rocks but he did find buried treasure.
He found a ten pound rock and he dragged it all the way home.
In the hole, he found something better than a rock- it was a dinosaur bone!
In the hole, the boy found 2 snails, but no rocks.

story: Kevin loved chocolate. So he went to the store and bought a bag of dark chocolate. But he remembered that he had a doctor's appointment. And he forgot to take the chocolate back home.
original_ending: After his appointment he found melted chocolate all over his car seat.

endings.ending: He threw it away in the parking lot of the doctor's office.
So he took the bag into the office with him.
He gave some chocolates to the doctor.
He ate the chocolates during his exam.
When he got back in the car chocolates were stolen.
When he got back in his car he found the chocolates and enjoyed them.
Luckily it was cold outside so the chocolate was fine sitting in the car.
He was excited to eat the chocolate after his doctor's appointment.

story: Tim was ten when he first went to the zoo. He had never seen so many animals before in his life. He was excited by everything he saw. He still has pictures of the trip to this day.
original_ending: Tim returned to the zoo several times and even worked there.

endings.ending: He showed pictures to his friends and they were also excited to visit the zoo.
He enjoys seeing the memories of zoo.
The trip was the last thing he did with his dad before his passing so the pictures are very dear to him.
He took the pictures with his first ever camera and that led to his lifelong interest photography.
He wanted to take his children to the same zoo.
He wanted to visit every zoo.
Tim thanks his parents often about trips to the zoo.
Tim decided to make a zoo collage to show his classmates.

story: All Tim ever wanted to do was be a writer. Throughout high school, he took advanced English classes. He continued in college and started a local school paper. Eventually Tim got into a famous reporting graduate school.
original_ending: After his hard work, he became a national news reporter.

endings.ending: However, Tim was never able to find a job as a writer.
He ended up winning the lottery while in school and dropped out.
He was caught cheating on tests and was kicked out of graduate school.
Tim decided he no longer wanted to be a writer after starting school.
Tim did not do well in graduate school, and ended up dropping out.
Tim was later kicked from the school for a political view he held.
Even after the time invested, Tim got stuck in a position he wasn't happy with.
Tim graduated at the top of his class.

story: India was teaching her daughter how to color. India had to show her daughter how to stay in the lines. India's daughter, after a few tries, stayed in the lines. India was proud of how her daughter was coloring the picture.
original_ending: In the end, the picture was pretty, and everything was in the line.

endings.ending: When he daughter grew up to be an artist, she'd often tell India this was what inspired her to do so.
India's daughter asked her for more coloring books for her birthday, and India bought her an armful!
After a while, India's daughter got bored and left the drawing without completing it fully.
While coloring India's daughter made a mess in the whole room.
Her daughter ended up becoming a famous artist.
All of a sudden the picture came to life.
The photo turned out beautiful and they were happy with the result.
They were happy with the result of the photos.

story: Tabitha woke up late to work one morning. She rushed around and got dressed. She called ahead letting her boss know she was on her way. Tabitha pulled in to her work and noticed she forgot to fix her hair.
original_ending: She quickly matted it down and told everyone she was having a bad day.

endings.ending: Tabitha didn't fix her hair, so her nickname in the office is frizzy.
She asked her female coworker if she could borrow her hair straightener.
She was frustrated because other coworkers laughed at her hair throughout the day.
The boss came over and told her that her bonus for the month had been deducted because she was late.
Tabitha refused to be seen like this and turned around and drove home to fix herself up.
As she struggled with fixing her hair, Tabitha noticed she'd missed a return call from her boss telling her it was the weekend!
She decided she was already late so turned around and went back home to fix it up, when she finally showed up at work her boss yelled at her.
Tabitha decided she didn't care and went into work anyway, HR called her in and told her that her appearance wasn't professional and sent her home.

story: Ann left the house, nervous for her first day at a new school. The principal greeted Ann and led her to her new class. The teacher smiled and showed Ann where to sit. The girl in front of Ann turned around and smiled.
original_ending: Ann was surprised to feel at home in her new classroom.

endings.ending: Later actions of girl showed that she just wanted to get gain Ann's confidence for her own benefit.
Ann didn't return the smile because she was feeling weird in new class.
However, Ann remained nervous.
Ann befriended them and was happy.
Everything seemed a little too phony.
Ann was fortunate to be born with such good looks.
All of a sudden her teacher turned into an alien.
This girl ended up being Ann's best friend for the rest of their lives.

story: Joe got a new tablet for his birthday. He had to figure out how to work it. As he was playing with it, his nephew came running. He knocked it out of Joe's hand.
original_ending: The tablet went crashing to the floor and the screen broke.

endings.ending: Fortunately, it landed perfectly on the couch next to him, and his nephew then showed him how to use it.
Luckily the tablet was purchased with a protective case, preventing any damage from the fall.
His nephew caught it quickly, and then showed him how to use it.
Joe almost dropped it and scolded his nephew for being careless.
His nephew caught the tablet and ran to his room.
Joe's tablet was not damaged, but yelled at his nephew not to run in the house.
Luckily, the heavy duty case saved the tablet from breaking.
Joe took the time to caution his nephew about being careless.

story: Jane woke up one morning and felt like her skin was too pale. So she packed up her beach bag and drove to the beach. She laid out her towel on the sand and laid down under the sun. However, she was so comfortable that she fell asleep.
original_ending: When she woke up, instead of being tanned, she was burnt to a crisp!

endings.ending: Someone walking by noticed she was bring burnt and decided to wake her up before she was in trouble.
She ended up waking up just in time as the perfect tan was accomplished.
Luckily she had put sun screen on before she feel asleep.
When she woke up she was at a beach on some strange planet.
She woke up to a crab biting her toe and she jumped up and down trying to get it off of her.
Jane slept on the beach for so long that when she woke up she realized that some kids had started burying her in the sand.
A man came over and covered her up so she wouldn't burn.
Fortunately she woke up quickly and realized she needed to get out of the sun.

story: I bought a copy of The Blue Dahlia ten years ago. I never opened up the dvd. This month, my wife went away to visit our daughter. As I was all alone, I opened up the DVD.
original_ending: I watched the movie for two hours and was happy.

endings.ending: But the DVD doesn't work.
There was no data in the DVD.
Somehow, there was no disc in the DVD.
I fell asleep watching the movie.
I was disappointed that I really didn't like the movie.
The dvd had a scratch on it and would not play.
Unfortunately, I broke my leg when I crawled into the attic looking for a DVD player.
I put the DVD into the player, but it wasn't a movie at all, it was really a secret message from aliens telling me that only I could prevent the earth from descending into global war.

story: I slowly drove down the lane to the cabin. It had been quite a while since I was last here. I parked and walked onto the porch. I opened the front door.
original_ending: A raccoon ran out of the door, and gave me quite a scare.

endings.ending: When I stepped inside I was transported to another world.
There was a strange man staring back at me.
There were leaves and cobwebs everywhere from the cabin having been empty so long.
To my surprise, a little family of foxes had moved in!
I remembered my childhood here, I suddenly felt the loss of my mother and father.
My brothers and sisters greeted me with much fanfare, it was my birthday.
To my surprise, there was a surprise birthday party there for me.
A strong smell hit me in the face.

story: Tina was resting on the couch. Her boyfriend decided to scare her and she woke up fast. After Tina went inside her room to sleep, she got scared again by him. She ended up getting mad.
original_ending: In addition, her friend offered her house to sleep in.

endings.ending: Tina broke up with her boyfriend because she didn't want to be with a guy that wouldn't respect her sleep.
Tina was so tired that she slept through her alarm and didn't make it into work on time, which resulted in her getting fired.
She told him she would break up with him if he did it again.
She yelled at her boyfriend and then went back to sleep again.
Tina ended the relationship and kicked her boyfriend out of the house, now she sleeps peacefully.
Tina had a fight with her boyfriend and he understood that he was being annoying, so he stopped scaring her.
She felt he was emotionally abusive.
She was just testing him to see how he would react.

story: I was swimming in Pensacola beach. It was a clear, sunny day with calm waters. I happened to look off in the distance, and I saw a shark fin. I screamed "Shark," and everyone cleared out of the ocean.
original_ending: My whole family and I ran and left the beach.

endings.ending: It turned out to be a dolphin fin and the lifeguard scolded me.
I then woke up from my dream and thought to myself that I should not have watched Jaws before bed.
After everyone rushed back onto the beach, a prankster emerged from under the water with a snorkel and a fake fin.
We were then informed that there were shark nets protecting the swimming areas of the beach, and everyone cautiously returned to the water.
but some people were not able to make it and were captured by the shark.
Then when that shark fin came closer we came to know it was diver using a artificial shark fin.
Jokingly, the fin was just a kid pranking everyone.
The shark bit a young man.

story: John was at work. He knocked a shelf over in the back room. The shelf made a big scratch in the paint on the wall. John found some paint under the bathroom sink.
original_ending: He quickly painted the wall so no one would know what happened.

endings.ending: The paint was the wrong color.
Someone had hidden $1000 inside the paint cap.
The paint color didn't match the color of the wall, so he just made it look worse.
He called the custodian to paint the wall.
He decided that he better let maintenance deal with the scratch.
John's boss walked in, saw the scratch and John's attempt to hide it and quickly fired him.
The paint didn't match the color of the wall, so he made the scratch on the wall look even worse than before.
The paint was all dried out, so he couldn't use it to cover the scratch, so instead, he had to move some furniture to block anyone from seeing it.

story: Today my dad took me and my brothers to the zoo. We liked looking at the animals. We rode a camel and a horse. My brothers got to pet a monkey but I was scared.
original_ending: My dad said that we will get to go again very soon.

endings.ending: The monkey started screeching and ended up biting my brother, I was so glad that I didn't pet the monkey.
Since I didn't pet the monkey, dad took me to get an ice cream, which is was way better than petting a monkey in my opinion!
I know that sometimes animals can be unpredictable so I didn't want to take any chances.
They called me a "baby" on the ride home.
I will pet a monkey the next time in the zoo.
I hope we can get back one day, we had a lot of fun.
On the ride home my brothers told me how the monkey felt to the touch.
I wanted to feed the monkey but there were no treats available.

story: I decided to have popcorn last night. While making it, there was a knock at the door. I went to the window and looked out. A raccoon was holding a rock and hitting the door.
original_ending: I'm not sure raccoons can knock but this one did.

endings.ending: The raccoon looked up at me and said "oh yeah I can talk too!"
My dog quickly ran up and snatched the raccoon in his mouth.
I pulled out a bowl and fixed the hungry raccoon a popcorn treat.
I opened the window and said "please in the future, just use the front door."
I invited him in and we ate the popcorn together.
I took the rock and threw it down the porch for him to fetch.
This was commonplace as I had three raccoon friends who lived nearby.
I threw a book in the direction of the raccoon and it ran away in a startled fashion.

story: Colleen was making fun of Cara at school in the hallway. Cara just got a haircut and Colleen didn't like it. Colleen was trying to embarrass Cars in front of everyone. Suddenly Colleen slipped and fell and everyone laughed at her.
original_ending: Colleen learned her lesson not to make fun of anyone.

endings.ending: Cara was sympathetic and helped her up.
Cara kicked her while she was down for making fun of her haircut.
Colleen ended up needing stiches on her head and the doctors had to shave the area giving her an embarrassing haircut of her own.
Colleen got up angry and insulted Colleen in even more mean ways to take the attention away from her fall.
Colleen did not learn her lesson and made fun of more people.
Colleen thought she learned her lesson but the very next day made fun of a boy for wearing ripped shoes to school.
Colleen got up and realized Cara was recording the incident and started crying.
Colleen got back up and hit the first person she saw before walking away.

story: I met my husband on line, where we spent hours emailing each other. After awhile we started talking on the phone which was great fun. Many months later I flew across the country to meet him. We then decided we wanted to make it permanent so I moved in with him.
original_ending: We have been married for six years and are very happy.

endings.ending: I discovered that he was nothing like our conversations suggested, and I ended up returning home.
I became another one of his harem of eight other women.
He turned out to be a very abusive person who trapped me with very few resources to turn to.

Sadly it only lasted 3 months before we got divorced.
We ended up having eleven children and twenty six grandchildren.
We've settled down and are now planning a family.
I soon realized what a mistake I made rushing into things so fast.

story: Dan was in English class texting his friend. The teacher told Dan to put the phone away, but he didn't . Finally the teacher walked over and took the phone. Dan was upset and argued with the teacher.

story: Joe likes to go to Minnesota to his grandparent's cabin on the lake. Every summer Joe takes his family there to go fishing. Joe's grandparents decide to sell the family cabin. Joe is very upset he will no longer be able to take his family there.

endings.ending: The water was really cold so they got out right away.

story: Little Charlie was running through the yard. He chased leaves as they danced out of the trees. He kept an eye on his mom while she raked leaves. All of a sudden, Charlie took off in a dash.

story: Paul had a lucky quarter that he always kept in his shirt pocket. One day, Paul went into the bank to make a deposit. Suddenly, robbers rushed in and began firing their guns! Paul was shot and fell to the floor as the robbers took off!

endings.ending: He bled out slowly as the quarter rolled across the marble floor of the bank.

The bullet had penetrated Paul's lucky quarter because quarters, while potentially lucky, are not bullet-proof.
They even stole that lucky quarter from him.
He started leaving that quarter at home after that since it wasn't lucky at all.

story: We had some balloons left over from a party. Our cat jumped onto a chair. She wanted to play with the balloon string. My wife cut the string and gave it to the cat.
original_ending: She took it away when the cat tried to eat the string.

The cat didn't like the string without the balloon.

my dog ​​ran to eat the garbage.

but I remembered that the cell phone had insurance and got another one.

story: Amy had been running a cupcake shop for a year. One day there was a fire in the building her shop was in. She had to close the shop to await repairs. The building owner told her it would be over a month for repair.
original_ending: Amy was disappointed to miss out on a month's worth of business.

endings.ending: Amy decided to look for a new place to move her shop.

As Amy was disappointed, she decided to look at the brightside and take a much needed vacation so that she would be ready to get back to work when the repairs were finished.
Amy ended up losing her business due to lack of revenue.
Amy sued the building owner successfully and lived comfortably from the settlement money for the building not being up to code.
Amy bought a food truck instead and made more money selling cupcakes all across town than she normally would have at the shop.
Amy turned to an in-home cupcake making business, which made her husband really fat.

story: Zach is enjoying his Thursday night alone. He texts his girlfriend to see what she is doing. She says she is bored, so she comes over. She brings a couple friends, eventually it turns into a party.

endings.ending: Zach found that the party night was better than his calm night and he felt grateful for his girlfriend.

Zach enjoyed the night with his girlfriend and other mates.

story: Gina was on a side street getting on the main street. But the streets were icy, and the side street was a hill. Gina's car was having a hard time getting up the hill. She realized she would need to back up to get up the hill.
original_ending: Just then a van pulled up behind her and she was unable to back up.

endings.ending: Gina, who was a professional stunt driver, slammed the car in reverse, spun it around, and flew up the hill without any trouble at all.
Gina came to her senses and decided that she didn't really need that pack of cigarettes, so she parked the car and went back into her house.
She backed up and successfully got up the hill.
Gina backed up on the hill, but she hit another car when she backed up.
Suddenly a tow truck pulled up, and helped her up the hill.
She began sliding backwards, and began to panic about how to stop.
But she didn't see a cyclist behind her and backed right into him.
After backing up, she got up good speed and made it easily up the hill.

original_ending: He never imagined a puppy would be so much work.

endings.ending: After building the new fence, the puppy is free to run around as much as possible.

story: Chris bought a new cookie jar. He placed all sorts of cookies in the jar. He got hungry and decided to grab some cookies. The cookies got stuck together and were stuck in the jar.
original_ending: Chris had to return the jar and find a new one.

although strange it was good.
after it was done he laughed at me and said he was joking.

story: I finished my laundry one day and decided to fold them. I brought the basket of clothes to my living room couch. After separating the clothes, I began to fold them. When the clothes were all folded, I accidentally bumped into a cup.

story: Ed whistled a popular tune as he worked at his desk job. After a while one of his co-workers joined in. The two of them whistled so loud that the whole office heard. Ed and his co-worker were cheered when the song ended.

story: I threw out my mirror because I didn't care how others saw me. I dug it out of the trash when I met a pretty girl. She said she liked the rough look I had. I gave her my number and asked her to call me.
original_ending: She said she didn't have a phone and just to write.

endings.ending: But she never called so I threw out my mirror again.

She told me she had a boyfriend and walked away.

story: John needed money. He walked into his bank and pulled out a gun. He took a bag of cash home and spent it lavishly. When Mark asked where the money came from, he proudly told the truth.
original_ending: Mark called the police and John was arrested the very next day.

endings.ending: Mark joked about calling the police, but John believed it and killed Mark with the gun.
Mark was very motivated and asked John to rob another bank with him tomorrow.
"I stole it!", he laughed, not noticing that Mark had sneakily pulled out a gun of his own...

They went outside and as they danced together in the street, a city bus driven by a man who had not slept well the night before thanks to a new report about a robbery at his bank, accidentally hit them, sending cash fluttering in all directions.
Mark blackmailed him and said that if he didn't give him some, he'd rat him out.
Mark stopped associating with John from that point forward.
John and Mark became partners and robbed more banks.
Mark decided to steal all the items that John had bought with the stolen money.

story: Whenever I talk on the phone my toddler gets very sneaky. She helps herself in the kitchen and paints her nails. She knows I am so distracted! Once she ate play-doh like it was a candy bar.
original_ending: Now I wait for her nap-time to talk on the phone.

endings.ending: I have started carrying her with me when I talk on the phone to keep an eye on her.
I have stopped talking on the phone altogether.
Now I lock her in the cupboard under the stairs when I get a call!
It's always interesting to see what she gets up to when I'm distracted so I let her do it still.
Now she has to go to her room if I am on the phone.
I've had to really childproof my home.
Whenever I get on the phone I put her in her crib with a few toys.
Whenever I talk on the phone, I make sure my eyes never heave her.

story: My husband and I took our children too the playground. After getting there we realized we had forgotten diapers. Our baby used the bathroom and needed a diaper change. Instead of rushing home we asked a fellow parent if they had one.
original_ending: The kind parent did and we were able to stay and enjoy the day.

endings.ending: The parent did not have a diaper, and we decided to clean him up at the sink and improvise a diaper with a shirt.
The guy looked me in the eyes with his weird bright all-white eyes, I saw a flash and then my baby was in the playground again with a brand new diaper and the guy had completely vanished.
The parent offered us a diaper but it was three sizes too big.
They gave us a diaper but thirty minutes later the baby needed another diaper change so we just went home.
They started to criticize us for forgetting a simple thing like a diaper.
They gave one but it was the wrong size and we eventually had to return home.
The wild-eyed stranger said to us, "I have something better!", and pulled a handful of straw and newspaper from a wet grocery bag.
Angrily, the stranger suggested that we use my husband's shirt as a diaper, mounted a broom and cackled as they flew into the air.

story: Greg loved to ride his skateboard at the skateboard park. He decided to build his own skateboard ramp to use at home. After he finished the ramp, he stood at the top on his skateboard. The ramp was so high that Greg got scared.
original_ending: He was embarrassed that he couldn't skate down his ramp.

endings.ending: Greg decided to face his fear of heights and went down the ramp like a pro.
Greg never ended up using his ramp and his parents eventually made him take it down.
But he gathered up his courage and made a great first run.
Greg realized that he needed to practice before he could tackle this height and cut down the ramp to match his skills.
Greg asked for help from his dad, to try and conquer is fear of the height.
Greg took a few minutes to focus, and tell himself he could skate down the ramp.
Greg ended up conquering his fear of heights and rode from the top!
Greg had some friends over and they showed him that the high ramp was actually fun, not scary.

story: One year at the school dance they provided free pizza. I was never much of a dancer so I just hung out around the place. Towards the end of the dance I started to get fairly hungry. My friends and I decided that we wanted some pizza.
original_ending: When we got to it they were all out of pizza and we were upset.

They had a good selection of toppings, and we were all able to have our favorites!

story: My husband decided that today was going to be the day to go out. He picked a wonderful restaurant to visit and took me there. On the way he complimented me and my outfit. While we were eating he held my hand and listened to me when I talked.
original_ending: I had a very wonderful time while we ate together there.

During dessert he kissed me on the forehead.

I had decided to impress him by my love.

Finally, I kiss my husband's forhead.

story: Kyle sent a text message to all of his friends. He told them it was going to be a nice day, so let's play ball! After everyone arrived at the park, they began to shoot around. When Kyle hit a few long range shots, he clapped.
original_ending: He was going to be the captain for the first team.

endings.ending: His friends got mad and felt Kyle was bragging about making shots.
Once the game started, Kyle missed all the shots he took.

Kyle's friends got really excited for him and tried to get him to keep trying for longer shots.
His friends thought he was being too cocky and decisively won the basketball game, humbling Kyle greatly.

A crowd started to form around us.

story: I went to visit my father's grave. My son put flowers beside it. I talked to him a little about my dad. Afterward he went back to the car and I talked to dad alone for awhile.

endings.ending: She never owned a car before this.
She was also shocked he would buy her this after only three dates.
Not because of the new car, but because she had just discovered a new element in her top secret laboratory, three miles beneath the Earth's surface.
Despite the lavish gift, she had decided earlier in the day to break it off with him, and she waved enthusiastically as she drove away in her brand new Mercedes.
But she was very ungrateful and didn't even thank Sammy for the expensive gift.
Sammy didn't realize though that his girlfriend would brake up with a week later and keep the car.
But your girlfriend doesn't like Mercedes
while driving the Mercedes, your girlfriend hit the pole

story: My sister in law's husband died while a young man. They had three children. The nine year old boy was very sad. One day he saw a man who looked like his father and he got scared.
original_ending: He ran home to his mother, thinking he had seen a ghost.

endings.ending: He ran to school, thinking he had saw his real dad.
He called me, and told me he saw his dad, and I explained to him it was just a look-a-like.
It turned out that his dad had faked his death and was living with a new family.
His mother gave him a hug and comforted him.
But his uncle was his father's twin brother.
His mother said it was a thing of his imagination.
His mother explained while teary eyed, that It wasn't your dad just someone that looked like him.
He slowly walked up to the man all shaken up, and asked what his name was.

story: Trevor went to the lake one day to fish. Trevor sat down by the lake and threw out a fishing line. While waiting, Trevor felt a strong tug. He tried to fight back, but the pole was yanked into the water.
original_ending: Trevor was forced to go home after he lost his fishing pole.

endings.ending: Trevor fished the rest of the day just using his bare hands to grab the fish.
Trevor bought a fishing pole from a store a few miles away and caught five fish!
He fought back and caught a huge fish.
His dad helped him pull in a small rock.
Suddenly a fishman walked out of the water and asked Trevor if he would like to have sharp objects thrown into his home.
Trevor decided to jump into the lake a get his expensive pole back.
He had a feeling that the world's biggest fish was in the lake.
His dad had spent $80 on that pole.

story: Steve wants to be able to dead life five hundred pounds at the gym. He currently can only deadliest about two hundred pounds. He set himself up with a year long plan to reach his goal. He worked hard and ate healthy for a year, making steady progress.
original_ending: A year later Steve was able to deadlift his goal weight!

endings.ending: Steve still couldn't do 500 pounds, so he began abusing steroids, and eventually suffered many mental and physical problems.
On the day he was planning the 500 pound deadlift, a sign on the door said the gym had closed permanently.
Even so, Steve did not achieve his goal.
Steve in addition to reaching the goal, doubled and reached ten hundred pounds.
When trying for his maximum lift a year later he voided his bowels and never returned to the gym.
While training Steve injured his shoulder and he could never properly deadlift again.
After that year he unfortunately hurt his back and had to stop weight training.
Even after the whole year of training he still wasn't able to dead lift five hundred pounds.

story: Cali had not been on a date in a very long time. She had met a guy who asked her out but she was nervous to go. She wasn't sure if she was ready but made herself do it anyway. The guy picked her up and was nice and thoughtful.
original_ending: She had a good time on the date and was glad she went.

endings.ending: Despite his good qualities, Cali couldn't find anything in common with him and couldn't wait to get back home.
As they left to go on the date his car wouldn't start, so they decided to stay at Cali's to watch a movie while waiting for AAA.
But, he had truck balls on the back of his Honda Civic, and Cali knew that they were not a good match.
At the end of the date, Cali asked the guy if he wanted to meet her parents the next time they went out and Cali never heard from him again.
Five years later they were married with two kids.
However the place he took her to was extremely boring and she never saw the man again.
They went to go see a comedy show.
They had a nice dinner at her favorite restaurant.

story: Selma went to the beach for her vacation. It had been a dream of hers to see the ocean. She swam and played in the ocean for a week. As she walked along the beach she picked up seashells.
original_ending: At the end of the week she went home, happy.

endings.ending: She later used the seashells to make a beautiful necklace.
But Selma forgot to use sunscreen, at the end of the day she got sunburned.
At the same moment she was about to pick up her final seashell, she stepped on a jellyfish that had just been abandoned on the shore by the wave that brought it there.
Selma had an idea that she was going to start making shell jewelry to sell online.
At the end of the week she went home depressed.
At the end of the week she went to the hospital from sea sickness.
She was so entranced by the shells that she decided to collect them all and open up a shop nearby, causing the locals to remark, "Selma sells seashells by the seashore".

Turning one over in her hand, she peered into a small opening and glimpsed an impossible landscape of cyclopean structures built with unknowable angles, many leagues beneath the very ocean that she stood before, driving her to near madness, and she resolved to never visit the ocean again.

story: Tasha went to the movies with her friend Gordie. Tasha accidentally spilled the popcorn they were eating. Gordie offered to buy some more. Tasha remembered that her parents taught her to be polite.
original_ending: Tasha told Gordie it was her turn to buy the popcorn this time.

endings.ending: So, she politely declined the offer and cleaned up the popcorn.
She wasn't sure what the polite thing to do was, so she ran to the bathroom in tears.
But as she had no money she accepted Gordie's offer.
So she politely refused but was pleasantly surprised when an onlooker bought popcorn for her.
Tasha offered to go with him to help pay for the popcorn.
Tasha smiled and said "Thank you", and waited for him to get back.
Tasha apologized to Gordie, accepted her friend's kindness, and promised to pay for the next one.
Since she was polite, she first cleaned up the mess and then bothered to get more popcorn.

story: James stopped at the gas station for gas. He pumped up his car with gasoline. Then he drove off the lot. On his way home, he got a warning message on his car.
original_ending: He pulled over to put back the gas cap on his car.

endings.ending: He was worried after seeing the warning message.
He then checked his gas in the car.
He thought: "2 liters of gasoline was not enough".
It was then that he realized that his gas tank was leaking.
The engine had died and James was stuck on the side of the road for over four hours.
As it turns out, James was dehydrated; so much so that the warning message was nothing more than an illusion.
Ignoring the message, James drove several miles before his car sputtered and stopped in the midst of a deep, dark forest.

The message read, "We've been trying to reach you about your automobile insurance...", surprising him and causing James to veer off the road, crashing through fifteen billboards and coming to a stop inside a mysterious building marked only by a sign that said "Insurance".

story: A group of teenage boys were gathering wood to sell. They needed money for camp. One boy climbed up the tree to knock down dead wood. He fell from the tree and broke his arm.
original_ending: They had to take him to the doctor so they got very little wood.

endings.ending: The boys had to use all the money they earned from selling wood to pay for the hospital bill.
The other boys got scared and ran away, leaving the boy to fend for himself.
The teenage boys told the boy with the broken arm to take himself to the hospital so they could keep collecting wood.
The boy with the broken arm continued working even though his arm was killing him.
The owner to the property paid for the boy to go to camp to avoid legal issues.
His broken arm prevented him from going to camp so his friends all stayed home too to keep him company.
The boys were so scared of the consequences they all ran off and left the injured boy to get help.
He brushed off the injury as minor so they all continued to collect wood.

story: Tim gave his dog a bath today because he got dirty in the yard. The dog stood in the tub while he ran water over him. He then dribbled shampoo on the dog and began to suds him up. He rinsed him off and let him shake in the tub a few times.
original_ending: Finally, to dry him off, he took him for a walk in the sun.

endings.ending: He then turned on the hair dryer to take off the moisture.
He then rubbed him with towel.
Before he could finish drying the dog it ran through the house getting everything wet!
After drying the dog with a towel Tim gave it some treats for being a good dog during the bath.
Dog slipped and was all wet again.
Dog left his owner's house that night live in the luxurious life of dirt.
After he got out, Tim tied a cute purple bandana with paw prints on it around his dog's neck.
As he was drying the dog off, Tim noticed he missed rinsing shampoo from his stomach and had to put him back in the tub to spray him off more.

story: Ben and his friends were sitting on top of a hill. Ben sat down on his skateboard and sped down the hill. When he reached the bottom his friends said they wanted to try too. His friend began to copy Ben but slipped off halfway down the hill.
original_ending: He hurt his arm badly and Ben and his friends called an ambulance.

endings.ending: Luckily a giant bird swooped in and grabbed his friend before he could get hurt.
He did flips all of the way down the hill and somehow avoided any injuries.
He rolled all the way to the bottom, laughing the whole time.
He smoothly bounced up and back onto the skateboard for the rest of the ride.
His friend rolled and rolled, much to the amusement of Ben and his other friends.
The skateboard continued racing down the hill so Ben's friend had to walk all the way back.
Luckily he managed to wipe out into some grass, unharmed, and went back to practicing until he got better.
His friend only got a few scrapes, but afterwards he was terrified of skateboarding and never went again.

story: I was watching the Red Sox on tv yesterday afternoon. In the second inning I went out to sit on the bench. I got to talking to some neighbors. By the time I got back the game was in the ninth inning.
original_ending: I watched the Red Sox lose in the ninth, and was mad.

endings.ending: The teams were neck-and-neck, but within just a few minutes, the Red Sox won!
I was really mad that I had missed most of the game, and I turned off the television in my frustration, so I don't know who won in the end.
The Red Sox ended up winning and I celebrated with the neighbors later.
Several of the Red Sox players got hurt while I was gone and they had to forfeit the game.
I got back just in time to see the Red Sox make a great play and win the game.
The game went into extra innings so I still got to watch a good bit of baseball.
I decided to turn off the TV and work on my memoirs.
The Red Sox won and I made my way to my bookie to collect on my wager.

story: Kim was on the highway driving to work. All of a sudden her car shut off and came to a stop. She turned the key, but nothing happened. Kim called her friend Gary who thought she broke a belt.
original_ending: She sat in the hot car in the sun and waited for Gary to come.

endings.ending: After Gary arrived and inspected the car, he realized that her battery had died.
She then called a wrecker service to tow her car to the repair shop.
he found the Engine broke.
The car was out of gas.
The police showed up and arrested her for blocking the highway.
When Gary arrived he discovered that the car was simply out of gas.
A truck driver saw her stranded and stopped to fix her car.
Gary was unable to come help and she had to call to get her car towed.

story: I live near one of the Great Lakes. Because of all its open water, the Lake causes strange weather. Last spring, a great windstorm blew straight across the Lake. The windstorm blew a tree down on top of our house.
original_ending: The crash of the tree was so loud that it woke us all up!

endings.ending: The roof caved in and I was seriously hurt.
I ended up selling my house to avoid being injured in the future.
The tree broke our entire roof!
The tree was propped up on our roof and to this day it is there.
Luckily, the tree only caused minor damage.
Thankfully, nobody was harmed when it came crashing down
luckily the tree was less than 10 feet.
It took weeks for us to fix the damage to the roof.

story: Jenny's family was moving and she didn't like it. She was leaving all of her friends behind and it made her sad. Jenny saw where they would be living as they rounded the driveway. It was a very old house and she wasn't sure about it.
original_ending: After exploring for a while, Jenny thought that the old house was nice.

endings.ending: They only stayed there a month before heading back to their old home.
However, the view from her new bedroom window brought her around immediately.
But then Jenny saw the there was another girl her age playing in the yard next door and she got excited.
After her parents parked the car, Jenny refused to leave it for an hour because she was so upset about the move and old house.
Jenny couldn't help but cry.
Jenny saw the neighbor who was a very handsome boy and realized that the house wasn't that bad.
After discovering that the house was haunted, Jenny's family moved out a few days later.
Despite this, Jenny would decorate the house for Halloween and it became the talk of the town.

story: It had come time again to celebrate a dear friend's birthday. I needed to hurry and get ready. I started by taking a shower and cleaning myself up. After bathing, I put my clothes on and headed out the door.
original_ending: Before I knew it, I was at the bar celebrating with my friend Jeff.

endings.ending: I realized I forgot the gift and ran back in the house to get it.
I hurried to Betty's thinking I was late, but I was actually the first guest to arrive.
I never saw the bus that hit me, I was in the hospital for five days.
Sam never made it to his birthday party, later the police took statements but he was never found.
My car would not start so I walked to the bar and was an hour late.
When I got to the bar Jeff was not there so I walked home.
My cab was late so when I got to the bar Jeff was already gone.
My car was out of gas so I called Jeff and he picked me up and we drove to the bar.

story: Meg loved eating ice cream. She asked her dad to take her to the ice cream stand. Her dad bought her a chocolate ice cream cone. But she accidentally dropped it, and began to cry.
original_ending: Meg's dad bought her a new ice cream cone and she ate it happily.

endings.ending: Meg's elderly dad asked her why a fifty-year old woman would cry over dropped ice cream, and told her to stop embarrassing herself.
At least the ants that swarmed the ice cream Meg dropped got to enjoy it!
The workers at the ice cream stand saw what happened and replaced Meg's cone for free.
Her dad also had a cone he hadn't eaten yet and quickly gave it to Meg, which made her happy again.
Since they were already home and her dad didn't want to go back out he gave his ice cream to Meg.
The ice cream stand worker saw the whole thing and immediately rushed a new cone over to Meg and earned a big tip from her dad.
Meg's dad gave her his cone instead and she happily ate it.
One of the employee's noticed and brought out a replacement ice cream cone.

story: My mom didn't want to go to Subway for lunch. I told her it was healthy and they had a lot of choices. So we went, she got a chicken breast sandwich. After she finished she told me she now loves Subway.
original_ending: Now me and my mom go to Subway every Sunday.

endings.ending: Now Mom and I are going to open a Subway in our neighborhood.
Now Mom and I are going to have a Subway snack every Saturday night made by ourselves.
My mom now wants to try every fast food place in town.
For the last five years my mom has had a chicken breast sandwich from Subway.
She loved it so much she went back and ordered a second sandwich.
She changed her mind later because she got food poisoning from the sandwich.
Now my mom wants to open her own Subway!
Now my mother can't stop telling everyone how good it is.

story: A man bought an mp3 player and loaded tracks on it. He began listening to it on walks. He noticed he had a pep in his step, doing this. People suddenly stopped to offer him rides regularly.
original_ending: He thought the music made him happier and people saw this.

endings.ending: He found it strange and scary, never accepted any rides.
He accepted the ride and went on to recommend music to everyone.
He was very happy that people helped him.
He then began to do more pep while walking to get a free lift.
One day he was offered a ride by a beautiful woman, who ended up being his future wife!
The man didn't hear their offers, of course, because he had his headphones on.
He stopped when he found that they never brought him back home.
He saved a lot of money on cab fare this way and bought a car.

story: Anita hadn't seen her son in 10 years. The other day, unannounced, he showed up at her house. Anita wanted to be upset, but her son brought his family. He was married to a Mexican woman and had two kids.
original_ending: Annita opened her door, hugged her son and met her grandchildren.

endings.ending: Anita closed the door, talked to her son through it and did not meet her grandchildren.
Anita's grand-kids only knew Spanish, so she could not understand them.
She began to cry and hugged the new members of the family.
Anita was able to put any resentments behind and welcomed them into her home.
Anita, overcome with emotion, passed out from the surprise of it all.
Anita's son explained that his family had been in the witness protection program and was prevented from socializing in any way.
Anita was upset, and told his son to leave.
Her son apologized at the door, and wanted to take Anita out to lunch.

story: A man walked into a barber shop and wanted to buy all the cut hair. The barber never had anyone ask for it so he didn't know what it cost. The barber told him it would cost $50 for it all. The man paid him the money and demanded the barber's own hair too.
original_ending: The barber thought it was far and shaved head head on the spot.

endings.ending: To the man's surprise, the barber handed him a wig; the barber was bald.
With all of the hair collected, the man started his own wig shop next door.
The barber refused and called the deal off.
The barber asked the man to pay him $20 more and the man agreed.
The man took the hair home and put it in his garden to nurture the soil.
The barber refused and had the man arrested and institutionalized.
The barber told him to leave and to never come back.
The barber asked what he was going to do with all of the hair.

story: Sandra went strawberry picking with her mother. They spent several hours in the sun gathering berries. At the end of the day Sandra dropped her bushel of strawberries! Luckily she was able to scoop them all up again.
original_ending: Sandra was glad that her hard work hadn't been wasted!

endings.ending: Before she could gather all the strawberries, some hungry birds and squirrels ran off with a treat.
As she scooped them up, Sandra realized that they were now covered with ants from an anthill nearby.
When she was scooping them up one of the strawberries started talking to her.
They were the most delicious strawberries she had every tasted.
They were covered in dirt, but she washed them off later.
She used them in several recipes at a later time.
She wanted to do it again next week.
The extra work made her tired.

story: I broke my leg when I was 8. I thought it was going to be cool having a pink cast. My friend's even got to sign their names on it. It got itchy and stinky really fast though.
original_ending: After that I wanted my cast removed as soon as possible!

endings.ending: I still have it in my closet at home.
Getting it removed was one of the most pleasurable experiences of my life.
I was the most popular girl at school because of it
I had to wait 3 months to get it taken off
I often had to use a ruler so I could itch myself underneath the cast.
One day I was so annoyed by my cast, I tried to cut it off myself.
But I was not able to help it for another 1 week.
And all of my friends started teasing me.

story: Tom grew up in San Francisco. All of his friends played baseball. Tom was afraid of being hit by a ball so he did not play. One day he decided to play and got hit by a pitch.
original_ending: It didn't actually hurt so Tom fell in love with Baseball.

endings.ending: It hurt him so much that Tom vowed to never play baseball again.
Tom hated the pitcher so much that he unfriended him immediately.
Tom let this bother him so much that he never played baseball again.
Tom was certain his friend had hit him on purpose and left the game in a huff.
Tom got scared and didn't not returned to the play area again.
Tom went to the doctor and got a medicine for his pain.
He never played baseball again after that day.
He had to go to the hospital for his head injury.

story: Julia had a lot of things to do that day. She had to run errands and then she had to clean the house. She left early in the morning. It took her six hours to get everything outside done.
original_ending: When she got home she saw that her husband had done the cleaning.

endings.ending: It was to her surprise that the house was in a totally unexpected clutter and mess, thanks to her teenage cat and dog playing and chasing around with each other.
She felt overwhelmed and exhausted to do the house cleaning that day, so she decided to postpone it to a couple of days later.
She had bought cleaning materials to her house at shop.
She called to house keeper to clean her house.
When she got home, her husband was passed out on the couch and nothing was cleaned.
When she got home, she had to clean the house, as her husband was still at work.
When she got home, her husband was gone and the house was all dirty.
When she got home she had to clean the whole house.

story: Al sneezed in his office one morning quite loudly. After a brief pause he heard a louder sneeze elsewhere in the office. Al took this as a challenge and force out an even louder sneeze. This went back and forth for quite a while.
original_ending: Al's co-workers yelled at Al and the other man to cut it out.

endings.ending: The next day quite a few people had gotten sick from the germs being spread around the office from all the sneezing.
Al sneezed so hard that he got a terrible pressure headache and his sinuses hurt, he vowed to never compete in a sneezing contest again.
When Al got up to find his competitor, he realized the office was empty.
The competition was cut short when Al was called into a board meeting.
Al, never one to back down from a contest, began shopping online for pepper in bulk, with overnight shipping.
They were both eventually quarantined for several months, and continued their sneezing match via social media.
His supervisor let out a loud sneeze as he was walking by his office.
Al had a couple more sneezes, but he started to feel sore and went to the doctors.

story: Tom got up early and got ready for his day. He put on his best suit and made sure he looked his best. He got in his car and drove to where his mom was. He walked in and was greeted by family and friends.
original_ending: He then approached the coffin and said his goodbye to his mom.

endings.ending: Tom started crying and everyone gave him a hug, knowing he was going through a tough time.
His dad quickly pulled him aside and asked him if he could loan him twenty dollars.
Tom sat down with his mom and the rest of family for dinner.
Tom approached the front of the Church, as he was the best man in his moms wedding.
His mom ran over to him and gave him a huge hug to congratulate him on getting married.
They all gathered in front of the camera to take family photos with a professional photographer.
He kissed his mom on the cheek and watched her walk down the aisle.
He gave his mom a hug as he watched her walk across the stage for her award.

story: Dahlia was blind but it never seemed to get her down. The only thing that bothered her was being alone. She decided to meet another person who was blind. Ronald was blind as well and they both hit it off.
original_ending: The two remain very close and Ronald just proposed to Dahlia.

endings.ending: They went on to star in a reality show documenting their relationship.
Dahlia was heartbroken to find out Ronald had a wife and was using her to have an affair.
But then Ronald got his sight back with the help of operation and he no longer cared about Dahlia.
Later after marriage they got ego problems and finally got divorced.
Dahlia had to break up with him though, when she found out he was moving out of the country.
Ronald introduced her to his friend, who was also blind.
Unbeknownst to Dahlia, Ronald was only pretending to be blind so that the two could be together.
However, the more Dahlia came to know about Ronald, the more she believed they should see other people.

story: Sean and Sara didn't have a lot of clothes. They also were very poor. One day, they saw a huge sale on clothes online. They decided to go ahead and order some stuff.
original_ending: They had to work extra to make enough money to cover it all.

endings.ending: When they went to pay the credit card there was no limit.
Your purchases have been lost.
They felt it was nice to splurge on themselves once in a while.
Some of their bills were late the following month because of overspending.
Unfortunately, the delivery was sent to the wrong address!
It was a sale for leftover costume clothing after Halloween, however, and the neighbors thought Sean and Sara's new attire was more than a little odd.
They bought more than they should have and ended up returning some of the clothes.
They were very happy to finally have some new clothes.

story: Timothy went for a ride on his electric skateboard. He went so fast, he went faster than the cars on the road. People honked at him. He thought it was because he looked so fly.
original_ending: But actually a squirrel was riding on the board behind him.

endings.ending: But he didn't notice the sparks coming from the skateboard's battery pack.
However, it was because Timothy was quite rude and didn't obey the road rules.
But there was actually a tree on the street ahead.
In fact, they were trying to warn him that a wheel was missing.
But the wheels of the skateboard was loose.
So he throttled the speed more and met with an accident.
He ran a red light and got hit by a car and passed out.
In fact his wallet fell on the ground and he didn't realize it until an hour later.

story: Linda had always loved the xylophone. Since she was very little, she loved the instrument. Once Linda was 10 years old, she started learning it. After a lot of hard work, she could play it.
original_ending: Now, Linda is one of the best players in the nation.

endings.ending: But her sister was jealous of her skills and secretly disliked her.
She was excited to be asked to join the school choir and play her instrument.
She couldn't find anyone who wanted to listen to its music.
For her next birthday, she was given a shiny new one of her own.

She applied the same work ethic when she single-handedly captured several Baltic islands for the Xylophone Republic, one of the last remaining power structures following the long and bloody Instrument War.
Her grandfather noticed her ability and bought her a whale-bone xylophone valued at over $100,000.
She loved it so much she made a career out of it.
She thought the guitar was cooler so she eventually quit playing the xylophone.

story: Jake's favorite sport was basketball. He played on the school team in the 4th, 5th, and 6th grade. Yesterday, he looked through his dad's old basketball trading cards. Jake was surprised when his dad's name was on the card.
original_ending: Jake's dad had his own basketball card when he was a professional.

endings.ending: Jake's dad had made the card as a joke but never got rid of it.
Jake's dad told him that the card was made because he wanted to go to the NBA but never succeeded in highschool.
Jake quickly burned the card so no one found out his dad's secret.
Jake asked his dad about it and his dad told him to mind his own business.
Jake's dad had fake basketball cards made and snuck one into his son's collection in order to impress him.
Jake was so motivated by seeing his father that he rejoined the team and went on to play professional basketball.
He never knew his dad was a professional basketball player.
When Jaked asked his dad about it, his dad said that he had someone make up a card for him so he could feel special even though he was an awful basketball player.

story: My uncle brought me several pounds of deer meat. He had made some of the meat into summer sausages. I didn't like to eat meat, but I had to admit I loved deer. I ate a large piece with my dinner that night.
original_ending: We spent the evening filling the deep freezer to the top.

endings.ending: Later that night, I could feel my intestines protesting, and I had horrible food poisoning for the next 12 hours.
The next night, I made a big roast and gave the bone to my dog after eating the meal, and we both feasted like kings!
Then i went to the market to buy a deer meat to eat again.
I then got an allergy on my skin after eating the deer meat.
The next day I made deer meat stew and invited everyone I knew to the party.
That night, I used some of the meat to bait a trap for the wild coyotes that had been living under my mobile home.
We spend the day emptying the deep freezer.
The next day the deer meat hit me hard and I was throwing up all day!

story: Jack wanted to get better at dribbling and decided to do a drill. First, Jack dribbled with his right hand many times. Then, he did the same with his left hand. Lastly, he dribbled with both hands at the same time.
original_ending: When he was done, Jack was much better at dribbling.

endings.ending: Jack found that he was only good at dribbling with his left hand.
He wasn't good at dribbling with both hands and ended up dropping the ball a lot.
At the end of the day, he realized that dribbling is a matter of training.
Even though he trained a lot, he realized that his dribbling skills was not so good.
Once he was finished, he showered and went to sleep.
He considered how much his improvement would give him a better chance at being the MVP of his team.
A college recruiter noticed Jack practicing and told him he was a great and that he'd make a great addition to their team next year.
A group of older boys on the basketball court noticed his practicing and asked Jack if he wanted to join them for a game, Jack was excited.

story: Paul had to take out the garbage to the curb. He emptied all his small garbage cans into a large garbage can. He then took the large can out to the curb. Once the garbage man came, he brought his empty can back inside.
original_ending: Paul put a new bag in the can and then washed his hands.

endings.ending: He decided the can smelled, so decided to take it outside and scrub it out using the hose.
He completely forgot to put a new bag in the can until after he emptied the vacuum into it.
Paul realized he had put his bag of money in the big garbage can.
Paul felt good about getting rid of so much junk.
The can was smelling really bad so Paul decided to keep that out from his house.
and left it on the hallway.
When he looked in the can there was a face staring back at him.
The next day the can had mysteriously disappeared.

story: I stood on a street corner and waited to cross. On the other side of the street was my friend, also waiting. I waved at my friend but he did not notice me. A cab driver pulled up and thought I needed a ride.
original_ending: I told him to drive me to the other side of the street.

endings.ending: I told the cab driver I had no money to pay the fare.
I ignored him and walked to the other side of the street to catch my friend.
I waved the cab driver away as my friend was so close already.
Unhappy my friend didn't notice me, I got in the cab and asked to be taken to a cinema instead.
I said "sorry" and he continued on his day.
Awkwardly, I jumped in and went to school.
I told him that I did not need a ride and he drove away.
I went to get in his car, but he pulled away before I could.

story: I love to watch my greyhound run. One day I saw first-hand how quickly he can get up to 40MPH. He was playing with his buddies and suddenly they decided to run. I had no time to move out of the way, and then they were upon me.
original_ending: I flipped up into the air and crashed down to the ground head first.

endings.ending: I yelled stop and my dog managed to stop before hitting me.
I was knocked to ground and my dog was scared and tried to apologize to me.
The dogs were trying to be playful, even trying to give me some kisses.
One of the dogs hurt themselves running into me, I had to take it to the vet.
They sped by in a blur.
My dog stopped by me and all of his friends ran into him.
Suddenly, a stranger pulled me out of their path before I was run over.
Before I knew it, I awoke from slumber and found it was just a dream.

story: Gina was going to turn on a side street to escape traffic. The cars were backed up for blocks back to back. If she turned right she would have to fight to get back on the street. The street to the left was empty.
original_ending: Gina decided she would turn left to escape the traffic.

endings.ending: She had to turn right to get to her office so she was stuck in traffic.
she decided to park the car and walk instead.
Gina went right because she always follows her GPS.
A car bumped into Gina's rear as she hesitated with her decision.
After turning left, Gina realized she was going the wrong way on a one-way.
As soon as Gina turned left, the street immediately filled up in front of her.
Gina decided she would turn right where there was more traffic.
Gina stayed in her spot to battle through the traffic for the next two hours.

story: Dana wanted the sparkling red shoes she saw in the store window. Everyday after work, she would admire them from outside. When she saved enough money, she went in to buy them. The store clerk told her there was one pair left, a size too small.
original_ending: Dana walked out of the store painfully, wearing sparkling red shoes.

endings.ending: Dana was depressed and went across the street to the ice cream parlor to eat a pint of ice cream.
Dana decided to order the shoes online and wait a couple of days to receive the right size.
