Dana tried on the shoes, but they were too uncomfortable, so she left the store without them.
Dana then looked around the store and found a similar style of shoes in green, so she bought them.
After requesting the store clerk agreed to order a new pair for Dana.
After that Dana went to another store and found the exact same shoe.
She tugged and pulled trying to stretch them to fit her feet, but soon realized the folly of her purchase.
Dana decided that she'd just have to save her money for an even better pair that would surely come along.

story: Tom was skiing for the first time. He was going very well staying up on his skis. So he was allowed to take the T-bar up to one of the small hills. He was afraid he wouldn't be able to get off when it reached the top.
original_ending: He was a little shaky, but he got off the t-bar without falling.

endings.ending: He was distracted by a girl he wanted to impress and forgot his fear.
His buddies laughed when he fell getting off the T- bar but he jumped back on his skis and pretended nothing happened.
He decided to not take the T-bar.
He got off the T-bar and fell and broke his leg.
He thought that he lost his balanced for a while, but in the end he was able to accomplish the move with success.
He tried too hard to maintain his balance to no avail, which ended up with him falling on his front body and feeling giddy for a short period of time.
He could not overcome his fear and ended up giving up.
He skied so well on the small hill that he couldn't wait to go to the big ones.

story: My cousin, Mitzi, always kept her shoes on when we were kids. It is because of something that had happened to her when she was 7. Despite many warnings, Mitzi was barefoot on the back of a bicycle. When the bike sped up, Mitzi gripped her driver and drew in her feet.
original_ending: In the blink of an eye, seven of Mitzi's piggies said their goodbyes.

endings.ending: The driver slowed down when he noticed how scared Mitzi was.
Mitzi jumped off the bike because her feet were hurting.
In that moment, roller skates sprouted from Mitzi's feet and she safely got away.
Miraculously, Mitzi fell into a huge hole and was unharmed.
Mitzi ended up breaking her feet.
Mitzi ended up losing very expensive shoes.
Her cousin hit a rock on the road and the bike tipped, Mitzi broke her feet and learned a valuable lesson.
Mitzi's foot got stuck in the spokes when she pulled her feet back and tipped over the bike injuring both of them.

story: It was a Saturday morning, and Julie had no plans for the weekend. Out of boredom, she decided she would make a trip to the mall. She visited many stores and purchased two new blouses. After shopping, she went to see a movie by herself.
original_ending: She then went home and was happy about spending the day alone.

endings.ending: She decided to see a horror movie and after about 15 minutes she was thinking maybe watching this movie alone was not such a good idea.

Once, the movie was over, a friend of hers called and asked if she wanted to go to the movies. Not to be one to disappoint, Julie accepted and ended up watching the same movie later that evening with her friend.
Julie wished she had a boyfriend.
The movie was terrible.
The movie was boring and she slept through half of it.
She was that her friend from work was there and sat with them during the movie.
There she met Rob who later became her life partner.
She came home early as she started having migraine in the middle of the movie.

story: Anna really had to get to a meeting. She looked at her watch as she knew she was going to be late. As soon as she got in the car there was traffic. Anna bit her nails as she nervously waited.
original_ending: When she got to work her boss wrote her up for being late.

endings.ending: She called in and lied about why she was going to be late.
She decided to start driving on the shoulder.
Not only was traffic busy, Anna had to wait behind a train!
Anna's boss didn't notice her sneak into work through the back door, though.
Anticipating reaction of her boss, she texted him and quit her job on the spot.
That's how she got idea of Air-taxi startup.
When she got to work, she realized that a lot of people were late because of the accident, and the boss was ok with it.
Her boss didn't even know she was late, and she decided to not tell him.

story: Jack asked his parents for permission to buy a goldfish. His parents said yes, if he took care of it himself. Jack promised he would feed the fish every day and clean its tank. Jack went to the pet store and chose the biggest goldfish they had.
original_ending: He took great care of his fish, just like his parents had told him to.

endings.ending: Even thought he took good care of it the goldfish got sick and died.
He fed it every day but one day his cat attacked it and the gold fish stopped eating.
He didn't take care of the fish and it died.
It lived so long that he had to make a pond in the back yard for it to live in because it got too big to live in a tank.
After awhile the fish got lonely so Jack bought a second one.
Jack forgot to clean the fish bowl and the fish died.
Jack forgot to close the top of the tank one day, and their cat ate the goldfish.
Jack enjoyed having a goldfish so much, he asked if they would allow him to get another.

story: Esther was on her way to downtown LA. She took the wrong exit a little too east, ending up in Compton. She was clearly lost. Esther was just way too stubborn to ask for directions.
original_ending: So now she lives with Ray J in a Trap House.

endings.ending: So now she is homeless on the LA streets.
So now she lives with her cousin Maria in an apartment building.
She kept driving until she ended up on the freeway.
She found a police officer and asked how to get to downtown LA.
She drive around for hours before she eventually ran out of gas.
She ended up on the wrong street and ended up getting robbed at gunpoint.
She walked so far she ran out of gas.
a few meters ahead she took the U-turn.

story: Gina had been at her grandma's house for over a week. She had no idea when she would be returning. She wanted to call her friends to tell them when she would return. But her grandma didn't want her making long distance phone calls.
original_ending: Gina would need to buy a phone card to make the phone calls.

endings.ending: She did anyway and her gradma catched her doing it, they had a huge fight and grandma kicked her out of her home.
Gina's best friend surprisingly decided to pay her a visited and showed up the next day on Grandma's house, stayed a few days and went back home with the news of when Gina would be coming back.
Gina snuck the phone into her room after her grandma had went to bed and called her friends.
Gina used a payphone to call her friends that she saw when she and her grandma were at the mall.
One night after she put her grandma to sleep she drove a few miles until she got cell reception to talk with her friends for awhile before hurrying back.
One day while her grandma was sleeping Jenny quietly made some calls to her friends.
She felt like she was in prison and didn't even get one phone call.
Gina locked her grandmother in her bedroom and made her escape the next day.

story: Ali was in the third grade. She got along with everyone in her class. Ali found out a girl in another class hated her. Ali was confused because she had never met the girl.
original_ending: Ali decided she would find out who this girl was at lunch.

endings.ending: Ali decided to talk to the girl and they hit it off.
Ali ignored this fact and went on with his normal life.
Ali figured the girl was just jealous of her.
Ali asked her classmates if they knew why the girl didn't like her.
It turned out that there was a blood feud between their two families.
She only found out who it was when the girl ambushed her in the school restroom.
At recess, the girl punched Ali in the nose for no reason.
It turned out Ali's father had been having an affair with the girl's mother.

story: A girl walked into a clothing store and saw a shirt she liked. She asked the clerk if they had it in her size. The clerk only found sizes that were too small. The clerk took one shirt in the back and stretched it by hand.
original_ending: She brought it out to the girl and it fit perfectly.

endings.ending: The shirt was still too small for the girl so she picked something else out.
The shirt tore at the seams but she sold it to the girl anyway.
The girl tried it on but didn't like how it fit so she didn't buy it.
The clerk told her she found her size and showed her the stretched out shirt.
The clerk ripped the shirt as they stretched it, and had to throw it away.
The girl noticed that it was the same shirt, and accused the clerk of trying to cheat her.
It turned out the stretching didn't work and the girl left the store.
The clerk accidentally torn up the shirt so he had to pay for it.

story: It was Thanksgiving day. Sean was in charge of the turkey. All of the other food was ready and the table was set. When Sean checked the turkey, he saw that the bottom was still raw.
original_ending: Instead, he just cut some pieces from the top and served those.

endings.ending: Sean served it anyway and everyone got sick.
Sean decided to cook the turkey longer and it got completely burned.
Sean put the turkey back in the oven on high to finish cooking.
Sean decided to go out and pick up a cooked turkey from a local restaurant instead.
He threw it back in the oven.
He left it alone because he was too lazy to finish baking it.
Sean politely asked everyone to get out of his house.
Emerging from the kitchen, Sean sheepishly asked if everyone would be okay with rescheduling Thanksgiving for next week.

story: Chris loved animals very much. He wanted his mom to take him to the zoo. But they lived over an hour from any zoo, and gas was very expensive. Then his mom had a great idea.
original_ending: She took Chris to the pet store and let him see dozens of animals!

endings.ending: She set up a computer to watch a livestream of the Omaha zoo!
She went to the shelter, and bought him a puppy!
She sold their car, bought two train tickets and they headed for the circus to begin their new lives!
By leaving the front door open for several days, their house filled with animals of all stripes, birds, squirrels and the occasional coyote!
She took him to the library to look at picture books of zoo animals.
She took Chris on a hike to see the animals in the forest behind their house.
She dressed up like a monkey and called for Chris to come look.
She told Chris that he shouldn't waste time on frivolities like looking at animals.

story: Harold went for a long bike ride. He had a flat tire about five miles from home. Harold did not know how to fix a flat tire. He had to walk all the way home with his bike.
original_ending: After he got home, Harold taught himself how to fix a flat.

endings.ending: After he got home, Harold refused to learn how to fix a flat.
Harold watched a YouTube video on his phone to figure out how to fix that flat, and repaired it on the spot.
He decided to sell the bike and start running.
As soon as he got home Harold looked for inflatable tires.
Harold let this event deter him from riding his bike in future and fell out of shape over time.
The next day Harold woke up to blisters on his feet so he called out of work.
He finally got it fixed with the help of a YouTube tutorial.
When he got home he asked his dad for help and was able to fix his bike.

story: Amy rode the bus to work everyday. One day Amy left her bus card at home. She explained to the driver she had no card today. The driver suggested Any pay or go home and get the card.
original_ending: Amy was shocked the driver would be so rude after months of riding.

endings.ending: Amy paid the driver, and decided to get a lanyard for her pass so that she wouldn't forget it in future.
Amy realised that the driver was new to the route, and so didn't remember her.
Amy got off the bus and walked home instead.
Amy got her wallet out and paid cash instead.
The driver said to not worry about it since she was a loyal passenger.
Another passenger got up and paid her toll, and they talked the whole bus ride.
Amy dug some change out of her purse and paid the driver.
Amy got off the bus and went back to get her card.

story: Jenny and Mike bought a house. the first night they stayed there they kept hearing noises. They began to hear it more often as they were there longer. One day they hear it and got up to check it out.
original_ending: It was a cute little mouse so they trapped and killed it.

endings.ending: They found a squatter who claimed to be a tenant.
The house was haunted.
They knocked on their neighbor's door and found that the neighbor was a carpenter.
They found nothing and ended up selling the house and looking for a new home.
They  found that the prior owners of the house had left a strange clock that made noises each night at the same time.
They heard it coming from the attic and were surprised to find an open window with a loose shutter that made noise whenever the wind blew.
To their surprise there was an alien living in the attic and he turned out to be really nice.
They realized that the shutters were not latched and every time the wind blew they hit the house.

story: Jeff got into an argument with his basketball coach today. The coach kicked Jeff off the team in front of all the players. Jeff went home and barely slept because he was so upset. The next day at school the coach called Jeff into his office.
original_ending: He apologized to Jeff and offered him his spot back on the team.

endings.ending: He told Jeff he was suspended from the team for one week, but welcome back afterwards.
He demanded an apology from Jeff if he wanted a spot back on the roster.
The coach told Jeff to clear out his locker.
The coach said there was something Jeff could do if he wanted to get back on the team.
Jeff's coach told him that arguing was not acceptable and he was not allowed back on the team.
He offered Jeff his spot back on the team but Jeff refused and joined swimming instead.
The coach told Jeff to pack his things from his locker and get out.
Jeff sat down and coach explained he was having an off day and appreciated Jeff's input.

story: Angel got a big bonus for all of her hard work at her job. She decided to treat herself, but wasn't sure how. She chose to go shopping. She wanted new clothes anyhow.
original_ending: She went online and found a few outfits she liked and bought them.

endings.ending: However, once Angel realized all of her bills were coming due, she decided to pay them instead.
Yet, when Angel passed the pet store, she saw an adorable puppy and decided to buy it instead.
She went to the mall and spend the rest of the afternoon shopping for a new outfit.
However, when she went to her favorite store, they had no power and were closed for the rest of the day.
She went to a department store and spent most of her bonus on clothing.
She decided to go to the store but her car broke down so she had to use the bonus money to repair her car.
The store she decided to go shopping at was having a BOGO free sale and Angel was able to buy twice as much was very happy she decided to get new clothes that day.
The store she wanted to go shopping at was closed for renovations and Angel ended up not spending any of her bonus that day.

story: Will loved going to the beach on the weekends. He would play in the water and lay in the sun all day. On this weekend the sky was very gray. Will decided to go to the beach anyway.
original_ending: Will was disappointed at the amount of fog and went home.

endings.ending: Will played in the water as usual, but found no sun to lie down.
Will found the beach completely empty and felt as if the beach was all his own.
As luck would have it, the sun came out in the afternoon and he managed to sunbathe after all.
Will decided to try beachcombing instead of his usual sunbathing, and found that it was great fun!
A waterspout dropped from the sky, sucked up Will, and threw him a mile out into the water.
When he arrived, he saw a crowd surrounding a person whose leg was bitten by a Great White Shark.
The beach was surprisingly crowded and noisy, which made Will irritated.
On the way to the beach, Will got a call from a friend and decided to go to the movies with his friend.

story: John forgot to take the garbage out two weeks in a row. The garbage piled up on the side of the house. The neighbors called the police to complain about the garbage. The police came and talked to John.
original_ending: John had to remove the garbage and pay a fine.

endings.ending: John was arrested.
John said that his neighbors were throwing garbage on his side of the house.
They told him there was an organization who could help him remove the garbage.
John got angry and the officers arrested him for disorderly conduct.
John got advice from police to realize his fault.
John called to cleaning service agency to help him.
When the police were there, they smelled something odd in the garbage, and it turned out John was hiding drugs in the rubbish, so he got arrested.
It was a good thing they stopped by, too, since it turned out that John had fallen and broken his hip, so he was unable to walk to carry the garbage out.

story: Sam took his lunch break by the pond outside his office building. He had too much food, so he decided to share. He walked over to the water to throw scraps to the geese. One goose jumped out of the water to chase him!
original_ending: He dropped the scraps as he ran from the goose.

endings.ending: He gave the goose extra food and it ran the other way.
The goose caught up to Sam and took all his food.
But Sam somehow managed to calm down that goose.
Goose was very slow and Sam was able to run away from him.
Sam was shouting when he saw the goose.
Sam wish to take picture the goose.
The goose easily caught him and bit him hard, it really hurt!
A hunter had been watching the goose and shot at that exact moment, accidentally hitting Sam in the leg.

story: Sandra was walking to the store. She passed a little girl who was crying on her front steps. Sandra asked her what was wrong. The little girl said she was locked out of her house.
original_ending: Sandra sat down and waited with her for her parents to come home.

endings.ending: Sandra walked around the girls house and found an open window and helped her get inside.
Sandra waited with the girl for an hour before realizing nobody was coming home, she took the girl to their neighbors house and left the girl safely there.
Sandra asked the child if her parents had a phone number.
Sandra left and didn't care.
Sandra picked up a rock and smashed a window and let the little girl into her house.
Sandra called the police and they took the girl away due to her parent's neglect.
Luckily the little girl knew her mom's phone number, and so Sandra called her to let the girl in.
Sandra took the girl home with her, and it was very cold outside.

story: My goldfish was behaving weirdly. I called the vet and he said the fish was sick. I went to the vet and bought medicine for the pet. I went back home and put the medicine in the water.
original_ending: After a few days of this, the fish got better again.

endings.ending: The fish had an allergic reaction to the medicine and was sick for two more weeks.
The medicine worked after only one day and my goldfish was happy again.
The medicine didn't work and my fish died.
My fish circled around with more energy again.
To my surprise, we discovered the goldfish was pregnant, not sick, and ended up having babies.
After seeing my goldfish quickly recover, I decided I wanted to become a vet when I grew up.
The next morning I found my little friend floating upside down in the bowl.
Somehow, the medicine that the vet gave me turned my goldfish into a black fish!

story: I woke up one morning and my newborn baby was screaming. My wife checked his diaper, but it appeared to be fine. She asked me if I could go and make a bottle for the baby. I left the room and walked to the kitchen and prepared a bottle.
original_ending: I came back, gave the baby the bottle, and then the screaming stopped.

endings.ending: There was a cockroach in the bottle, so I had to go out and buy a new one.
I came back and gave the baby the bottle, but the screaming continued, so I had to warm the bottle up so the baby enjoyed it more.
By the time I got back to the room with the bottle the baby was sleeping peacefully.
While there I also made my self a sandwich and cup of soup.
When I took the bottle it was very hot.
After giving the milk, the baby continued to cry.
While I was waiting for the formula to warm up my wife quietly entered the room and whispered that the baby had fallen back asleep on its own.
The bottle didn't help and we had to stay up comforting the crying baby for hours before it settled down.

story: Joe dreamed of being the fastest kid in his 3rd grade class. His friends always held races during recess. Joe practiced constantly, striving to be the best. But when the races started that year, a girl named Lisa won the race.
original_ending: Joe was disappointed, but decided he would not stop trying.

endings.ending: Joe decided to trip Lisa one day so that she would hurt her leg and not be able to run.
Joe asked Lisa to help him learn how to run faster.
If only he had not tripped he would have won the race.
Joe decided that if he could not be the best at running he would be the best basketball player instead.
All of his classmates teased him.
Since then Joe hates Lisa a lot.
Joe got in second place and was proud because he had improved a lot.
Joe  felt defeated, he practiced even harder and with the year he became the US track champion.

story: Ryan was always good at baking items. His mother also wanted a cake for her birthday. Ryan stayed up all night baking a cake for her. It was a very big cake and had a lot of sprinkles as well.
original_ending: Ryan and his mom enjoyed the cake while celebrating her birthday.

endings.ending: Ryan was so tired from baking the cake that he slept all day and missed his mother's birthday.
The next morning Ryan found the cake sitting on the floor, because the leg of the table had broken and the cake slid off.
As he carried the cake over to the kitchen table to eat with his mom, he slipped and fell face-first into the cake he was carrying!
As they shared the cake, Ryan's mom told him he should become a professional baker and he decided to give it a shot!
Ryan's mom doesn't liked the cake.
Ryan's cake fell and it made all the hard work go in vain.
Ryan was so tired of having made the cake that he ended up missing the party.
Ryan ate the entire cake by himself the next day.

story: When I was a boy my parents used to take my brother and I to the park. We would play and have a lunch and just walk around. One day the park all the picnic benches were full we had one. These two police officers has come up and ask if they could join us.
original_ending: After they had lets us operate the police car lights and siren .

endings.ending: We didn't like the look of the police officers so we politely declined.
One of the police officers took one of my brother's sandwiches and he was not at all happy.
We became friends and regularly started meeting.
We later found out that they were fake police and are actually robbers.
Then we asked if we could turn on the siren light, they wouldn't let us.
My parents said no.
My parents said no and they went on their own way.
We all enjoyed talking about guns.

story: A rock was loose in the curb. A truck came along and knocked it from the curb. The rock now lay in the middle of the street. Another car came along and ran it over.
original_ending: The rock caused the car to get a flat tire.

endings.ending: The weight of the car crushed the rock into smaller pebbles.
Hitting the rock made the driver lose control, and they crashed into the side of the road!
The bump caused the driver of the car to hit their head on the ceiling.
The car then skidded off the road and into a busy gas station parking lot.
The car skidded and crashed into a tree.
After some time, when no one was around, the rock went back to the curb on it's own.
A rock had removed from street for better service.
A car driver had informed about this rock to other persons.

story: Butters was a very pretty cat but she was also very curious. One day she sneaked out of her house through an open door. She spent the entire day outside looking around and exploring. When she wanted to go back into her warm house the door was closed!
original_ending: She was very grateful when her owner noticed her and let her back in.

endings.ending: She was stuck outside in the cold all night and almost caught her death!
Luckily, one of the neighbors found her and kept her until her owners noticed she was gone.
Butters started scratching the door.
She decided if she ever got inside she would never go outside again.
Her owners were on vacation so she was stuck outside for a week.
She went to the neighbor's house and they took her in.
Butters screamed loudly for half an hour but her owner didn't wake up so she had to sleep outside.
Butters tried to enter the house via the chimney but she got stuck in it so her owner had to call someone to rescue her.

story: When the summer came, Rico had to move back home. He was sad because he had made many new friends in Iowa. On the last day of school, Rico exchanged addresses with his friends. When Rico arrived home, he already had letters waiting for him.
original_ending: Rico has many new pen pals that he writes to every week.

endings.ending: He expected a letter from one of his dearest friends but it never arrived.
He didn't like writing letters so he never wrote back.
He gathered them up and put them in "Rico's Mail Bag", from which he would select one a day to read aloud on his nationally syndicated late-night television show, Late Nite with Rico.

One of the letters was in a very shiny golden envelope, and when he opened it he was showered with confetti and saw a message that read: "The entire state of Iowa is lost without you, please come back Rico, we need you!!".
But the number of letters reduced as the days went by.
He wrote replies for all the letters and sent them through his owl.
Rico realizes he has more friends than he thought.
He answered all the letters but after a while he realized that writing letters is boring.

story: Cedric had written a play for Drama class. His teacher chose to put it on as it was very good. A girl Cedric liked tried out for the female lead. Her boyfriend tried out for the male lead.
original_ending: Cedric cast himself as the male but when the girl found out she quit.

endings.ending: The boyfriend was an excellent actor and got the part but the girl did not.
Cedric decided to play both parts himself.
The girl he liked got the lead, and Cedric got the lead over the her boyfriend, they became close friends during rehearsals.
Cedric got the lead over her boyfriend, but the boyfriend threatened Cedric until he quit.
Cedric told the teacher that the boyfriend did not capture the essence of the role properly.
Cedric unintentionally brought the girl closer to her boyfriend after they both landed the roles.
Cedric didn't end up casting the girl, but her boyfriend was a natural performer and Cedric gave him the starring role.
Cedric revised the play so that the male lead was killed off during the first act.

story: Max had a loose tooth. He wiggled it with his tongue at school. The tooth fell out at lunchtime. Max put his tooth under his pillow that night for the Tooth Fairy.
original_ending: When Max woke up the next morning, he found a shiny gold coin.

endings.ending: He was very sad when he woke up and found the tooth still under his pillow.
Next day, Max found a letter from the Tooth Fairy with $50 in it!
The Tooth Fairy never came.
The next morning, Max's parents told him the Tooth Fairy isn't real.
Max was excited the next morning to find some money under his pillow.
In the morning, Max was sad to find that his tooth was still under his pillow.
Max didn't slept the whole night waiting for the tooth fairy.
Max was very excited to get his coin from fairy.

story: Tina got home from work one day very tired. She cooked her kids food and went to the tub to relax. She got her tub nice and ready and then climbed in. Right as she got in the water, she heard a loud crash in the house.
original_ending: Tina drained her tub as she rushed to stop her kids from misbehaving.

endings.ending: Her kids dropped a plate off of the table.
The kid's father came home and dropped a bunch of boxes off.
suddenly the dog busted through the door.
someone had thrown a ball through the window!
She left the tub filled and went to check outside, their cat knocked over a plant.
Her husband told Tina It was ok, so she got into the tub.
She decided to ignore the sound and deal with it after her bath.
Tina was so upset that her bath was ruined right as it began.

story: I took my first plane ride today. We boarded the plane and got in our seats. I was so nervous as I buckled my seat belt. The plane shook as it rose into the air.
original_ending: I loved seeing all the fluffy clouds in the sky.

endings.ending: Hours later as the plane spiraled towards the ground, I wondered why I hadn't just taken the train.
Once we reached cruising altitude, I put on some headphones and resolved to sleep through the flight as a means of ignoring my discomfort.
One of the engines cached on fire, I was then scared.
Turbulence hit and we had to head back, I'm never stepping on a plane again.
There was terrible turbulence and I swore to never ride a plane again.
The plane kept rising up and all of a sudden we were in space.
Then my stomach started hurting and I had vomiting.
It was a terrifying experience for me.

story: Jessie had just arrived at school. She saw that not a lot of people were there. She realized that today there was no school due to testing. She was supposed to call her dad to pick her up.
original_ending: Instead, she decided to go out and hang out with friends.

endings.ending: Except her cell phone would not work, so Jessie decided to walk home.
Seizing the opportunity, Jessie decided to join the school basketball team which was practicing that day.
Instead, she called her bestie so that they could go to the mall.
However, she decided to catch the next bus home, as she was in no rush to return home.
Her dad came and picked her up.
Her dad didn't pick up her phone call.
So she made the call and returned home with her father.
Instead she went to the library to study.

story: Our son turns 27 this week. We gave him money for an Xbox. He was going to combine the cash with a Best Buy gift card he had. He looked everywhere for his card and thought he lost it.
original_ending: Luckily he found the card and was able to get his birthday gift.

endings.ending: After a lot of search he was not able to find the gift card.
Then he remembered he already spend that gift card on something else.
As he was missing a part of the money, he did some errands in exchange for money and bought an Xbox.
He didn't find the card so he couldn't buy the gift and ended up getting sad.
Until his sister apologized for using the card and said she would make it up to him.
When suddenly the cat came running by with a card sticking out of it's mouth.
When it wasn't found, Dad came up with a few chores that covered the difference and saved the day.
The day ended with a birthday lesson to keep your valuables safe that was learned the hard way.

story: Joan had always wanted to participate in a chess tournament. Finally there was a tournament coming to her hometown. Joan competed and took second place in the tournament. Her friends and family were all very proud.
original_ending: Joan is so happy with her results at the chess tournament.

endings.ending: A local newspaper found out about Joan's impressive finish and wrote a piece about her in the paper.
Joan realized she had a real talent for chess and decided to take on teaching others how to play too.
Joan was asked if she would teach a group of high school kids how to play better.
Joan became a local celebrity over her chess skills and it went to her head causing people not to like her anymore.
Joan was happy with her results but wanted to do better time, she practiced even more and won the next tournament.
Joan was so disappointed she didn't win that she pouted and sulked for weeks and stopped playing chess.
Joan was disappointed she wanted to get the first place.
Joan got invited to another tournament, everyone was impressed.

story: The old man was tired of work and wanted to go on vacation. The old man looked at a map and picked a destination. The old man went on vacation to his destination. The old man was lonely on his vacation.
original_ending: The old man realized that home was the best place.

endings.ending: The old man then found a stray dog who become his loving companion for this vacation and many more.
He realized that it wasn't the destination that was important but the people you share it with.
The old man called a friend and invited them on the trip.
The old man decided to visit another location, hoping it wouldn't be as lonely.
Then he made some friends at the new destination and had a great time.
But he found a place nearby where party is organized so he joined that party.
The old man asked the rest of his family to join him and the vacation became much better.
The old man decided to go to a new place where there were a lot more people and he could have a good time.

story: Danielle needed to buy new clothes for school. She asked her mom for some money. Instead, her mom offered to pay her for some work. Danielle spent the next week working for her mom.
original_ending: At the end of the week, she had a ton of money to buy clothes.

endings.ending: After working for the money, she decided to save it instead of spend it.
Much to her dismay, her Mother wrote her an IOU instead of paying her for her work.
Her mom was so happy that she not only paid her but bought her the new clothes as well.
She was so tired that she did not have the energy to go shopping for the new clothes.
Which in the end wasn't enough money to buy new clothes, so she sneaked to her mom's purse and got some money.
When she was going to the store to buy her clothes with the money she earned, a guy near the entrance asked if she could donate him money to feed his kids and she did.
Her mom gave her double what was promised.
Danielle ended up using the money on candy.

story: Gina bought a whole box of round fudge snack cakes. She didn't intend to share them with her siblings. But as soon as she got home they all milled around. She only had 8 cakes, and wanted to save them for later.
original_ending: By the time they left she was down to 3.

endings.ending: Obviously there was no way for her to save them later, so she decided to share the joy of eating together.
She decided to tell a white lie that indeed the cakes were intended for an experimental purpose, so that she could dissuade her siblings from eating.
She gave them each one and saved the rest for herself for later.
She told them no loudly and ran off with the snacks.
Gina took wrapping paper and made the box look like a present, knowing that all 8 would be there later.
Gina told her family that the snack cakes were for after watching a movie about how the cakes were made.
She realized family was more important and was happy to share.
She changed her mind and ate the extra 3 all in one go.

story: Sid did hours research for a science project. He worked tirelessly building his model rocket in the garage. Upon completion, his model was by far the greatest in the class! One day, Sid's brother came into the garage with a candle.
original_ending: He tripped over a wire and Sid's whole project went up in flames!

endings.ending: Sid was inspired by his brother and wanted to see his project.
As he was getting closer to the rocket, a gust of wind came in from the open window and put out the candle.
Sid blew out the candle.
Sid's brother wanted to warm up Sid.
Sid's brother studied the model by candlelight, wishing he had the talent his brother had.
Sid's brother used the candle to light the fuse to launch the rocket, and it shot up through the garage roof!
He had an idea to improve the rocket and ran to tell Sid.
He looked for how the rocket would launch, but couldn't find it.

story: My instructor told me to wash my hands before going to the kitchen. I put on my apron and gloves for safety. He showed gave me some raw macaroni to boil. I placed it in the pot and added it with salt and pepper.
original_ending: 20 minutes later, I took out the pasta and it came out cooked.

endings.ending: I then seared the chicken on both sides, and slow-grilled it until the pasta dish was ready.
It would've helped if I had turned the burner on, realizing it about 10 minutes later when the water still wasn't boiling.
I totally forgot about it and almost caused a fire in the kitchen.
The macaroni tasted awesome and my instructor said I got some real cooking talent.
The pepper clumped together in the water and ruined the pasta.
I felt silly learning something as simple as how to boil pasta in my cooking class.
30 minutes later, I took out the pasta and it came out burned.
10 minutes later, I took out the pasta and it was still raw.

story: Marlene wanted to make cookies but didn't know how. She asked her mom to show her. Marlene's mom got out the cookie dough and heated the oven. She helped Marlene form the dough into balls and put them on the tray.
original_ending: The cookies were so delicious when the came out of the oven hot.

endings.ending: From then on Marlene always helped her mom with the baking because she enjoyed making the cookies so much.
While working the dough, Marlene ate so much of it that she felt too sick to even try one of the cookies after they had baked.
As a novice she prepared them a little bit too greasy, other than that they were delicious and both enjoyed them together along with the afternoon tea.
She kept them a little bit longer in the oven, which then led the cookies to turn out browner and bitter tasting than they should.
She didn't tell Marlene to set a timer and the cookies ended up burning.
Marlene invited her friends to try the cookies that "she" had made.
But Marlene's cookies became burnt when she forgot to take them out of the oven.
Marlene shaped some of the cookies to look like her favorite shapes.

story: Missy was at a fourth of July party. Her brother thought it would be funny to prank her. He ran up to her and pushed her into the pool. She yelled because her phone was in her pocket.
original_ending: Her brother apologized and promised to pay to fix the phone.

endings.ending: She quickly checked her phone and fortunately it was working.
She complained to her mother but her brother ran away in fear.
The phone fell out of her pocket and settled on the bottom of the pool.
Thinking quickly, Missy threw the phone into the grass before she hit the water.
They put the wet phone in rice and it ended up working again.
As it turned out, her phone was actually on the table.
She advised to her brother about his mistake.
She had put her phone in dry place to recover it.

story: My daughter is afraid to try new foods. I was happy that I talked her into trying a bag of mixed nuts. Soon after she ate some of the nuts she stopped breathing. In a panic, I called 911.
original_ending: She lived but found out the hard way that she has a severe nut allergy

endings.ending: Unfortunately, they failed to make it to the scene in time to save her.
Waiting for them to arrive, I started to give her the Heimlich and after a few attempts she spat out the nut she had been choking on!
It turned out my daughter was playing a prank on me, I grounded her one week for being naughty.
My daughter ended up in ICU for two days and my wife was furious about it.
I couldn't stop crying on the way to the hospital.
The operator told me to give her water as we waited for help.
Luckily they arrived in time to retrieve a surprisingly large nut that she'd accidentally inhaled into her airway.
But it was too late, she died before they arrived and I never could bear to taste or even see a nut again.

story: Paul bought a small gift for Cindy for her Birthday. He didn't spend a lot of money, but he spent a lot of time choosing. The gift was a small brass mouse with a long tail. No one at the birthday party thought much of it at all.
original_ending: Cindy knew it was the most thoughtful gift she got that day.

endings.ending: Cindy didn't really like the gift.
Cindy was upset because she was expecting something else.
Cindy did not know the significance of the gift she received that day.
Cindy pretended to like it, but went to the bathroom afterwards and cried in disappointment.
After the party, Paul called Cindy by her nickname, the desert mouse.
Cindy conducted research in a laboratory using mice and she thought it was a way to memorialize all the mice from the past.
Cindy didn't like the gift at all, but acted like she loved it so Paul wouldn't get offended.
Paul ended up dropping the mouse and it broke right in front of Cindy.

story: Ted's car constantly had battery problems. But he didn't want to spend anymore money at the mechanic. So Ted spent a lot of time studying cars. And eventually, he was able to fix his car battery problems for good.
original_ending: Ted was happy that he no longer had to go the mechanic.

endings.ending: After this, he decided to become a mechanic.
This inspired him to invent a car battery that would last forever.
Ted saw he could make money fixing other people's cars.
Ted told everyone what he learned to do.
At least he thought, as after he thought he fixed his problem the next time he drove the car it shut off on the freeway.
Ted decided he didn't want that car anymore and decided to sell it.
Soon after, Ted was involved in an accident that totaled the car, forcing him to buy a new one.
Unfortunately, Ted then started having brake problems, which he knew nothing about yet.

story: Tom's son wanted to watch a real car race. So Tom and his son went to a famous race course to watch one. It was a 200 lap race. And Tom's son quickly got bored.
original_ending: He felt was embarrassed for wanting to watch the race.

endings.ending: His son started looking for ways to entertain himself and ended up wandering off onto the track that caused a 3 car collision.
As soon as Tom noticed he grabbed up his son and delightedly left the race to go to the movies and get ice cream instead.
So they decided to leave a catch the new Spider-Man movie at the near cinema.
Tom decided that he didn't want to let the love for races die in his son, so he spiced things up by tooking him to a Kart circuit to drive his own car and he loved.
Tom admonished his son for irrational behaviour.
Tom's son faked excitement when cameraman pointed camera on him.
So, Tom went and got some hotdogs and sodas and his son said "Hotdogs make everything better!".
After a few minutes it started raining and the race was canceled. Tom was relieved because they were able to get their money back and go do something that his son would enjoy more.

story: Kayla was on her way to school one morning. She made sure to grab her hot cocoa mug on the way out. At her bus stop, she was cold so she took a sip. The sip was so hot she immediately spit it out as her mouth burned.
original_ending: For the rest of the day her mouth hurt from the burn.

endings.ending: Others who were at the bus stop laughed.
Ten minutes later, she sipped again and it burned herself again.
She went to the doctor who gave her a prescription cream to help the burn heal.
Kayla threw the cocoa at the wall in a fit of rage.
Instead, like a dragon, fire came out of her mouth.
It led to break-up of her friendship as the coffee fell on new dress of her friend.
Everyone at the bus stop gave Kayla a strange and awkward look.
So she just waited for the drink to cool down a bit and enjoyed it.

story: Rita loved riding her bike down the trails of the state park. While she was riding, she came across a bear. She immediately hit a side path. She pedaled as fast as she could out of the state park.
original_ending: Rita will now only go on the trails when she is with friends.

endings.ending: Rita decided to look for another place to ride.
Talking with friends Rita discovered that the bear was scenographic.
Fortunately there was a park ranger who honked constantly to drive off the bear.
The "bear" was actually a giant black dog, his owner apologized to Rita and they had a laugh about it.
The bear simply looked at her, seemingly wondering why she had been rushing through its house.
She unfortunately took the wrong path and ended up going deeper into the woods.
Rita has not been back to the state park since.
Rita has not let it stop her from enjoying the state park though and returned the next day.

story: Jacky was doing dishes when she heard a scream from outside. She ran out and saw that her son had fallen off his bike. She rushed to his side and picked him up. Her son cried and pointed at a scrape on his elbow.
original_ending: Jacky kissed his elbow and he felt a lot better!

endings.ending: His arm was broken and she had to rush him to the hospital.
Jacky jumped right back up and got on his bike.
Jacky looked at her son and sternly said "this is how you learn to be careful."
Jacky jabbed her finger into the wound and her son cried out in pain.
The cut was deep and Jacky decided to take him to the hospital.
The wound had begun to fester, meaning that it had been received much earlier than the current incident.
Jacky rushed him to the hospital to be checked for a concussion.
She picked up his bike, and found that there wasn't even a scratch on it.

story: Jim wants to see an action movie but Jen wants to see a romantic one. They flip a coin to see which one to go to and Jim won the coin toss. Jim could still see that Jen was a little upset. He offered that they go see the romantic movie that night.
original_ending: Jen was so happy that she went to see Jim's movie the next night.

endings.ending: However, this was all an elaborate ruse by Jim, as the movie they were seeing still had fight scenes in it.
Touched by Jim's kindness, Jen relented and they saw the action movie instead.
Jen refused the offer and they went to see an action movie.
They went to see the romantic movie and Jim ended up really enjoying it.
It turned out to be a good decision because Jen really enjoyed the movie.
Jim regretted seeing the movie because Jen was crying all night.
Jen was angry and did not go see Jim's movie the next night.
Jen felt cheated, and demanded a second flip of the coin until she got her way.

story: I decided I wanted to read a nonfiction book this afternoon. After thinking about different books, I decided on store and left. The drive there was simple and quick. Once at the store I was able to find my book quickly and check out.
original_ending: I took my book home and proceeded to read it.

endings.ending: This left me with more time to relax and enjoy my book.
Unfortunately, my afternoon plans were ruined when I went to leave and saw that someone had ran into my car, totaling it.
I realized I bought the wrong book by accident when I got home.
I then realized I was not able to find my wallet at the check out stand.
I was a little tired, so I went next door to get some coffee and enjoy my book.
As I was walking out the store, a kid ran by and stole my book.
After buying the book, I couldn't wait and started to read in the car.
I was so into my new book, I was reading while making dinner at home.

story: Amy's aunt Rita was visiting from out of town. Rita decided to make french toast one day as they were talking. Amy had never made french toast at home before. Rita showed Amy how to make french toast.
original_ending: They had a great time talking, laughing, and eating french toast.

endings.ending: Amy cursed her aunt when she suffered burns while trying to make french toast on her own.
Amy became a famous chef when she made this dish in a cooking contest.
Amy really didn't like touching the raw egg so she refused to help.
Amy wasn't interested in learning so she went to watch tv until it was done.
Amy doesn't liked the taste of french toast.
They had a fight because no one was ready to clean the kitchen after cooking.
It was delicious.
Amy wanted to make French toast every day after that.

story: Joe was on the beach with some friends. Down the beach the sea oats were on fire. Joe had gone to see what was going on. When he arrived everyone was just watching the fire.
original_ending: Joe started to throw sand on the fire, people joined in and stopped it.

endings.ending: Fire was set to clear that area, they said.
A water truck arrived next and solved the problem.
Joe joined them and watched the show.
Just then goddess of sea comes out of sea, douses fire and curses everyone present of being reborn as moth in next life that willingly dies in fire.
Joe called emergency services who were unable to put the fire out in time.
Rather than fret, Joe decided to find marshmallows so that he could roast them over an open flame.
They explained to Joe that the sea oats needed to be burned.
In a few moments firefighters arrived and brought the fire under control.

story: Aaron loved playing tag. He would tag anyone and just yell out they were it. He did not care if you were old or a baby, you were it. When he tagged his friend Jacob his pinky got caught in his shirt.
original_ending: His pinky may have broken, but his doctor is still it.

endings.ending: By the time he untangled it Jacob had retagged him, and he had to keep running around looking for a new "it".
He ripped a hole in Jacob's shirt, and Jacob refused to play tag with him every again.
Jacob helped Aaron get his finger out, now Jacob tagged the mailman.
A mother walked by and asked Jacob if he was alright, his finger is sore but managing.
while running he tore his friend's shirt.
His hand got stuck and he was easily caught in the game.
They both giggled because it's impossible to play tag when you are attached to one another.
Because he couldn't get away, Jacob tagged him straight back.

story: Fred had a huge crush on a girl in his class. But Fred was scared to speak to the girl because he was unpopular. Fred finally got the courage to speak to the girl's friend. The friend told Fred that the girl secretly liked him too.
original_ending: When Fred finally spoke to the girl, they got along great.

endings.ending: Fred believed what his friend said and spread the news to the entire school, even without first making sure it was true.
Despite his friend Fred's statement, he didn't believe it and always kept to himself all the feeling he had for his schoolmate.
Fred didn't believe her and continued to admire the girl from afar.
He asked her to the next dance and they ended up together for many years.
They decided to chat online before talking in person.
The first time they met there was 17 minutes of silence.
when he talked to the girl she was rude to him and her friend was lying.
he was too scared to talk to the girl so he never did.

story: A man paddled his canoe down stream to a small bridge. He banked his canoe and started walking to the bridge. At the top he tripped over the railing and fell down. In the air he felt like he was flying.
original_ending: It was so fun that he decided to do it all over again.

endings.ending: But he hurt his knee when he landed.
He questioned whether he should continue paddling his canoe.
It made him to enjoy a better travel in stream.
He got a new experience in this stream with nature.
Despite the adrenaline rush, he swore to be much more careful in the future.
It wasn't until he landed that he realized his canoe was being carried away down stream.
It was the last thought he ever had.
He realized it was because someone had grabbed him and held him mid-air.

story: Snow fell on my sidewalk overnight. I had to wake up early to shovel it all. My neighbor saw me and walked over. He told me that it would be nice if I did his sidewalk too.
original_ending: I laughed in his face and went back to shoveling.

endings.ending: I asked if he would pay me and he said "yes."
I did his sidewalk for free and continued to do his sidewalk all winter.
I asked how much he would give me.
Since I enjoy serving others, I was happy to help him.
I told him I would only do his if he paid me.
I agreed and told him I would do his if I had time.
I smiled and told him that I would be happy to do so as soon as I was done with mine.
I looked him in the eye and asked him if twenty dollars and hour would be an acceptable rate to hire me for the job.

story: I was in the bathroom getting ready to shave. My son snuck in to see what I was doing. He saw the shaving cream on my face and said I looked like Santa Claus I told him that maybe I actually was the real Santa Claus.
original_ending: He ran out of the room and asked his mom if I was lying.

endings.ending: I told him it was a secret and he couldn't tell a single soul.
I grabbed him for a hug and got shaving cream all over him.
He quickly ran from the room and returned with cookies and milk for Santa.
He sat on top of the toilet and started reciting his list of presents.
He smiled, knowing that Santa lived in the North Pole.
He yelled with glee and ran off to make his Christmas list.
My son ran to the phone to tell his friends his dad was Santa Claus.
He tripped on the way out and hurt himself, I told him he would be ok because I'm Santa Claus.

story: Sarah was walking to the school spelling bee. She had studied hard but was nervous. On her way, she looked down and saw a shiny penny. Hoping it would bring her good luck, she picked it up.
original_ending: When she won she said it was because of her lucky penny!

endings.ending: She saw another nervous girl practicing for the spelling bee, and decided to give the penny to her to cheer her up.
She lost the spelling bee and learned that superstitions are silly that day.
She came last in contest and blamed it on the cursed penny.
The penny owner sued her.
Sarah got last in the spelling bee so she decided to toss the penny away.
Sarah won the spelling bee and picked up every penny from that day forward.
She won the spelling bee and ended up carrying it with her every where.
She lost the spelling bee and decided to throw the penny in a fountain.

story: Dan decided to dress as the Easter Bunny for his kids. He picked up the costume his wife ordered online. When he put the costume on it was too big. He went to the yard to see the kids wearing the hideously large suit.
original_ending: The children began screaming when they saw the monster bunny.

endings.ending: The kids all came up to hug the Easter Bunny and ask him for candy.
Dan's kids were embarrassed to see their dad in such an ugly suit.
The kids still loved Dan as the bunny.
Dan handed out candy.
The kids attacked him thinking of him as alien invader.
Kids were glad that their dad came to play with them, so they played along.
The kids loved the costume and decided they wanted a big one too, so we all went to a store and bought costumes so everyone could have Easter fun.
The kids found the costume really funny and they started playing all day with it.

story: Mary had always gotten good grades in school, but failed a test. She was sad when she saw she had been given a F. Mary cried when she saw the bad grade. Mary asked the teacher if she could take the test again.
original_ending: The teacher agreed and let her take the test again for a better grade.

endings.ending: The teacher told her no and gave her detention for asking.
Mary retook the test but still got a failing grade.
Mary was denied a retake, but she was offered to complete extra credit work.
Mary's parents were upset about her grade, but she insisted It wouldn't hurt her overall grade.
She wasn't allowed to retake the test, but she got to do some extra credit work.
The teacher decided to throw out the grade for everyone since all their grades were poor on it.
The teacher told her she should have concentrated harder on the original test.
The teacher look at Mary's test paper and realized she had given her the wrong mark and corrected it to a C.

story: John decided he wanted to move to a new state. Before he could move he needed to sell his house. A buyer offered John a good price for his house. John sold the house.
original_ending: He was happy that he could now move to a new state.

endings.ending: John did not like the new house.
In his new home he found a leak on top of his bed.
With his budget in mind, John began to shop for new houses in his desired state.
John was upset at how much his house sold for, so he was unsure if he would be able to relocate to another state.
He used the money to pay off other debt.
John took the money and invested it well.
John was sad to sell the house.
John packed his bags and headed towards his future.

story: Yesterday I ate a bug. I had never eaten a bug before, but yesterday was different. I poured a bowl of cereal and took a big bite. Then I noticed the bugs running around in my bowl.
original_ending: I must admit that bugs are quite tasty in breakfast cereal.

endings.ending: My friend told me bugs were nice to eat but after eating one I can only disagree most strongly.
The bug didn't taste bad but gave me a very nasty upset stomach.
I jumped up and threw my bowl in the sink and ran out of the room screaming!
I immediately looked in the box to see if that's where they came from and the cereal box was full of nothing but bugs!
I screamed and knocked the bowl off the table.
I took a picture with my cellphone, and called the grocery store to complain of their faulty product.
The taste was quite sour and I never want to eat these insects again.
I threw up all the cereal, I couldn't chew those crunchy bugs.

story: Heidi needed to take the bus to her parents house. She was broke and had no money. Just to try she begged the driver to let her ride. Luckily, he offered to pay for her fair one time.
original_ending: She was so grateful and made sure to pay him back.

endings.ending: Heidi was so happy with the bus drivers actions that she contacted the bus company and praised him.
When Heidi sat down a woman across from her berated her for the position she put the driver in.
The driver told her to get lost if she didn't have money.
Another passenger heard her plea and ended up giving her the money for the fiar.
When Heidi got off the bus, she saw her Mom was waiting for her with their dog named Skippy.
Heidi found a lottery ticket on her seat and she decided to give it to the bus driver to thank him for helping her.
When she went to return home she borrowed the bus fare from her parents, but she was embarrassed she had to do so.
She tried to get on the bus the next weekend but the driver wouldn't let her and she had to hitchhike to visit her parents.

story: May was a teacher at a high school. She had come to hate her job. At finals she gave the students a relatively easy assignment. She was shocked to see there was little effort from the students.
original_ending: May decided to just give everyone a passing grade and be done with it.

endings.ending: She failed everyone, to get their attention.
May let the students take the test open-book, so that they wouldn't all fail.
May gave all the students a failing grade and felt like they all deserved it.
May decided to call their parents and tell them how poorly the students had performed.
May felt bad but she knew that she had to fail some students.
May decided to give everyone another chance and let them retake the exam.
She discovered that her lack of enthusiasm had carried over to her students.
She redoubled her efforts and found a new interest in her job and her students.

story: Kim accidentally took her Dad's lunch to school instead of her own. At lunch time she was horrified to see a sardine sandwich! Tom was sitting near her and begged her to trade with him. She accepted not knowing what she was getting.
original_ending: To her surprise it was her favorite peanut butter and Jelly!

endings.ending: She was dismayed to find that her lunch was now tuna salad.
She told her father he wasn't allowed to have sardines anymore, so it wouldn't happen again.
To her surprise the lunch box was empty.
She got frustrated as soon as she opened the lunch box filled with her least liked cauliflower.
She couldn't believe that anyone would want that.
She ended up getting a ham sandwich, but she didn't like it much.
It was still fish - but tuna was much better than the horrid sardines!
She gave Tom the sardine sandwich but didn't accept his as the sight of the sardines had ruined her appetite.

story: One day Paul found a bush with large berries. He was very tempted to eat them but he didn't. He picked one and took it to his dad to check out. His dad said it was safe to eat so Paul ate some.
original_ending: They were so good that he picked enough for the whole family.

endings.ending: Paul's dad ate some too but they gave him diarrhea.
When Paul returned to pick the berries they had all already been plucked!
Paul's dad was wrong and Paul got sick.
He later learned that they were wild huckleberries.
It turned out his dad was wrong about the berries and they were poisonous.
The berries were very sour and Paul spat them all out.
Paul's father was mistaken and for the rest of the day Paul had horrible stomach cramps.
The berries dyed Paul's tongue purple and Paul stuck it out to tease his siblings.

story: Early on the 4th of July, John and Bob could not wait for fireworks! John and Bob decided they would go to the park to get a spot to watch. They waited there all day to see the fireworks go off that night. John and Bob packed a picnic and became very close that day.
original_ending: After the fireworks, they went home and smiled at the wonderful day.

endings.ending: John and Bob were upset, their was a malfunction that caused the fireworks to not go off.
They were ecstatic during the finale, they've never seen such a finale before.
They kissed at the end of the night.
John ignored Bob the next day because he was afraid of his feelings.
John and Bob remain friend to this day thanks to that wonderful day.
Bob moved to another country but they are still in touch thanks to that bond.
But a brunch of kids came and ruined their picnic and they were pissed off.
There's an accident with the firework programming so the firework show was cancelled and they were so disappointed.

story: Ron found a seashell on the beach. And it looked so beautiful that he decided to keep it. He liked it so much, that he brought it to school. And other students saw the beautiful shell.
original_ending: The next day, someone grabbed it from him and ran away.

endings.ending: Ron lost the seashell and offered a reward for anyone that can find it.
Ron woke up from his nightmare, and found his seashell on the nightstand.
Ron asked some friends If they've seen his shell, they did not.
Ron found his shell broken in the trash, he took what he could to try and repair It.
Ron decided to look for more shells to give to his friends.
Someone offered 10 dollars in the shell and Ron sold it.
Ron used the seashell in an art project and the teacher gave him a very good grade.
Other students asked Ron to trade for his seashell, but he never did.

story: Susie saw someone flying a kite at the park one day. She immediately asked her mom to buy her one. She even volunteered to do extra chores for a week. Susie's mom took her to pick out the kite she wanted.
original_ending: She decided on a purple one that looked like a giant squid.

endings.ending: Susie forgot to tie string securely to the kite, and it flew away forever the very first time she tried it.
The kite looked like a pigeon, and when they tried flying it in the park, a flock of seagulls attacked it and Susie cried that her kite was ruined.
Susie flew her kite the next day.
Susie also wanted her mom to buy a kite for her brother too.
But, when they got to the store, they were all sold out.
The bought a bright pink kite and stopped at the park on the way home to try it out until it started to rain.
Susie tried to fly her kite that evening, It was the most fun she's had in awhile.
She decided to fly the kite coming out of the store, It ended up getting caught on the roof.

story: Sam went door to door to try to sell magazines. He knocked on one door and waited. An old man opened the door and greeted Sam. Sam took out his flyers and began to sell to the man.
original_ending: The old man waved Sam off and told him to go.

endings.ending: The older man offered to buy 2 magazines if Sam would wash his vehicle.
Sam and a girl scout went to the old mans house, he bought from the girl scout instead.
The old man bought a couple magazines and really enjoyed them.
Sam tried to convince the old man to buy the magazine but was so nervous he ran away.
The man seemed excited, and bought a few.
The mans son came into the room, and interrupted the sale.
The old man made him some lemonade because it was a hot day.
He bought two subscriptions and that really perked up Sam's mood.

story: James is late to work today. He rushes out of the house and drives very fast toward the office. However, a police officer pulls him over for driving too fast. The officer gives James a speeding ticket.
original_ending: James decides he will never try to drive that fast again.

endings.ending: James tries to argue the ticket and ends up being arrested by the officer.
The moving violation made James late for work and he was fiercely reprimanded by his supervisor.
James gets very upset and swears at the police officer.
James decides after this to wake up earlier from now on so he doesn't have to speed.
James grabs the ticket and speeds off down the road, slamming into a tree.
James begins to think about how to tell his boss why he's late.
James is very vocal and rude to the officer which provokes the officer into arresting James.
After arriving late James gets reprimanded by his boss and sent back home after all that.

story: Timmy had been secretly feeding a stray dog. He was afraid to tell his parents. One day, the dog scratched and jumped for Timmy at the door. Timmy snuck food out and called him Froggy, for jumping so much.
original_ending: His mum thought it was so cute, she let him adopt Froggy.

endings.ending: His parents found out and told Timmy not to feed stray dogs ever again.
Froggy was found by his owner, who thanked Timmy for providing him with food.
He was hoping his parents would not notice food missing from the fridge.
Finally, Timmy bought a cute green collar for the with its name written on it.
His parents hated stray dogs and got him grounded for being near one.
Froggy one day started to get agitated and bit Timmy, that later discovered Froggy had rabies.
Tim's mother saw this and ran outside to chase away the mangy stray.
Timmy was so happy to see his new companion that he failed to notice the froth around Froggy's mouth.

story: Anna loved gymnastics. She wanted to be a professional gymnast when she grew up. So she was eager to try out for her high school gymnastics team! She tried out and was happy to find she had made the team.
original_ending: Not only that - the other members had voted her team captain!

endings.ending: The day of her first gymnastics meet she fell off the balance beam and broke her leg.
Her team mates were jealous of her skills and treated her badly.
She knew that this was only the beginning and now the real hard work would begin.
She ended up hating the team and ended up quitting within two months.
She finished the rest of her high school years on the team.
Her position was top of the pyramid.
Now she is very excited and is looking forward to maker her team win.
She joined gymnast school to learn more to support her team.

story: Pippa and George loved playing in mud puddles. One day they found a great big puddle in the backyard. They put on old clothes and boots. They jumped around in the puddle for hours.
original_ending: They were covered in mud from head to toe by the time they went in.

endings.ending: They found a gold coin in the puddle.
Their girlfriends saw them like that and broke up with them.
The parents came out and yelled at them to get out.
They were so dirty afterwards, they had to shower off with the hose.
They totally forgot about time and didn't leave until nightfall.
They got so dirty that they preferred to throw their clothes away rather than wash them.
On their way home a storm came through and the rain washed the mud from their clothes.
When the two of them got home their mother demanded they hoses themselves off before she'd let them in the house.

story: Tyler was so nervous to start his first day of middle school. When the big day came he got on his bus and sat with a friend. He learned that his friend was nervous too, that made him feel better. Tyler ended up having a wonderful first day of school after all.
original_ending: He went home and told his mom he had been nervous for nothing!

endings.ending: Tyler made several new friends his first day of school and looked forward to going to school every day afterwards.
He was voted class leader and got special treatment from all of his teachers.
Tyler ended up seeing the doctor for anxiety and was given medication to relax.
Tyler loved going to school so much he decided he wanted to become a teacher.
After school Tyler went to play with his new friend and had even more fun.
After school on his way home Tyler witnessed a car accident, again he was nervous about going to school next day.
However the fear of the unknown was still there.
He went to a fancy restaurant and had dinner with his parents to celebrate his first day of school.

story: Anna had two daughters and was a single mom. Then she found out she was pregnant with a son. She had no idea how to raise a boy without a man to help! When her son was born, though, she decided to just do her best.
original_ending: She knew all her son really needed was love and care.

endings.ending: Anna was worried that she couldn't give the best to his son.
She was thrilled by seeing his son playing happily with her daughters.
One day, however, she met someone and fell in love; which in turn gave her son a father.
Due to her efforts, her children were raised properly and became incredibly successful.
To her surprise, she found raising a boy to be a bit easier than her two girls for some reason.
She was very grateful that her daughters chipped and helped so much taking care of their little brother.
Fortunately she dated Josh who was really helpful raising her son and they ended up getting married.
Raising a son turned out to be harder than she expected so she had to call her dad to help.

story: Pam had one cat and couldn't decide whether to get another. She decided that she only have another cat if it came into her life. One day she was driving and heard meowing coming from her engine. It was a tiny, scared but healthy kitten!
original_ending: Pam named the kitten Lucky and gave her a forever home.

endings.ending: When she went to pick up the kitten, it leapt from the engine and ran off into the woods.
While comforting the kitten, she heard another meow coming from the engine compartment, and found a second kitten that looked just like the first!
Pam found the kitten's mother near the road so she reunited the kitten with her family.
When Pam tries to catch the little kitten she runs into the woods.
The animal grew very quickly and Pam soon realized that her new pet was actually a lion and not a regular house cat.
When Pam brought the kitten to get evaluated at the vet's office, she found out that the cat was microchipped and the rightful owner was thrilled to get their pet back.
Pam took the kitty to the Vet for a full body inspection.
Pam put the Kitty down on the street and kept driving home.

story: John didn't have many friends in his class. He had just moved earlier in the year. He was reading the book Tom Sawyer at recess. A boy walked up, telling him it was his favorite book.
original_ending: He and the boy ended up becoming friends after that.

endings.ending: John ignored him and kept reading the book.
John and the boy talked briefly about the book, and then went their separate ways.
John and the boy ended up starting a successful book club.
John looked away and didn't say anything because he was too shy.
The boy then bullied him for reading during recess.
John told the boy that he didn't care what his favorite book was.
The boy ripped the book out of John's hand and ran away laughing.
He offered John money to paint his fence after school.

story: Seth was a very respectful boy who always did the right thing. At school, the teachers and students all loved him. One day, the worst boy in school decided he wanted to be his friend. The worst boy got Seth in trouble all the time.
original_ending: Seth decided he would stop being his friend and go back to being good.

endings.ending: Seth got the boy into trouble by telling the teacher the boy did something wrong.
The parents of both boys had to come to the school because of all the trouble.
Seth was try to change the worst boy character.
Seth was complaint the teacher behaviour of worst boy.
Seth and the boy continued to terrorize their teachers for their entire school career.
Seth and the boy eventually pulled such a prank on their classmates that they ended up being expelled.
Corrupted by the worst boy, Seth was no longer respectful and no longer did the right thing.
Seth lied to the teacher and got the worst boy expelled.

story: I arrived to work one day and it seemed very slow. I began to do dishes, but not many showed up to work on. After about an hour of no business, my boss seemed worried. He walked over to me and told me to take the night off.
original_ending: The restaurant closed early, and then I went home happy and sad.

endings.ending: I went home and played video games with my room mate.
I asked if I could stay and help clean instead.
But suddenly a big crowd arrived and we are back in business.
We had leftover food which we donated to the nearby orphanage.
Since I was free I decided to surprise my girlfriend and bring her flowers.
I told him no and that I would go over to the mall to try to generate customers.
The restaurant closed late, and I went home angry and scared.
The restaurant got robbed just as I was leaving home.

story: Grayson begged to have his Xbox back. His parents told him he couldn't because he was still punished. Grayson snuck downstairs at night to find the xbox. He found it, and started walking back to his room.
original_ending: He tripped on a lego though, and broke the xbox into pieces.

endings.ending: When he got to his room he felt too guilty and walked the Xbox back downstairs.
When he plugged the Xbox in it was too loud and his parents caught him red handed!
He started to feel so guilty about disobeying his parents, that he returned the xbox and went back to bed.
He plugged the xbox into his bedroom tv and played all night.
He plugged it in and played until 4 AM.
He couldn't find where the plug went though so he didn't play it.
Just then, the light came on and his dad, sitting in the chair, asked him where he was going with the Xbox.
After falling asleep playing all night and unable to return the Xbox before his parents woke up, he got punished even more.

story: Before 911 I went to beautiful Black and White wedding. The couple gave their guests Japanese Betta fish as gifts. I carried that beautiful fish on plane for safekeeping. I filled the perfect bowl with water for it when I got home.
original_ending: I tried to pour the fish in the bowl but it went down the drain.

endings.ending: When I went to put the fish in the bowl I noticed that it had died.
He was happy in the bowl and I went to research what fish eat.
The fish lived with me for five years.
I spent a lot feeding the fish.
I still keep fish as pets to this day.
That fish was good company for me for several years.
The fish swam circles in the bowl, seemingly happy with its new home.
Pleased with my new pet, I decided to get a second Betta fish to keep it company!

story: My friend Jeremy called the other day. He asked me to fly out to California for a visit. He let me know that there was an exciting show going on. When I hung up the phone, I was so excited I couldn't stand it.
original_ending: I immediately called my friend Jacob and invited him along.

endings.ending: I went to the computer and began researching everything about the show.
Unfortunately at that moment my boss called and said that we had an emergency project, so  I was not able to go to California.
Excitement soon turned to sadness as I realized that I could not afford the airfare.
I immediately booked a ticket on the next available flight out.
When I went there, I saw that the show was a series of speeches on how to maintain world peace by non-violence.
Thankfully I missed my flight, because show was cancelled at last minute.
I worked overtime at my job for the next few weeks to save up enough money, and then off I went!
Jeremy and I saw the show together from a front-row seat and it was amazing!

story: It took us three days to climb the mountain. As we neared the top we found a place to make camp. We layed down our gear and decided to check the view. Above the trees on a rocky hill we stood.
original_ending: The whole valley lay out before us in all its beauty.

endings.ending: We could see smoke on the other mountain across from us, assuming from other hikers.
We could see a storm far into the valley, we went to setup camp in case It moved to us.
The valley was amazing, we admired the view for hours.
The view was blocked by some trees so we decided to change spots.
I trembled with fear and awe as I looked down.
A hermit came to us and gave us revelations about life.
We couldn't prevent ourselves to watch the beautiful landscape in awe for a while.
The hill was a little steep, so we watched the landscape in a careful manner.

story: John thought he was the best video game player ever. John went to a party with his friends. John drank a lot of liquor at the party and boasted about his skills. John was challenged by a friend of his and lost horribly.
original_ending: John learned he wasn't as good as he thought he was.

endings.ending: John was embarrassed and left the party early.
John wanted to prove himself so he challenged many other people until finally he beat someone.
Defeated, John called the police and had the party broken up.
Sick from the alcohol, John spent the night throwing up in the nearby woods.
John got angry and left the party.
John challenged him later when he wasn't drunk and beat his friend.
John blamed it on being drunk and stayed delusional in his mind.
John challenged the friend to a rematch once he was sober and won easily.

story: Jake lived at the beach all his life. Jake landed a job which required him to move to Denver. Jake landed in cold Colorado in the middle of January. He had never felt such cold weather and seen such snow.
original_ending: Jake decided he loved the cold and would never go back to the coast.

endings.ending: Jake got lost in the blizzard and had to spend his first night in a hotel instead of his brand new apartment.
He immediately pulled up his resume and started updating it so he could find another job.
