The cold was too much for Jake, he couldn't wait for the spring.
He decided this was too much for him, and moved back near the beach.
Jake wore bright Hawaiian shirts at work every Friday to remind him of the coast.
Jake worked hard and earned a promotion to be the reginal manager on the coast.
Jake couldn't last two days and went back to the coast.
Jake had to be strong, he stayed out in the cold even though he hated it.

story: Sally was so excited about Christmas that she couldn't sleep. She got out of bed and walked to the tree. Sally found a present with her name on it, and opened the wrapping. It was a red jumper.
original_ending: Sally carefully rewrapped the jumper and put it back under the tree.

endings.ending: Sally burst into tears because she really hated jumpers as Christmas presents.
Sally was so excited by the jumper she put it on immediately and ran into her parent's bedroom.
She looked up and saw Santa Claus staring back at her.
She was so happy she ran into her parent's room and woke them up.
Her parents came out while she was unwrapping the presents and told her to go to bet.
She thought the jumper was ugly, and couldn't sleep because she was so man.
Her parent's noticed the present was missing and took the jumper away.
Sally was disappointed, she already had that exact same jumper upstairs in her closet.

story: Janie had a dog named Max. Max was a very needy dog who never liked to be left alone. Every day when Janie went to work, Max would get very sad. Max would sit by the door all day long until Janie got home.
original_ending: When she finally got home, Max the needy dog would be happy again.

endings.ending: Janie got a video monitor so she could talk to and see Max during the day.
Janie ended up giving Max to someone who could be with him all day.
It made Janie feel guilty about having to leave Max every day.
Janie decided to buy a puppy to see if that would keep Max company and make him happier.
Janie decide to get a second dog to keep Max company.
After that Janie decided it was okay to take Max to work with her.
Janie decided to put a doggie door on her backdoor so Max could play outside to distract him until she got home from work.
Janie decided that to adopt another dog so that Max wouldn't be lonely during the day.

story: A few years ago I was teaching my brother how to drive. He was incredibly nervous, which made me nervous as well. I would yell when he would mess up, and make him mess up more. I eventually figured out to stay calm and help him do the same.
original_ending: He is a very accomplished driver now, and I was glad to help.

endings.ending: Because I was so explosive while teaching, to this day he has great trauma when he gets behind the wheel of a car.
I was forced to give up because he hopelessly got everything I said wrong and made me want to get out of the car.
He got a job as a chauffeur for a famous rock star and travels the world with them now.
I now have successful line of calming serums I started to develop shortly after.
Now I realize he wasn't nervous, I was the one who was and I thought he was too.
He became a truck driver and promised to teach me how to drive one.
This helped him greatly when he was driving on slippery ice, as he was able to avoid rear-ending a driver at a stop sign during a blizzard.
The only car accident he's ever gotten into was when another car hit him at a stoplight, which wasn't his fault.

story: Rita genuinely believed that there were forty-nine states in the USA. Her friends tried their hardest to talk some sense into her. Rita kept denying that Hawaii was a state. She insisted that it was a city.
original_ending: Her friends dropped it after a while, but it's still unbelievable.

endings.ending: A friend showed Rita a website explaining that Hawaii was a state and Rita relented to the fact.
As her friends became more wound up Rita began to laugh and explained to them she was only joking.
Eventually they used Google to settle the argument.
Rita was so annoyed her friends did not believe her she stormed out of the building.
She ended up losing a lot of friends because of this argument.
Rita's friends pulled out a map to prove her wrong but she dismissed the evidence as "fake news."
Rita's friends called her out in the middle of class and everyone made fun of her when she refused to admit she was wrong.
Rita's friends were so annoyed at her insistence that they bought her a book about Hawaii, she read it and finally admitted she was wrong.

story: Cody and his brother were invited to a Mario Kart party/ The party was at Cody's best friend Ross's house. They played Mario Kart all day and had a ton of fun. Once it got late at night they were forced to go to bed.
original_ending: In the morning they went home excited for the next game day.

endings.ending: They dreamed of Mario Kart all night.
Each of them pretended their beds were Karts and the raced in their imaginations.
They fell asleep quickly dreaming that they were really characters in the game.
After and hour of not being able to fall asleep the boys snuck out of the bedroom to play more of the game.
After they thought Ross's parents were asleep, they got up and snuck back out to play the game all night long.
The next day, when Cody and his brother got home, their parents surprised them and had gotten them Mario Kart and they could now play it anytime they wanted.
They only stayed asleep for a little while and sneakily got up and continued to play the game for the rest of the night.
That night there was an earthquake and the boys forgot all about the game and could only talk about the shaking.

story: My friend used to own an old Range Rover. We don't know how he bought it, since he's always broke. But it was a real beater. One time, he had to take it to the shop.
original_ending: It was so beat up, he was advised to just buy a new car.

endings.ending: After he left the shop the Range Rover started flying through the sky!
When he go to the shop he ended up meeting his future wife.
After a transmission and alternator belt overhaul, it was as good as new!
The shop told him to take the car to the museum, since it was so old and collectible.
The shop repaired it and he was able to keep it on the road.
The shop quoted him a repair bill way more than he could afford, and he was stuck without a car for a while.
There he got free repairs.
When he arrived, he received the news that there was no more repair.

story: Amy had gotten a new watch for her birthday. Her friends all loved the watch. They all asked their parents to buy one. Everyone except Sara had the watch a week later.
original_ending: The girls all chipped in and bought Sarah a watch so she fit in.

endings.ending: Everyone started to bully and exclude sarah, as she was the only one without a watch.
Some days after, Sarah shows up with a really expensive watch and now everyone wants it.
Sara said it's fine because she has a good clock app on her phone.
Sara's parents found out she was the only one without a watch and bought her one the very same day.
Sara ended up purchasing an even fancier smartwatch which made all of her friends jealous.
Sara was blind, so a watch was of no use to her.
Sara loved the watches that her friends had but told them she didn't want a watch.
Her friends all got Sara a watch, but Sara never wore it.

story: Matt was scared. He had been challenged to a fight after school. He did not want to be known as a coward, so he showed up. He was afraid, though, that he would get beat up.
original_ending: But to his surprise, his opponent never even showed up!

endings.ending: He threw the first punch when the fight started.
He was right though and his opponent punched him to the ground.
A teacher had heard about the fight and came before anything even got started.
Once he got there, he decided that because his opponent was a girl, it wouldn't be a good idea to go through with the fight.
His opponent showed up and beat up Matt.
His opponent was afraid as well, and they both agreed to call off the fight when they got there.
Steeling himself, Matt squared off against his opponent but as he strode forward to fight he tripped and fell, knocking himself out cold.
Luckily Matt's opponent was half his size, and he defeated her easily in front of a horrified crowd of onlookers.

story: The snow fell over the small town overnight. A man woke up to find his car covered in snow. He hopped out of bed and began to clear it off. When he was done he shoveled out his driveway as well.
original_ending: The man got into his car and drove to work.

endings.ending: But he could not get to work anyway, due to his whole street being covered in deep drifts of snow.
But once he got to work, he found the business closed, due to bad weather.
Only, after having fully woken up, the man discovered he had mistakenly shoveled his neighbor's car and driveway.
Just then, it started to heavily snow, rendering the man's efforts futile.
He the realized the rest of the street was in worse condition.
The man tried to turn the car on after that but ignition failed.
He was so tired, he called work and said he wouldn't be there and went back to bed.
As he finished, the snowplow came by and pushed snow onto his car and driveway.

story: On Saturday, Kate went to the rescue center to adopt a pet. The first animal she saw was a little black and white puppy. She picked up the tiny dog and it licked her face. Kate knew instantly that she loved this little puppy.
original_ending: She filled out the paperwork and took the puppy home.

endings.ending: However, her mother told her she could only get a cat.
She hurried home with the puppy to begin showing it off to all her friends.
They told her the application for adoption had been denied.
She went to the pet store afterwards to buy supplies for the new dog.
Kate licked the puppy back and it recoiled in horror!

Kate and her new dog became inseparable, to the point that people couldn't tell them apart any longer, as kate had grown long, shaggy hair and the puppy began walking on it's hind legs and had taken to wearing Kate's clothes.

After providing some references, she went home to wait to hear if she would be able to adopt the puppy, and her allergies acted up so severely that she had to retract her application, as she was too allergic to the puppy.
The rescue center said that he was part of a litter of three puppies and brought out the other two, who also vied for Kate's attention, so she adopted all three!

story: Matt's family decided to move to the other side of the country. He tried to hold back the tears as he said goodbye to his best friend. Matt told his parents it wasn't fair. When they got to their new home, his parents had a surprise.
original_ending: Matt now texts his best friend on his very own smartphone.

endings.ending: In the backyard of the new home was a brand new puppy for Matt to play with.
Matt's parents had a new basketball hoop and backboard installed in the driveway of the new home.
That his best friend's family were also moving to his country.
He wasn't much happy about the surprise as he was missing his best friend.
His parents bought him a puppy and Matt was thrilled and forgot about unpleasant things.
His parents invited his best friend's family here for a vacation and Matt was thrilled to reunion with his best friend.
His best friends parents had also moved to the same area and they would still be able to see each other.
They were only going to be there for a few months and would be moving back to their old neighborhood before school started back.

story: Jim wanted to be the fastest runner in the school. Jim practiced and trained every day to complete his goal. He eventually challenged Chad to a race. Jim won the 100 meter dash but lost in the 200 meter dash.
original_ending: Both Jim and Chad decided to work together to become faster.

endings.ending: Jim accused Chad of cheating in the 200 meter dash and they never spoke to each other.
Jim was surprised by his failure in 200 meter dash so he trained even harder.
Their rivalry would continue throughout their lives.
Jim learned that being the fastest at school wasn't as black-and-white as he'd thought.
Jim wasn't discouraged, and kept training harder until he eventually was a world class runner.
Jim was so angry that he tripped Chad the next time he saw him racing, causing Chad to break his ankle.
Chad accused Jim of cheating and didn't train with him anymore.
Chad told Jim that he should try out for the school's track team.

story: Laura's old cat had died when she was little. Laura's mom missed having a cat, and it was her mom's birthday. Laura's friend at school was moving, and had to give away her cat. Laura brought a carrier to school, brought the cat home, and hid it.
original_ending: That night, Laura surprised her mom with a cake and the new cat.

endings.ending: So Laura asked her mother if she would like to have a cat.
So Laura adopted the cat and named him "Mommy"
When Laura went to see the cat it was gone.
When Laura went to see the cat he had eaten the cake.
However, the cat escaped from the home and ran away.
Laura's mom found the cat before Laura could give it to her and cried tears of joy.
Laura's mom was so happy that she cried tears of joy.
Laura's mom ended up being allergic to the cat and they had to give it away.

story: When May's grandson was born, she tried to pass on all her knowledge. She gave her daughter Sadie instructions on how to do everything. Eventually Sadie told her mother firmly to stop trying to take over. May was a little hurt when Sadie told her to stop butting in.
original_ending: But she knew she had to let her daughter learn to parent on her own.

endings.ending: As such, May decided to leave home so that Sadie and her grandson could take over.
Seeking retribution, May tried to hurt Sadie as well by giving her poor instructions.
She called social services and said that her grandson was being neglected.
She offered to babysit every day so that she could have an influence on her grandson's upbringing.
But, the next day, when her son started coughing and developed a fever, Sadie immediately called May for advice.
May decided that she wanted her own infant to take care of and she called an adoption agency.
Her mother began to cry, saying she was only trying to help.
Her mother got furious, and asked her to leave.

story: Rachel wanted me to meet her new kitty. She wasn't sure when we'd have time to meet up so she was sad. I told her we'd probably have time soon. The next week we both had time to meet!
original_ending: She was so excited that I got to meet her kitty, and it was cute.

endings.ending: I finally met her kitten and it scratched me so hard that I bled!
I ended up loving her kitty so much that I went and adopted my own.
Unfortunately her kitten was hit by a car before we met up and I spend the whole meeting consoling her.
Rachel's kitten hated me, and the entire time I visited it hissed at me and clawed at my leg.
I liked her kitty, but it scratched me.
We had a great time playing together with her new kitty.
I fell on my way to her house and had to be taken to the hospital for a broken ankle.
Unfortunately, her cat died before I was able to see it.

story: I drove home from work last night while sipping coffee. There was a bump in the road and coffee went flying. Some of the splashed around the cup holder. I was annoyed so I let it sit there.
original_ending: The next morning the cup was frozen to the cup holder.

endings.ending: When I went out to my car later, hundreds of ants were swarming inside trying to get at the sweet delectation.
Little did I know, the 5-gallon water bottle in the back had cracked as well and was about to flood my car with water causing a real headache.
Mysteriously, when I later went to clean the mess, the coffee spill was no where to be found.
The next day, my car pleasantly smelled like freshly brewed coffee, which improved my mood greatly.
The coffee ended up short circuiting the car and caused me to have to spend thousands on repairs.
Ants smelled the sweet coffee and infested the cabin.
Later that day I realized the coffee was too strong because there was a hole in the floor of the car.
The next time I entered my car it triggered and idea for coffee scented air fresheners.

story: Chris was in a rush to open a bottle of wine. He twisted the corkscrew into the cork as fast as he could. He gave it a strong yank to get the cork out. The cork tore in two pieces.
original_ending: Chris had to remove the cork from the corkscrew and start again.

endings.ending: Chris had to buy a whole new bottle of wine, as he ruined the taste on this one.
Chris had to tell his friends to remove the cork the right way.
Chris ended up having to push the cork into the wine to be able to drink it.
Chris' date was so amused by his failure that she burst out laughing.
One fell into the bottle, but that was okay.
He was never able to get the remaining cork out and got out another bottle instead.
he dropped the bottle on the floor.
Chris broke the corkscrew

story: John took his dog to the dog park. John's dog got loose and chased after another dog! John ran up to his dog and the other dog's owner. John apologized to the dog owner and she said it's okay.
original_ending: John left the dog park to buy a better collar for his dog.

endings.ending: The other owner told John to watch his dog better next time.
John was very embarrassed and never went back to that dog park again.
They got into talking and John asked her out for a coffee.
But then John's dog bite her dog making her angry.
The other dog owner sparked up a conversation with John and they went on a date together.
The other dog owner made a big fuss about the situation and threatened to call the police!
John then turned back to pick up his dog, and saw it running away at the distance.
John found the woman beautiful and decided to take his chances and ask her out, she said it was reciprocal and accepted.

story: Charlie loved collecting rare record albums. He found an out-of-the-way store that had tons of oldies. He spent hours looking through the stacks of rare albums. Charlie spent several hundred dollars there on some great finds.
original_ending: At home, he spent the day listening to his collection's new additions.

endings.ending: Many years later, Charlie sold his record album collection for thousands of dollars.
Now all Charlie needed was a record player to listen to them on!
He then sold them for thousands of dollars.
On a terrible night his collection got stolen.
He later founded out many of the rare albums were fake and retuned to demand his money back.
Charlie was so satisfied and befriended the store owner.
After that he started selling them online for good profits.
And he started regretting all this.

story: Ben's friend got  a puppy for his birthday. Ben had lots of fun playing with his friend's new pet. Ben decided to ask his parents if they would get him a puppy. He was upset when his parent's told him they need time to decide.
original_ending: They decided to get Ben a puppy for his birthday a month later.

endings.ending: They suggested he start with something smaller like a fish.
They eventually said yes but by then Ben had lost interest in a puppy.
After waiting for weeks, Ben's parents sat him down and told him that he couldn't have a puppy due to his father's allergies.
His parents thought about it, but then suggested getting a hamster as a compromise, which Ben wasn't thrilled about.
So Ben went to the humane center and got himself a puppy.
Ben's dad had to tell Ban that he was allergic to dogs and that they could not get one.
His parents decided not to give him a puppy as it would require a lot of care.
His parents got him a gold fish instead, Ben was happy with his new pet although he was expecting a dog.

story: Luke was climbing a tree when he fell. His mom drove him to the emergency room. They took x-rays and told him it was broken. They put a cost on it and sent him home.
original_ending: Several weeks later the cast was off and he was back to climbing.

endings.ending: Luke liked having a cast and made all his friends sign it.
Luke took advantage of being injured and made his mom wait on him hand and foot.
His mom was mad, but didn't give him any additional punishment.
The next day he showed it off to all his friends.
Luke didn't let a cast hinder him and he still climbed trees even with a cast.
The cast was so uncomfortable and itchy that Luke was dying to get it off.
He cried the remainder of the night from the seating pain he felt from his foolish mistake.
Once he arrived at school, he allowed all of his closest pals to write and draw on his cast for memories.

story: I used to have long hair for years. But when my heart was broken,i decided to cut my hair into short. After my new haircut, i almost cried for it. It doesn't look good to me.
original_ending: Because of that i never cut my hair into short.

endings.ending: I went a bought a hat to hide my head.
A man walked up, pointed at my head and laughed.
I ended up donating my hair to cancer patients so it was worthwhile.
After this I realized it's what's on the inside that counts, not the outside.
I felt no one will ever love me.
It will take two years to grow back to the old length.
I used hair extensions till my hair grew back.
But I was convinced when my boyfriend liked it a lot.

story: Jessie was about to go to summer camp. First, his mom had to drive him to the bus stop to catch the camp bus. They had to drive through the woods, and through a big city. Finally, they arrived at the bus stop.
original_ending: Jessie said goodbye to his mom and boarded the camp bus.

endings.ending: Jessie burst into tears and begged his mom not to send him.
Jessie excitedly hopped out of the car and ran toward the bus, forgetting to kiss his mom farewell.
Only to realize that they had already missed the bus.
Then Jessie's mom decided that she would drive him to camp so she could spend a little more time with him.
But the bus never came and they found out the camp would start tomorrow.
They were told the bus broke down on the road so Jessie's mom had to drive him to the camp.
Then Jessie decided that she doesn't want to go to the summer camp.
But they were late and was not able to catch the bus.

story: Tammy bought some pretty colorful peppers at the market. She made pasta with an olive pepper sauce for her new boyfriend. He told her that it was good but a little spicy. She decided to mix the extra sauce into her dog's food.
original_ending: Afraid she'll hurt the dog since the sauce was so hot, he stopped her.

endings.ending: The dog spit it out after one bite.
The dog devoured the food instantly.
The dog ate the food with the sauce and was so sick it puked everywhere.
The dog sniffed the food and decided he did not wan to eat it.
The dog sniffed the food and sat back down, looking sadly at Tammy as he refused to eat.
The effect was so striking, she decided to paint a picture of the bright combination.
The dog ate the food and was violently sick.
Her new boyfriend thought Tammy was crazy for trying to feed peppers to a dog and decided to leave her.

story: Chester was walking along the beach with his girlfriend. They were having a very nice conversation for a long time. Suddenly, they saw an odd shape lying on the beach. Chester ran over to it and they saw that it was a human body.
original_ending: They quickly called the cops and tried to stay calm.

endings.ending: The body jumped up when they got close and ran away.
As he looked down the beach he realized there were bodies everywhere.
Chester started CPR and saved the man
the body jumped out of the sand and he realized it was just someone playing a prank.
Chester prodded the unmoving mass with a piece of driftwood and it replied, "Hey, do I come in your bedroom and poke you with a stick?".
Suddenly, the shape arose into the air, it's black wings obscuring the sunlight, whilst obsidian feathers swirled around them in a hurricane of dark energy.
A big wave came in and took the body back out to sea.
Chester got a big shock when the 'body' started coughing up water!

story: Tom thought that football looked fun. He decided to go to the store and purchase a brand new one. On his way to the store he found a group of people playing football. They invited him to play, so he joined them.
original_ending: He had tons of fun, and made a bunch of new friends.

endings.ending: He had no fun at all, and made zero friends.
He injured his shoulder during the game, and left back home crying.
He had so much fun that he lost track of time and didn't make it to the store before it closed.
He turned out to be a natural and was invited back to play every week.
Tom realized that he was not very good at football and decided to switch to basketball.
Tom scored the winning touchdown and was carried off the field by the people he was playing with.
He scored four touchdowns.
He later realized they invited him because he was too small and slow to cover anyone properly.

story: My friend R and her husband G were going to a beach party. They were bringing cups. G got bad news from work and did not want to go to the party. R asked who will bring the cups.
original_ending: G said they will manage, and they did not go to the party.

endings.ending: G decided to bring the cups and have fun even though he had a terrible day.
G didnt reply back and everyone got worried.
G called a delivery service and had cups brought to the beach party.
No one brought cups and the partygoers were forced to drink out of their hands.
G told her to go ahead to the party without him.
They decided to go to the party and G ended up feeling much better.
G agreed to go to the party.
G got angry and fought with R.

story: My neighbor called me over to have coffee. I was excited because I really needed it. When I got there he poured me a cup. I let it cool for a while in my hand.
original_ending: When I went to take a sip I saw it had a roach in it and spit it out.

endings.ending: I drank it and was surprised it was so bitter.
The coffee was hazelnut and it tasted great.
I drank the coffee and it was extremely creamy.
I ended up dropping the cup in my pants.
I tasted the coffee and it was so delicious, I ended up drinking two cups!
I took a sip and it still hadn't cooled down, so I ended up burning my tongue.
When I went to take a sip I burned my tongue severely.
It turned out my neighbor had some terrible news to share about their mother.

story: This was the trip that the Lewis family had planned all year. Six weeks on the road with a truck and a camper. The trip was planned out to see all the sight along the way. They spent 6 weeks traveling the west coast and it was amazing.
original_ending: In the end the trip was great but they were all glad to be home.

endings.ending: Their favorite part was seeing the Grand Canyon.
They came home to a burnt down house.
They decided to start planning next year's vacation right away.
They were sad when they had to return the camper and go back to their normal lives.
They were very happy that their plan was so good.
So they decided to plan one more trip next year.
Unfortunately, a killer hornet had been trapped in their tail pipe and it wreaked havoc on their town.
When they arrived back home, they all looked at each other and said, "6 more weeks" and continued the journey.

story: Willie was a great baker. He made cakes, and pastries, and danishes better than anyone. One day he decided he needed a bakery but didn't know how to make one. Learning about it, he found it wasn't that different from baking.
original_ending: And now, there's a cute little bakery in the shape of a cake.

endings.ending: However, he decided he no longer wanted a bakery.
He decided he might make a bakery at a later time.
Due to lack of money he discovered that this would not be possible.
To achieve this, it was necessary to borrow money from the bank.
He started to draw up several blueprints for ideas he had.
He contacted a builder and discussed the visions he had for a bakery.
He realized he didn't have the money required, however, and put it off until later.
He knew he needed to assemble a team that could put all the ingredients (aspects) of a good bakery together.

story: Maria was laying in bed trying to sleep. She wrapped her blankets around her but she was still cold. She was so tired that she didn't want to get up. But the longer she went, the colder she got.
original_ending: Finally, she jumped out of bed to turn up the heater.

endings.ending: Even with the cold she managed to sleep
After a while she started to shake
She eventually drifted off to sleep and never woke up again.
A violent sneeze gave her the bit of motivation she needed to get more blankets as she cleaned her face up.
So Maria took her blanket and covered herself.
Maria didn't care and slept in the cold anyway.
She stubbornly refused to budge and when she finally woke up the following morning she was beginning to come down with a cold.
Frustrated, she finally realized she'd left a window open and hurriedly got up and shut it.

story: Tina was taking a shower. But suddenly, the hot water turned off. She had no choice but to use cold water. After she got out of the shower, she heard a knock at the door.
original_ending: She got a letter that said she was months late on her heating bill.

endings.ending: In the letter it said that they would cut off her heating if she did not attend the meeting she had been invited to.
The letter was blank, Tina was scared and confused
Then she realised, the heater was not working and has called the electrician.
Her mother came and shouted at her for taking a shower in cold water.
She answered the door naked.
She was afraid and tried not to make any noise.
Her dad said he turned off the water by accident.
Her mom said she needed to grab something in the restroom.

story: My school is a big football school and my friends and I are fans. When they had a game out of time, we all decided to go. It was freezing but we were hoping it'd be worth it. We froze the whole game and finally we lost.
original_ending: We thought twice in the future about going to out of town games.

endings.ending: Considering it was cold and the stands were empty, one of us won one of the raffles that took place after the game.
However, my secret crush noticed me in the stands and asked if we wanted to join the team for pizza after.
The fans and players had a party after together and made it worth freezing all night.
Even though we lost the game, we didn't regret it, the players were happy we were there to support them.
We still had a good time cheering on the team with our friends.
Two of my friends had hypothermia and we spent the night in the hospital emergency room.
But being together made it all worth it.
Thankfully, they sold hot chocolate at the stadium that helped our bodies and spirits thaw out.

story: Sydney loved to play with his toys that his mother had bought him. His favorite toy was his orange ball. He loved the orange ball so much that he played all day with it. One day he discovered if he tossed the ball at his toy cups they fell.
original_ending: He was very happy that he discovered such a fun game to play.

endings.ending: It was the beginning of his lifelong interest in physics.
He grew up to be an NFL quarterback.
This is what started his love of physics.
His mother shushed him, though, because this made a loud noise.
He threw the ball so enthusiastically the next time it went straight out his bedroom window!
His mother was annoyed by the constant noise and soon confiscated the orange ball.
Sydney was scared when all the cups fell and never played with the cups again.
Sydney laughed as the cups fell and her parents helped her rebuild the cups.

story: Ellen had just adopted a little boy named Tony. She wasn't sure what to buy Tony for his first Christmas. Then she had a great gift idea. She bought Tony a brand new bike!
original_ending: She was very happy when Tony said he loved his gift.

endings.ending: Tony cried tears of joy and began riding his bike on Christmas day.
Tony was afraid of the bike and did not ride it.
She was sad because Tony didn't like the color.
Tony said she had never received any gifts before.
Tony got excited and was riding in his new bike.
Tony jumped out of joy by seeing his new bike.
Tony sadly told his mom that he didn't know how to ride a bike.
Tony hopped on the bike and instantly rode out the front door and into the sunset.

story: Joe was twelve when he decided to run away from home. He told his parents he was angry with them and would be leaving. Joe went to bed that night thinking this would make them feel sorry. When he awoke the next morning, Joe found his bags packed by the door.
original_ending: His mom attached a note saying she'd see him when he gets back.

endings.ending: He grabbed the bags and ran out of the door.
He started crying and asking his parents for forgiveness.
Joe felt ashamed by his idea of running away and apologized to his parents.
It tuned out his parents gonna take him to a picnic and Joe was very happy.
His parents explained the importance of not saying those kinds of things.
His father said he would go to a disciplinary camp to think better of life.
When he went to his parents he was shocked and happy to find out that they were taking him out for a vacation.
He thanked his parents for packing his bag and went out of his home.

story: Every time I bit down on something I felt a sharp pain. I made an appointment with the dentist. He told me I needed to have my tooth removed. The tooth was pulled and I felt much better.
original_ending: The dentist told me to lay off of the sweets.

endings.ending: But afterwards, more of my teeth started hurting.
I decided to keep the tooth as a reminder to stay healthy.
I took better care of my teeth after that.
I started to visit to dentist regularly to avoid these problems.
But after 1 week I started feeling the same kind of pain in other tooth as well.
I was happy and I had lots of ice cream.
But then the spot the tooth was became infected and hurt even worse!
I got a gold plated artificial tooth in its place that I think looks really cool.

story: Hunter wanted to buy a new house. He saved up for Years and finally bought a brand new home. Hunter was so excited to begin moving into his new home! However, tomorrow night a bad tornado rolled through the area!
original_ending: Hunter was torn apart when he was told that his new home was gone.

endings.ending: Hunter's apartment building he had just left was damaged by the winds and he thought to himself that his move was perfect timing.
The tornado caused minor damage to his new home which only delayed his move for another week.
Hunter started crying that all his dreams of new house went in vain.
Hunter consoled himself and thought of building a new home.
Hunter was over joyed to see that his new home was fine.
Hunter quickly sold the house because he was unaware the area had tornadoes.
Hunter started crying for his loss.
Hunter's family consoled him as he was very sad.

story: Jeff was reading comics at night. He was reading Batman, and thought he could be like him. Jeff decided to go in the city and see if there is any crimes. He saw a robbery, and jumped out of his car to stop it.
original_ending: The robber punched him in the face, Jeff will stick to reading comics.

endings.ending: Jeff was successful in stopping the crime and was awarded the key to the city.
Only Jeff was interrupted, as a real-life superhero ran out before him to foil the crime.
As soon as he realized his gun was only shooting water, he heard his Mom calling him to get up for breakfast.
The robber grabbed his loot, but before escaping into the night stopped to ask Jeff a maddeningly difficult riddle.
Jeff stopped the robber, called the police and set off in search of more crimes.
The robber stole your cell phone and watch and that's the end of the adventure.
The robber fled and the victim thanked Jeff for his bravery.
The robber pointed his pistol at Jeff and ended up taking his wallet as well.

story: I made grilled cheese sandwiches for supper. I first buttered the bread and started the griddle. I then got the cheese out and put it on the bread. I put the sandwiches on the griddle until they were a golden brown.
original_ending: I then took the sandwiches off and stacked them all on a plate.

endings.ending: The cheese was so gooey, it dripped out of the sandwich onto the floor and my dog ate it!
I was very proud of myself, since I had never made a cheese sandwich before without burning it!
So I ate one sandwich at a time, I think I ate about 5.
So I put them in a bowl and handed them to my mother.
I then decided to make Tomato soup to eat with the sandwiches.
I burnt my fingers on the griddle as I removed the sandwiches!
The problem is that I ended up forgetting and toasted one side.
After that, I took it to the fridge because the recipe said it was necessary.

story: Jill was missing her grandfather who recently passed away. She was thinking about him as she walked down the sidewalk. She picked up a penny she saw on the ground. It was dated 1943, the year her grandfather was born.
original_ending: She felt like it was a sign that he was thinking of her too.

endings.ending: Jill decided to use the penny to build a diorama in honor of her grandfather's life.
So sick with grief, Jill threw the penny away and tried the rest of the day to take her mind off the passing of her grandfather.
She felt so sad and cried in public.
She felt so special and blessed and called her parents about it.
She was so inspired by the penny that she took it home and started a coin collection, which soon grew to be worth hundreds of dollars.
When she got home, she wrote a letter and picked some flowers to put on his grave the next time she visited the cemetery.
She smiled and kept the penny in her pocket from then on.
She was glad that the universe found a way to remind her of her Grandpa.

story: After finishing my homework, I started to exercise. I got tired after 30 minutes. Although I was drowsy, I took my medication before sleeping. When I woke up, I checked my alarm clock.
original_ending: Since it was 12 in the afternoon, I decided to skip school.

endings.ending: I had slept until almost A.M.!
Since I had only slept an house I decided to close my eyes and get some more rest.
I woke up late and had to run to work.
As it was still early, I decided to sleep another 15 minutes.
I felt like I had been asleep for days, but in reality it had only been 1 hour.
The sun was up, but my clock said it was 2 a.m., I looked around for my phone and saw that it was 4 p.m., I had slept through the whole night and the whole next day!
It was 9 am in the morning and I hurried to school.
And then I had my healthy breakfast.

story: The Smith family went to the county fair. After they ate corndog and cotton candy they watched a circus. When the circus was over they all rode the merry-go-round. On their to their car they played games for prizes.
original_ending: It was such fun they decided to make it a tradition and go every year!

endings.ending: Unfortunately they all got food poisoning from the corndogs, and decided never to go there again.
When they eventually got back to their car, it had been stolen by carnies.
Their favorite part was watching the elephants perform.
They often talked about the trip long after it was over.
In the parking lot, the daughter got sick from eating too much cotton candy.
The youngest Smith won a giant teddy bear to take home with him!
Sadly, no one won any of the games that they played.
Mr. Smith checked his wallet after the whole affair and found that he was down to his last dollar.

story: Mike wanted to start his own business. All his friends told him not too and that it was a bad idea. Mike was told that most business fail within the first months. Mike still believed in himself and did it anyway.
original_ending: Now over a year later Mike's business is very successful.

endings.ending: Since his business started to fail Mike decided to burn the building down to collect the insurance money.
Ten years later there were multiple franchises and Mike was still kicking himself that he sold the company after 6 months.
Mike failed miserably and now lives on the streets as a transient.
Mike's business turned out quite mediocre and Mike developed a drinking problem to cope.
Mike was wrong to believe in himself and ended up destitute.
Mike's business was not very successful but it caused him to meet his future wife so he considered it a success.
Mike hired an employee who stole all the money from the cash register, causing Mike to close his business.
Mike was very successful and didn't let his friends into his business out of spite.

story: Mom decided to let Bobby and Jean color Easter eggs. She boiled the eggs for 10 minutes. The eggs needed to cool off before they could color them. Once the eggs were cooled, the kids began to color a dozen eggs.
original_ending: The eggs dried and then they hid the colored eggs for the hunt.

endings.ending: The children could not wait to hunt them the next day in the Easter egg hunt.
Bobby and Jean were great egg artists and won a contest in the local paper.
There were so many colors that they created rainbow eggs.
They looked forward to hiding them for the egg hunt tomorrow.
Bobby and Jean handled the eggs too roughly, and they all broke!
The kids got ink and coloring all over themselves, and had to take a bath before the egg hunt.
The kids spilled the dye and made a huge mess.
Bobby ate all his eggs as soon as he was done coloring them and got a severe stomach ache.

story: Timothy lived in the USA, but his father was from Argentina. One day he moved back to his home country. While there, he went to the country and ate some beef. The beef was delicious, but it made him very sick.
original_ending: Timothy was flown back to a hospital in the USA, and never returned.

endings.ending: He went to the hospital for a few days, but made a complete recovery.
He had to adjust his diet after that, and did not eat the beef again.
The Argentinian doctors treated him well and he recovered quickly.
Timothy was not used to the Argentinian spices but recovered and adjusted with the help of his father's family.
That's the day he decided to become a vegetarian.
He became so I'll that he couldn't even get out of bed for two weeks.
Fortunately, the illness only lasted a day or two.
His father had warned him about the food abroad, but Timothy ended up with a tapeworm and terrible food poisoning.

story: Bob's friend David played the guitar. Bob was jealous of David and wanted to play the guitar as well. He went to the store and bought a guitar. He brought it home and spent many hours practicing.
original_ending: Bob became very good at the guitar and now David was jealous of him.

endings.ending: He never could master the guitar, and ended up giving up in a few months.
He approached David and asked for help getting better at guitar.
Bob got good at guitar and formed a band with David.
He never got very good, but he never gave up.
After weeks of practicing Bob realized he wasn't that good and playing and decided to give David his guitar.
Bob felt bad that he was so jealous of David and admitted his feelings, David offered to teach Bob to play so they could play together.
Even though he practiced, Bob couldn't learn how to play the guitar well.
Bob played so well, David invited him to join his band!

story: Noel was walking through the airport food court with her mom. They had just gotten off of their flight and were about to eat lunch. Noel suddenly felt as if something important to her was missing. She started crying when she noticed that she didn't have her toy bear.
original_ending: Her mom then explained that she had put the bear in their luggage.

endings.ending: She was happy when a little boy ran to her and gave the toy bear which she had dropped to her.
She found out that she had missed her bear in the plane using her magic sense.
Noel's little brother had stolen her teddy bear!
Noel's dad told her that he had already put the bear into their rental car.
Noel looked down and saw it had just fallen onto the floor.
Noel's mom called her connection within the airline, and through herculean effort, located the bear on the plane still and had it shipped home.
A flight attendant came running up with her bear and saved the day.
Noel and her Mother went to lost and found and later the bear was found.

story: Jane used to get made fun of at school for being poor. Even though the other kids had money, they weren't as happy as Jane. One day she was asked why she is always happy even without money. She said she appreciates the many little things in her life.
original_ending: Now she is no longer made fun of at school.

endings.ending: Jane's attitude would allow her to one day become the CEO of a large corporation.
Despite this, Jane was still picked on at school, which inevitably led to her transferring to another.
She later became a certified counselor and helped many patients.
But due to lot of criticisms in her life, she is no longer happy as before.
This made her classmates feel small and regret their behavior.
Her classmates didn't understand the importance of small things but decided to leave Jane alone.
The kids think she's lying, and continues to make fun of her.
Jane's parents won the lottery, so she can fit in with the other kids now.

story: MaryJane gathered all the ingredients on the counter. She followed the recipe step by step. She slid the first pan into the oven and waited. When the timer went off she pulled the baked goodies out of the oven.
original_ending: She served her friends the fresh baked cookies at lunch.

endings.ending: When she ate it was really bad
they weren't well baked yet
And then she ate several cookies in secret.
And so she decided to add a special frosting to the cookies.
She realized they weren't finished yet, and put them back in for a few minutes.
She realized she never turned the oven on!
She was shocked to see the burnt cookies as she had set the timer wrongly.
She added a secret magic ingredient and served it to her boyfriend.

story: Martha was in her living room. Suddenly there was a knock at the door. No one was there but a big box was on her porch. She looked inside and saw a ton of gently used baby toys.
original_ending: It was really helpful because she was a poor mother.

endings.ending: Martha didn't have any children so she took the toys to a charity shop.
Martha walked around the neighborhood asking if someone was missing a package of toys.
Martha was very confused and thought it must be for someone else because she didn't have any children.
Martha brought the box inside and placed it with the other toys for the Christmas toy Drive she organized.
Marth worked at the children's hospital so she brought the toys to the workplace and her patients were really happy.
Martha was devastated because she had a miscarriage and these toys brought back her miserable memories.
It's great to be surprised
The happiness of making someone happy

story: Zsa Zsa and Mark were in bed on Sunday morning. They were having a contest to see who could be lazier. Mark agreed to make breakfast, so Zsa Zsa was winning. However, there was no milk to make pancakes.
original_ending: Zsa Zsa was voluntold to go to the store to get milk.

endings.ending: They decided to be equally lazy and both laid back down to bed.
Mark cooked eggs instead of pancakes.
Mark was going to look up a different recipe on his phone, but it was three feet away on the desk and Mark didn't want to make the effort to reach it.
They both decided to order breakfast instead, although they were shocked to learn that it cost them $30 in delivery fees.
So they both just went back to sleep.
So Mark made them using water instead.
Mark decided to heat up some pre-packaged waffles instead, while Zsa Zsa continued to doze in bed.
Mark decided he wasn't hungry after all, and went back to bed and slept the day away.

story: I was painting my garage and was almost finished. My phone rang and when I reached to get it I knocked over the paint. Red paint spread all across my white carpet. I tried to get up the paint before it set but it was too late.
original_ending: Now I have an odd shaped red paint stain in my new carpet.

endings.ending: I had to replace the entire carpet.
I bought a cleaning product later that took most of the stain out.
My wife was angry and shouted at me for the mess.
Now my white carpet turned into the red carpet.
I had to call a professional carpet cleaning service to fix it.
I covered the stained carpet with a rug.
I had to rip out the carpet and buy a new one.
I decided to paint the rest of the carpet red to match the stain.

story: Amelia had an old brown chair, but she wanted it to be pink. She asked her mom if she could have a pink chair instead. Amelia's mom told her that they could paint the chair pink. They went to the store and bought a beautiful pink paint.
original_ending: After it was painted, Amelia loved her new pink chair!

endings.ending: After sanding, priming and painting the chair, Amelia thought it looked terrible so her mom bought her a new pink chair instead.
They painted the chair together and had a great time, once the chair was fully painted Amelia sat on it before the paint dried ruining their hard work.
Amelia couldn't wait to sit in her new pink chair, and she jumped into it while the paint was still wet, and now everything in her room is pink too!
When placed in Amelia's room, which was painted the same shade of pink as the chair, it seemed to disappear!
Unfortunately, the paint changed blue when applied to the chair.
The paint fumes were too strong so they weren't able to paint the chair.
The paint was not meant for furniture and ruined the chair.
The paint was uneven and left the chair as a mix of pink and brown.

story: Matthew's front yard had a single tree in it. He decided to make his son a swing. His grandpa did the same for him when he was that age. He threw a rope over a branch and tied an old tire to it.
original_ending: His son swung for hours just like he did when he was a kid.

endings.ending: The branch was rotting and it broke as soon as Matthew put his son in it.
Matthew's son did not like the swing and cried every time his dad put him in it.
His son looked at it with disdain and went back to playing games on his iPad.
Matthew should have tested the rope because it snapped the first time his son played on it.
His son wasn't impressed with it and went to the park to swing instead.
Matthew liked it so much that he decided to swing on it himself.
His son, however, had no interest in swinging.
The first time Matthew's son used the swing it broke and he ended up falling on his face.

story: Tom had to move into his new apartment. However, he had no friends to help him do that. Since he had no help, it took Tom all day to move in. It was very difficult and exhausting.
original_ending: After this Tom decided he would hire a moving company next time.

endings.ending: Tom vowed never to move again.
Tom felt very depressed that he had no one in his life when he needed them.
He ended up tearing his rotator cuff while lifting a couch up the stairs.
Fortunately, his brother called him up and asked him if he needed some assistance.
He ended up hurting his back from lifting so much stuff.
He decided to take a nap before he even unpacked anything.
Tom pulled a muscle while moving furniture, and it caused him to miss work.
Tom had to pay more for his moving truck because of how long it took.

story: Dan is working at Dairy Queen when a blind man comes in. When the blind man pays he drops a twenty dollar bill. A woman picks it up and puts it in her pocket. Dan tells her to give the money back.
original_ending: The blind man thanks Dan for standing up for him.

endings.ending: The woman runs out the front door.
The woman denies taking the money, and begins to argue.
The woman refuses and runs out of the restaurant with the money.
Dan then grabs the woman and they struggle until eventually she gives up and throws the money at him.
The woman runs out of the store with the money.
The woman apologizes to the man and gives him the money back.
The woman says "Finders Keepers" and runs out the store.
The woman cunningly pulls a five dollar bill out of the same pocket and gives that to the blind man.

story: As kids, they went on vacation and stopped at Howe's Cavern. They went down into the cavern with the tour guide. They asked for two child volunteers to come forward. Isaac was volunteered and another girl came forward as well.
original_ending: They demonstrated how some people get married down in the cavern.

endings.ending: The two volunteers were given special permission to drink the water from the crystal clear underground lake.
They got the chance to demonstrate a unique natural echo chamber that could be made by standing at two specific points in the cavern.
Isaac and the girl didn't get along and fought about everything during the whole tour.
The girl slipped while walking up and Isaac helped her to her feet.
Together they showed how the voice echoed differently in opposite directions.
Isaac walked towards eastern and the girl towards western ends of the cavern, while their body appeared different due to the reflections within the cave.
When Isaac saw that another girl volunteered as well he decided he didn't want to do it anymore.
Isaac and the girl inched forward towards the cavern, but both froze and were too afraid to go in alone.

story: Amy was invited to go to a Movie with a group of kids. She was invited by her crush Ray. She thought Ray liked her and wanted her there. When she arrived he was there with another girl.
original_ending: Amy finally realized her and Ray were not meant to be.

endings.ending: Amy did not realize her and Ray were not meant to be.
Amy ran out of the movie, and back home to her room to cry all alone.
Amy began sobbing and ran out of the theater.
Ray came over and introduced his sister to Amy.
Amy left, walked home with a smile on her face knowing she would no longer waste her time on him anymore after he showed his true colors.
Amy went up to the girl and slapped her, causing Amy to get arrested that night for assault.
Amy didn't know the girl, but she turned out to be Ray's sister.
When Ray saw how disappointed Amy looked, he finally realised that she had feelings for him.

story: One day I bought a ticket to Vidcon, to see Shane Dawson. It was a very long road trip, but we made it. Once I got there, I took in line for 3 hours. When I got to the front of the line, I met Shane Dawson.
original_ending: He took a picture with me, and then I went home.

endings.ending: Dawson was so impressed with my dedication that he invited me to be in his next video.
It was not until I got home that I realized the person I met was only a Shane Dawson impersonator.
But out of excitement I fainted.
I got a surprise gift from him as I was the 300th person in the line.
He was so rude to me I was upset and never watched him again.
Another fan got impatient and pushed me out of the way and took my spot so I never had a chance to talk to him.
He turned out to be the rudest person I've ever met.
Just when I was going to talk to him, someone said they were out of time and made us all leave.

story: I am very picky about my pets. I had a dog as a child, but I was afraid of it. I got a lizard but was very bored with it. I recently returned a rabbit to the pet store because it smelled.
original_ending: Next I am going to try to get a bird.

endings.ending: I have decided I just should not have a pet.
As it turned out, it was me who smelled, not the rabbit.
I want something exotic like a monkey.
Maybe I would feel better around farm animals.
Maybe I don't like pets after all.
I probably should think a long time before getting another pet to be sure to get the right one.
I decided that I was not meant to have a pet.
I plan to adopt a cat and see if that fits me.

story: Bill went to the library to check out a book. He wandered the stacks to find a good one. A blue book about fishing caught his eye. Bill took it to the front desk.
original_ending: The librarian said he couldn't take it out unless he paid an old fine.

endings.ending: When he began reading the book the fishes came to life.
This book inspired him to become a fisherman.
Another boy suddenly grabbed it from him and went to check out.
He was unhappy to find out that the book can't be taken to home and has to read only in the library.
Once home, Bill realized the wrong cover was on the book, and what he had taken was a romance novel.
Only all of the librarians had gone to lunch, leaving Bill waiting for over two hours.
The book was worn down and starting to break so the librarian winked at Bill and told him just to take it to keep.
Bill took the book home and read it front to back, he learned some new tricks and caught his biggest fish yet when he went fishing next.

story: I was meeting my brother to pick up my mom for a visit. We decided to meet in a town about halfway between us. He thought it was one exit off the highway. I thought it was a different exit.
original_ending: We ended up driving right past each other on I-95.

endings.ending: For some reason, I decided just to keep driving and see where the open road took me.
My brother ended up picking up my mother and I met her the next day.
I had to make a U-turn to find him.
I ended up getting lost and drove back home.
We ended up in different towns, far away.
Somehow we ended in the same town.
We argued and said somethings we can't take back.
My mom told us we were both wrong and decided to drive herself to my house.

story: First, when I got into my class my teacher called me over. She handed me a paper with a huge F on the top, beside my name. Then, I got to lunch, and I spilt my milk all over my new dress. I went to the off the milk and  I found a twenty dollar bill.
original_ending: When I walked out I had a big smile, and I had a great day after that.

endings.ending: I gave the money to my friend who I owed money to.
I placed the bill in my shoe and made sure no one was looking.
My friend came up and accused me of taking her money.
I decided to go to the mall after school and buy myself something nice.
When I turned the money into the lost and found, the teacher it belonged to ended up letting me keep it for my honesty.
I decided to skip my last class of the day and treat myself to a drink and a pastry at the local coffee shop.
I decided to go to a restaurant to make up my bad day.
I was not happy with it as I had very bad day in school.

story: Mark loved to prank his teacher Mrs Davison. He would throw erasers at her every time she turned around. Mark saw that she wasn't looking so he grabbed an eraser and threw it. She turned around quickly and caught it, throwing it back at Mark.
original_ending: After Mark was hit in the eye he decided he would never prank again.

endings.ending: Mark told his parents and they got Mrs. Davison fired.
The entire class laughed at Mark which only led to him acting out more in the future.
Mark was mad that she threw at him and told the principal on her and Mrs. Davison was fired for abusing a student.
The entire class laughed as the eraser hit Mark, he was so embarrassed that he never bothered Mrs. Davison again.
Then Mark was sent to the principle room for his bad behaviour.
Mark was guilty for pranking on his teacher.
He didn't realize she was aware, and apologized after class.
Mark isn't done with his pranks, but will need to find something different now.

story: Lucy was on the phone with her friend Amy. Amy was at a party for another friend. Lucy wanted to feel included. But being on the phone was worse than not being there.
original_ending: Lucy got off the phone with Amy, and sat alone in her room.

endings.ending: She sadly thought of the remaining time on her prison sentence, and wondered if her friends would still be there when she got out.
She hung up the phone, got dressed, and decided to crash the party.
Lucy hung up the phone and went to the party.
when she hung up she realized there was pizza in the fridge and she ate happily for not being at the party.
Lucy cried for hours and ended up feeling very depressed.
Lucy decided to crash the party and ended up having a great time.
So Lucy got on her bicycle and rode over the to the party.
Just then, Lucy's Mom burst into Lucy's room, took away her phone and reminded her that she was grounded.

story: Amy had a paper due on Beethoven for her music class. The weeks passed and she hadn't begun. The night before she spent the whole night working on the paper. In class the teacher asked her to read her paper aloud.
original_ending: Amy was embarrassed by the poor quality of the paper.

endings.ending: Amy had crammed really hard the night before and did a great job presenting the paper!
As soon as Amy began to read her paper, the fire alarm and sprinklers went off, ruinning her paper.
Amy pretended to get sick and ran out of the classroom.
The teacher told her it was the best paper she had ever heard.
everyone gave her a round of applause as she finished.
The teacher yelled at her for reading too slowly.
Amy loved the script!
Amy criticized the script and said she would never be a part of it.

story: Mia has 3 dogs that always want to sleep with her. Mia only has an air mattress and doesn't want the dogs on it. Mia makes sure to keep the dogs from her room. Mia forgot to shut her door and the dogs jumped on her bed.
original_ending: The dogs had sharp nails and popped Mia's air mattress.

endings.ending: They slept on the bed all night and Mia slept on the floor.
She yelled at the dogs and closed the door to her room.
The dogs made a mess on the bed but nothing else happened.
Mia gave food to calm the dogs.
Mia realized she actually like sleeping with her dogs, they were very still and kept her warm all night.
Mia freaked out and jumped up, sending the air mattress into the air and tossing the dogs all over the room.
The dogs wrestled on the bed and got dirt all over her clean sheets.
The dogs immediately laid down and caused no disturbances.

story: He slipped into his backpack smiling, the day had finally come! He was a sixth grader - the rulers of the school! She opened the front door and called for him to get into the car. At the drop off gate, he gave her a kiss goodbye and ran to his pals.
original_ending: Tears formed as she watched her little boy go off to rule the school.

endings.ending: Just then, she heard a loud honk behind her as other parents waited to drop off their children as well.
Unfortunately, his pals saw him kiss his mom and started heckling him about it.
His pals turned around and waved at her.
He ran back because he forgot his water bottle.
His pals made fun of him the rest of the year because his mom kissed him, he was very unpopular.
He had a great year, but his grades were so poor he was held back and got to be the ruler of the school for a second year.
She realized he forgot his lunch, so she had to run after him with the paper bag.
It wasn't until she stopped at the gas station on the way home that she realized she had two different shoes on.

story: Tina had a lot of homework. Instead of doing the homework, Tina watched television. After a while, Tina woke up and it was very late. Tina has to rush through her homework.
original_ending: The teacher gave Tina a bad grade for poor work on the homework.

endings.ending: The teacher called sick next day so Tina got an extra day to revise her homework.
Lots of students rushed through their homework and teacher assigned extra homework for the whole class.
She finished her homework but forgot to bring it with her the next day and her teacher gave her a zero.
Tina's parents found out that Tina was neglecting her school work because of the TV, so they removed it until she got her grades back up.
Amazingly, she got it all done even if she had to sacrifice some sleep.
She ends up falling asleep again and misses the bus to school.
Despite rushing through it Tina did so well her teacher praised her in front of the whole class.
The teacher called Tina's parents to tell them that Tina continually neglects her homework and turns in poor quality work.

story: Gus got into his car to pull out of his driveway. He looked behind him to back up but he could not see. There was too much snow on his window. Gus got out of the car and brushed it off.
original_ending: He got back into his car and could not safely go.

endings.ending: When he got back in he realized someone was inside the car with him.
he drove to work but had to go very slow in the snow and ice.
on leaving he saw that the passage was full of snow.
when he realized his hand was freezing.
Then he noticed it had started to snow heavily and decided to stay in his home.
He was shocked to see a snake slithering away from his car.
Then his car did not start back up so Gus could not leave.
A bunch of snow from on top of the car fell on Gus and he got very upset.

story: Beth needed to get to her office. She waved a taxi down and told the driver where to go. The driver took her to her office. The driver told her that she didn't have to pay.
original_ending: She decided to pay for the next person's ride instead.

endings.ending: She smiled, thanked him and left.
She thanked but still paid double for the driver's kindness.
Beth was so happy by the drivers offer that she gave him the money as a tip instead.
Beth was so impressed by the drivers gesture that she contacted the company and told them how great he was and sent him lunch as a thank you.
His meter had broken and he did not know how much the fair was for so he could not legally charge her.
Beth gave the driver her business card and said that if he ever needed  good lawyer to call her.
She said "thanks" and left.
The driver instead gave her money.

story: Rick had a big pet snake in his home. When he moved to a small apartment for work, he had to get rid of her. His friend watched the snake for a year while Rick worked. When Rick returned home, he was so happy to get his snake back.
original_ending: The snake had grown almost a foot while he was away!

endings.ending: He could tell his friend took great care of the snake while it was away.
The snake was not used to him, however, and was a little aggressive towards him.
Rick's friend hadn't fed the snake and it looked malnourished.
Rick's friend had given away the snake to a pet shop.
Later on, Rick noticed a different pattern on the snake's back and realized it had been switched with another snake!
Rick sat and watched TV at night with his snake, just like they used to do before he moved into the small apartment.
his snake didn't recognize him and tried to bite him.
Little did he know that his snake would only live 2 more days.

story: Jane and Fred always met by the log behind the fence. They would meet and talk and laugh for hours. The log was eventually cut up into firewood. Jane and Fred got married and cut down a tree in the back yard.
original_ending: No they have a log gain when they want to get away.

endings.ending: They decided to get some nice chairs made out of the tree and they found them much more comfortable than the log ever was.
They felt so guilty for cutting down the tree that they became environmentalists, and fought against logging all over the country.
One day they went out to the log to find It missing, someone must have taken It for firewood.
Jane and Fred found a tree fell over on the log, they each have a log now.
They made a extra supply of firewood for future use.
This made room for a shed that they would build in order to store lawn equipment.
One day by the log, they were talking about building a log cabin to live in.
They weren't satisfied with just the log, so they built a fence to go around the log.

story: Tim wanted to buy a new video game that was very popular. He didn't have enough money to buy the game right away. Tim was determined to earn money and did extra chores at home. Tim's mom gave him the money he earned.
original_ending: Tim finally had enough money and bought his new video game.

endings.ending: On his way to video game store the money got stolen.
However the game was very expensive, so Tim had keep working like that for 2 years to save enough money.
Tim chose to buy candy instead with his money.
Time was sad because the next day he dropped and lost all his money.
When he went to buy it the game was sold out.
He bought the game and played it all night.
By the time he had earned enough money Tim realized he had only wanted the game because it was popular at the time and so he saved the money for something else.
As it turned out, Tim didn't even like the video game and was very disappointed.

story: The prisoner went to the edge of the yard and looked at the fence. A small hole had been cut in it by his friend from the outside. The prisoner waited until a guard was distracted. He ran towards the fence and crawled through.
original_ending: Once on the other side he ran for the woods.

endings.ending: Once in the woods, he was bitten by a mountain lion and was captured hours later by K9 units able to track the blood from the fresh bite.
Once in the woods, he found a tree to climb on and took a nap.
The prisoner's shoelace got snagged on the cut fence, alerting the guard nearby leading to his re-capture.
Unfortunately he didn't know his friend had already been arrested, and the police were waiting for him at the getaway car.
Once through, he bolted across the gravel road to hide in the ravine.
But in a moment, he felt the sting of the guard dog's teeth on his leg.
He was caught in the fence and got stuck.
He realized it was a trap when he was met by a guard .

story: Horace has wanted to learn how to make rice for months. He asks his friend Amy to come over to show him how. Amy teaches Horace each step to making delicious rice. Finally Horace knows how to make it for himself.
original_ending: He is happy that he learned how to make rice.

endings.ending: Horace eventually becomes a famous chef and owes it all to Amy.
When he tries making it on his own it tastes terrible.
He took a bite of his rice and decided he doesn't like the taste of rice.
He takes this skill and becomes a celebrated sushi chef.
Horace makes rice with every meal for the next month, but grows so sick of it he never cooks it again.
Horace tries to make rice as soon as Amy leaves, but it turns out soggy, apparently he didn't follow the lessons properly.
Later, he goes to work for a Chinese restaurant and makes rice all day.
He asks Amy out on a date and eventually they get married, and rice is thrown on them.

story: A girl heard her mom yell her name from downstairs. She got up and started to head downstairs to see what her mom wanted. As she to the bottom of the stairs, her mom pulled her in close. Her mom began to cry.
original_ending: The girl's dog had been hit by a car and was dead.

endings.ending: Alarmed, the girl asked her mother what was wrong to which her mother replied the she just really missed her today and needed a hug.
The mother told her daughter that they just won ten million dollars and all of their money troubles were gone!
Because she was hurt.
The girl got selected in her dream dance academy.
Her mom told her they just won the lottery and wouldn't have to move from their home after all.
When her mom stopped crying, she found out her parents were getting a divorce.
The girls mom got a promotion at work, and wanted to tell her daughter first.
Her mom has to go on a business trip for a few weeks, and will miss her greatly.

story: John completely forgot to do his homework. He got to school early and asked to copy his friends work. They all told him they forgot the homework as well. They sat in a circle before school and tried to finish it!
original_ending: With the group of them all trying they managed to get it done!

endings.ending: A teacher saw them and yelled at them for being forgetful.
The homework was too hard and they didn't finish it on time.
They all copied off each other and got in trouble for cheating.
When they got to class the teacher stated the homework wasn't due until the next day.
They didn't have enough time to finish it and they all ended up in detention.
Luckily their teacher was out sick and they had an extra day to complete the home work.
A stray dog walked by and offered to do their homework for ten dollars each.
They didn't finish it but their teacher let them turn it in the next day.

story: Kate wanted to move the snow resting on the basement windows. She decided to open the windows and let the snow fall in. But when she opened the window the snow just kept falling in. She closed the window quickly to stop more from coming in.
original_ending: But there was already ankle deep snow on the basement floor.

endings.ending: Her dad walked in and got angry.
She picked up the snow and put it in the sink.
Then the window suddenly broke as a rock was carried through it by the moving snow.
Now Kate could go sledding without leaving her house.
Kate grabbed a mop and cleaned up the melted snow that managed to get into basement and onto the floor.
Deciding it was a mistake, she left the windows closed from now on for the snow to melt off the windows naturally.
She needed to shovel the snow, as she was already straining the floor and the windows.
Kate called her husband to help her shovel the snow.

story: Jenny never used a crystal punch set she got as a wedding gift. When a friend got married, Jenny wrapped the set as her gift. When the friend opened the gift, she looked curiously at Jenny. She told Jenny it was the same punch set she gave her Years ago.
original_ending: Jenny laughed and said best friends share the same taste.

endings.ending: Jenny's face turned sour and she slammed the bowl down.
Jenny cried from being overwhelmed with having such a great friend
Jenny felt embarrassed, and offered to take it back in exchange for something else.
Jenny denied this, saying it was similar but not the same model.
Jenny felt like she was going to die of embarrassment.
Jenny lied and said it was a different version.
Jenny laughed and told her that she now she had a punch set to regift.
Jenny blushed and agreed to take back the set and swap it.

story: George got glasses today. He has to go to work in an hour and is nervous. He thinks he looks ridiculous in his new glasses. He walked into work with his head down so nobody will notice.
original_ending: Within an hour of work he got three compliments on his glasses!

endings.ending: The first person who saw him laughed, George was extremely sad.
Everyone said George looked better with glasses.
Someone immediately called him poindexter.
With his confidence shattered, he couldn't do his job.
It stressed him out so much he ended up with a bad headache and had to go home early.
Turns out nobody was remotely interested in whether he wore glasses or not.
Because George was walking with his head down, he ran into a wall and his glasses fell off and ended up getting broken.
His supervisor saw him walking with his head down and thought he must be having a bad day and told George he could take the day off.

story: Gina went to the store and got ice cream for herself. When she got home her mom was mad she didn't get some for everyone. She handed Gina some money and sent her back to the store Gina bought a gallon of ice cream and ran back home.
original_ending: She was afraid it would melt in the heat if she walked.

endings.ending: Gina told her mom to go get her own ice cream.
Gina went back to the store and got ice cream and it dropped on the sidewalk as she was running home.
When Gina got home she was yelled at for getting the wrong flavor.
Everyone was finally happy and they all ate the ice cream together.
Everyone was so excited to have ice cream for dessert.
On the way, she dropped the ice cream and the gallon burst open all over the sidewalk.
on the way she tripped and dropped all the ice cream.
when he went to eat the ice cream his mother didn't like it and left everything to Gina.

story: One day as I was coming home from work, my cat ran out the front door. I looked for her for hours that day. After a week of looking, I gave up hope that she would return. To my surprise, she came back to the front door after two whole weeks!
original_ending: My white cat had turned a dirty brown from being out in the wild!

endings.ending: I took a long time cleaning her up then my real cat showed up, it turned out it's another cat visiting me.
She got a wound on her belly and I was so sad and angry about it.
I jumped with joy to see my cat again.
My cat was very hungry and I fed him some milk.
She had a hurt paw and she was hungry.
She was purring and happy to see me
She was thin and only came back to eat and then ran away again.
She went out to mate, came back pregnant and had 8 pups.

story: Bella ran out of the school building on the last day of school. Along with most of her class, she headed to the pool. She noticed a boy looking sad, sitting on the ground. He told her he'd left his swim suit at home and it was locked.
original_ending: A half an hour later they both swam, he in her brother's old suit.

endings.ending: She decided to stay with him instead of going into the pool.
They ran to a store and bought him a swim suit with the money she had saved.
Bella offered him her swim suit, and watched as he happily headed to the pool, as she sat on the ground, looking sad.
She explained to the boy that she had "A certain set of skills..." and they left for the boy's house to try her new lockpick set on the door.
She suggested that he swim in his jeans.
She laughed at him and walked away.
She sat with the boy all that afternoon so he wouldn't be sad and alone.
They got some scissors and cut the boys jeans off so he could swim anyway.

story: When I was little, I had a book. It was my favorite, but the pictures scared me. I asked my mom to hide the scary book. Later, I found the book in her closet.
original_ending: I secretly would go to the closet to read the book when she was out.

endings.ending: I took the book to the trash can outside and never saw it again.
She told me that the story was not real and then I felt less scared.
I was very scared and could never read.
One day I read that book. I could never sleep without the lights on again.
I decided to throw the book in the garbage as I never wanted to see it again.
I looked at the book and laughed that I used to think it was scary.
I want to criticise this book what are the book said.
I wish to throw this book out of my view.

story: Cassidy has joined his college swimming team. He finds out that the other new members are all shaving their heads. Although he doesn't want to shave his head, he does so he can fit in. At first he finds it very cold and strange to have a shaved head.
original_ending: However, he feels very connected with other the new swimmers.

endings.ending: Then one day his teammates started removing something from their heads in the lockers, showing they were all wearing swimming caps that looked like skin.
One day his coach comes and ask why Cassidy decided to shave his head, as he was the only one in the team to do it.
But in his first race he set his personal record for the 200 meter freestyle.
After a week Cassidy decided he really likes the look of it and kept shaving his head, even after college.
