Dustin ignored his mom and kept on dumping dirt on his head.
Dustin's dad hear the yelling and went out to grab the dump truck from Dustin.
Dustin ran away from his mom because he was afraid of what his mom was going to say.
Dustin went straight to the tub and scrub himself clean.

story: I heard a loud noise last night. The noise woke me up from sleeping. I went outside to see where the noise was coming from. It was coming from my next door neighbor's house.
original_ending: I went over and ask him to turn the music down.

endings.ending: I realized it was just my neighbor, Tim, doing some work on his house.
They are new neighbors and boy, they sure are loud!
I called police.
I hacked into his music system and made it play church songs.
My neighbor is a former prisoner, so I tend to ignore him and let him do what he wants.
When the partygoers saw me outside in my pajamas, they invited me over and we had a great time drinking beers.

story: Lucy was sitting on the porch at her grandparents. She had no friends, and nothing to do. She went for a walk down the block. She picked up a stick and played drums on a fence.
original_ending: She decided she had better stop when the owner opened their door.

endings.ending: The gatekeeper caught her and started questioning her.
A black dog started barking and the door was opened.
Then a dog came down the sidewalk so she played with him instead.
Once that got boring she decided to play hopscotch instead.
The owner of the fence came outside and scolded her.
Lucy broke a piece of the fence off by mistake and ran away.

story: Jose and his wife decided to go for a walk one morning. They left their home and began walking down a forested path. All of a sudden, a large black panther pounced at them. Jose pulled out his handgun and fired into the beast.
original_ending: The large cat dropped and Jose and his wife fled.

endings.ending: The panther hesitated for a minute and then ran into the woods in the other direction.
The first bullet did not seem to phase the panther so Jose fired another shot and that dropped the big cat.
The panther ran away and Jose and his wife never walked that path again.
Deciding not to waste some perfectly good meat, Jose and his wife tried to cook and eat the Panther's carcass.
Jose missed the panther and hit a tree.
The beast ran off scared of the noise.

story: Dan loved reading to his daughter. Recently, he bought a new book titled Magical Unicorn. Dan read the book to his daughter, and she loved it. She loved the book so much, Dan read the book another two times.
original_ending: Dan loved the fact that his daughter loved the book he bought.

endings.ending: Then Dan said that is enough and went to bed.
Then Dan asked his daughter if she wanted to be a unicorn for Halloween.
Dan's daughter started to cry when he said he couldn't read it a third time because it was time for her to go to bed.
The next day, Dan's daughter unfortunately lost the book and Dan was unable to find another copy to buy her.
By then, Dan's daughter knew all of the words.
They started to bond and it made Dan feel bitter about the custody arrangement.

story: Kyle was leaving to pick up his sister from work. When he got to the car he realized he was missing his keys. He looked through every room in his house but still couldn't find it. He decided to check his dirty clothes basket.
original_ending: He found his keys in the pocket of the pants he wore yesterday.

endings.ending: He did not end up finding his keys anywhere and his sister took an Uber home.
He was pressed for him after not finding his keys in his dirty clothes basket. He borrowed his dad's car to pick up his sister from work.
When he bent over to check, the keys fell out of his pocket that he didn't check.
He searched for a while, but could not find the keys.
Kyle didn’t find his keys until 2 weeks later as his dog had buried them in the yard.
His keys weren’t in there but there was a $20 so he called a cab.

story: Oscar did not want to go to work. He wanted to go to a hockey game with his buddies. So Oscar called in sick at work. Oscar was having so much fun at the game he did not see his boss.
original_ending: The next day the boss called him into his office and scolded Oscar.

endings.ending: Luckily for Oscar, his boss didn't see him either.
His boss was playing on the ice and Oscar somehow missed it.
His boss did not see him either at the game.
His boss saw him at the game and fired him immediately.
He was surprised when his boss wanted to reminisce about the match the next day.
Oscar's boss was wearing the other team's jersey.

story: Richard recently got a job as a mailman. On his first day, he lost several packages. He dropped them as he got in and out of his truck. Richard decided to lie to his boss about losing the packages.
original_ending: Richard's boss believed him, but Richard felt guilty for a long time.

endings.ending: His boss later found out and fired him on the spot.
Richard's friend later went to his boss and told him what he did.
Then his boss found the packages on his morning jog, and fired him for lying.
However, his boss had magical powers, so he turned him into a toad for lying.
Richard's boss had a hidden camera on the truck and  knew Richard had lied to him about the missing packages so he immediately fired him.
Richard told his boss about the lost packages and promised to be more careful in the future, his boss was disappointed but was pleased Richard admitted losing the packages.

story: Joe had been talking to Nan about going to the dance. Nan told Joe she wasn't sure if she could go. Joe asked Tina to the dance instead. Tina said she was going to the dance with Nan.
original_ending: Joe went to the dance by himself just to laugh at Nan and Tina.

endings.ending: Joe thought to himself that times are changing.
Joe said that he will never ask anyone to a dance again.
Joe decided not to go to the dance and stayed back home.
The dance was cancelled due to a pandemic and nobody went to the dance.
So Joe asked Annie to the dance and she said yes.
Joe was annoyed with Nan so he talked to her about the situation.

story: Jake was very tired from working a ten hour day. He had to go to his son's school play that night. He was so tired that he didn't know how he was going to stay up. He bought and drank an energy drink on the way home from work.
original_ending: He was then able to stay awake through the entire play.

endings.ending: Unfortunately, he passed out on the couch before he made it to the play and his son was very upset.
The energy drink made him sick, so he spent the night in the bathroom instead of at his son's play.
The energy drink was not enough and he dozed off and missed the play.
His son was very thankful that his dad showed up at the play.
Unfortunately, the energy drink wasn't strong, so he ended up going to sleep anyway and missing his son's play.
He would make an attempt to go to the play, but thanks to a storm the event up being cancelled anyway.

story: I had a few too many drinks at the party. I became less inhibited over time. I eventually found myself dancing on a table with my friends. I began to sing loudly and off key.
original_ending: My husband convinced me to go home and sleep it off.

endings.ending: I realized what I was doing and suddenly my face turn red like a tomato.
My friends were laughing at me but I was having a good time signing off key.
I finally realized that I'm an alcoholic.
That's how I met the woman who would become my wife.
My friends later told me that I was the life of the party.
My bad singing made a few people walk away.

story: Lucy was watching TV with her grandpa and was bored. She wanted to do something else but he wouldn't let her. Lucy looked at grandpa and saw he was asleep. Lucy stood quietly and slipped out.
original_ending: She was free of Grandpa's boring show, but still had nothing to do.

endings.ending: She went and asked her Grandmother is she wanted to play some checkers.
Lucy settled into a big chair in her Grandpa's study and read a good book.
She went next door to her friend's house and they played a game.
He suddenly awakened and yelled for her to get him some ice cream.
Lucy then went outside and discovered a cute kitten that needed some attention.
Lucy went on a walk and when she got back her grandpa was still asleep so she put on a tv show that she liked.

story: Jeff tried out for the basketball team at school. He did not make the cut this year. His coach told him he needed to work on his shot. Jeff joined a gym and spent all winter perfecting his basketball shot.
original_ending: The next summer Jeff tried out again and made the team.

endings.ending: The following year was no better and he still failed to make the team.
Approaching the try outs he was sure he'd make the team this year.
No matter how hard he practiced, Jeff just got worse and worse at basketball.
Before Jeff could even try out for the team, a college recruiter selected him to play for the local university while enjoying a full scholarship.
He wound up transferring to another school and never did play for a team.
The team got a new coach, though, and he still didn't make the team!

story: Gina's grandma sent her to feed the dogs. But Gina was scared. When she finished she stood at the closed gate relieved to be done. She thought her grandma would be happy she fed them.
original_ending: Instead she stood in the doorway shaking her head in disappointment.

endings.ending: She was right, her grandma gave her $5 to show her appreciation.
Regardless though, Gina had learned an important lesson in conquering her fears.
Once Gina got back her grandma promised never to send her to feed them again.
Grandma told her to not be so scared and just be brave next time.
Her grandma was so proud that Gina overcame her fear of the dogs and was able to feed them on her own.
Her grandma stood waiting for her with a big grin on her face.

story: When Joe was in Preschool they made him take naps. One day he was awoken just a couple minutes early. Groggily he sat up and saw a fire truck sitting outside. The school had the firefighters show up to the school.
original_ending: Joe was so excited when he got to sit in the driver's seat!

endings.ending: He screamed in joy and woke everyone up.
He didn't care and fell back asleep.
Joe got to wear a real fireman's hat that day!
All of the children we allowed to climb and play on the fire truck.
Joe got to play with the hose, which was very exciting.
A fire broke out at the school and the firefighters had to fight it while Joe watched.

story: Terry put glitter on all of her crafts. She was always finding glitter on her clothes and skin. She took a long shower to get it all off for a date. Terry got dressed up and met her date.
original_ending: Her date told her that she had some glitter on her face.

endings.ending: Her date thought she was a fairy in disguise because of the gliiter, which was great since he was also a fairy in disguise.
Her date had glitter all oer him and asked why she wasn't wearing glitter for the glitter party they were going to.
She really disliked her date so it was all for nothing.
It turned out that her date loved glitter and asked her to use it more often!
The date did not go well and Terry went back home to work on more crafts.
Terry and her date bonded over their love of using glitter.

story: Billy decided he wanted to make a robot. He worked for many months to get it just right. Once finished, he wanted to show it off. Billy took the robot to school to show his friends and teachers.
original_ending: When he turned the robot on, it exploded in flames.

endings.ending: Billy put the robot in his locker, when he went to get it he found that it was gone.
Billy asked the teacher if he can show everyone his robot but his teacher has told him "You have to wait for show and tell time."
Everyone loved it so much that he took it to he science fair and won first prize!
It was so well made that a businessman bought it and asked him to work for him making more to sell!
It turns out the robot was scared of people and started crying and cowering the minute it was turned on.

Bobby's robot was so spectacularly good that word spread rapidly about it, and in no time at all, a large company decided to develop it, and ended up making a fortune with it after having paid a miserly sum of money to poor Bobby.

story: Lisa forgot to read her textbook for History class one day. That very day, the history teacher asked who had read their reading. Lisa was not the only one who had not done the assignment. Half of the kids admitted to not doing the work.
original_ending: Every one of those kids was kicked out of class that day.

endings.ending: The teacher gave the entire class on extra day to do the reading assignment
The teacher then held an informal discussion about what the students liked and did not like about the book.
Lisa felt relieved having company.
Teacher extended assignment date to next week.
The history teacher was forced to postpone the history test.
The kids were all given failing grades for that assignment.

story: I have and electrical outlet that does not work. I tried to take it apart and fix the problem. The outlet still did not work so I called a professional. The outlet cost me forty dollars to have fixed correctly.
original_ending: I was glad I called in a professional so I did not get hurt.

endings.ending: Soon after he left, another outlet went out!
An envelope with cash in it went missing and I think he robbed me.
I felt bad for not being able to fix it myself.
I began watching electrical DIY videos so I can fix such things on my own next time.
They gave me a 50% discount, which made me much happier.
The outlet had a defect, which costed me an additional forty dollars.

story: Uli was looking forward to her basketball game this afternoon. She entered the gym and left her backpack on the bleachers. After the game, she couldn't find her phone in her backpack. She was sad all night and in the morning checked in the office.
original_ending: She was happy to learn that someone had turned in her phone.

endings.ending: She suspected her arch nemesis Sarah stole her phone.
She vowed to never leave her bag alone again.
Her phone didn't turn up and she learned her lesson.
They person in the office told her to check again later.
When Uli got in the office, she saw the the desk lady using her phone, which really shocked her!
When she got in front of the office, Ali realized it was bank holiday and everything was closed.

story: The young buck stood on the doorstep eating flowers out of the pot. Inside the house the little dog was barking like crazy. Joe stopped painting to see what was going on. He didn't see the buck so he let the dog out to get it to be quiet.
original_ending: The dog chased that buck all the way down the street.

endings.ending: When the dog was no longer protected by the house, it was afraid of the buck and hid behind the house.
Unappeased, the dog continued to bark at the buck as it stood in the yard.
The dog came up to Joe because it was hungry and Joe gave the dog his lunch.
The young buck saw the dog and they played catch together with tree branches.
The dog approached the buck and began barking again the buck was terrified and dashed off into the nearby woods.
The dog was just happy to be out so he dug up a bone he recently buried and began gnawing on it and forgot about the buck.

story: I worked in a church for a while as a youth minister. The kids loved me, though they were a bit quiet and shy. We did things all summer, and had a fantastic time. Though, their parents didn't trust me because of my age.
original_ending: They had me fired, and I had to say goodbye to their kids.

endings.ending: I gained their trust at the end of the summer.
The kids threw me a party at the end of the summer.
After summer was over, a lot of the parents praised the work that I did and started to trust me more.
I know how hard it is to gain trust, but I plan on working really hard to get it from the parents.
However, after talking more with the parents, the Church leaders decided to invite me back again.
I decided to leave the Church instead of dealing with annoying questions from the suspicious parents.

story: Jean needed to go to the store to buy some ingredients for dinner. She also bought a water because it was very hot that day. On her way out, she decided to give her water to a lady outside. As Jean walked up to her car, she found ten dollars!
original_ending: Jean felt rewarded for her kindness and got a treat on the way home.

endings.ending: Jean took the ten dollars she found and placed it in her bank account.
Jean felt so bad finding 10 dollars she turned it over to the police to find the rightful owner.
After she got to her car, there was a note on it from a secret admirer with a treasure map inside leaving her stunned in a pleasant way.
Jean scratched the lottery ticket she had purchased while inside on the way to her car and to her surprise it was a winner.
Near her car was a homeless guy who looked pretty desperate so Jean gave him the ten dollar bill.
Jean thought it could be her lucky day and swung by the convenience store to buy a lottery ticket with it, which then won her millions of dollars!

story: Kay's car was getting old. One day she arrived at work and began rolling up her windows. The driver door window got stuck half way up. Kay tried, and tried but the window would not go up.
original_ending: After 10 minutes she was forced to leave it down or be late to work.

endings.ending: Kay asked a coworker to give her a hand with the window.
Kay tried so hard that the window got jammed and remained stuck.
She knew she'd have to take the car into the mechanics, yet again.
Of all the days, she didn't feel like dealing with this today.
She noticed rain clouds gathering in the distance and scrambled to find a way to cover the open window.
A coworker noticed she was having trouble and stopped to help.

story: Mike went to a coffee shop one day. He was sitting in the shop when a woman caught his eye. When he looked at her, he noticed she was looking at him. Mike walked over to her and they began to passionately talk.
original_ending: It was love at first sight, and the two fell into a strong love.

endings.ending: He knew he was smitten and asked her out for dinner that night.
He knew he wanted to get to know her better so he suggested they spend the day together.
He had thought that love was finally found, but she turned out to have no personality.
Throughout the conversation, however, he eventually realized that she was already married to another man.
Unfortunately, they had completely different political views, so he decided to not talk to her again.
She had really bad BO and Mike was disgusted, so he walked away.

story: I took a test in history. When I sat down to take the test, I was shocked. I could barely remember anything the test was asking me about. I did my best, but I was sure I failed.
original_ending: When I got the test back, I realized I hadn't done as bad as I feared.

endings.ending: I spent the rest of the day upset, because I knew that if I failed the test, I will have failed the class completely.
When I went to review my answers in the reference book, however, I was relieved to find I had answered all the questions correctly.
I really did badly and vowed to take the test more seriously next time.
I always think I've done bad, but in the end I aced the test.
I went home and cried myself to sleep.
Sure enough, I got one of the worst test grades in the class.

story: Chelsea hurt her fingers playing basketball. She was really scared to go to the doctor. Chelsea's dad convinced her to go and get checked out. It turns out the bones in the fingers were fractured.
original_ending: The doctor was able to give her the needed care she would have missed.

endings.ending: She spent the next month in a cast.
She wasn't able to go to the state finals and let her team down.
Chelsea has to miss her final two games because of her injury.
Chelsea is really glad she took her dad's advice.
Unfortunately Chelsea's dad did not have proper insurance or funds to pay for the hospital bill, and the family spiraled into bankruptcy.
On the way home, Chelsea accidentally fractured the bones in her other hand by slamming them in the car door.

story: Dan took an order for a young man who came into the restaurant. Before he left, he thanked Dan and asked him to look at his napkin. Dan searched for the napkin on the table. He found out that there was $100 behind the napkin.
original_ending: Dan was able to fill his car gas and pay a bill with the money.

endings.ending: Dan thanked the young man and told everyone about the great day he had at work.
Dan decided he should get his girlfriend something nice with the money.
Dan went out and blew the money on a night at the casino.
Then the young man grabbed the money, and yelled "just kidding" as he ran out the door.
Dan decided to pass on his good fortune and gave the bus boy half of the money.
Dan was so excited until he went to the bank and was told the bill was counterfeit.

story: Matt threw a party. It was a lot of fun for Matt. He loved being with his friends and having a good time. The only problem is that it made his house messy.
original_ending: He had to clean up the place by himself, so he was upset.

endings.ending: Matt’s landlord got sick of it and threw Matt out and none of the friends he always hosted would let him stay with them.
Matt’s girlfriend is an idiot and started cleaning his house after these parties even though she wasn’t invited.
His friends ended up staying to help him clean it up.
He went to sleep, saying that he would hire someone to clean it up in the morning, as he was way too tired.
Many of his friends stayed after the party to help him clean up.
He was also worried that his things may get broken accidentally.

story: Jackson needs to find something to cook for guests arriving today. He looks in his cupboard and sees that he has ingredients for soup. Jackson cooks a terrific chicken noodle soup for his guests. All of his guests love Jackson's soup.
original_ending: He is very happy he found something to cook for them.

endings.ending: One of them , however, winds up having an allergic reaction to one of the ingredients and becomes quite ill.
One guest in particular was writing a cookbook and paid him for the recipe!
Jackson invited everyone to give him their favorite soup recipes so he could learn new ones to cook.
One happy guest suggested that Jackson enter a soup taste contest because he would be sure to win.
He decides to save the recipe for use again.
Always the perfectionist, he still wonders how it could be improved upon.

story: Donna's favorite CD was in her car. She was taking it out to listen to in her house. Donna dropped the CD on the ground walking into her house. She stepped on the CD and cracked it.
original_ending: Donna had to get a new copy of the CD.

endings.ending: Donna told her bother about the situation who recommended she download Spotify to listen to the music without a disc.
When she told her friend what happened, they said it was a sign from God and she shouldn't listen to the devil's music.
Donna picked up the pieces and saved them for an art project.
Donna walked inside without noticing her mistake.
Donna screamed out in frustration.
Donna remembered that she had made a duplicate CD and grabbed it out of the console.

story: The Super Bowl is the biggest game of the year. We always have a big party to celebrate it. All of our friends come over, and we make great food. We make bets on what the commercials will be.
original_ending: It is one of my most favorite days of the year.

endings.ending: This year, the party was ruined by a power outage which was caused by supernatural factors.
This year's party turned sour when a verbal argument about one of the teams broke out between a friend's spouse and myself.
This year, we had to cancel the party due to COVID restrictions and everybody was very disappointed.
This year, I won a bet for $500 due to a Pepsi commercial!
It usually turns out the commercials are the best part of the game.
I think it should be declared a National Holiday.

story: Matthew was not happy to be going shopping with his mother. The grocery store was no fun but then they went next door. It was a new pet shop filled with mice, birds, and fish! To a delighted Matthew, it was like a zoo.
original_ending: His mother let him pick his first pet, a goldfish with black spots.

endings.ending: Matthew was excited to look at all the pets but his Mom was not ready to let him have a pet.
Hi Mom made Matthew promise to take card of a new pet and she let him pick out a fish to take home.
While he and his mother enjoyed looking at the animals, she refused to buy Matthew a pet on impulse.
Matthew enjoyed looking at the different animals and asked to come shopping with his mother next time too.
Mathew picked up one of the lizards when his mother wasn't looking and carefully zipped it into his coat pocket to take home.
When Mathew leaned up on the alligator glass it quickly lunged toward him making him cry and run back to his mother who recommended they get a pet rabbit instead.

story: I went to the store to buy food to make a salad. The grocery was out of lettuce so I skipped it. They were out of carrots and onions too so I skipped that. In the I only was able to buy mushrooms and tomatoes.
original_ending: I decided to use those to make a brown sauce and get chicken for it.

endings.ending: I saved the ingredients for a later time as I was not happy with the choices for a salad at the moment.
I decided to use spinach in place of the lettuce.
Being out of so much of what I wanted I had to drive to a store in the next town over.
I had to change my plans and make a different meal.
I decided that i wont make salad and instead bought a hamburger.
In the end i ended up just not making anything at all.

story: Last night I had to be home in time for the new episode I had to watch The show is vanderpump rules and it's one of my favorite shows. Thankfully I got home just in time to see it. I ended up loving the episode.
original_ending: I couldn't wait for the new one the following week.

endings.ending: But my wife hated it so much she broke the TV.
I loved its actress so much I kidnapped her.
Too bad it was the season finale and there was no more to watch.
It was the first time I had seen it and I wanted to watch the rest as soon as possible.
I then rang my friend Alice and told her everything about the show since she was at the hospital couldn't watch it.
But if that is one thing I don't like on this show is the new cast for this new season.

story: Amy loved the movie Love Story. She had seen the movie 10 times, but still loved to watch. She smiled as she watched the story unfold. Amy braced herself as the end of the movie approached.
original_ending: Amy tried to control herself, but still cried when Jennifer died.

endings.ending: As the saddest part was about to happen Amy remembered the ending and surprisingly didn't feel too emotional.
She held onto her dog, hugging him as she watched the end of the movie.
She decided not to watch the end of the movie and turned it off with 10 minutes left.
Her brother came in the room and made fun of her for crying over a movie.
She always reacted this way to this movie and loved to share it with he friend.
It didn't hit her as hard as usual but she still liked the movie anyway

story: Mary and her family were flying home from vacation in a small plane. It was dark out when the plane flew directly into thunder and wind. The passengers had to hold on tight through the rough movements. Mary thought for sure that the plane was going to crash.
original_ending: When the plane landed safely everyone clapped and cheered happily.

endings.ending: The pilot announced that they had to make an emergency landing at sea, but everyone evacuated safely onto a life raft.
After that experience, Mary decided never to fly in an airplane again.
But soon the plane passed through the storm, and Mary realized they were safe after all.
Realizing the danger, the pilot turned around and diverted to another airport.
The weather was so bad the plane had to make an emergency landing at a closer airport.
The pilot came on the intercom and reassured everyone that the plane would be safe and Mary felt much better.

story: Jimmy went for a swim at the water park. He climbed on top of the tower where there are slides. Since he left his wallet in his pocket by accident, it got lost. When he saw it, it was headed towards a large crowd of people.
original_ending: He wasn't able to go through all of the people.

endings.ending: One of the kids caught it and ran off with it!
He finally was able to retrieve it but the contents were gone!
He saw a little girl pick his wallet.
A boy ran away with his wallet.
Someone saw the wallet and grabbed it, then ran off.
Thankfully, he was able to find the wallet and put it in a locker.

story: Lucy was in the yard when she heard her grandma calling her. She ran into the house to see what she wanted. Her mother was waiting on the phone to speak with her. Lucy and her mother laughed and talked for an hour.
original_ending: They said their goodbyes and Lucy ran outside to continue playing.

endings.ending: The call was cut short though, when a car accident outside took out the telephone line that Lucy was talking on.
While Lucy was on the phone, her grandmother was in the other room scratching off a winning million-dollar lottery ticket.
While they were talking, Lucy's mother told her that she will be visiting next month.
Lucy's mother told her about a promotion that her brother recently got.
Then Lucy said "I need to go" and hung up on her mom.
Then Lucy told her she broke her mother's favorite vase.

story: Lucy was walking down the street. She had nothing better to do on a boring summer day. A puppy ran alongside her as she walked past it's fence. She stopped to play with the puppy.
original_ending: An old man came out of the house yelling causing her to run away.

endings.ending: As soon as she put her hand through the fence the puppy bit her finger.
On her way home, she decided to ask her parents for a puppy of her own.
She began to walk away from the puppy and she noticed the puppy got out of the fenced area.
She wanted the puppy so badly that she ended up picking him up and taking it.
Without warning, the puppy bite her so hard her thumb bled causing her to need a rabies shot.
After some time, she realized no one was home so she left to get some food to feed the poor hungry puppy.

story: Sally wasn't feeling well when she got home from school. She took her temperature and saw that she had a fever. She poured herself a glass of orange juice and went to her room. Sally crawled in bed and pulled the covers over her.
original_ending: The dance was this Friday and she hoped she'd get better by then.

endings.ending: After a few hours, she felt fine again and was able to go about her day.
Unfortunately she felt like she wasn't improving so her mom took her to the doctor.
Sally's condition worsened and she had to go to the hospital and missed the dance.
Sally got better and was able to enjoy the dance.
In the night, her fever got so high that she had to be taken to the hospital by her parents, and stayed there for days.
Sally fell asleep and had the craziest and most beautiful dreams she had ever had, and woke up tired but inspired and happy.

story: Beth was being bullied by a girl at school. One day on the bus the girl hit Beth. Beth hit the girl back and a fight broke out. The bus driver pulled over and broke them up.
original_ending: It was the last time the girl picked on Beth.

endings.ending: Girl falsely accused Beth of starting the fight and got her suspended.
The girl and Beth joined hands to first teach bus driver a lesson.
They were both kicked off of the bus and had to walk home.
When they got to school both of the girls had to go to the principal's office for their behavior.
The bus driver called the police.
Another car ended up hitting the bus on the side of the road.

story: Megan was waiting at the bus stop to go to school. It was raining and she was wearing her boots and raincoat. Suddenly, a car sped by and went through a puddle. The water splashed so high and even soaked Megan on the sidewalk.
original_ending: The bus showed up and she had to go to school all wet.

endings.ending: Luckily, Megan was also wearing a raincoat so she managed to stay dry.
She couldn't believe that the car had been so careless!
She decided to walk back home and get her clothes changed.
She just hopped on the bus and hoped to dry off before she got to class.
She called her mom when she got to school to ask her to bring dry clothes.
The car never slowed down to see if she was OK.

story: I was driving home from work on a cold winter night. About 20 miles from home I hit a patch of snow on the highway. My car slid out of control. My car finally stopped two inches from the edge of a cliff.
original_ending: I drove home the rest of the way while shaking badly.

endings.ending: Then an angry cow butted into the back of my car, and it pushed me over the edge, and it is a miracle that I survived.
Then a giant claw came out of the sky, which is when I realized that I was actually in a claw machine on an alien planet.
Then the edge of the cliff gave way and my car tumbled off as I jumped out.
I panicked and got out of the car and ran home.
I called a tow truck on the side of the road to come tow my car home.
I got out of my car and walk home in shocked of what just happened.

story: I went to the park to fly my kite. It was very windy at the park so i took out my kite. I ran with the kite behind me and it began to fly. The kite flew higher and higher until it was above the treetops.
original_ending: I was able to land the kite safely after flying it for an hour.

endings.ending: Suddenly the string got tangled on a branch and the kite fell into the tree.
Soon a large gathering of people surrounded me and began to cheer!
I lost control of the kite because of the strong wind.
A little girl nearby asked me to teach her how to fly a kite.
Suddenly it lifted me off the ground and flew all the way to a land of fairies and unicorns.
There was a helicopter that was in trouble because of heavy cloud cover, but when the pilot saw the kite they were able to follow it to land safely on the ground.

story: Dave went to Shoots and Ladders park on a field trip. He was excited to play on the slides. He climbed the ladder all the way to the top. When he reached the slide he froze and wouldn't go down the slide.
original_ending: A teacher had to take a crying Dave back down the ladder.

endings.ending: A spider on the wall said “Dave don’t be scared” and Dave screamed all the way down as he was falling.
A friendly cricket told him there was nothing to be scared of and Dave worked up his courage and slid down the slide.
When he was finally removed he was scared.
They needed to go up and take him back to his parents.
One of the kids behind him that was waiting in line pushed him down the slide.
One of the kids behind him encouraged him to be brave and Dave went down the slide.

story: Dan set his alarm clock for seven in the morning. For some reason, the alarm clock didn't go off. Dan was angry because it made him miss work. He got so angry he broke the clock with a hammer.
original_ending: Then, he got more angry because he realized he had to go buy a clock.

endings.ending: Dan called his boss to apologize for the work he missed, but his boss didn't believed him and Dan was fired from his job.
Even though Dan was angry and late for work, he went to work anyways because he is the CEO of his own company.
His neighbors thought he was hurting someone and called the police.
He decided that from now on he would just use his phone alarm like everyone else.
He realized he needed to have a backup plan in case this happens again.
Dan grew more frustrated, and began to scream.

story: Mary was driving home one night after work. The truck in front of her was carrying gravel. All of the sudden, she heard a loud crack. A rock had flown out of the truck and hit her windshield.
original_ending: Mary was very sad that she would have to pay for a repair.

endings.ending: Mary did not care one bit because she knew her insurance would pay for the replacement.
Mary yelled out in disgust and honked her horn repeatedly at the truck in front.
She knew she'd have to file and insurance claim and hoped it would be paid.
This really was turning out to be a bad day, for sure.
As Mary didn't have the money for the repair, she had to sell some of her jewelry inherited from her grandmother.
Mary was already stressed out by problems at work, so all she can do right away is drink to try to forget about all this mess.

story: Ken had too many drinks. My friends and I had to pull him out of the bar. However, he fought back and tried to go back inside. He threw his fists in the but eventually fell.
original_ending: We picked him up and threw him inside the backseat of my car.

endings.ending: Ken then became unconscious, and we had to call an ambulance to get him to the hospital for some medical aid.
Me and my friends tried grabbing him, but he threw up on my clothes, and I went back home to get some clean clothes.
He was too heavy for us to pick up, so we called the police on him, and they took him away.
Before we could do anything, he got back up and stumbled into the bar where we left him.
We got him in the car but he stripped off his clothes and called us names so we drove him dennys parking lot and left him there naked while we went and had a grand slam.
The cops were called and Ken spent the night in jail but he started dating the lady cop that arrested him.

story: Tom and his wife Diane had just had their first child. Every night they were rotating who would feed her at 3AM. One night Tom was very ill and his wife took care of the baby. Tom woke up the next morning, realizing he never fed the baby.
original_ending: He woke his wife to tell her, she then broke the news to him.

endings.ending: He was mortified, but his wife assured him the baby was well taken care of.
He quickly rose to feed the baby, only to realize his wife had feed her and she was sleeping soundly.
Tom was excited that the baby was now sleeping through the night.
Tom never told his wife worried she would be upset.
He felt so bad about it he had tears in his eyes .
Lucky he saw his wife on the baby monitor feeding the baby at 4 a.m

story: Rowan went into his backyard to play with his dog Harper. They usually play well together, but today was different. Every time Rowan threw the ball to Harper, Harper would not catch. Then Rowan realized Harper was very sleepy.
original_ending: They both decided to go back inside and have a nap instead.

endings.ending: Rowan took his dog to hospital for checkup.
Rowan left the dog feeling it was getting lazy and old.
Rowan put Harper to bed, and went to play with his friends.
Despite being tired, they continued to play until dinner was ready.
Rowan took Harper to the vet to see if something was wrong.
Then Rowan started throwing the ball and running after it to encourage his dog to play.

story: In seventh grade I got in trouble in school for the first time. A girl asked me to write bad words on her arm and I did. Known as a good kid, the principal was surprised as well as friends. I had a lot of shame for many weeks.
original_ending: By the time high school started I was finally over it.

endings.ending: I still think about it sometimes and have a small giggle with myself.
I apologised to my friends and told them that the girl had asked me to do it.
What made it worse was that my parents were disappointed in me.
Plus the girl laughed at me and told me I was a sucker.
My friends never let me forget what I did to this day.
At a recent class reunion, nobody seemed to even remember the incident.

story: Mike bounced on his toes while he warmed up in the back. He was ready for this fight and he knew it. Hearing his name Mike ran out to the ring arms up ready to win. Mike didn't hear anything but the bell and his hours flew hard.
original_ending: In less that thirty seconds the man was dropped, Mike had won.

endings.ending: Mike had to have a very long slug fest but he eventually came out of top
Unfortunately his opponent was someone who was just more talented than him and he was put down.
Unfortunately, Mike lost at the very last minute.
It was a long fight and Mike eventually tied, which upset him.
Mike was so emotional that he had a panic attack mid-fight, causing him to lose the battle.
Mike knocked out his opponent and won the fight.

story: Felicia ate so much food she got very fat. She couldn't get off the couch without some help. She tried but fell on the floor. No one was home, and she couldn't get up.
original_ending: Felicia was on the floor for hours until her husband came home.

endings.ending: Luckily she had a medical device around her neck that alerted the fire department, and they came to help.
When her friends finally found her three days later she had lost fifteen pounds!
Felicia ended up taking a nap on the floor until her sister woke her up
Felicia called her sister's phone to come downstairs to help her get back on the sofa.
The feeling of being vulnerable made her question her life choices.
By the time someone came to help her, the entire day had passed.

story: Gray was a little boy who hated to take naps. When his mom tried to put him down for a nap, he fought and fought. One day, Gray's mom told him to just lay down and go to sleep. Gray got a cup of milk, drank it, and went to sleep.
original_ending: From then on, Gray's mom let him fall asleep on his own.

endings.ending: Gray started drinking milk every day before going to sleep.
Unfortunately, he woke up right away when he heard a dog barking outside.
Then his mother complimented him on acting like a big boy so that he would continue to act well.
But the truth was, this was Gray's plan to have his mother think he was sleeping, when in fact, he stayed awake.
Now, Gray can never go to sleep with drinking a cup a milk.
He later woke up with a stomach ache because he's lactose intolerant.

story: I told Frankie to go to the store and get groceries. He put on his jacket and went on his way. After fifteen minutes I heard a knock on the door. I wasn't expecting Frankie for another hour but there he was.
original_ending: When I asked him how he came and went so fast he said he ran!

endings.ending: He came back because he forgot his phone.
He really wanted to use the bathroom  really bad.
I panicked, worried what Frankie would do if he saw me with another man.
Frankie had forgotten his wallet.
The grocer had started a new home delivery service and Frankie had called their number.
He had forgotten all about the groceries and had come back home empty handed.

story: Greg was not a very athletic boy. He studied very hard in school, but didn't seem to do well in sports. One of his friends suggested he try out for the jump rope team. He tried out and made the team.
original_ending: Greg turned out to love jump rope and was one of the best on the team.

endings.ending: He wound up falling and injuring himself and decided to stick with books and not be athletic.
He was later kicked off the team for not performing as well as hoped.
Greg began to meet many new friends and became one of the top competitors on the team.
After working out with the team for a month Greg was in better shape than ever and was excited to try out for other school teams.
Greg soon grew miserable with jump rope and quit.
His studies forced him to not join the team.

story: I was walking through the forest on a dark and stormy night. The wind was whipping through the trees. It looked like the branches were reaching down to grab me. I ran as fast as I could to get out into the clear.
original_ending: Then I woke up in a cold sweat from the nightmare I was having.

endings.ending: When I reached the clear area I found a campground with people.
After reaching the clear I started to calm down and was able to enjoy the forest and nature.
As I was running, I swore I saw a ghost block my path and I froze in fear!
A lightning bolt hit a nearby tree and it nearly hit me as it fell!
I finally found a road and waved my hands at passing cars for help.
I finally found a path and saw some homes so I knocked on doors.

story: I waited for the afternoon school bus to take me home. When the bus arrived at my stop, outside was raining. Knowing this, the bus driver still wanted me to get out. After walking out, I became soaked from the rain.
original_ending: I decided to wait in a store for the rain to clear up.

endings.ending: I ran inside the store and slipped as soon as I reached the slick tile breaking my arm.
When I stepped off the bus, a stranger offered their umbrella and I gladly accepted.
When I got home, I was drenched and couldn't wait to put on dry clothing.
The bus driver laughed as he drove off from me standing in the ran.
I quickly ran home in the rain.
Trudging home, I tripped in a puddle and got covered in mud.

story: Cate always wanted to learn how to ride a horse. Cate decided to ask for a horse for her birthday. Instead of a horse, her mother got her riding lessons as a gift. At first, Cate was disappointed about not getting a horse.
original_ending: But after some lessons she knew there was a lot to learn about horses.

endings.ending: Cate then knew her mom could not afford to buy her a horse, so she was okay with just taking lessons.
After being denied of a horse as gift, Cate quit riding horses immediately.
Cate decided she was angry with her mother and refused to go to the lessons.
Cate enjoyed the lessons and was able to get a horse after she convinced her mother she knew how to ride.
But after she attended her first lesson, she realized that she didn't yet know enough to choose a horse that would be a good fit for her abilities.
However, as she completed riding lessons, she discovered they allowed her to spend time with horses, without having to be responsible for all of their needs.

story: Lucy's grandpa had given her an Easy Bake Oven. Lucy opened the box and saw all the little treat packets. She mixed a cake and slid it in the oven. Lucy had no idea a light bulb would take so long to cook a cake.
original_ending: Finally, after 90 minutes her and grandpa shared the cake she cooked.

endings.ending: Lucy tried to cook the cake for less time and realized she had ruined it.
Lucy got tired of waiting and quit baking.
Lucy and grandpa went to the local bakery in the meantime to buy a cake to compare.
Grandpa was just amazed that it could cook a cake at all.
Lucy completely forgot about the cake by the time it was done, and the oven still has a cake in it to this day.
Lucy had so much fun with the oven that she eventually became a professional cook as an adult.

story: Erin was walking home from school one day. He found a little stray dog who looked hungry. Erin took the dog home and began to feed it and wash it. The dog was really happy and Erin decided to keep it.
original_ending: Erin now goes to the park on weekends with his dog.

endings.ending: One day the dog saw his original owner walking on street and went on to bite him.
The dog didn't like Erin's house and left it.
Unfortunately, the owner of the dog called and wanted their dog back.
After a couple months, the dog was having lots of issues so Erin gave it to her friend.
But his mom was against the idea and he had to leave the dog back where he found it.
The dog's mother managed to follow them and Erin had to let the other dog inside as well.

story: I once had a pair of socks that were the most comfy in the world. I wore them every day because they were so comfy. Before long they began to smell. Eventually they got holes in them because I wore them so much.
original_ending: I ended up having to throw out my favorite socks because of the holes.

endings.ending: I decided to sew the holes shut and to continue using them.
Instead of throwing them away, I kept them, as I grew way too attached to them.
I wore the socks anyway since I loved them so much and everyone laughed at me.
I ended up using the socks as rags since I didn't want to dispose of them.
I decided to clean and repair them by sewing up all the holes, which allowed me to continue to wear them.
I then washed the socks and gave it to my dog to chew on, as they liked to play with my other socks.

story: Jenn wanted to throw a surprise party for Kate. She secretly sent out invitations to Kate's friends. She ordered balloons and food to be delivered on the special day. All of Kate's friends showed up early and hid until Kate arrived.
original_ending: When Kate walked through the door, everyone shouted and cheered.

endings.ending: When Kate walked in she could see some people crouched behind the couch so she got suspicious and stayed in the doorway.
Kate saw a food delivery person knock on her door as she made her way to the apartment so she knew a surprise was about to go down.
Kate forgot it was her birthday and had no idea what was going on when everyone surprised her.
Kate anticipated this and was wearing a shirt that said "thank you for the surprise", everyone had a good laugh about it.

The only problem was that Kate ended up meeting a friend she had not seen in a long time on the day of the party and decided to spend the evening with her instead of going to Jenn's, thus missing her own surprise party.
When Kate heard all that screaming and cheering she had the strangest feeling and fainted.

story: Wes was watching his kids while his wife was out running errands. He wanted to play a fun trick on her. He wrapped his kids up in wrapping paper with bows on their heads. When his wife got home he said he had gotten her some presents.
original_ending: She unwrapped the kids and they gave her a big hug.

endings.ending: She said she was too tired to unwrap them now and would look at them later.
She asked why he got her that many gifts on such an ordinary day.
When she unwrapped them they had all suffocated!
She said the next time he wanted to give her a present to get her jewelry instead.
She didn't think the trick was funny.
When she saw the kids, she began yelling and screaming and immediately stormed out of the house.

story: Briana was watching TV. Suddenly, she heard her dog making a weird noise. She went to check on him and saw that the dog was sick. It had thrown up on the carpet.
original_ending: Briana cleaned up the mess and then made an appointment at the vet.

endings.ending: The dog seemed fine the rest of the day so Briana forgot all about it.
It was something that her dog does often so Briana cleaned it up and gave it some water.
Brianna was really worried about her dog so she called her mom for help.
Brianna knew that her dog was getting sicker and sicker everyday so she decided to put him down.
Briana realized she had accidentally fed her dog chocolate.
Briana's dog was quite old and unfortunately, nearing the end of its life.

story: Ben's mom was on her way out of the house. She left him with a list of chores to complete that day. Ben put off the list all day until time was almost out. Quickly he rushed to finish the list of chores.
original_ending: Luckily he got everything done just in time for her return.

endings.ending: Ben was unable to get all his chores finished on time, and his mom grounded him for a week.
He accidentally broke his mom's favorite vase while trying to dust the furniture, and had to pay it off using his weekly allowance.
He broke a flower vase while cleaning the house.
He found a gold coin under the bed.
His mom noticed the sloppy nature in which the chores were completed.
He told his mom he had been working all day and was dead tired.

story: Rick rode his bike to the store. He left his bike outside and went into the store. But when he came out, his bike was gone. He told a police officer that someone stole his bike.
original_ending: After a few days, his bike was returned and he was so relieved.

endings.ending: The police called Rick and told them his bike was used in a violent crime and could not return it as it was part of evidence.
The police arrested Rick the next after for filing a false report about his stolen bike.
The bike was never returned, it was actually the police officer who had stolen the bike in the first place.
The police officer just laughed and told Rick that he should have been more careful.
He later found out that his neighbor (who was always jealous of him) stole the bike.
They never did find the bike but Rick always suspected that the clerk from the business next door took it.

story: Rick bought a house in the middle of the woods. He spent the next two months clearing away the trees. He made a pile of all the logs that he cut. Rick put up a sign to sell his wood.
original_ending: Rick was able to make a lot of money selling the wood.

endings.ending: He got almost no buyers as everyone in the area cut their own wood also.
He forgot that most people want dried wood for various purposes.
Someone saw Ricks sign and ended up stealing all of his wood in the night.
No one saw Ricks sign and he did not end up selling any wood.
Because he was so isolated nobody saw the sign.
It did not take more than a week to sell through all the wood.

story: Cameron is 22 Year's old. He couldn't afford college at 18 and his parents wouldn't help him. For four Years, he worked 2 jobs to save up for college. Now, at 22, he finally has enough to go back to school.
original_ending: He is majoring in Business and is happier than ever.

endings.ending: He is so proud of himself and bought a cake to celebrate.
He feels very content but know that he has to keep working in order to support himself through college.
He decides to buy a car with the money instead.
The experience made him mature.
He regrets going back and blowing all his savings.
He feels out of place at college being older then most.

story: The snow fell fast and furiously for two hours. Once it stopped, Jane ran outside with her coat and mittens on. She got down on the ground and spread her arms and legs. She made a perfect snow angel from the first snowfall of the year.
original_ending: She went back inside to warm up and admire her work.

endings.ending: She took out her smartphone and took a picture.
He brothers joined her in the angel making.
Afterwards, she went to her neighbors and they drank hot chocolate.
Soon after, they began discussing which Christmas gifts they would purchase this year.
She stayed outside far too long and ended up catching a cold.
After she was done she had a cup of hot cocoa.

story: Andy had just made some soup in the microwave. It was too hot to hold so he grabbed a towel to use like a pot holder. As he was walking, he tripped. The soup spilled everywhere because he had no grip on it.
original_ending: He had to clean it all up and had no more soup to eat.

endings.ending: Some of the soup splashed into his face and Andy suffered severe burns.
Andy felt a primal urge to get down on his hands and knees and lick the soup up off the floor as if he were an animal.
As Andy went to find a towel, his dog came and licked up all the spilled soup.
Andy decided to scoop some of the soup back in the bowl and ate the rest.
He was so annoyed he made a machine that reverses second law of thermodynamics to get his soup back in bowl.
He was sad but his pets were quite happy cleaning it up.

story: Today is Jack's 18th birthday. His grandparents usually throw him a big party each year. This year his grandparents told him they would not be able to have it. Heartbroken Jack wished for them as he blew out his candles.
original_ending: When the last candle blew out his grandparents miraculously walked in.

endings.ending: He looked over and noticed that his biggest present was from his grandparents.
The next year, on his 19th birthday, his grandparents picked the tradition back up and threw him a big party.
But nothing happened and Jack cried and he ate his cake.
Jack felt a bit sad because his friends didn't show up.
He was surprised to see a big gift sent by his grandparents among other gifts.
Suddenly he woke up and realized it was just a bad dream.

story: Dina decided to volunteer at a nursing home. She was introduced to an elderly man. He reminisced about his first wife who had died young. She was surprised how fresh the old pain was for him.
original_ending: She hoped she would find a husband who loved her as much.

endings.ending: Dina asked questions to learn more about his first wife.
The old man then talked about the pain of his second wife who died.
She then realized he was making up the whole story.
She asked him questions to allow him to relive his past.
She loved to hear the stories that the man told of his wife.
She sensed that his telling of the stories was somehow therapeutic for him.

story: Charity was playing with friends in her yard. Suddenly, the kids noticed a weird car on the road. The car was moving really slowly. The kids had a bad feeling and decided to go inside.
original_ending: The car drove by a few more times before disappearing.

endings.ending: Charity ran inside the house and brought her father out.
One of the kids wrote down the registration number and the car sped away.
The car stopped at their neighbor's house and seemed to be fine.
Charities mom reported a description to the car to the neighborhood watch just in case.
The kidnapper stepped out of the car and rang their doorbell.
Charity realised that her dad had bought a new car.

story: Mitsy decided to celebrate her birthday by throwing a party. All her closest best friends were invited and they all attended. Mitsy's mom bought her an expensive cupcake to serve as the cake. They sang happy birthday and Mitsy felt great, but she was hungry.
original_ending: Her cupcake had been stolen with no one to confess, Mitsy was crushed.

endings.ending: Misty's mom gave her 2 cupcakes instead of one to make her feel extra special.
So Misty started devouring as many cupcakes as she could while everyone sang.
She decided to cut herself the biggest piece of the cupcake since it was her birthday.
She was so happy all her friends were with her that she gave a piece to everyone else first.
They ate and she felt a lot better.
She fainted from the hunger.

story: When I was little, I thought I had big feet. My feet had actually just grown ahead of the rest of me. I got roller skates for my birthday, and they were big. The rest of my body started growing and my feet stopped.
original_ending: Now I still have those roller skates and they still fit.

endings.ending: I continued to use those roller skates for the rest of my life.
I loved those roller skates and because they still fit I use them even as an adult.
I ended up very proportional as an adult.
The doctor told me I will be a normal sized person when I grow up.
As an adult I still buy my shoes in the children's department.
People tell me my feet look too small for my body now.

story: Sarah wanted to throw a beach party for her and her friends. Sarah sat down at table and wrote down what she needed for the party. Sarah went to different stores and bought the items she needed. Sarah called and invited all the friends she wanted at her party.
original_ending: Sarah threw the beach party and had a good time with her friends.

endings.ending: Sarah eventually realises that no one likes her, so no one has been to her party.
Because Sarah has spent too much money, she asks her friends for money for party attendance.
But nobody came, and Sarah cried the entire night.
When her friends all invited friends of their own the party quickly became massive.
However, on the day of the party, she had to cancel the event as a big storm blew through the region.
Unfortunately, she forgot to bring sunscreen to the party and Sarah and her friends all ended up with painful sunburns.

story: The county inspectors visited our trailer park. One of them told me I had to put handrails on my steps. I visited John and asked him to help me build some handrails. So John came over to my place with some wood and some tools.
original_ending: Then John and I built a really stable set of handrails for my steps.

endings.ending: We did not know how to properly build the rails so we ended up asking a neighbor for help.
We ultimately did not have the right tools or parts for the job so we had to go buy the right components for the job.
Since John knew what he was doing he did all the work.
But we did not know what we were doing so called a carpenter to do it for us.
We tried to build the handrails, but made a mistake and they didn't fit the steps.
While we worked on building the handrails, the saw slipped and cut John's arm, which required stitches.

story: One day, Ben's mother told him they were getting a puppy. Excitedly, they made the drive to a friend's house. Their friend's dog had given birth to eight puppies. Ben was allowed to pick out which puppy he wanted.
original_ending: He spotted a red one he loved and in eight weeks, he took it home.

endings.ending: He chose the smallest one and was quite surprised when two months later he went to get it and saw that the puppy was now enormous.
Ben spent weeks after that building a cute dog house and buying cool toys for his new friend.
Ben picked out a puppy but was allergic to it and had to return it.
The puppy was a runt and fell quite ill, so Ben had to take it to the vet.
He did not see any puppy he wanted and decided in the end to get a cat.
He loved the white one with brown tail but the friend decided to keep it for himself.

story: Al grew vegetables in his backyard as a hobby. He had more carrots than he could possibly eat. Al set up a farm stand to sell off his extra food. Many people came by to buy his carrots.
original_ending: Al made a lot of money when all his carrots were gone.

endings.ending: He couldn’t do it all by himself and hired an assistant
He was so excited that many people got to enjoy his carrots!
Al thought that he may have stumbled on his next venture.
Once they were all sold, he realized how much people enjoyed fresh vegetables.
Al stil had some left over carrots left and he donated them to a food pantry.
Al decided to change up how many carrots he planted next year.

story: Max had always liked his next- door neighbor Julie. Finally he asked her on a date to see a movie. But then Max's dad's car broke down and he had no way to get there! Julie saved the day by suggesting that they walk to the theater.
original_ending: They had a long walk there, full of fun conversation!

endings.ending: As they walked, they saw a huge meteor in the sky, and since Max was a superhero, he was able to stop it and save the world.
On the way, they ran into a stampete of elephants, so they decided to ride them to the theater instead.
However, Max hates walking so he pressured her to drive him there.
As they walked, they decided to go shopping instead since the stores they were passing were having huge sales.
Max realized the distance was too far, so he turned down the date.
As they were walking a taxi passed and Max paid for a taxi for the rest of the trip.

story: Dan was walking in his farm when he felt some pinch on his leg. He then saw a snake nearby and thought it was a snake bite. Dan got scared and rushed to the nearest hospital. The doctor said it was just an insect bite and not a snake.
original_ending: Dan was relieved and happy to hear that from the doctor.

endings.ending: Even though the doctor said it was only a insect bite, Dan got suspicious and decided to go to another doctor to check.
The doctor looked a bit closed and realized it was really a snake bite!
But it was actually a snake bite and Dan had to be admitted to the ICU.
Dan wasn't sure, so he decided to get a second opinion.
Dan was so relieved of the good news he fainted in front of the doctor.
Dan was glad it was a snake bike but the doctor told him he needed to run more test to ensure he was not bitting by a bat.

story: Jamie was riding her horse in the woods one day. A snack came out of the brush and scared the horse. The horse threw Jamie from the saddle and she broke her arm. Jamie had to wait for her arm to heal and was unable to ride.
original_ending: After several weeks Jamie was back to riding her horse.

endings.ending: Horse felt bad for Jamie and began coming to see her at her house.
Jamie left horse-riding.
While she was healing in the hospital, Jamie took up reading and by the time she was discharged she had finished an entire book on horse riding.
Even though she was sent home, Jamie found herself missing the ability to sit and do nothing but rest but at the same time she was glad to be able to ride again.
Her doctor said she could ride again in 3 weeks but it took her longer to heal and Jamie was so dejected during their rehabilitation period.
Jamie drew and wrote a lot of poetry during her healing process.

story: I was driving to my friends house one day. While driving on the road, I saw flashing lights. I pulled over and cops walked to my window to my surprise. They told me I was speeding and I apologized.
original_ending: They gave me a warning and then let me go.

endings.ending: They fined me fifty dollars.
They told me I need to go to the police station.
They ended up arresting me, and at the police station, I was given my court date.
They gave me a ticketed fee, and they told me not to do it again.
They fined me and seized my car.
They demanded bribe from me.

story: George made sure his kids were in bed before he went downstairs. As he got to the downstairs' table, he saw delicious sugar cookies. George looked around, and took a bite of the tasty dessert. The cookies were delicious and he ate every single one of them.
original_ending: He later drank the milk that was there as well.

endings.ending: It turns out the cookies were for someone else and his wife, who made the cookies, got angry at him.
As it was Christmas eve and he was the family Santa, George knew he had every right to enjoy them.
When his wife asked him about the cookies he said he had given them to the kids.
But his stomach got upset from the sugary cookies and he couldn't sleep all night.
He didn't know the cookies had laxatives in them, and he spent the rest of the night in the bathroom.
Then he put on his red coat, got on his sleigh, and told the reindoor to get going.

story: Jim and Gil found a wallet lying on the ground. There was over a hundred dollars in it but no id of any kind. There wasn't anyone around so they weren't sure what to do. They put up signs in the area asking if anyone had lost a wallet.
original_ending: After a month no one had claimed it so they split the money.

endings.ending: Right away several people claimed they had lost a wallet but could not identify it correctly.
A young man who seemed very upset came and claimed the wallet with great relief.
A man name Bob contacted them and they returned the wallet to its rightful owner.
They gave the wallet to the local police station because no one claimed it.
When no one claimed it, the bought a homeless  guy new clothes, dinner and gave him the leftover cash and slept like babies that night.
They wallet was possessed and everything they spent the money on brought them grief and they couldn’t lift the curse til they replaced the money.

story: Sam's family decided they wanted to go on a family vacation. Sam had never been on a plane before so he was very nervous. He asked me for some tips on staying calm and so I told him some. He was very grateful but still extremely nervous.
original_ending: On his flight he was fine and thanked me so much when he got home!

endings.ending: Come time to board the flight he was too nervous and ended up staying home.
The trip was canceled due to poor weather so he ended up not needing my tips.
It turns out it was all for naught, as their flight had been canceled when they got to the airport.
Sam was so nervous, he forgot all of the tips I gave and spent the flight time in fear.
The plane was delayed until the next day.
His mom gave him some medicine to help his anxiety.

story: The weather turned cold and foul by Jim's house. There was icy rain and the wind blew hard. Jim saw that his front steps were covered in ice. He took some salt from his garage and spread it on the steps.
original_ending: The ice melted a little so Jim added even more salt.

endings.ending: However, the wind was too strong and blew the salt away before it could melt the ice, so Jim decided to stay in his house.
While he was spreading it, he slipped on the untreated portion and broke his leg.
The wind blew away all of the salt Jim put down
The salt was not doing the trick, so Jim poured hot water over the steps instead.
Jim stood there watching the ice melt and decided to put some salt on the back steps too.
Jim put the salt back in the garage and waited for the ice to melt.

story: Timmy got a check in the mail for his birthday. He took it to the grocery store but they couldn't cash it. Timmy tried to find a location to cash his check in town. He eventually found a branch for his bank and walked in.
original_ending: They cashed his check and Timmy took his money home.

endings.ending: After he cashed the check at the bank he wrote a thank you letter to the person who gave it to him.
He told the cashier he wanted to cash the check to buy a new video game.
The teller noticed it was his birthday and the bank staff all sang a birthday song to him.
After he cashed his check, he went to the electronics store and bought his favorite game.
They said the check is useless because owner doesn't have any money in his account.
Just then some robbers barged into bank and took away bank's cash along with money of Timmy.

story: Carl tried out for the men's volleyball team. He wasn't very tall but wanted to spike the ball. He would try and try all day but kept getting blocked. His coach taught him how to be a back row hitter because of his size.
original_ending: He is now one of the best back row hitters on the team.

endings.ending: He excelled at this position and went on to be a professional player
He wasn't very good in this position either but he didn't give up.
However, he was not picked to be on the team as he was unable to play effectively with the rest of the team.
Carl ended up spraining his ankle while trying to hit a ball, and ended up being unable to play for the team for that season.
He put it in the work and now he is the best spiker in the team.
He then quit the team.

story: My father was saying that he hasn't seen a baseball game in years. My sister and I surprised him with some tickets to a ball game. The whole family went and watched the game. Everyone had a great time especially dad.
original_ending: We go to the ball game once a month now.

endings.ending: We took pictures and enjoyed the family time together.
Later he told us how thoughtful the gift was, and that he really had a great time.
He even got an autograph from the best player after the game.
Many of the fans left early so we were able to move closer.
My dad ended up catching a foul ball during the game.
My favorite part was eating nachos.

story: A hurricane came through Caleb's town one weekend. It knocked out all of the power in his neighborhood. The next morning,Caleb was worried about what to eat for breakfast. Caleb and his girlfriend walked down the street looking for anything.
original_ending: There wound up being a place open for them to eat!

endings.ending: Total destruction meant there was no place operating.
Seeing them hungry, a neighbor offered to share their morning meal.
But everything was closed, so they went back to the house and ate some buttered bread.
Before they got far, Caleb's neighbor who owns a generator saw them, and invited them in to share his breakfast.
Nothing was open in town so they called a cab to take them to the next town over.
They wound up getting into a fight over the dire circumstances and Caleb's girlfriend left him just standing in the street.

story: Tay was having a yard sale. She needed the money to get her car fixed. She feared that she could not raise as much money as she needed. But many people came to her sale and bought items.
original_ending: After the sale she had made more than enough cash!

endings.ending: However, her husband surprised her with a new car.
She changed her mind about fixing the car and bought herself a new laptop instead.
With nothing left to sell, Tay began wondering how she would afford to buy gifts for her parents birthdays.
When there was a loud boom down the block, Tay discovered one of her customers had crashed into a tree after leaving.
Tay was worried that people would view her possessions as nothing but junk.
She made enough money and was able to get her car fixed the following week.

story: Yesterday I got a new rooster for my farm. He was the biggest rooster I had ever seen. This morning when the sun came up the rooster was very loud. The rooster woke me up.
original_ending: I decided not to get any big roosters in the future.

endings.ending: I had to adjust to my new rooster.
I use the rooster as my alarm clock now.
I walked outside to greet the day, only to see the rooster pecking the eyes out of a dead squirrel, an evil look in his eye.
I was so upset because I had only gotten four hours' sleep the night before.
I started going to bed earlier after so it wouldn't be a problem in the future.
I sold the rooster the next day (at a profit) as I really needed the money for other animals.

story: Arlene still felt weak from a previous illness. The volleyball match was only a few days away. She still could not breathe too well or practice. Her coach came up with a home remedy to help her get better.
original_ending: Arlene ended up competing in the match and had a good game.

endings.ending: The remedy just made her sicker, as the coach didn't know what he was doing.
She felt better, but had her foot run over on the way there, forcing her to forfeit.
She had always thought her coach was a bit strange and her suspicions were confirmed when she saw that the home remedy was made with frog eggs and salamander drool.
The home remedy worked like a charm and Arlene ended up teaming up with her coach to market it as a health supplement.
The home remedy tasted horrible but Arlene drank it down and felt better.
Arlene drank the home remedy and made her feel even worse thus she had to miss the volleyball match.

story: Lou had a coupon to a sandwich place. He liked it but didn't go often because it was a bit expensive. He ordered his favorite sandwich. When he handed the coupon to the clerk she said it was expired.
original_ending: He was too embarrassed not to go ahead and pay full price.

endings.ending: She made an exemption to the coupon.
Lou left without paying and left without his sandwich.
He asked the clerk to extend the validity of the coupon.
He was unhappy and returned without eating the sandwich.
The coupon had expired only a day ago, so the clerk was nice enough to give Lou the discount anyway.
Lou changed his order to a cheaper, different sandwich.

story: Alex went to the kitchen to have breakfast. He looked for his Spiderman bowl but couldn't' find it. He turned to see his sister eating out of it. Alex ran up and hit his sister.
original_ending: His mother put him on time out for an hour.

endings.ending: His sister punched him back and Alex ran crying to his mother.
His sister turned the bowl upside down over Alex's head and poured the cereal and milk all over him!
He took the Spiderman bowl from his sister.
She cried and he realized what he had done was wrong.
She hit him back and then threw the bowl in his face.
She started crying and he laughed at her.

story: Jim decided he was going to try to forgive and forget. His neighbor had really slighted him throughout the years. Jim felt he could be a bigger man about it. He set the neighbor's house on fire and urinated in his gas tank.
original_ending: Jim forgave himself for it and forgot all about the neighbor.

endings.ending: Jim brought up his terrible deeds at a counselor event and he was turned into the police for mischief.
After realizing that he could have killed his neighbor, he thought to himself he was lucky not to be charged with attempted murder.
However, his neighbor didn't like it and call the police on Jim.
But Jim couldn't forgive and forget and the regret was eating him alive.
The neighbor called the police and Jim was arrested.
The neighbor was frantic but Jim stayed quiet and was proud of what he did.

story: It was a Friday, and I began to walk to work. As I neared the entrance, I saw a twenty dollar bill on the ground. I stopped to pick it up, but wondered if there might be more around. I checked in the street nearby, and found another twenty!
original_ending: Satisfied, I went into work, $40 richer than I was before I left.

endings.ending: I decided to keep following the money trail and I got 3 more!
Then I looked above me and realized it was actually raining twenty dollar bills from above!
I kept looking, and I found another $20,000!
Then I saw that there was a zebra nearby, and it was pooping money everywhere.
I seen And another twenty a few feet away and continued on the path running into a armed bank robber.
I spent the 40 on lottery tickets, won the jackpot, quit my job, retired to the carriabean  with my long haired hunky boyfriend and lived happily ever after.

story: Anna was in a hurry to get to her job in a big city. Already late, she hurried down the sidewalk. Unexpectedly she bumped into someone. That person was a famous actor, and they both apologized.
original_ending: Anna was late to work but at least she got his autograph.

endings.ending: The actor asked her out on a date, and Anna was extremely flattered and excited.
Anna asked for his autograph, but he rudely ignored her request and continued down the sidewalk.
Anna was late but she took the time to flirt and get his phone number
The actor apologized to Anna and asked if she would like for him to give her a ride to to work in his brand new sports car.
It was love at first sight and both got married a year later.
Anna didn't know who the actor was and he got offended.

story: Randall has never liked being outside in nature. However, his mother encourages him to get out of the house. Randall decides to visit a nearby forest. Randall is stung by a bee at the forest.
original_ending: He decides that he was right to dislike being outside.

endings.ending: He remembers a technique he learned online to treat the sting and he was fine after.
Fortunately, there was a hiker nearby and helped Randall with his bee sting.
Luckily, it was a magical bee and it gave him honey powers and turned him into "beeman," the world's first hero.
Since it hardly hurt, Randall realized his mom had been right, so he built a tree house and moved into the forest.
However, Randall continues to walk throughout the forest despite the bee sting, and comes across a beautiful river, which fills him with awe and joy.
Randall gets a terrible allergic reaction from the bee sting, and runs back home to his house to get some help.
