I immediately bought a new remote online and it arrived next day.
I've then proceeded to download an app that has a virtual remote and our problem was solved.
I got them moving when I made a competition out of it and told them the first one to find it would get five dollars.
It turned out their mom had confiscated it earlier because they'd not done their homework.

story: Jason went to a beach where there is typically no one. He went there to think about his love life, he needed a wife. He went inside an abandoned lighthouse and walked up the stairs. At the top level he saw a brunette in black shorts and red shirt.
original_ending: She was beautiful and Jason couldn't help but introduce himself.

endings.ending: He said hi to her but to his dismay it turned out to be a man in female clothing.
Jason wanted to introduce himself to her but saw that she was with family so he abandoned his thought.
Jason fell down the stairs when he saw that she was a witch.
Jason was disappointed when he saw another man hug her.
The brunette invited Jason over for a chat.
When Jason got close, he realized the brunette was a man wearing a wig.

story: Megan was eating pancakes in bed. When she was done she set her plate on the ground. Later when she got up, her blanket fell to the ground. When she found it it was covered in sticky syrup from the plate.
original_ending: She had to wash everything to get the syrup out.

endings.ending: No matter what she did she could not get the stain out of the blanket.
Megan shrugged and tossed the blanket on her bed.
Her dog ran over and started licking the syrup which made Megan laugh!
She wound up stepping on the plate and cracking it making the situation even worse!
Megan is not very hygienic person so she just decided to ignore it for a few days.
Megan didn't know how to remove the syrup from the blanket, so she had to call her mother for help.

story: Bill woke up in the middle of the night. He thought he had heard a noise downstairs. He tried to ignore it, but the noise sounded again. He was too afraid to get up and look.
original_ending: When he awoke, he saw that his cat had knocked over a vase.

endings.ending: Bill wondered if the monster had got into the house again.
The fire continued to rage downstairs as Bill slept.
He then realized it was just his dad getting a drink of water.
He couldn't sleep for the rest of the night.
He stayed paralyzed in the bed until he heard the door creak.
He soon heard hushered voices and remembered his parents had gone out for the evening.

story: Once I had a babysitter who was kind of mean. She blew up a balloon and gave it to our cat. The cat played with the balloon until it popped. The babysitter laughed hysterically when the cat screamed and ran.
original_ending: I asked my parents to not use that babysitter any more.

endings.ending: She didn't know I was recording it on my phone to show my parents and they ended up showing her parents, too.
She sure wasn't laughing when the cat got brave, turned around, and swiped her with his claw.
I didn't want to laugh, but the cat jumping so high was hilarious!
The babysitter would tease our dog too, and even our parrot hated her.
The babysitter fell to the floor trying to catch the cat.
The cat took off and ran to the backyard and never came back.

story: Javi loved classic cars. He would attend car shows and wish that he could participate. Javi decided to buy an old car and fix it up. When he finished he entered his first car show.
original_ending: Javi won first place and was super proud of his car.

endings.ending: The car was stolen at the show and Javi had to take an Uber back home.
Javi was such a cool guy that he was able to get 10 phone numbers from potential lovers at the show.
Everybody mocked his car and he decided to never participate in a car show again.
He met an attractive woman there, who appreciated his car, and got her phone number.
However, one of the tires fell off and rolled away.
One of the judges laughed at the way Javi had used parts from other vehicles, and called it a "Frankenstein" car.

story: Missy and her daughter were at the grocery store. Missy's daughter,Cindy, was holding onto a teddy bear. Cindy got distracted and sat her teddy bear down in one of the aisles. As they were going home, she realized that she had forgotten the bear.
original_ending: Missy drove back to the store for the teddy bear.

endings.ending: She whistled as loud as she could and not even two minutes later Tibby, her little teddy bear, had already run back to her.
She took a deep breath, focused and decided that it was now time to be a big girl that doesn't need a teddy bear.
Missy drove back to the store but someone had already stolen the bear.
Missy was too tired and deiced to go back to the store the next day to retrieve the bear.
Her mom pulled over and found the teddy bear in the trunk and Cindy was happy.
She couldn't believe it when she looked out the window and saw her teddy bear running along side the car trying to catch up with them!

story: Timothy was at the zoo with his daughter Lydia. He was taking a picture of her standing in front of the lion cage. Suddenly, the lion charged at the glass. Timothy jumped as the lion opened its mouth wide.
original_ending: Everyone laughed as the lion hit the glass and ran in pain.

endings.ending: Timothy got upset and started cursing the Lion.
the Lion fainted when he hit the glass.
Some girls were heard screaming because they were so scared.
Timothy thought it was funny but nobody else laughed.
The lion crushed the glass wall and ate poor Lydia in a single bite.
Lydia cried so loudly that the zoo asked Timothy to take her out of the zoo until she calmed down.

story: Jason had a crush on Jennifer. Everyone seemed to know about it but her. One day he came up with a plan. He went out into the meadow and picked a bunch of wildflowers.
original_ending: He walked up to Jennifer, asked her out, and she said yes.

endings.ending: As he pick the flowers he start to itch on every inch of his body.
As he picked the flower a bear came out of nowhere.
When he presented them to Jennifer, she started to loudly sniff and cough.
While walking towards Jennifer, he tripped and fell and all the wildflowers scattered on the floor.
She said thank you but she told Jason that she has a boyfriend already.
After picking the flowers, Jason got cold feet and never gave them to Jennifer.

story: I remember the day when gas prices dropped very low. People went out in the streets and had parties. At the party I was at, a lady asked me how I felt. I told her it was the best day of my life.
original_ending: Now that a gallon was 23 cents, I felt like nothing could stop me.

endings.ending: I explained how I had shorted oil commodities.
She frowned and reminded me that she owned a gas station that was about to go out of business.
I asked her if i could buy her gas as well.
I filled up my car and decided to go on a cruise.
I didn't realize prices would quickly skyrocket from there.
The next day I drove all day.

story: Chris noticed a bird's nest on the ground in front of a holly tree. He looked in it and saw three eggs. There was a worried mother bird flying around. Chris put the nest into the tree quickly and walked away.
original_ending: He saw the mother sitting in the nest a few minutes later.

endings.ending: The mother was upset Chris touched the nest and abandoned it.
A week later Chris noticed newly hatched baby birds.
But to his disappointment the nest fell again, breaking all three eggs.
But before the mother bird could get to the nest, a hidden snake attacked them.
When he looked back, he saw that the nest had fallen and all the eggs were broken.
He met his friends at the playground and forgot all about the nest.

story: Karen fell in love with a boy named Josh. Josh didn't love her like she loved him and he broke up with her. She had to let him go because he didn't want to be with her. Letting go broke her heart and made her very sad.
original_ending: She had to say goodbye to love and hopes to be happy again one day.

endings.ending: Karen never got over the heartbreak and it made her depressed.
Karen eventually fell in love with another boy who loved her very much as well!
Then Karen met a gorgeous woman and fell for her, so she learned something new about herself, as she embarked on her exciting new relationship!
Karen decided to revisit the calling she had been afraid to pursue before, and she visited her local convent, asking to join the sisterhood.
She was admitted to a mental hospital for being suicidal after the breakup.
She found out Josh was gay and in love with another boy.

story: Cliff was walking down the street and he saw a woman crying. He asked her why she was crying. She told him she lost her cat. Cliff decided to help her find her cat and eventually they found it.
original_ending: The woman was grateful and kissed Cliff on the cheek.

endings.ending: They became friends after that and sent each other photos of their cats all the time.
She kept on crying, but this time they were tears of joy.
However, it was stuck down a drainpipe and they had to call the fire department.
But then after inspection, they realized they had the wrong cat.
The woman left with the cat and didn't even remember to thank Cliff.
The woman invited Cliff to have coffee with her and the cat.

story: Anne liked to bake. She bought a new pie pan for baking pies. She planned on using it a lot this fall. When it was time to test it out, she couldn't find it.
original_ending: Her son had taken it and used it in the sandbox!

endings.ending: So, she had to buy a new pie pan again.
So she dropped the plan of making pies and went to eat in bakery.
She checked all the cabinets until she remembered it was still in the box.
She asked her mom for one and luckily she had it
She remembered that her sister asked to borrow a pan from her and that she must have taken it.
She looked around for the pan and ended up finding it in a bag that was in the closet.

story: I ate pizza at the new place with my family. Later that night, I was watching tv when I began to feel ill. I became very sick, vomiting and staying in bed for days. It took over a week to feel better.
original_ending: By the time it was over, I could no longer stand the sight of pizza.

endings.ending: The next week I ate pizza at a different place.
Then I went to the doctor and discovered I'm gluten intolerant.
I found out later that everyone who ate there felt sick.
I promised never to eat like that again.
We never went back to that restaurant again.
We went back to the restaurant and asked for our money back.

story: My dad and I like to hunt for worms. We use the worms for fishing. Tonight was the perfect night for hunting for worms. Tonight I got the most worms ever.
original_ending: My dad and I decided to sell some worms and use the rest for fishing.

endings.ending: We used an old coffee can to put the worms into.
Some worms were little and skinny and others were long and fat.
unfortunately all my worms fell into the water as soon as I arrived at the fishing place
I took all my worms and did the biggest fishing trip of my life.
I decided to keep a few of them as pets.
Since we had so many, we decided to let a couple of them go.

story: When I was little I used to chew my fingernails as a habit. My mom told me if I continued doing this it would make me really fat. Her plan worked, as my fear of getting huge stopped my nasty habit. Well, one day we saw our neighbor in the store, being quite pregnant.
original_ending: I pointed at her belly, saying I knew what she had been doing!

endings.ending: I asked her if she ate nails.
she had contractions and we had to take her to the hospital.
I loudly exclaimed to my Mom, "That lady has a really bad habit!"
I surreptitiously checked her cart to see if she was fat from food or from chewing her nails.
I asked her if she was married and she said no.
I called her fat and I don't regret it.

story: I just made myself some popcorn as a snack. The doorbell rang as soon as I sat down to eat. It was my mailman delivering a package. When I came back my popcorn bowl was empty and my son was laughing.
original_ending: I guess I have to make more popcorn if I want my snack.

endings.ending: He had given the popcorn to our dog.
He spilled the popcorn on the floor.
I told him to go make me another bowl of popcorn.
I grounded him for the rest of the day.
I've grounded my son as he wasn't allowed to eat popcorns that late.
I've made my son make me popcorns which he did.

story: My friend Lizzy wanted some gum. She gave me a dollar to go get her some. I went to a corner store to purchase it. I purchased some gum but the total was 25 cents extra.
original_ending: I gave Lizzy her gum, but I didn't tell her I paid extra.

endings.ending: I gave Lizzy her gum and the change.
I found out when I got back that Lizzy didn't like that flavor of gum.
Luckily I had extra money and I bought a box with several for us to share.
She always does it knowing I won't buy just one, but this time she'll owe me.
I asked the man at the store if i could pay him the extra the next day.
The lady behind me felt sorry for me and gave me the extra quarter.

story: A baker began to close shop after a hard day of work. Suddenly, it began to rain very hard and the baker couldn't leave. He turned the radio on and heard that there was a flash flood warning. The baker had to wait for a few hours before he could leave.
original_ending: When he finally left, he was grateful to be going home.

endings.ending: Unfortunately, the storm lasted longer than that and the baker had to sleep in the shop overnight.
The baker didn't want to go home to his nagging wife, so he stayed inside the shop longer than necessary.
While he waited, he listened to lively music on the radio, and break-danced in the front of the store.
While he waited, he decided to try a new coffee, chocolate, and cherry cookie recipe.
He was going to miss his appointment with his doctor.
He ended up having to sleep in right at the bakery.

story: Jack had been eyeing a prize in his teacher's prize box all year. But Bill earned a trip to the prize box first. Bill picked the prize he knew Jack had wanted! When Bill saw how sad Jack looked, he felt guilty.
original_ending: Bill felt much better after he decided to give Jack the prize.

endings.ending: Bill asked if Jack wanted to share the prize and keep it every other week.
Jack came up to Bill at recess later that day and stole the prize.
But Bill did that intentionally because Jack used to bully him in school.
Bill intended to give the prize to Jack, but Jack demanded the prize arrogantly so he changed his mind and kept the prize.
He volunteered to help Jack study so he could get a prize too.
He remembered how he had cheated off of Jack's work in order to win the prize.

story: Bob loved to fish in the ocean. He decided to take his sister and mother in law fishing. They chummed behind the boat for 2 hours. His mother in law had a bite on her hook.
original_ending: She pulled in a 5 foot shark all by herself.

endings.ending: The problem was that the bite was from an enormous shark who easily pulled her out of the boat and into the water, where she barely escaped from his giant teeth.
But just when she was about to pull her catch out of the water, the smell of the chum and the rocking of the boat got the better of her and she became seriously sea-sick.
But as she was reeling it in, she actually fell overboard!
But she objected to fishing for sport, so she cut the line.
She had never reeled in an oceanic fish before and got so nervous that she let go of her rod watching it sail into the sea.
When she reeled it in they were all flabbergasted to see the strange and eerie bottom dweller called the blobfish.

story: Jerry wanted to make some fresh lemonade. He had a recipe from his mother that she gave him a long time ago. After Jerry remembered the recipe he started to make the lemonade. To Jerry's surprise it was very easy!
original_ending: After he was done making his lemonade he sat down and enjoyed a glass.

endings.ending: He shared the lemonade with his family and they all puckered their mouths after tasting it.
He started making the rest of his lunch and decided to spend the rest of the day relaxing.
But the lemonade that he make its different from what he remember
But he hate the results.
When he tasted it he found out he put way too much sugar in it.
He later decided to make some for his next door neighbor as well .

story: It was Liza's fifth birthday and her parents decided to take her out. They decided it would be a good idea to head over to the zoo. The three of them had so much fun looking at the animals. Liza's favorite animal was the tiger.
original_ending: None of them wanted to leave it was so much fun.

endings.ending: Her parents laughed when she asked to take the tiger home.
Her parents bought her a tiger doll at the zoo's gift shop.
Nobody else like the tiger
The tiger was very intimidating
Liza wanted to take a tiger cub back to her home.
Liza ate a lot of ice cream and started running happily.

story: Larry was trying to finish his book report before school. He wasn't done writing when the bus drove up. On the bus he continued working and didn't talk to his friends. With some difficulty he was even writing while walking up to the door.
original_ending: He put down the last period just as he entered the classroom.

endings.ending: While writing, he didn't notice the floor was wet and tripped.
While entering, someone was exiting and he had a crash with this person.
Right after entering his laptop ran out of battery and turned off, and he lost everything.
His teacher then asked if Larry was able to the report on Pride and Prejudice, and Larry realized his report was about To Kill a Mockingbird.
He didn't even notice that someone had closed the door, and walked straight into it!
Luckily for him, his teacher was off sick and he got an extra week to finish the report properly.

story: Mark came back from work exhausted. He fell on the bed ready for a good nap. But as always his neighbor was playing loud music. So Mark put on his earbuds to listen to what he liked best.
original_ending: And fell asleep within minutes to the sound of ocean waves.

endings.ending: He couldn't fall asleep with music in his ears.
After a few minutes, he took them out and yelled at his neighbor to stop playing music.
But he could still hear the thumping thru his earbuds.
But then the doorbell rang and he had to answer it.
Ironically, it was Swedish heavy metal.
But then he discovered his earbuds were broken.

story: Mary had always wanted a dog. Mary's mother would never allow her to have a pet. One day, a dog followed Mary's mother home from the grocery store. The dog would not go away, but laid down on Mary's mother's' feet.
original_ending: The dog got to stay, and Mary got a new pet.

endings.ending: Mary's mother sneezed four times in succession because of her dog allergies, and told Mary to take the dog to the pound.
Mary and her mother took care of the dog for a few days before finding its owner and reuniting them.
Her mother still wouldn't let her keep the dog and took it somewhere else
They fed the dog and took it to the vet the next day
Mary's mom angrily kicked the dog.
Mary's mother called the local animal shelter and arranged to have the dog brought there immediately.

story: Jason lived at home and brought home a new puppy to his parents house. He begged his parents to let him keep it. His parents agreed as long as he made sure it didn't pee in the house. The dog ended up peeing on the carpet that very same day.
original_ending: His parents ended up making him take the dog back to where he got it.

endings.ending: Jason tried to tell his parents that he peed on the carpet.
Jason tried to clean up the mess before his parents saw anything.
Jason cleaned up his pee without his parents noticing.
His parents were upset but they let the dog stay at home.
His parents were more understanding than he expected and began to help potty train the dog.
Since the dog peed on the bathroom tile floor, though, Jason was able to clean it up before his parents even found out about it.

story: I used to have a crush on a girl named Lucy. This was way back when I was in high school. She had brown hair and was fair skinned. I used to write love letters when I got home about her.
original_ending: I never sent them to her because I was too scared.

endings.ending: She saved every one of them, and gave them to me as a gift on our 25th anniversary.
I folded each one of them into various origami animals, and would leave them on her desk before class started.
Ten years later we are happily married and have two children.
I finally sent her the love letters, but she rejected me.
She replied back, and I was ecstatic!
She sent me a very cold reply and said that she wasn't interested, but I didn't give up.

story: Cindy was very shy and didn't like going out much. Soon, staying in all the time became very lonely. She reached out to some friends who were similarly afflicted. They went out in a group, which was much easier.
original_ending: After a while, Cindy's shyness was no longer a problem.

endings.ending: They would often meet at the local coffee shop and play board games together.
They created a weekly meeting group, which they advertised on social media, and have been slowly building in size over the last two months.
So Cindy started a self help group for lonely people to meet others and thus started tinder.
At that point she had no idea that she and her friends would become the world's best bank robber team.
Cindy was still very shy and decided to leave.
Cindy forgot about her shyness and eventually got a guys number.

story: Jake and Zack love to hunt. Usually, they go together and during deer season. One year, Zack spotted a huge deer and he shot at it. They deer appeared to fall over but was nowhere to be found!
original_ending: They decided that the deer was smarter than them and they went home.

endings.ending: Zack went looking for it behind the bushes and was attacked by the deer's mother.
They ran away after they saw a bear in the distance dragging something back into the forest.
They looked again and found the deer had fallen into a deep ravine.
All of the sudden they saw the deer jump up and run away to safety.
The deer was not shot and got away.
Zack thought he shot a deer but instead shot a moose.

story: Amy was upset she lost her new watch. She looked everywhere she could think of and never found it. While in her mom's car she found her watch tucked deep in the seat. Amy realized she was wrong when she accused a classmate of taking it.
original_ending: The next day Amy apologized and gave the girl she accused a cookie.

endings.ending: Amy hated the watch, so she gave it to her brother as a gift.
Amy believes her mother took her watch and hid it from her.
Instead of confessing, she got the classmate to buy her another watch.
She didn't realise that the classmate had buried it in the car seat later that day to avoid consequences.
Amy's pride got the best of her though and she never apologized.
Amy decided to write her classmate a note saying it was a misunderstanding.

story: Carl decided he was going to leave home and go to the city. He had always used his GPS to find his way around. When he got there his phone battery died. He couldn't even leave his car out of fear of being lost.
original_ending: He had to call his mom and ask for directions to get home.

endings.ending: He decided to sleep in his car.
He finally decided he need to leave and found a police officer.
Fortunately, a police car pulled up shortly after to see why he was parked in one place for so long.
Then, he remembered his mom bought him a portable power supply for his phone and had put it in the glovebox.
He stayed there for hours waiting for help.
Even with fear, he decided to take a chance and return home.

story: Sara went to her parent's funeral on Sunday. It was a sunny day but no one else was present. That left Sara feel very alone in a world that was still happy. She went back home afterward to cry.
original_ending: And when she had no more tears, she looked at old photographs.

endings.ending: Sara didn't know a person could have so many tears and she cried all through the night.
Fortunately, Sara's friends were able to come over and help her feel better.
Sara's sister called and came over.
Sara ended up being alone forever.
She felt bad for her parents who had burned many bridges before their passing.
During the long flight home she wished her parents had moved to her country with her so she could've seen them more before they passed.

story: Bob and his friend Joe were playing hide and seek. When it was Bob's turn to hide, he waited and waited. Joe never came, so he thought he must have found the perfect spot. He finally went back inside the house to find Joe at the table.
original_ending: He was eating cookies and had totally forgotten about Bob.

endings.ending: Joe was building Legos on the table.
Joe asked him where he had been hiding the whole time
Joe told Bob he gave up looking because he couldn't find him.
Joe said he didn't feel well and wanted to go home.
Joe looked up at Bob and said "I got tired of waiting."
Joe quickly jumped up and ran out the door.

story: Danny's dad was taking trash to the dump. He decided to bring Danny with him. When they got to the dump, Danny got out of the car to tie his shoe. Not realizing this, Danny's dad accidentally left him there!
original_ending: It took him five minutes for him to realize and go back for Danny.

endings.ending: He didn't even know until Danny called him.
Danny's dad decided to hide up the road to scare Danny as he tried to walk home.
By the time his dad returned to pick him up, he was missing from the spot.
Danny was waiting for his dad, suddenly a group of spider monsters surrounded him.
He realised what had happened straightaway, as Danny didn't ask him how long it would take them to get home like he usually did.
Eventually the dump's custodian found Danny and called his dad to come get him.

story: Amy heard a new song on the radio and loved it. She listened to the song every time it played. After 3 months she was sick of the song. Her friends were enjoying the song when she turned the radio off.
original_ending: Her friends were upset, but she couldn't bare to hear that song again.

endings.ending: Amy decided to sing the song but made it funny by changing the words, her friends laughed.
Amy told her friends that she had a secret to tell them.
Forcing herself for the sake of not hurting her friends' feelings, she turned on the radio again and listened the song together from a different auditory aspect.
She persisted in her decision of not to turn on the radio, although her friends insisted.
Her friends immediatly turned it back on and gave her a questioning look.
Her friends all questioned her over the motif of her action

story: Gina was waiting on her grandpa to return home. She wanted him to take her to the store to buy chips. When he returned home he was too tired to go to the store. Gina would have to wait until tomorrow to get the chips.
original_ending: She was disappointed, but there was nothing she could do.

endings.ending: When he fell asleep she took his car and drove to the store herself.
She was so mad she ran away from home.
Rather than wait, Gina decided to walk to the store to buy the chips herself.
When they went the next day, the store was unfortunately all out of chips.
Luckily, an hour later her friend dropped by and was able to take her to the store for chips.
She decided to watch some YouTube videos to figure out how to bake her own chips at home.

story: People told Dave that a watched pot doesn't boil. He tried to prove them wrong by watching a pot. He put water in a pot and set it on the stove. He set the stove on high and waited.
original_ending: He was very excited when the pot began to boil.

endings.ending: The pot boiled over and water got all over the floor after Dave got a phone call.
Dave's pot never boiled because the stove was broken.
He then came back 20 minutes later to find out the stove was not turned on.
As he waited the pot exploded and caused a huge mess.
The pot never boiled and Dave ended up being wrong.
However Dave noticed that the stove wasn't actually generating any heat.

story: Tom had been asking his parents for a cat for weeks. Finally, his parents told him they could get one kitten. Tom and his parents found a cat online and picked it up. When they brought it back, Tom took a nap with it.
original_ending: When Tom woke up, the cat was nowhere to be found anywhere.

endings.ending: Tom smothered the cat while sleeping and it died.
When Tom woke up, he realized the cat had scratched him in his sleep.
After that, the kitten always slept in Tom's bed.
When he woke up, Tom discovered that he was allergic to cats.
The kitten licked Tom's face to wake him up.
Tom decided to name the cat Spotty.

story: Katie could not wait to wear her new shoes. She had worked all summer to buy the perfect heels. They were hot pink with black polka dots. When she wore them she felt great.
original_ending: As soon as she put them on, her heel broke and Katie cried.

endings.ending: She went out that evening full of pride over her new shoes.
But she was too scared of ruining them, and wore her old shoes instead.
Katie soon realized she could not stand up with the new shoes though.
The shoes were a little tight and hurt her feet after a few hours.
She went to school with her new shoes and founded out another girl was wearing the same pair of shoes, which frustrated her.
Her shoes were stolen in the gym locker room a week later, which pissed Katie off.

story: My friend had to go to jail for two days. He was given until midnight to turn himself in. I dropped him off at 10:30 that night. At 12:30 am he called me to come pick him up.
original_ending: He was there for less than 3 hours but it was over 2 days.

endings.ending: I refused to pick him up, wondering how he could only be there for 3 hours, assuming he was illegally trying to leave.
As I was driving back pick up my friend, a deer came out of nowhere and smashed into my car - preventing me from going to the jail.
I think he had run off because he never showed up.
I came to pick him up and he was crying to bits.
At the time I cannot pickup my friend because I was in sick.
I do not like to pickup my friend because he was going to jail.

story: Lana called me to hang out. When we were walking together, I noticed that she was silent. I told her if there is anything that's bothering her. She told me that she had strong feelings for me.
original_ending: Considering that we're good friend, I decided to ask her out.

endings.ending: Unfortunately, I did not feel the same way about her.
I always thought that she had found me unattractive.
I felt so awkward and feared our friendship would be impacted because she knew I had a girlfriend.
I was so happy and told her that I had feelings for her as well and we had a wonderful dinner together.
I was shocked to know that because my best friend was Lana's boyfriend.
She immediately said she was only joking and we laughed it off.

story: One of the first dog's I can remember liking was a pitbull. In high school, my best friend had one. At first I was scared of dogs, but this one was loving and playful. He never bit anyone, and loved to play.
original_ending: As I grew, so did he, with my friends kids, never bit anyone at all.

endings.ending: We played catch every day after school.
One day, his stepfather abused him and he became very reclusive.
One day he saw someone walking their dog and broke out of the house to bark.
As time went on, the Pitbull got more and more aggressive so we had to get rid of him
But eventually the pit bull's true nature always comes out.
I later learned that my friend ran an illegal dog-fighting ring.

story: This morning I rushed out the door to go to work. I drove toward the end of the main road in my neighborhood. Traffic was backed up so I decided to cut through the bank lot. I was pulled over on the other side of the lot for cutting through!
original_ending: The officer let me pass with only a warning but it was a close call.

endings.ending: I eventually failed a breathalyzer and was arrested for driving under the influence.
When the officer recognized me as an old classmate, he let me go with a warning.
To my surprise, the office was my friend's and he let me go.
The officer was corrupted because he asked me for a fee to let me go.
The policeman gave me a ticket.
The policeman was my friend and didn't fine me, but he scolded me!

story: Jimmy arrived to the ocean with his fishing equipment. He took out his fishing rod and walked towards the dock. Unfortunately, one of the wooden boards from the dock broke. He ended up falling in the water.
original_ending: Another fisher managed to get him out of the water.

endings.ending: He didn't know how to swim, so he struggled against the deep water until he could find his footing and crawl out of the water.
He hit his head on the board and lost his balance as he fell, being pulled completely under, and he drowned in seconds.
Suddenly a shark started chasing him.
He was saved by a beautiful mermaid.
He then stated to drown deeper and deeper into the ocean and screamed for help, but no one answered.
A big fish passed near him in the water and he caught it with his bare hands, the first game of the day.

story: I took my son to daycare this morning. We got in the car and buckled up. I drove across town to the daycare center. We walked in and down the hall to his classroom.
original_ending: He ran off to play with his friends right away, and I went back home.

endings.ending: He had a great time and daycare and couldn't wait to return.
After daycare he was sad because he hadn't made any new friends.
There was a note on the classroom door, class had been cancelled!
We were the first ones there!
I opened the door and entered in on the same hallway we just passed, walked down and open the same classroom door, seeing the beggining of the hallway again.
My son started to cry saying he was afraid of being away from me, and I stayed there with him until he was calm.

story: Jerry was out to dinner with his girlfriend. Jerry was so in love with her. The two had been together for 2 years. Jerry got down on one knee and asked her to be his bride.
original_ending: She cried and told him it wasn't working out between the two.

endings.ending: She accepted on the spot, and the diners around them cheered and clapped.
She started cracking up because it wasn't his girlfriend - it was her twin sister!
She said yes and the two hugged and kissed.
She said no, but added that she just wanted to wait a little bit longer before being engaged.
She screamed and immediately said "yes," hugging him.
She ended up slapping him because she found out he was cheating.

story: Jake was seven years old when his family went to the coast. The hotel had a ten foot high diving board at the pool. Jake was in line behind a 14 year old boy. The older boy walked to the end of the board and did not jump.
original_ending: Jake went to the end of the board and in he went.

endings.ending: Jake began to cry and the older boy let him go off the board
The older boy’s dad threw a tennis ball at his head .
Then Jake walked up behind him and pushed him.
Then Jake was too scared to jump also.
Jake consoled the boy and helped him down off the diving board.
Jake cheered him on with encouragement until he worked up the courage to jump.

story: The Lewis Family had lost power for the day. They knew it wouldn't be back until 11pm that night. The mom thought that she needed to find something for the kids to do. That is when she thought of going to the movies.
original_ending: The kids loved the idea and wanted to go right away.

endings.ending: When they got to the theater, they found out it was closed for the day, due to repairs.
The kids objected and then suggested they go to the beach instead.
When they got to the theater, they found out that the theater was out of power as well.
Unfortunately, the movie they wanted to watch wasn't out yet so they went to the park.
The kids don't like the idea.
The kids fight with each other chossing the movie

story: When Joy was ten Year's old, her family moved. She had to go to a new school and make new friends. She was very nervous about her first day at school. At lunch, she asked a group of girls if she could sit with them.
original_ending: The girls were funny and cool, and Joy felt better!

endings.ending: The girls were very mean and did not let Joy sit with them.
The girls were all friendly and welcomed her to sit in whenever she wants.
The girls said No and made fun of her.
They just looked at her and all moved to a different table away from her.
They said no but she wasn't upset because she wouldn't want to be friends with such rude people anyway.
Not only did they say yes but together they ultimately became the best Power Ranger team in history.

story: Gina was to pick up bread on her way from school. The text was on her phone. The phone was locked in a teacher's desk at school. Gina lied and said she hadn't seen the text.
original_ending: She pretended to be happy and offered to walk to buy the bread.

endings.ending: Gina's mother scolded her for being irresponsible.
Suddenly Gina's nose started to grow.
Unfortunately, then she had to explain why her phone was locked in the teacher's desk.
Later in the evening she felt bad for lying, so she told her parents the truth.
If her parents knew her phone was taken away again she would be grounded.
She was secretly happy as she had begun a no carb diet and bread was off limits.

story: Tina makes a schedule for herself every day. She feels more comfortable with a to-do list and a time frame. She wakes up, sits at her desk, and writes her day's plan. Sometimes she follows it to the letter.
original_ending: Even when she doesn't, she feels better with it in her pocket.

endings.ending: Today, she decided to be a bit adventurous and not write a plan for the day.
Tina experiences brain fog from all of the overthinking and begins to write random items that she would like to complete for today.
Sometimes she throws it away in frustration.
Today she used colorful markers to encourage her to do every item.
And feel very bad when don't do.
And sometimes do nothing that has there.

story: Nicole was watching a movie on her iPad. She heard a noise in the other end of the house. She got up to check, and fell. After picking up the iPad, Nicole realized the screen was cracked.
original_ending: She decided to take it to the store and see if it could be fixed.

endings.ending: She tried to figure out what the "silver lining" was and decided it best to buy a new iPad with upgraded technology.
She threw it to the ground angrily before noticing a burglar in her house!
She had no money to fix the cracked screen on the iPad.
Nicole had a replacement screen, and she changed the screen with her replacement screen tools.
She got very angry and started crying.
She smiled and thought: it is time to buy a new one.

story: My boyfriend in high school was crazy. We had only been dating 1 month when it was Christmas. His family was on vacation and their car broke down. In order to make it back, my boyfriend rented a Uhaul.
original_ending: His parents drove and he rode in the back for 1000 miles!

endings.ending: He decided to fill it with gifts as they drove, and the family returned with hundreds of gifts for the needy.
Unfortunately he didn't take into account the fact that Uhaul charges by the mile, and his rental bill was thousands of dollars.
The Uhaul broke down, too, and they were stranded!
He drove while his parents rode in the back of the UHaul.
We drove this rental car for a few miles before it broke down too!
His parents' car also broke down and they had to rent an Uhaul.

story: Tracy lived at the end of her small town. It took her two minutes to reach the center. And it took two more to reach the other end. As she loved running the whole way, it didn't take very long.
original_ending: And it made her feel very powerful to cover her whole town so fast.

endings.ending: However, she was extremely out of breath afterwards, and she realized she needed to get in better shape.
She was disappointed that it didn't take longer, as she thoroughly enjoys taking in the scenery of her small town.
She was praised by her neighbor for her ability to stay fit.
She rewarded herself with a smoothie.
She had more than enough energy to run across the entire time several times a day.
One day while running, she was hit by a car and that put an end to her running across the town.

story: David was the best air hockey player in town. He had his own table at home and practiced a lot. One day a boy named Sam came to play with him. Sam beat him by 10 points.
original_ending: David was angry so he punched Sam in the face.

endings.ending: David told Sam it was just luck and challenged him to another game.
David found out that Sam had been practicing even more than he had.
David asked Sam to keep coming over to play so he could practice
David and Sam are now best friends who compete in air hockey tournaments.
He practiced all next week because they were going to have a rematch.
Sam showed him some of the tricks he new and they became good friends.

story: I noticed that my house was filling up with trash bags. I decided that I needed to take my trash out. I picked up one bag and brought it to the can outside. It took me twenty minutes before all the bags were gone.
original_ending: I looked at my house and it was much cleaner.

endings.ending: I knew I'd be embarrassed for all my neighbors to see so much trash, so I was looking forward to when the garbage truck would haul it all away.
Once I was done, I saw an actually mouse in the corner where all the garbage had been.
I put a reminder in my phone to take the trash out every day from now on.
With all the bags gone I actually found my phone that I thought I had lost last month!
I went to my backyard because I decided it was time to clean it up too.
The trash man came and I could see he was unhappy taking all the extra trash.

story: Walt wanted some ice cream, so he went to the store to get some. When he got to the store, he saw the best invention he had ever seen. It was a ball that would make ice cream when you shook it! Walt put all his ingredients into the ice cream ball and shook it.
original_ending: When he opened up the ball, he ate his delicious ice cream.

endings.ending: When he opened it up, he saw an inedible thing.
He couldn't believe how easy it was.
Walt decided to steal this idea and open his own ice cream shop on the other side of town.
But surprisingly, the ice cream tasted hideous.
After a while he checked and saw that it was still liquid, but decided to keep shaking it to see if it would work.
He shook it and shook it until he couldn't feel anything moving, and when he opened it, he saw that all his ingredients had leaked out a crack in the ball.

story: Kate made a new friend named Jan at the library. They walked to the corner store to buy snacks. Jan bought a can of soda as well. Jan snorted when she laughed and soda came out of her nose.
original_ending: They both laughed as soda spilled out of her nose.

endings.ending: Kate found that weird and never spoke to Jan again.
Jan became so embarrassed that her whole face turned red.
Kate drank a soda and tried to do the same thing.
Jan got a napkin and tried to be less messy.
Kate decided she didn't want to be seen with Jan anymore and she went home.
She stuck her tongue out so she could drink it back up.

story: Jim always wanted a pet turtle. He went to the pet shop and saw that they had a few. Jim picked out the one he liked most. The cashier told him that turtles require lots of care.
original_ending: Jim told him that it wasn't a problem and bought the turtle.

endings.ending: Jim asked the cashier if they had books on turtle care.
Jim decided he did not want a pet turtle as he did not have the time to spend on it.
Jim did not fully believe the cashier, which resulted in the turtle getting very sick.
Jim therefore went to the library in order to read up on proper turtle care.
He put the turtle back and bought a pet rock instead.
Jim went back to the turtle section and picked up a book on turtle care.

story: Ed had been warned there were jellyfish in the water. He ignored the warnings and went in to swim anyway. He was in the water for a few minutes when he felt a burning pain. He looked down and saw a jellyfish touching his side.
original_ending: He got out of the water as fast as he could.

endings.ending: And ended up being burned by her, he tried to run away and when he saw he was surrounded by jellyfish.
With luck she didn't burn him he swam away but was surprised by a lifeguard who told him to get out of the water
When Ed got out of the water the person who had warned him point and laugh which made Ed feel embarassed.
Ed removed the jellyfish and kept swimming because he didn't want anybody to know he had been stung.
He swam as fast as he could but he just ran into more jellyfish
It turned out they wasn't a jellyfish at all and that he was stung by something else

story: Sandy caught a cold and stayed home all day. He sneezed a lot and used many tissues. But noon he had ran out of fresh tissues. Sandy had to use paper towel and toilet paper instead.
original_ending: By the evening his nose was very red and his face was puffy.

endings.ending: Sandy deposited the paper towel into the toilet.
Sandy used the toilet paper and wiped her face forgetting she used it to blow her nose.
She did not like the roughness of the paper and would rather tissues.
But she felt at ease that at least she had something to use.
The paper towels were rough, and they cut up his nose.
Afterward, he had no more paper towels for cleaning.

story: Amy and her dad were driving out of state. Amy kept sleeping when her dad awoke her at a gas station Later she awoke and needed to use the restroom. Her dad was upset because she didn't go when the stopped for gas.
original_ending: They sat in angry silence for an hour after the second stop.

endings.ending: Even though she begged for him to stop, he kept driving until she eventually had an accident on the seat.
Thankfully, they were near their destination, and Amy waited the last half hour until they arrived at their hotel.
Her dad then apologized for overreacting and explained that driving is stressing him out.
Amy then became reluctant to ask her dad to pull over for a restroom break unless it was an absolute emergency.
They argued until they got to the next rest stop.
Amy lightened the situation by making some jokes and they stopped at the next rest stop.

story: Bob's doctor told him he needs to stop eating red meat. His blood pressure was very high. Bob went out to eat and ordered a chicken sandwich. He never had one before but he liked it.
original_ending: Switching off of red meat was going to be easier than he thought.

endings.ending: Bob decided to try being vegan next.
After that, Bob swore off red meat.
Bob decided he would try to adopt a vegan lifestyle instead.
He ordered one more so he could eat it later.
He wondered why he'd waited so long to try one.
It wasn't as good as red meat, but it would be a good substitute every now and again.

story: Nick and Pat met when they were 7 years old. They lived across the street from one another when they were children. They went to the same schools and always hung out together. When they became adults Nick moved away but they still kept in touch.
original_ending: They are now 53 years old and they are still the closest of friends.

endings.ending: Nick died a few years later and Pat went to his funeral.
They moved into an assisted living facility with each other once they were elderly.
Unfortunately, as is the way of childhood friendships, they grew apart and eventually stopped talking to each other.
It was during a yearly phone call that Nick sadly found out Pat has cancer and only a couple of months to live.
Until one day Pat and Nick had a falling out, and they haven't spoken to each other since.
A few years later, Pat ended up moving close to Nick again, and they resumed spending their time together everyday.

story: All of the employees were asked to bring a dish to the office party. Jeremy decided he'd make his family's famous buffalo chicken dip. His mother usually helped him with the hard parts. This time, he tried to make it himself.
original_ending: Unfortunately, he measured wrong, and the dip was too spicy to eat.

endings.ending: He couldn't help feeling proud after making a perfect chicken dip.
After cooking, he went out to buy some beer, and when he returned, he found that the dish he made was gone.
And everyone loved it and asked for the recipe.
But his mother didn't let him to to cook and she made it by herself.
The dip turned out great and everyone loved it.
Jeremy thought the dip tasted great so he brought it but many people got sick after eating it.

story: The Smith family was excited to go to Disney for the first time. The kids immediately ran to all of the fun rides at the park to play. Kelly, the youngest, could not wait to eat at Epcot. The family then went to an Italian restaurant for dinner.
original_ending: The family had a great time and took hundreds of pictures.

endings.ending: Unfortunately, the food was cold and bland and Kelly was disappointed.
After dinner, the kids decided to ride more rides and Kelley ended up getting sick.
After eating they decided to go on more rides until the park closed.
Kelly had her favorite, spaghetti and meatballs.
Kelly promptly threw up after eating and the family immediately had to leave, much to her chagrin.
But Kelly did not see one thing she liked on the menu and loudly whined that she wanted to go to a restaurant with a different theme.

story: A house had a rat problem. So the owner put down traps before he went to bed one night. The next morning, he found the bait gone, but no rat caught. He was infuriated.
original_ending: This was mostly because he found the trap by stepping on it.

endings.ending: He begin to search for the trap.
The trap is simply gone.
He decided to add more bait the next night.
He looked for an exterminator on the internet.
The rat had learned to evade traps successfully.
A thief had broken in and stolen the bait along with other valuables.

story: Jan called and said her car didn't sound right. So I walked over to her place and drove her car around. It sounded to me like it needed a tune-up. So I gathered all my tools and the parts needed for a tune and did it.
original_ending: Now Jan tells me her car sounds and runs much better.

endings.ending: Unfortunately, I tuned it improperly and her car caught fire on the highway.
I was a little too self confident and we had to end up taking it to a mechanic.
I didn't have the right parts so her car did not sound any better when I was done.
After Jan said the car sounded the same I realized I installed used parts for the tune up.
But i forgot the main tool which was a wrench so had to go buy a new one.
But i decided to put it off till the next day because it was really hot.

story: Dan's class was in the library at school. A boy across the room stuck his tongue out at Dan. Without thinking Dan threw a book at the boy. The book hit the boy on the nose which began to bleed.
original_ending: Dan knew he would be in big trouble for throwing a book.

endings.ending: The boy's nose was broken!
Luckily, the boy was playing a joke and it was just ketchup.
The boy's nose was broken and he had to be taken to the hospital.
The boy was a bully and when the book hit his nose, everyone in the library cheered.
Dan ran up to the boy and held a tissue to the boys nose.
Dan turned around to see a teacher who took him to the principals office

story: Martha wanted Jerry to ask her on a date. Martha did not know how to get Jerry's attention. She thought about her problem all day long. Finally she decided to walk up to him and just ask.
original_ending: Martha and Jerry had a good time at the movies.

endings.ending: Jerry was relieved as he too had a crush on Martha.
Jerry was embarrassed as he was gay.
Jerry politely told Martha that he already had a girlfriend.
At the last minute she chickened out and decided she would ask him another time.
Jerry laughed and said she was not his type.
After a very boring date Martha decided she did not like Jerry after all.

story: I was mailing letters one evening. There were a lot of letters to mail and a lot of envelopes. When I licked one envelope, it gave my tongue a paper cut. I yelled out in pain from the paper cut.
original_ending: I then went to the kitchen and got a wet sponge for the envelopes.

endings.ending: I had to rinse my tongue under cold water to ease the pain.
My tongue ended up bleeding everywhere.
I washed my mouth and stopped licking the envelopes.
I decided to use paper clips to seal the envelopes.
I decided to give up entirely and just got to FedEx to have them mailed.
I kept right on going as I had a deadline to meet and no injury would stop me!

story: Carla loved the beach. She wanted her own beach house. Carla worked for 40 years and saved up money to buy a beach house. She was hit by a car on the day she would move into the house.
original_ending: Carla never got to live in her dream beach house.

endings.ending: Fortunately, Carla made a full recovery, and after a short convalescence she finally moved into her beach house.
The driver of the car was an older man who fell in love with Carla and they ended up dating after she got better.
Finally, Carla was lived in her beach house.
She was died in the car accident.
She just walked it off and continued moving in.
The settlement allowed her to buy a better beach house.

story: Reese was at school. He was taking a test when his head began to hurt. His teacher sent him to the nurse's office where he laid down. The nurse hoped that laying down would help him feel better.
original_ending: Unfortunately, it didn't so he had his mom pick him up.

endings.ending: After laying down for 10 minutes, he felt much better and went back to class to finish his test.
After talking to his teacher, the nurse realized that Reese was faking to get out of a test and sent him back to class.
Reese fell asleep and when the nurse woke him up thirty minutes later he felt much better.
He had a history of headaches and the nurse knew he probably just needed to rest.
Soon enough he was able to get up and continue the test.
Unfortunely, they soon realized that the issue was way more severe than a headache.

story: I gave Hannah a poem in our class. She took it and decided to read it. After she read it, she had an angry look on her face. She stood up and walked to the garbage can.
original_ending: I had to stop her before she threw it away.

endings.ending: I started crying and she said, "You know I'm dyslexic and can't read that!"
But Becky went over to the garbage can, took out the poem, read it, and was so touched by it, she asked me to the dance.
She was mad because she thought the poem was about her.
She tore the paper in half, then stomped out of the room.
Hannah told me the poem was inappropriate and I should be ashamed.
Hanna pinned the poem to the message board and told me the poem was beautiful.

story: Alice was a sweet girl, but she was also very sneaky. When she thought her teacher wasn't paying attention, she would be bad She would say bad words and tell other kids bad things. One day her teacher talked to her about the right thing to do.
original_ending: From then on, Alice decided to be a good student.

endings.ending: Alice took heed for a day or two, but then resorted back to her bad behavior.
The teacher referred her to a school counselor, thinking that could help.
Alice said she would change but did not.
Alice made excuses for her behavior so her teacher sent her to the principal.
Alice ignored the advice and continued to do bad things.
Alice didn't like what the teacher said and keyed her car.

story: Sally was going on her first plane trip. She felt scared, but tried her best to be brave. After the plane took off she fell asleep. When she woke up she was at her destination.
original_ending: Sally was proud of herself for not letting fear get the best of her!

endings.ending: She began to feel like she was floating out of her seat and then she realized she was still dreaming and not actually awake.
A fake bomb threat had been called in causing the whole process of getting off the plane to take much longer.
She called her mom to celebrate her safe arrival.
She smiled at the flight attendant who gave her a thumbs up.
or she thought so, soon she realized she had boarded a wrong plane.
As the plane was moving away from runaway she got an anxiety attack seeing the vastness of an airport.

story: Ike loved eating hot dogs, and he had a big appetite. He decided to enter a hot dog eating contest. In front of the whole town, he ate hot dog after hot dog. But then he was too full to continue.
original_ending: Ike ended up coming in third place in the contest!

endings.ending: Ike began feeling ill and dropped out of the contest.
Ike vowed to never again eat hot dogs.
Luckily, though, he had already eaten enough to win!
He ended up vomiting out all of his previously eaten food!
He win the contest.
He lost for surrender.

story: It was Tim's turn to kick the ball. He had been practicing at home for days. When it was rolled toward him he closed his eyes and kicked. He missed completely and kicked so hard he fell.
original_ending: All the other kids made fun of him and he ran to the bathroom crying.

endings.ending: He got straight back up and kicked the ball right into the goal.
Tim cut his knee and had to run to his mom for a plaster.
He was so embarrassed and practiced harder afterwards, next time he kicked the ball very far.
He fell so hard that he broke his ankle and was sent to the hospital, which made him feel more disappointed.
Then he got up and grabbed the ball and kicked it out of the yard in anger.
He decided to take a nap since he was lying on the ground.

story: Rogers favorite vacation was the one he took in Hawaii. He lives in Montana where there's a lot of snow. Its very cold there most of the year too. He wanted to go where he knew the weather would be nice on the beach.
original_ending: He was there for 2 weeks and didn't want to return to Montana afterward.

endings.ending: Roger arrived in Hawaii and a volcano was spitting lava towards the beach.
Roger's vacation coincided with Hawaii's coldest weather in years so he flew farther south.
He asked himself why he lives in Montana since he wants nice weather.
He met an island girl while on vacation.
Roger decided to sell his property in Montana and buy a beach house in Hawaii.
Roger looked at the house prices and decided he couldn't afford to live in Hawaii, so he went back to Montana.

story: I wanted to know that she loved me. So I drove to her house without any notice. I ran to her front door and opened it. She stood up and looked at me.
original_ending: I could see it in her eyes that it was indeed love.

endings.ending: She slammed the door in my face.
She asked "who are you and what are you doing here?"
She looked in confusion as she asked me what i was doing there.
She looked shocked and right behind her, i saw that she was with someone else.
She told me to leave and I knew she did not indeed love me.
She asked why I was at her house and looked very confused.

story: Gina went into her grandpa's room. It was the first time she had been in there since he died. She looked at and picked up items from the dresser. She opened the drawers and cabinets and peeked inside.
original_ending: There stood the clothes she would never see him wear again.

endings.ending: What she discovered made her freeze in fear because there was a large gun in the top drawer.
Nothing was in the dresser so she decided to bring it to the pawn shop to see how much money she could get for it.
She found a wristwatch that was glowing.
She was surprised to see bundles of banknotes neatly arranged and a letter addressed to her inside.
She found his medals from the war and wondered about his time as a soldier.
He had saved newspapers from every year he was born.

story: Sharon had a beautiful blue backpack that she loved. She kept all of her homework in there. One day, she sat next to someone on the bus who had the same backpack. When she got to class to turn in her homework, it wasn't in her bag!
original_ending: She had grabbed the wrong backpack off of the bus!

endings.ending: She noticed that she was robbed without realizing it.
She left her backpack on the bus!
She then realized that the other person on the bus had her bag!
She realized that she'd left in on the table at home, and was upset she wouldn't get credit for the assignment.
She realized that her backpack had a huge hole in the bottom.
She started crying and told her teacher she must have left it at home.

story: Jill lies to her new date and tells him that she is a great cook. It turns out that he is a chef. On their next date he insists that she cook for him. Instead of telling him the truth she gets her friend to cook for her.
original_ending: When he finds out that she's a liar he doesn't want to see her again.

endings.ending: Her friend isn't very good at cooking either.
The chef asks her how she made it during the date.
He says that this meal is the best that he has ever had.
He said he knows her friend and knew what was actually happening.
But her friend refused she ended up cooking anyways.
Her date never realized she was lying, and she signed up for cooking classes so she wouldn't have to lie again.

story: Ana had fallen asleep on her school bus. She had a habit of leaving her mouth hanging open when she slept. Suddenly, she felt something weird and woke up. She saw that kids were throwing food into her mouth.
original_ending: She was so mad, she immediately moved seats away from the kids.

endings.ending: She had skipped breakfast that morning and was excited that she got to eat after all.
She laughed and asked them if they had any pop-tarts they could throw next.
She laughed, because she thought it was funny.
She began to cry, and the other kids laughed.
She just laughed and ate the food in her mouth.
She made sure to not fall asleep on the bus again.

story: On the way to school, Dan saw a dog running in the street. Dan called to the dog. The dog came to Dan, wagging its tail. Dan looked at the dog's collar to find out where it lived.
original_ending: Dan was able to return the lost dog to its owner.

endings.ending: There was nobody at the address on the collar.
The owner seemed mean and unfriendly, so Dan kept the dog.
There was no information on the collar, so Dan took the dog home.
The dog suddenly turned violent and bit Dan on the hand, so he had to get a series of rabies shots.
The dog had come all the way from another state!
Then he took the collar off and threw it in a trash can so that he could keep the dog for himself.

story: Cindy was mad at her family because they had to move away. She loved the house she grew up and lived in. Cindy was upset the whole way to the new house. They pulled up to the new house and showed her the swing set.
original_ending: The swing set made Cindy happy and she loved her new house.

endings.ending: Despite this, Cindy still could not warm to the family's new house.
Cindy quickly started using the swing, but fell off and hurt herself in the process.
She enjoyed riding in the swing set and forgot about the old house quickly.
Cindy refused to take the swing set as she was very sad.
Cindy started to play with the swing set but she felt lonely soon and missed her old house very much.
Cindy tried to play with the swing set but she felt on the ground badly so she hated the new house much more.

story: Joe's class went to the orchard on a class trip. He and his friends filled up buckets of apples. When he got them home, his mother didn't know what to do with them. They had all kinds of apple dessert the next few weeks.
original_ending: And everyone had an apple in their lunch every day for a month.

endings.ending: She decided that it would be nice to make apple pies for all of her neighbors.
Joe's mom went to where homeless people live and passed out apples to them.
He decided to bring in one of the pies to class with him to share.
Joe suggested that they make apple juice instead for a while.
However one day they opened their lunch box and they found a chocolate bar instead of an apple dessert.
The class agreed that their favorite was the apple pie.

story: Gina came home from school and went to her room. Outside the room she could hear voices inside. She walked in to see her sisters in her room. The little one was swinging from the gold ball on the top of a pole.

story: Sammy wanted a toy truck to play with. His mommy told him she would try to buy him one. On his birthday he got a cake, but no toy truck! He tried to act happy as he went upstairs to bed that night.

the other day when he woke up the toy truck was on the table.

story: Marc was playing on the stairs. He slipped and fell down, breaking his ankle. The doctor said he could not walk for one month. Marc cannot climb the stairs at his house now.
original_ending: His mom is letting him sleep in the living room for a month.

endings.ending: Mark got a brace for his ankles, allowing him to be more mobile.
