endings.ending: Sky was not convinced by her mother and remained afraid of flying. The trip has been cancelled.
Sky was so excited by the videos that she spent hours watching them.
On flight day Sky decided to hide in her closet so she could avoid flying.
Her mother also decided to buy her a big teddy bear to take on the plane.
Ironically when the big day came Sky was exhausted from all the excitement and anticipation, and slept through the whole flight.
Sky dreamed that she herself became a pilot and became so enamored with the idea that she made it her life goal.

story: Reid was walking in a field when he saw a bunny. He got his dog to chase after the bunny. The dog ran fast and caught up to the poor rabbit. Instead of killing it, the dog licked the bunny playfully.
original_ending: Reid decided to keep the bunny as a pet instead.

endings.ending: Reid returned the rabbit to the wild.
Reid decided to give the rabbit to his niece as a pet.
Reid decided to adopt a bunny from a shelter, so his dog could have a friend.
The video Reid uploaded to YouTube of the interaction ended up going viral the next day.
The bunny hopped away after a few licks from the dog.
Reid sat down and watched the bunny eat clover.

story: Jaiden was nervous about moving to a new home. He thought about all the friends he would miss. On the day of the big move, Jaiden saw many children playing outside. The children immediately invited Jaden to play with them.
original_ending: Jaiden played into the afternoon, and felt his nervousness slip away.

endings.ending: Sadly, the other children weren't friendly to him which made Jaiden miss his old friends even more.
Jaiden fell and hurt his ankle which made bonding with new friends quite a challenge.
Jaiden played with this children and they were very happy to play with jaiden.
After the playing jaiden feel sad because of moving new home.
Jaden didn't enjoyed playing with them as they were very rude while playing.
But jaden refused to play as he was missing his old friends.

story: One of our favorite places to visit as a family is New York City. Once, we only had a day to visit, so we did a lot in a short time. We started out with a ride on the Staten Island Ferry. Then, we made our way all the way up to Central Park.
original_ending: By the time we had to leave, everyone was exhausted.

endings.ending: We got there just after a lion that had escaped from the zoo, was captured.
We walked the whole park and were able to see a live concert!
Even when the day was over, everyone was still excited and wanted to explore some more.
After that, we saw a bar nearby so we went in to get some drinks.
We loved it so much we decided to stay an extra week!
We ended up walking past a movie set filming there!

story: Mike was too cheap to buy a new wallet. And he's used the same one for 20 Years. It had a hole on the bottom that was getting bigger. One day, lots of money fell through the hole without Mike noticing.
original_ending: And he had no more money to buy a new wallet.

endings.ending: A kid picked it up and bought a new XBox with the money.
The bills were borne away by the breeze, never to be seen again.
So Mike borrowed the money to buy a new wallet.
Mike was so angry that he never used wallet again.
Seeing no other choice he bought a new wallet.
Instead of replacing the wallet he decided to not use a wallet anymore.

story: Helen wanted to be a dancer. She took ballet classes ever since she was little. Then she was told her legs were too short for a ballerina! She was crushed, but then had a good idea.
original_ending: She began to teach ballet to kids, dancing every day!

endings.ending: She decided to become a gymnast instead.
She decided to write a book, titling it "How to Become a Ballerina."
She asked her friends to pull on her legs as hard as they could, and now she's six feet tall!
She founded a special ballet company for short people, and it was a huge success.
She decided to work extra hard to become the shortest ballerina and break all sorts of records!
There were a lot of behind the scenes jobs that went into dancing, like costume design and choreography, and she decided to learn all about those roles.

story: Jan checked to make sure no one was around. Her two older brothers had been sneaking around the garden lately. Being a curious child, Jan wanted to know what they were up to. She carefully opened the door to her brother's room.
original_ending: Inside the back of their closet, she found several jars with spiders.

endings.ending: She found a pack of cigarettes and a book of matches on their bed.
She was surprised to see a tank filled with crawfish on their bureau.
There was dirt all over the room.
They had taken plants from the garden and moved them to their room.
There was a strange looking alien peeking out of a corner with fearful eyes.
The door slammed shut on her face as the cameras alerted the brothers of an intruder.

story: Dan and his daughter went to the supermarket. As they reached the checkout, Dan's daughter was asking for candy. Dan told his daughter that she could not get any candy. Dan's daughter immediately threw a tantrum right there in the store.
original_ending: Dan was so embarrassed with the behavior of his daughter.

endings.ending: Dan accepted to buy candy to his daughter.
Dan promised her to buy other things like dolls.
Dan changed his mind and bought her a pack of Skittles.
Dan put her on timeout when they got home for misbehaving.
Dan ignored his daughter and she kept screaming to the dismay of other customers.
Dan relented and bought his daughter candy before returning home and vowing to his wife to never take his daughter shopping again.

story: Amy didn't have time to leave the store she worked at for lunch. A co-worker told her there was a deli in the store. At the deli Amy found a LeAnn Chin. She had no idea there was fast food Chinese food.
original_ending: Amy loved it so much she ate it the next day as well.

endings.ending: In the next day, Amy started to have diarrhea and needed to go to an ER.
She was so grateful that she decided to pay the lunch for everybody on the fast food.
The food made her really sick, so she left work early.
She couldn't buy herself lunch because she left her wallet at home.
Unfortunately, she became profusely ill and had to leave work early.
She ran into an old friend from high school there and really enjoyed catching up!

story: Our 2 year old granddaughter and her parents are coming from NYC. My wife decided to buy a new rug. She paid for the rug on Wednesday and said she would pick it up later. Our son went to pick it up and the clerk said to come back in 3 days.
original_ending: My son yelled at him and he found the rug.

endings.ending: Our son went back in three days and the rug still wasn't ready, so we decided to stop patronizing the establishment.
Three days later we had our amazing rug, but my granddaughter peed all over it.
He went home with no rug and told his mom that she had to wait.
The son told the clerk to refund the money and went to a different store and bought a rug to bring home to his mom.
My son comeback home whithout the rug.
My son come home with another rug.

story: I bought a new television for the big game. The television got to my house just in time. All of my friends came over and watched the game. Many of them commented on my new television.
original_ending: I am happy with my new purchase and I want to buy another.

endings.ending: I told them I had to wait in line for five hours on Black Friday to buy it.
Some of the guys wanted to know how I convinced my wife that we should buy it.
But when I went to turn on the game, the fuse blew and the tv shorted out.
But my wife kept making comments on how the tv was a waste of money.
At the start of the game the TV broke.
I decided that going into debt to by a new TV was not a smart idea.

story: My extended family was planning a visit to see me. I really didn't want to see them so I kept stalling. They really weren't happy with me but came anyway. We had a really good time during their visit.
original_ending: I felt really bad about not wanting to see them afterwards.

endings.ending: I felt bad but I don't want to see them again.
I felt very happy to have meet them.
I realized then that their company was good after all.
On the same day, we talked about it and we were fine.
A change my mind but probably will do the same thing in the future.
I still think that have be better if them not came.

story: Henry loved to watch the chipmunks playing in his yard. One day he decided to try to catch one and keep it as a pet. Henry built a trap and caught a chipmunk, but it tried to bite him! Henry was surprised and scared.
original_ending: He decided to leave the chipmunks alone from then on.

endings.ending: He decided to call an animal catcher to take the chipmunks away.
He went to his storeroom to get his father's gun to shoot the chipmunks.
He then released the chipmunk and realized they are happier free.
Henry put on some gloves and pet the chipmunk.
He let the chipmunk run free after the near bite.
He realized that trapping them is not so nice.

story: My brother and I came up with a great idea when we were younger. We cut up some slim jim sticks in small one inch pieces. Then we wrapped them like tootsie rolls in aluminum foil. We told all of our friends that we had made them ourselves.
original_ending: We would probably go to jail if we did that as adults.

endings.ending: One kid broke their tooth trying to bite down on one of the fake tootsie rolls and the prank got serious.
One of the kids told their parents about the fake candy's and we were expelled from school.
Our friends loved them and we started selling them after school.
The principal saw us handing them out and we were suspended for a week.
We sold out on our first day.
Our parents were proud of our creativity.

story: My best friend was from Spain. His family had me over to eat Menudo. I asked them fifty times what it was because I knew they ate strange. They just told me it was soup.
original_ending: I threw up after the third bowl when I found out it was sheep stomach.

endings.ending: It tasted very good
I never did find out what was in it
When I finally tasted the meal I loved it, and it ended up becoming my favorite dish.
I didn't believe them and decided to go eat at a restaurant, they got a little offended.
I immediately regretted after taking a sip off the spoon, realizing that it was made from octopus.
A bit hesitant at the beginning, I actually liked the taste of it to the point that I ate almost three bowls.

story: Jarvis woke up early on Sunday because of noisy birds near his window. He spent the morning running errands. Later during the day, he felt sleepy and took a nap. However, this made it difficult for him to sleep on Sunday night.
original_ending: As he lay in bed, he felt angry at the loud birds.

endings.ending: In the future he used earplugs
He eventually fell asleep
Eventually, however, he did drift off to sleep.
He didn't get a wink of sleep and was barely coherent at work the next day.
It took him another  week to get his sleeping pattern back right again.
The next day, he went to the store and bought some earplugs.

story: Ben went to the pet store to buy a parrot. He found one that he really liked. He bought the parrot and took it home. On the way home he talked to the bird.
original_ending: When he got home the parrot repeated what he had said.

endings.ending: Although, the bird never answered him back, Ben always knew he was a good listener.
He got so distracted by the bird, that he ran a red light and nearly had an accident.
And that was the last time that parrot ever said anything - bummer.
Over the next few days, the parrot became increasingly chatty and Ben realized how much smarter than him the parrot actually was.
The bird responded to Ben in a different language.
Ben later realized the bird was deaf.

story: This past weekend I took my children to a new playground. The equipment there was very fun and new. There were lots of things that spun and a really neat rope swing. My kids got kind of sick from all the spinning.
original_ending: It was still fun though and we will go back.

endings.ending: My kids started vomiting even before they got out of the ride.
The children recovered from the scare and enjoyed the day in a very happy way.
They threw up all over my shoes.
They thought it was hilarious and years later, still remembered the "dizzy rope swing" they had played on.
My kid threw up a lot and I had to clean the mess up which frustrated me a lot.
There're not many kids there so I tried the rope swing as well, I ended up feeling sick and threw up.

story: Alex had wanted a pet dog for her whole life. One Christmas, her family told her they had a surprise for her. Her parents opened the door to their room. Inside the room was a puppy!
original_ending: Alex was happy to have a dog of her very own.

endings.ending: The puppy ran up to her and licked her face.
Unfortunately the puppy ending up not liking her and bit Alex all the time.
Receiving the puppy as a Christmas present was so exciting that Alex peed on the floor.
Alex was quite moody and once he saw the puppy he decided he'd rather have a kitten instead.
Alex named her new puppy "Bella".
Alex cried tears of happiness and hugged her family to thank them.

story: Leah's family moved away to a new town. So, Leah had to go to a new school. She was nervous that she wouldn't make any friends. However on her first day of school her classmates were very friendly.
original_ending: Leah soon had a lot of friends at her new school.

endings.ending: Leah developed a crush on the cute boy next to her.
A group of girls invited her to the mall.
By the end of the day, she had been invited over to several girls homes to play.
Unfortunately, the teachers were not as friendly.
Managed to find one or two people that she was friends for for a while
But it turns out that none of them actually wanted to be her friendbut it turns out that none of them actually wanted to be her friend

story: Pam had a pen pal when she was 8. They wrote each other for 3 years. Pam suddenly stopped writing her pen pal. Ten years later, Pam ran into her pen pal.
original_ending: Pam and her pen pal are now best friends that hang out all the time.

endings.ending: Her pen pal walked into her prison cell and was to be her new cellmate: not the in-person meeting she had ever imagined!
Her pen pal was the young nurse admitting her to the mental health ward; embarrassed, she stayed silent about it and was grateful she had never sent a photo to her pen pal!
They had both changed so much that Pam didn't even recognize her and they passed without speaking.
They had a fun time catching up, but realized they had become different people that no longer had anything in common.
Pam gave her pen pal a kiss.
Pam's pen pal did not recognize Pam at all and gave her a weird look.

story: Someone sent me a new song to check out. I liked it so much that I turned the volume up. I must have turned the volume louder than I thought. The neighbors called the cops on me!
original_ending: I turned down the volume when they told me to.

endings.ending: I tried to explain but I was arrested.
I didn't talk to my neighbor after that.
The cops showed up and said I had a noise complaint filed on me.
I noted the volume on my device and made sure to keep it lower from now on.
I was annoyed they called the cops so I turned it up even louder.
The next time the neighbors had a party I was sure to call the police on them.

story: Sarah was not excited to go to school. She missed school due to having the flu last week. She had a week's worth of homework to make up. Sarah had to make-up 3 tests that day.
original_ending: She was so exhausted that she fell asleep on the bus back home.

endings.ending: Sarah ended up getting sick and had to miss more school.
Sarah just skipped her tests and got all F's since she hated school so much.
She wondered which test would be the hardest.
She tried to eat food for energy.
She slyly pretended to be sick again, so unable was she to face facts and do what needed to be done.
Because of lack of preparation and her lingering exhaustion she failed all three tests.

story: Mark is watching Mrs Debbie's dog, Ralf, when she's gone for the week. On the last day, Ralf escapes through the back door! Mark spends all day looking for Ralf. When he gives up, he finds Ralf waiting for him back at the house.
original_ending: Mark decides he doesn't get paid enough for this job.

endings.ending: Mark wanted to chain it, but it turned into a hairy man in his thirties.
Ralf was holding a strange token in its mouth.
He hugs Ralf and nails the back door shut.
Upon closer look, he finds it to be a different dog that looked like Ralf.
Mark gives Ralf extra treats and doesn't mention the incident to Mrs. Debbie.
Mark locks Ralf in his kennel for a few hours as punishment.

story: Kim ran to the store on her break at work. It was a warm day and she was wearing flip flops. As she arrived at the store it began to rain hard. She ran through the parking lot to get out of the rain.
original_ending: People stared as her flip flops squeaked in the store.

endings.ending: As she ran, she lost one of her flip flops.
She was soaked and very upset once she reached the door.
When she got to her car, she couldn't help but laugh, as she had an umbrella waiting in the front seat for days like this.
As if to spite her, the rain stopped right as she got back to work, and she cursed her luck and the timing of her break.
On her way to the door she fell and was helped up by the most handsome young woman.
Once inside the store she realized that this was not the place she intended to be.

story: Dan was tired of owning a clothing store. He decided to sell everything he had and go out of business. Dan put up big signs and ran a major sale. A lot of people came to buy his clothes.
original_ending: So many people came that Dan was sold out before closing time.

endings.ending: He decided afterwards that he would keep operating his clothing store.
Dan donated the leftover items to Goodwill and closed his store.
He got inspired by the big turnout and dropped his idea of selling his business.
He got a good profit and used it to start a new business.
He did not expect for everything to be sold out in under 30 minutes.
Dan did not realized his favorite pants was mixed in and ended up selling it .

story: Monee was mad after her day of work. She was punching the walls of her room. She also a grabbed a knife and was about to stab herself. I immediately ran and took the knife away.
original_ending: She came into my arms and I tried to comfort her.

endings.ending: Tragically, after I went to sleep she found the knife and stabbed herself anyway.
I took her to the hospital so she could get checked in for some psychiatric treatment.
Then I took her to a mental health care facility where she was put on suicide watch.
Then she punched me into the wall and broke my jaw.
Monee ran away from me screaming loudly.
Monee begged me to take her to a mental hospital.

story: Emerson went home early from work. He was feeling well so he took the rest of the day off. When he got home, his wife made him some soup. He enjoyed the soup from the couch before falling asleep.
original_ending: He felt much better when he woke up from his sleep.

endings.ending: When Emerson woke up, he realized that he had urinated deep into the couch while sleeping.
His mother gave him a bill for the soup when he felt better.
He went to the doctor the next day and found out he had pneumonia and couldn't return to work for a week.
A few hours later he woke up violently ill because the soup had given him food poisoning.
He was energized by the soup and went straight to the gym.
He drank the soup and criticized his wife for making it spicy which threw her in rage.

story: Tammy is very jealous of her friends new necklace. Tammy and her friend are hanging out at her pool Her friend goes inside, so Tammy throws the necklace into the pool. Tammy's friend thinks the necklace is inside.
original_ending: Tammy is happy her friend doesn't have the necklace anymore.

endings.ending: It ended up being broken so Tammy had to pay the full price of the necklace to her friend.
The necklace was no where to be found, and Tammy's friend later finds out that it was stolen and sold by someone who she thought was Tammy.
Surprisingly, the necklace lands on a raft and Tammy's friends exits the home to find it shimmering on the raft.
Tammy realizes she had made a mistake and dives into the pool to retrieve the necklace.
Tammy feels bad and tells her friend where the necklace actually is.
To Tammy's surprise, a young boy finds the necklace and hands it to her friend.

story: Sammy was camping with her friends. They had just set up camp near the base of a mountain. They were about to make a fire when it started to rain. Sammy and her friends had to get the fire going in their dry tents.
original_ending: They were able to rough the rain with the aid of their bonfire.

endings.ending: Since all the wood ended up being soaked, they were grateful they brought along a small propane heater for the tent.
Unfortunately, they built the fire too close to the tent and a gust of wind put one of the tents on fire, so they had to end their trip.
But then their tents caught fire and they lost all their food and clothes.
Unfortunately the fire caused a lot of smoke and they had to put it out so they could breathe.
They tried to get the fire going but the rain came before they could get it started.
They got the fire started just as the rain shifted away from them.

story: Jessica's grandma bred dogs. One day Jessica got to witness some puppies being born. She decided she wanted to have her own puppy to raise. She spent the day helping her grandma take care of the puppies.
original_ending: She realized it was a lot of responsibility and she needed to wait.

endings.ending: She loved caring for puppies and her grandma allowed her to bring her favorite one home.
She accidentally hurt a puppy badly, she ended up feeling sad and didn't want a puppy for now.
She couldn't manage to take care of puppies so she dropped the plan of raising a puppy.
She enjoyed taking care of them and soon she got one puppy in her home.
She took the puppies to a kennel.
The puppies did not like Jessica, so they started to bark at her.

story: Alicia and Kimberly had just gotten married. On a sunny Sunday afternoon they took a walk. Down a street they never saw before they noticed a tiny park. In the park was a pond that they sat next to until it was dark.
original_ending: From then on they visited that park every Sunday they could.

endings.ending: While leaving they found out someone closed the fence of the park from the other side.
While leaving the park they found an abandoned puppy under a tree.
As they were leaving, they noticed an alligator in the pond, which was unexpected as this was a fairly small pond.
They told their friends about the park and it quickly became popular through word of mouth.
As the stars came out they shared a passionate kiss and enjoyed the romantic location.
Thousands of mosquitoes came out as the sun set, and they ran from the park slapping at their skin.

story: We were driving through the Blue Ridge Mountains in the early spring. It was so beautiful, we decided to pitch our tent and spend the night. We had trouble starting our campfire, but finally got it going. We slept very well, in the fresh air, though we heard some odd noises.
original_ending: The next morning, the ranger told us that a bear had been spotted.

endings.ending: We loaded our packs and set out for the hike.
That's when we noticed some of our belongings missing.
Without even thinking twice, we packed everything in a second and we left.
Then I spotted two big red eyes looking at me through the bushes.
There was an owl who hooted for several hours.
In the morning we saw no animal tracks near our campsite.

story: Our granddaughter's name is Ilsa. The parents would not tell us the name before the baby was born. Everyone was waiting for the child's birth to learn her name. We were told she was named after Ilsa from Casablanca.
original_ending: As this is my favorite movie I was very pleased.

endings.ending: I was not happy with the name as it was very old.
Soon everyone started learning and called her Ilsa.
I had never see the movie Casablanca, so I had no idea who Ilsa was.
I've always hated the movie Casablanca, so I begged her parents to change her name, and they named her after me.
I did not like the name at all and wish I could've had some input.
I think the parents used one of my ideas I had given them earlier.

story: Tim was scared when he got a bike without training wheels. Tim's dad helped him get on the bike and going. Tim's dad let go and Tim fell over. Tim would not give up and got back on the bike.
original_ending: After some practice Tim was riding his bike all on his own.

endings.ending: Tim kept trying but would fail each time so he was very disappointed.
Tim and his dad decided to practice for a bit everyday after school so that he could improve.
Tim hurt his leg, though, and ultimately gave up trying to ride it entirely.
The bicycle got a flat tire on Tim's first successful ride!
On his next try Tim fell down and badly scraped his knee.
He couldn't catch his balance so he asked his dad to put the training wheels back on.

story: Olivia was carrying a hot bowl of soup. She tried to gently put it on the table, but it was too hot. She accidentally spilled the soup across the table. The liquid drowned a book she had left on the table.
original_ending: She tried to save it but the book was ruined.

endings.ending: The book soaked in the soup like a sponge and left the table clean and dry.
Luckily it had a water proof jacket that kept the book intact.
It only stained the pages but she felt kind of silly reading it through the soup stains.
She ended up having to buy the book again because it was her favorite book.
Luckily the hard book cover saved the book.
But fortunately it didn't get we due to the micro glaze coating.

story: George really like hot dogs. He saw a flyer for a hot dog eating contest at the state fair. George signed himself up and trained hard to win. On the day of the contest, he was totally ready.
original_ending: George got third place in the contest out of 80 people.

endings.ending: George won the first place among contestants.
George did a new record in the contest
But he saw a cute girl and would be embarrassed if she saw him eating hot dogs.
He won at the last second.
Then just as the contest was about to start George had a heart attack and had to be rushed to the hospital.
He ate fifty hot dogs in just ten minutes and was declared the hot dog eating champion!

story: Tammy fell in love with a pair of heels at the mall. They were perfect for the big dance coming up. She saved up for weeks to get them. When she went to the store they didn't have them in her size.
original_ending: She bought a bigger pair but couldn't walk in them.

endings.ending: She ended up ordering them online and got the size she wanted.
She bought a smaller pair, but her feet really hurt now.
When the delivery never showed up, Jenny's mom disputed the credit card charge.
It was a three hour drive in the car, but Jenny was thrilled with her perfect, new shoes.
She bought a smaller pair that hurt her feet.
She decided not to go to the big dance at all.

story: I sat on the living room with a Twinkie for a snack. The sound of the wrapper made my cat curious. My cat stretched and sniffed at my Twinkie. Then to my surprise he ate my Twinkie.
original_ending: Now I have to hide from my cat to eat a Twinkie.

endings.ending: My cat got sick that night and I regreted letting him eat it.
I laughed and decided to eat the next Twinkie in my room with the door closed.
I put the cat outside and then grabbed another Twinkie.
Then he went to the bathroom all over the floor.
My cat ended up getting sick.
I decided to sit at the table from then on when I ate something.

story: Amy was walking in the park when a leaf landed at her feet. She was surprised since it was warm enough not to wear sleeves. She then remembered it was in fact the middle of October. As Amy held the leaf she thought of how much she loved fall.
original_ending: Even though she loved fall she was sad to see summer go.

endings.ending: Amy began to wear sleeves from the next day.
Amy took the leaf to her home to show her family.
She got excited about the fall and started planning the holidays in her head.
That one leaf brought back many memories from last fall, she got lost in those memories totally forgetting about the leaving summer.
She thought about how much she loved Halloween and horror movies.
She knew that the new season meant she got to go shopping for new clothes.

story: Jimmy opened the door to go outside and play. But he left it open behind him. Soon, a flash of gold ran by - it was spot! The dog seemed hopelessly lost, but then a bark!
original_ending: The bark around the corner was spot, bringing a ball home!

endings.ending: Jimmy ran after spot, but couldn't catch him and he ran away.
Spot was chasing after a squirrel, eventually got bored, and came home.
The bark came from spot, he was signaling to come look at something.
Spot looked so happy to see me, I ran up to him and gave him a big hug.
The dog see a strange person close to the kid.
The dog is trying make the kid help him.

story: I decided to make breakfast for my mom and dad this morning. I made my favorite cereal as soon as I got up for my family. My mom and dad slept in and the cereal sat for an hour. When they got up they were very happy to see they had breakfast ready.
original_ending: They told me next time they will make breakfast and I could sleep in.

endings.ending: They didn't eat much of it because the cereal was soggy.
They appreciated the effort and thanked me.
But the cereal was congealed into a soggy mess and was unfit for eating.
They made a habit of it and I had to make breakfast for everyone everyday.
However, as they took a long time to wake up, the cereal was bad, and they didn't like the breakfast I prepared.
As a way of thanking me they took me to my favorite restaurant for dinner.

story: Bob packed a box to send to someone but had a problem. The box was too small for all the stuff he wanted to put in it! Bob looked around for a larger box to use. He noticed one which looked perfect had arrived that very day.
original_ending: Bob packed all the stuff into the new box and it all fit in perfectly.

endings.ending: Bob put all of his stuff in the box but when he picked it up everything fell through the bottom.
However as he got closer, he saw that the box already had a bunch of stuff inside it.
But there was a problem, Bob had forgotten that that box was already full, so he couldn't use it.
Upon inspecting the box more closely, Bob noticed that the box was damaged and had a large hole in it, so it could not be used.
Unfortunately, there was a huge spider hiding in it that made Bob scream.
He put all his stuff in there, and when he went to pick it up, the bottom disintegrated, scattering all his belongings onto the floor.

story: Allen was at the mall with his friends. He was waiting in line for the photo booth. All of sudden a girl with blonde hair and ripped jeans stepped out. Allen fell in love instantly as she walked past.
original_ending: He was so starstruck he couldn't even say hi as she walked away.

endings.ending: He awkwardly introduced himself, and asked the girl for her name.
He tripped and fell in his hurry to look at her, and she laughed at him.
Allen trip and fell and the girl laughed at him
Allan said Hi to the girl but she rejected him.
He stopped her and asked if she would take a picture with him in the photo booth.
He followed her through the mall and worked up enough courage to ask her if she would like to get some ice cream with him.

story: Manny was at the store with his mom. He noticed a book that he really liked and began reading it. When it came time to check out he asked if they could buy it. His mom said no because they couldn't afford it.
original_ending: Luckily, someone behind them offered to buy it for him.

endings.ending: Manny then decided to take it without anyone noticing.
Manny threw a tantrum until his mother gave in and bought it.

story: Max woke up and noticed he was late for work. He jumped out of bed and got dressed. Then, he quickly rode his bike to work. When he got there, he apologized to his boss.

story: Andrew realizes he has never been to his local park. He puts on his running shoes and walks over to the park. At the park he sees many other people walking and running. He decides to visit the park more often.

endings.ending: The next time he went he decided to bring his dog, but regretted it later because he got a ticket from a cop after finding out dogs were not allowed at the park.

story: Lou bought a newly constructed home. He already submitted a change of address form with the USPS. Lou checked his box everyday for a month and it was empty. He called the post office concerned and found that they had his mail.

story: Ricki liked going to her neighborhood pool in the summer time. Sometimes at the beginning of the school year they had no lifeguards. Many of them went back to school and were not available to work. Ricki thought it might be a good idea to become a lifeguard and help.

endings.ending: And just like that, Ricki discovered her life's calling.
But upon reflection, she realized that spending the day sitting on a high chair, squinting at children trying to drown each other might not be such a dream job after all.
She didn't like the lifeguard courses and decided that life guarding wasn't for him because it was too hard.
Life guarding became Ricki's favorite job ever and decided to make a career out of it.
Ricky decided to do it right away, but remembered he didn't even know how to swim properly.
Whils he was thinking, a small kid started to drown right in front of him, and he heroically saved him.

story: Julie wanted to go to the beach. She packed up everything and drove there. After a few hours, she had a feeling that she had forgotten something. Julie went home and saw in the mirror how red she was.

story: Sarah is a baby girl. She is happy most of the time. She has a brown swing that she loves to swing in. One day mommy took her swing away and she cried.

story: There was a storm where Lucy lived. And she saw a cat soaked in rainy. So she decided to take it inside. The cat was so adorable that she decided to keep it.
original_ending: But when she woke up the next day, her couch and carpet were torn.

endings.ending: The cat snuggles in bed with her and became her forever pet.

story: One morning we woke up and was hungry for waffles. We decided to get in the car to go to our favorite breakfast place. We had to drive over 80 miles to get there. It was worth the drive.
original_ending: I would happily make the drive for waffles every weekend.

endings.ending: However our car is getting old though so I don't know how much longer I can accord to make future trips.
We are thinking of inviting all our friends and family next trip so they can experience the amazing waffles.
On the way back, my car broke down and we had to walk the last 50 miles home.
Two hours after we ate, we both got food poising from the waffles and we've never eaten waffles again.
Soon they put a new breakfast spot closer to our home.
Sadly, it had closed down.

story: There was a boy who played out in the mud. His mom called him inside and told him to clean up. She had dinner ready and wanted to eat. He went upstairs and washed off.
original_ending: She was glad he cleaned up because his grandparents were in town.

endings.ending: After that he got dressed and came down for dinner.
By the time he was done, his family had already eaten dinner without him.
The boy came back downstairs and they had dinner.
When he came back, his mother was already eating.
Cleaned, he was finally able to have dinner and after dinner the whole family gathered to watch a movie.
After dinner his father helped him with his school homework.

story: Tina's cat narrowly escaped a car accident. Tina's mom told her that cats have nine lives. Later, Tina's mom heard a howl from the cat. She found Tina holding the cat under the faucet.

story: One day I decided that I wanted to learn to make pancakes. I found a pancake recipe in a book and made a list of ingredients. I went to the store to buy all of the ingredients to make pancakes. When I got back home I followed the recipe and made lots of pancakes.

original_ending: One day the egg hatched and Emily had a baby bird to care for.

endings.ending: In the end, the eggs never hatched, and Emily felt disappointed.
She came home one day and found that the egg had hatched but there was no baby bird to be found anywhere in her house.

story: Tony wanted to decorate his Christmas tree. He went to the attic and got all of the ornaments down. He opened the box and began taking out the ornaments. One by one, he hung all of them on the tree.

endings.ending: Tom's cat started playing with one of the ornaments that was on the tree.

endings.ending: I was so hooked that I didn't even go to work that day, and I lost my job.

My boss called in the middle of my last fight and I had to rush into work so I didn't lose my job!

story: One night the fan I use for white noise broke. I couldn't sleep for the rest of the night. I went to the store in the morning to buy a new fan. It was winter so no stores sold fans.

endings.ending: I checked a popular retail outlet online and was able to have one delivered the next day.

I remembered that I could buy it on Amazon.
I didn't sleep again that winter.

Now I listen to recordings of birds in the forest every night to put myself to sleep and I dream sweet, gentle dreams.

original_ending: Joey was really proud of himself that he was able to overcome his fear

endings.ending: With luck, she just got her clothes dirty.

It painted the staircase and we left it that way
Luckily it was sealed so it didn't go everywhereluckily it was sealed so it didn't go everywhere

story: Jessica and her mom were out paying bills. Jessica saw a dress she wanted in the store window. Her mom told her that she could not buy it right now. She came home from school the next day to find a wrapped box.

endings.ending: It was a gift card to the store from where the dress was from.

story: This girl at the daycare used to get horrible bloody noses. She would just run and run like a faucet. So I put on gloves. I got a damp small towel and folded it.
original_ending: I shoved it under her upper lip and the blood stopped.

endings.ending: I instructed the girl to lean her head back and hold the towel to her nose.
I cleaned her up the best I could and then called her parents to come get her.
She sat there pinching her nose and thanked me and we became great friends.
By the time I got back there was a big mess and I cleaned it up.
I handed her the towel to catch all the blood.
The girl thanked me and held the towel to her nose.

story: Amy was going to visit her friend who just moved. She looked up the address and thought she knew how to get there. While she was driving she realized that she was lost! Luckily she had her phone and she used the GPS to get back on track.
original_ending: In the end she found her way to her friend's new house.

endings.ending: She saw a bakery on her GPS and decided to pick up some treats.
She played her favorite song as she looked for parking on her friend's street.
A few miles from her friends house her phone battery died and Amy spent all night looking around searching for her friend.
Her friend called and suggested they meet at a restaurant instead, so Amy adjusted her GPS directions to take her there.
But then she made another wrong turn and realized she wouldn’t make it there in time.
While exploring the new route, she saw a house for sale that she liked.

story: My oldest child is so loud. She is so loud that it is hard to sleep when she is awake. We put the youngest down for a nap earlier. Our oldest started yelling at the top of her lungs.
original_ending: She woke up the baby and got sent to timeout.

endings.ending: The only way we have found to make her stop is to ask her to yell as loud as she can: it shuts her up instantly.
I can't wait until she's in school and is somebody else's problem.
She ruptured a vocal cord, and she was hospitalized.
Thankfully, though, our little baby never even woke up!
That was the day I enrolled her into gymnastics and she ended up being team leader of the cheer squad.
When the baby woke up and started crying, she ran in their room to sing them back to sleep though.

story: I always thought golf was for old people. One day, my dad invited me to play golf with him. I reluctantly accepted his invitation. On the golf range I saw lots of people my age.
original_ending: I realized golf was a sport for everyone to enjoy regardless of age.

endings.ending: They seemed unhappy to be there with their parents and grandparents.
They invited me to race the golf carts on the green with them.
Then I met some of them, and looking closer I realized that my perception had been wrong: these golf players apparently had quite convincing plastic surgery, they weren't young after all!
Then I remembered I was a young looking 59, and almost old myself: it was time to face reality!
I then started to take more interest in golf.
I asked someone there who is my age why they are into golf.

story: Beth was leaving work on Tuesday. She noticed a man dropped his wallet in the parking lot. She ran all the way across the lot to give it back to him. The man was so happy that his wallet was returned.
original_ending: Because Beth was so honest, he gave her 20 dollars.

endings.ending: To her surprise, the man accused her of stealing the cash he was sure that was inside.
Then, the cameras all came into view and she realized she was on a hidden camera television show.
He soon explained that he had recently lost his job and that every penny counted.
Beth then went home feeling content for the good action that she did.
He quickly grabbed the wallet and hurried on his way.
He thanked Beth and invited her to dinner.

story: Bill stood at home plate and awaited the pitch. The ball came at Bill faster than he ever seen. He gave a mighty swing and the ball went sky high. He was so stunned by his hit that he didn't run.
original_ending: The ball landed 4 feet away and he was tagged out.

endings.ending: The ball went so far that he had plenty of time to run all the bases before anyone could get the ball.
He ended up getting a homerun and the team all congratulated him.
Since Bill did not run the bases, his home run did not count in the game.
He was even more stunned when one of the outfielders caught the ball.
The coached yelled and Bill ran to get the first homerun of the season.
Bill fainted and went to the hospital.

story: Joey got home from work. When he walked into his house there was a strange smell. He could not find where the smell was coming from. He looked all over his house with no result.
original_ending: Than he found an old fish in his garbage can.

endings.ending: Just then his neighbor came over and had been cooking dinner for a large gathering...and invited Joey to come by.
Joey never did figure out where the smell came from but it was gone the next day.
Joey jaws dropped when he found out there was dead animal near his house.
When Joey took his shoes off he knew immediately where the smell was coming from.
Then, he realized he forgot to put the eggs back in the fridge.
Then, he found the dead rat.

story: Amy was watching TV when she found a scary movie. She and her brother watched the whole film. They each pretend not to be afraid. When it was time to sleep Amy was scared to go into her room.
original_ending: She fell asleep hiding under her bed with a flashlight.

endings.ending: She decided to spend the night downstairs on the sofa.
She and her brother stayed awake and played video games the rest of the night.

Amy's mother came in and scolded the children for watching a scary movie.

story: There was a snow storm last night. I peeked out my front door and saw the steps were covered in ice. I put on my coat and hat and scarf before going outside. I sprinkled salt over the steps and on the sidewalk.
original_ending: I won't fall when I walk to the bus stop to go to school.

endings.ending: My dog came over and licked up all the salt, ruining my hard work.
My brother walked up the steps and ended up falling anyway since I didn't put enough salt out.
However, I still slipped and fell on my way to the mailbox.
The next day it was 50 degrees and all the snow melted.
My dog ran out and slid right down the ice to the road.
My neighbor then asked me to salt his steps too.

story: Khalid was going to the beach on a sunny day. He got to the beach and the waves were very large. After going in the water for a bit, he decided it was too dangerous. Packing up all of his towels, he headed back to the car.
original_ending: When he got in the car, he saw storm clouds roll in.

endings.ending: Khalid then realized he had left the car keys inside the locked car.
He spotted a friend near his car and they drove to a bar together.
He decided to go to a movie instead on the way home.
As he was walking back to the car he saw the lifeguards rush to save someone caught in the waves.
He drove home satisfied with his decision to be safe rather than sorry.
As he approached the car he decided to turn back and sunbathe for a little bit since he already drove there.

story: Brett had a crush on a girl named Elsa. He decided to pass her a not that asked if she liked him too. He put a little yes or no box for her to check. He passed it to her and anxiously waited for it to return.
original_ending: Right before it reached him the teacher took it and threw it away.

endings.ending: When the teacher wasn't looking, he noticed it back on his desk with a big check mark next to yes!
At the end of the day, he found the note stuffed in his locker with the box next to no filled in.
When she received it she checked the No box and Bret was devastated.
By the time it got to Bret another student had opened it and read it rudely.
After seeing the note she looked back at him with a huge smile.
After seeing his response, she began to cry.

story: Nick came down with a very serious illness one day. His doctors told him that he may not be able to exercise again. Nick was afraid he would have to spend his life bed ridden. After a few hard months, Nick's health started to improve.
original_ending: Nick was so happy to be healthy, he started running every day.

endings.ending: However just a month later, his health started to deteriorate again.
He even signed up for the baseball team at his high school!
Nick's doctors told him it was a miracle for his improving.
Nick got sick and was once again bed ridden.
Nick decided to join a running club.
He left the hospital and booked a ticket to travel the world.

story: Lucius was asked to write a report on aging. He imagined his own life at 85. He thought of his grandfather, who has a simple but happy life. Lucius realized he didn't fear aging.
original_ending: He drove to his grandfather's house after school to be with him.

endings.ending: He then started to feel a little tired and decided to take a shower, and when he looked at the mirror he saw an old man.
But he also remembered his other grandfather who died at 60 from a lung cancer, he then trowed away his cigars and tossed the pack in the trash can, as he didn't fear only the good aging.
He wrote in his report about all the old people he knew seemed really happy.
He realized he just feared what happens when someone finally stops aging.
He tried to follow his grandfather's life.
He got better ideas from his grand father's life.

story: My dad got a new job across the country. He told my brothers and I that we had to move. I was so sad I would never see my friends again. Luckily, I was able to find new friends pretty quickly!
original_ending: Moving across the country was not so bad after all!

endings.ending: But I still miss my old friends from time to time.
But for my surprise, my dad got another job offer across the country and we had to move once again.
I even got a girlfriend!
I'm fortunate to have such good looks.
Then, it turned out they were two faced goblins who attempted to poison me at lunch.
I kept in touch with my old friends as well and our relationships have never been closer.

story: Tavon was a sweet boy, but he was very lazy. When it came to doing work at school, he hated it. He always had a hard time turning papers in. One day his teacher helped him clean out all the papers in his desk.
original_ending: Tavon had to stay in from recess to work on all the work he didn't do.

endings.ending: Tavon found some homework from a few weeks back he never turned in.
Tavon decided to never be that messy again.
She helped him to organize a system so he wouldn't miss any more assignments.
They filled an entire recycle bin with all the paper they cleaned out.
She discovered that Tavon had actually done all his work and it was really good, he'd just never handed it in.
With a more organized desk Tavon was able to focus better and he became a much better student.

story: I brought home a girl from the bar last night. In the middle of the night I woke up to her staring at me. I asked her why she was staring at me, but no answer. I shined my phone light in her eyes and all I saw were whites.
original_ending: This girl slept with her eyes opened, and I never called her again.

endings.ending: I could hear my friends in the closet laughing about a mannequin.
I took a plea deal and, with good behavior, I'll only have to serve five years in prison.
I immediately ran out of the house screaming.
The light hurt her eyes, so she insisted I turn it off.
It turned out the girl was having a stroke, so I promptly called 911.
As it turns out, the girl was possessed by a ghost who lived in my home.

story: A young African boy was walking in the jungle. The boy needed water for his family. He tripped on a branch suddenly and saw a mouse. The mouse looked at him and ran away.
original_ending: The boy was curious and followed and he found a watering hole.

endings.ending: He shuddered, thinking about how he did not like small rodents.
The mouse had been fleeing a small jungle cat, who know was feet away and staring hungrily at the boy.
The boy looked behind and saw a snake then he had to run away as well.
He followed the mouse and accidentally the treasure left by the mobs in the jungle, his family could live a good life now.
That's when he saw a small pond next to him.
He got up, cleaned his clothes and kept looking for water.

story: Sally got a new microphone for her birthday. She started singing into the microphone straight away. After three hours, she started to lose her voice. She had to put the microphone away until the next day.
original_ending: When she woke up in the morning she had her voice back again.

endings.ending: But the next morning, she found she had larangytis!
When she started singing again, her mom and dad burst into the room and started singing with her.
Her parents were so happy to get a break from her singing.
She decided to drink hot tea in between songs to help her voice.
She took it easy the next day and made a point to sing much more softly.
She knew her voice would get stronger and pushed herself to hit the three hour mark the next day as well.

story: Tammy and her family wanted to take a vacation this year. They looked around and decided to go to the mountains. It was very nice there and everyone enjoyed it. They had a great time at the cabin.
original_ending: The end of their trip came and they were all so glad to have come.

endings.ending: But on the last day a large mountain lion showed up at the door, forcing them to cower inside until a ranger came to their rescue.
The adjacent lake offered many fun water sports and everyone in the family learned a new skill.
The last day a tornado came through and went right by the cabin!
Tammy found a hidden lake and decided to move there one day when she was older.
They enjoyed this trip but they did not go back to the home because, they are sick in lockdown.
When they returned to home their home was firing by the gas leakage.

story: Alec loved to play with his ball. It was blue with yellow stripes. One day, Alec went outside with his ball. He kicked the ball so hard it went rolling down the hill.
original_ending: Alec ran after it and found it lying next to a tree.

endings.ending: He never found the ball again
He managed to find someone else's ball that was pure red
The ball rolled into a lake and Alec watched it float away.
The ball rolled into a cactus and popped.
The ball rolled into the street and caused a terrible car accident.
Luckily for Alec, an older gentleman saw the ball rolling and stopped it for him.

story: Amy used to have a crush on Ray. It was clear he wasn't into her. In the hall outside class he tried to get her attention. Amy pretended not to see him and looked at her phone.
original_ending: Amy felt nothing as she walked past him while he stood stunned

endings.ending: Ray came up and shouted at her to pay attention to him.
Amy looked at Ray again and thought he was cuter now after his new haircut, so she approached him.
Amy got butterflies in her stomach.
Amy really wanted to talk to him but she played hard for him.
Ray tapped her on the shoulders.
Amy quickly turned around and met Ray.

story: Erin was always losing things in her room. Her room was very messy and disorganized. She always started to clean but never finished. One Saturday she decided to spend the whole day cleaning her room.
original_ending: She found at least ten things that she had been missing.

endings.ending: While cleaning she found a book she had lost years ago and she was quite happy.
But her friends had movie plans and Erin as usual didn't finish her room cleaning.
The room was so messy she wasn't able to finish cleaning it.
She never let her room get messy again.
It took longer than expected as she had to stop and admire the many fun things she found!
She bought a set of shelves that really helped her become more organized.

story: Joe was sick and worried. he knew that his high school dance was only three days away. If he was still sick, his mom would not let him go! Then he began to feel better.
original_ending: By the night of the dance, he was well again!

endings.ending: The night of the dance came but he was still sick and stayed home.
The night of the dance came and Joe ended up picking up a girl on the way to the dance.
He met a girl at the dance.
However, because of COVID protocols, he wasn't allowed to go.
He was good on the dance night but unfortunately the event has got postponed.
But on the dance night, his partner got sick and Joe was really unhappy.

story: Jackie's garden was doing well. She had plenty of vegetables for her family and some to share. On Saturday Jackie took some cucumbers to her nextdoor neighbor. On Sunday, when she got home from church, there was a knock at the door.
original_ending: Her neighbor had made cucumber salad and had brought some to share.

endings.ending: She opened the door to see her mom on the other side.
She decided to ignore the knock and rest.
She opened the door and found her neighbor had gotten sick from the cucumber and wanted to see if she had used poisonous chemicals while gardening.
Another neighbor from down the street heard Jackie had extra cucumbers and wanted to know if she could have some.
The cucumbers had been filled with mites and the neighbor returned them in their unfortunate state.
The neighbor developed food poisoning from her cucumbers and her family was soliciting donations to pay for her medical treatment.

story: Louis loved to eat meatloaf. He made it at least once a week at home. One day Louis got really sick after eating his meatloaf. He was sick for a week and ended up having the flu.
original_ending: Even though Louis had the flu, he didn't eat meatloaf for a long time.

endings.ending: He found out the meat in the meatloaf was infected with a bacteria.
But Louis loved meatloaf so much he made it as soon as he recovered.
Soon after he got recovered, Louis proceeded to make a meatloaf for his dinner.
This was 2 years ago and Louis is eating meatloafs everyday ever since, saying no flu would take it away from him.
His mother was relieved it wasn’t food poisoning from her cooking.
Later, every time he ate meatloaf, he remembered how sick he was and how much his mom helped him recover.

story: For the first time ever I went to a country music concert. My sister loves country music and she had nobody to go with. I told her that I would go if she bought my ticket. To my surprise I actually had a good time!
original_ending: The music was better than I fought it would be for sure.

endings.ending: The music was okay but the people where friendly and lots of fun.
I think I have become a country music fan.
My favorite part was when my sister got called on stage and got to sing along with the artists.
I ended up meeting my boyfriend of 2 years now there.
We quickly searched for another concert to attend.
We made great memories, and looked forward to the next time we could get together.

story: Pat saw a hill in his backyard and hatched a plan. He dug into the hill to make a deep hole. He lined the sides of the hole with wood to make a room. Pat used this as his roots cellar for his food.
original_ending: He put a door on it and began to fill it with food.

endings.ending: One day it rained so much that his cellar turned to mud and collapsed.
He didn't put a good door on it and some animals came and took all of his food.
Pat was very happy to find a place to eat.
But he couldn't finish the room as there was no door.
However, worms got through the cellar and started eating his food.
Pat was able to keep all of his food safe from pests in the cellar.

story: Billy liked Christmas songs. But didn't know what a turtle dove was. He like turtle and knew they were green and had a shell. He also knew what a dove was, a type of bird.
original_ending: So he decided that 12 drummers drumming was a better part of the song.

endings.ending: He decided that a turtle dove was likely a flying turtle.
He pulled out his phone and looked up what a turtle dove was.
So, Billy changed the lyrics to ones he understood better.
So, he asked his mom exactly what a turtledove was because he was unsure.
Billy became a famous author after embracing his love for holiday traditions.
He went to ask his mother about turtle doves, but when he found her in the bathtub, she was dead.

story: Rachel had just moved into a new house. She had her own washer and dryer for the first time. She had built up a lot of laundry at her old place. As soon as she was moved in, she started washing the clothes.
original_ending: It took hours but she was finally able to clean all of her stuff.

endings.ending: The washer ended up leaking all over the floor, so she had to call a repair person.
She was so grateful to not have to go to a laundromat again.
Unfortunately for Rachel, the washing machine broke a little later, so she had to buy a new one.
As she had no experience with the machine, she used the wrong settings and ended up ruining a lot of clothes.
The moment she turned the dryer on, it broke.
She separated the clothes by colors to facilitate.

story: When you are on a boat with your friends. You can help them to not be sick. Last week my friends got sick and I helped them. I told them to breathe and stay calm.
original_ending: When we got in,  they didn't ride on the boat anymore.

endings.ending: Instead of them I panicked and got sick throughout the journey.
It worked and they enjoyed the boat ride, wanting more of such holidays in future.
They enjoyed the boat ride without problems.
We spotted a huge whale next to us.
They took deep breaths and ended up feeling much better.
They jumped off the boat in an act of desparation!

story: Merida had long red hair that she never combed or tied up. One day while running quite fast, she got her hair stuck in a tree. It tore out a chunk of her hair and also some skin. Merida had learned her lesson.
original_ending: Now she wears her hair in a bun or a ponytail.

endings.ending: Merida shaved her hair off.
Merida never ran ever again.
She went to her stylist and got her hair cut much shorter.
She now watchers her hair carefully when she does things like climb trees.
She has a permanent bald spot as her hair will not grow back.
She will walk from now on.

story: Todd took his dog to the beach. The dog ran around and smelled everything. The dog went in the water and got all wet The dog rolled in the sand and got all sandy.
original_ending: On the drive home, the dog got sand all over the car.

endings.ending: Todd then cleaned him up.
Todd had to take the dog to a pet store for a bath.
Todd had to brush the dog off before he could go in the car.
Todd decided to walk his dog home as he did not want sand and water in his vehicle.
The drive home felt a lot longer than it was because the dog really smelled and needed a bath ASAP!
While he was rolling around in the sand, he picked up a tick, so Todd has to make a pit stop at the vet's before going home.

story: Noah had been saving for a car for two Year's. Yesterday, on his birthday, his parents bought him a car. He was so excited he didn't know what to say! He got tears in his eyes and kept thanking them over and over.
original_ending: Then he took his parents and little sisters for a ride around town.

endings.ending: Noah then tried his car out for a test spin and ended up crashing into a tree.
Unfortunately Noah did not have his driver's license yet, so his parents prohibited him from driving his new car.
He backed the car out of the driveway and immediately crashed into a tree.
Noah's parents started to laugh and explained that the car was just a practical joke.
Then he got in the car and it would not start.
He took the car out and just as he left his driveway he was pulled over by the police.

story: Judy was walking down the street minding her own business. When a gentleman stopped her on the street. He asked her a few questions about herself. After answering the questions Judy is given a prize.
original_ending: Judy took her prize home and shared it with the family.

endings.ending: Judy was weary of the prize and threw it in the garbage can.
Judy was very surprised that the prize was real but she couldn't take it so she gave it back to the gentleman.
She then bought a new dress she had been wanting.
This gave Judy a new sense of confidence.
Judy was in shock over winning the prize she fainted.
The prize was a brand new car which Judy has been wanting.

story: Laura was completely relaxed lying on the beach. She set up a chair and spread out a blanket. She had been dreaming of this vacation for months. When it was time to leave, Laura was sad.
original_ending: When she got home, she started planning her next trip.

endings.ending: Laura decided she wanted to come back to this spot soon
Laura tried to think of a way she could stay another night, but realized she had work the next morning.
She realized she had forgotten to use sunscreen.
She wouldn't see her friend again until the summer.
Laura decided to book another week at the resort to prolong her vacation.
Laura posted pictures of her trip on Instagram to remember it always.

story: Evan wanted a pair of jean shorts for the summer. He shopped around, but every store was too expensive. Then he decided to try to make his own. He carefully cut the legs off an old pair of jeans.
original_ending: Soon he had a homemade new pair of jean shorts!

endings.ending: He accidentally cut the tablecloth that he was cutting on!
He didn't hem in the shorts, and they unraveled when he was outside!
Evan cut them too short and decided he didn't like how they looked.
After cutting the jeans Evan asked his mom to hem them.
He failed, and he had to throw it away.
He succeeded, and now he has a business of jeans!

story: The boy had wanted to wash their car for money. The man was angry at having been woken up for that. He locked the door and walked away. The boy rang the doorbell again.
original_ending: The man told him he would call the police if he didn't leave.

endings.ending: The man softened and gave him a fiver without him having to wash his car.
When the man didn't answer, the boy threw a brick through the car window and drove it to Mexico.
The old man told the boy to come back on Monday because the car wash is closed on the weekends.
There was no answer so the boy rang the doorbell a few more times before giving up and leaving.
The man gave up and let the boy wash the car.
The man called the boy's parents to complain.

story: Ivy wanted to date Jason, but her parents said no. They thought he was a bad guy. Then Ivy set up a meeting between her parents and Jason. They decided that Jason was charming and polite and after all.
original_ending: They told Ivy that she was allowed to date him after all!

endings.ending: However, they still did not allow her to date him as they felt he was too old for her.
Then he started swearing at them over a minor disagreement, and they decided their first impression was an accurate one.
But they still didn't want him to date her
They decided to let her date him but they chaperoned
However, her parents still decided that she was too young to date and told her to wait 2 more years.
Ivy's mom thought Jason was so cute that she asked him on a date herself.

story: It was that time of the year again. The pond's were beginning to freeze over. The boys were excited to go out and ice skate. They tested the ice to make sure it was safe before skating.
original_ending: It looked good and they were off ice skating the day away.

endings.ending: The snow storm came and didn't let them skate.
When the boys climbed onto the ice, one of them fell and was badly injured.
A crack in the ice made everyone nervous.
The boys picked teams for an ice relay race.
When the ice proved dangerous, they went home instead.
It seemed safe, but one of them fell through the ice when they started skating!

story: Robert never knew what to give his wife for her birthday. So he asked his secretary to choose for him. He came home with a nice box packaged for his wife. She opened it and frowned.
original_ending: Inside was a card signed by his secretary telling her everything.

endings.ending: The box was completely empty.
The gift had a price tag on it.
Inside the box was a pair of men's rain boots.
Inside was only a card, not a birthday card, but a Christmas card.
The gift consisted of nuts and other foods the wife was allergic to.
Robert had allowed the secretary to spend far too much money on the gift.

story: The old farmer had two mules and one plow. Both mules like pulling the plow for the farmer. Each day the farmer worried about which mule to used. One morning he saw both mules standing together.
original_ending: He got the idea to hooked both mules to the plow.

endings.ending: He tried to hook both mules to the plow but they walked in different directions and almost ruined the land.
He checked mules and found one was bleeding, he had to call the vet immediately and canceled the work plan that day.
He hooked up one mule and the other one walked alongside.
So the farmer decided to let them take turns pulling the plow.
They were looking intently at each other, pawing the ground,  and making growling sounds.
They were staring in horror at something in the field.

story: My Mom read that raw milk was a healthy food. She found a farm that sold raw milk. We have been drinking it for 12 years. Our cat got sick and we fed it some raw milk.
original_ending: It helped him get better without going to the vet!

endings.ending: unfortunately the cat did not survive.
the cat became addicted to raw milk.
The cat licked up a bit of the milk then slunk away.
The cat lapped up the raw milk because it was so tasty.
After a week the cat died.
Now the cat drinks raw milk everyday.

story: I love going for walks during the winter. I have a lot of fun walking in the cold air. Last night though, it was way too cold. I my ears got very cold and I cut my walk short.
original_ending: I'll never go on a walk in the winter again.

endings.ending: I take my winter walks during the day now.
I bought a new coat that is warmer for my walks now.
I decided to go home and wear more clothing then headed out again.
I told myself that i would drink something warm before i head out the next day.
When I got home, I made myself some hot tea and waited for the weather to get less cold before going out again.
But today the day is not so cold so I will be able to enjoy the day better

story: Harry Henry decided to take the day of work and go fishing. He arrived at his favorite spot, only to find too many people there. He went to a new spot and was worried he would catch nothing. But each time he threw in his line he immediately caught a fish.
original_ending: After catching fifteen catfish, he decided to go home and clean them.

endings.ending: He found a magical spot and was able to make a living off of the fish he caught.
It turns out he was catching the same fish over and over again.
The last fish he caught was magic, and granted him three wishes.
He caught too many fish and overfished the lake, causing the fish population to die out.
It made him feel like it was almost like the fish wanted to be caught, which was a bit depressing.
He got more and more excited thinking of how he would tell about it to his friends.

story: Nina told Colleen she found a tiny black kitten named Marie. Marie was found shivering outside with a huge 150 pound dog. Colleen remembered dreaming about a black cat the night before. They both thought it was a sign.
original_ending: So Colleen gave the orphan kitten Marie a loving home.

endings.ending: In her culture, the dream meant she’d come into money.
The cat, however was carried away by the dog, meaning Nina was going to have to chase!
Colleen told her friend about the animals and her friend decided to adopt both the kitten and dog.
Even though Colleen really wanted to help the animals, she knew her house would be too small to keep them in.
They thought it's not a good sign dreaming of a black cat so they sent the cat to the animal shelter.
They took Marie home but next morning Marie just disappeared mysteriously.

story: Tina had to write a great essay to get into college. She was worried because she doubted her writing skills. She decided to write about her own life. She did her very best on her essay.
original_ending: She was delighted to hear the college had accepted her!

endings.ending: Unfortunately your essay was not approved.
she did so well that they invited her to write a book.
Unfortunately she was correct about her writing skills, and she had to go to the local community college instead.
Not only did she get into the college, but her essay was published in the New Yorker!
The college mailed back and said although they enjoyed her essay they regret to inform her that her application was denied.
Tina never got a response back.

story: Lucy was straightening her hair with a flat iron. The iron was hot, but she was careful. She dropped the iron by accident and burned her forehead. If her grandma saw the burn she would take the flat iron.
original_ending: Lucy wore bangs for a week to hide the burn.

endings.ending: Lucy wore a hat to disguise the burn until it healed.
Her grandma came home early, saw the burn, and took away the flat iron forever.
Knowing that her grandma would find out anyway, Lucy took the flat iron to her and told her what happened.
Lucy wore heavy makeup for a week to disguise the burn, and told her grandma that it was a bruise rather than a burn.
Lucy started wearing hats all of the time, so that her forehead would never be visible.
Later that night Lucy's grandma saw her forehead, and never let her straighten her hair again.

story: I was writing on a rainy evening. I heard the rain and found it inspiring. I decided to open my window to hear it better. I got up and opened up the window.
original_ending: I sat back down and listened to the rain while I wrote.

endings.ending: Immediately, a bird flew into my room.
Then, it stopped raining.
A giant wind gust blew in and knocked me down.
Right as I opened it a humming bird flew in.
But the rain got through the window and soaked my carpet beneath the window.
Instead the sound of the rain made me sleepy so I went to bed to sleep.

story: I lost my dog about a month ago. He had ran out of my house and never came back. We put up signs and had people looking for him for 3 long weeks. As I was walking in my neighborhood one day I saw him!
original_ending: A neighbor had taken him in, apparently he had lost his collar.

endings.ending: I ran up to him but sadly he ran away as fast as can be.
He ran up to me and started licking my face and I was able to bring him back home.
My neighbor had adopted him and claimed he was their own.
He was rabid and I had to put him down at the vet.
As I got closer, I realized that although very similar, it wasn't him.
But he ran away again and I never saw him again.

story: Gina was watching a show she really liked on TV at her uncle's house. That is until her mother was ready to go home. This was the first time Gina wanted to stay at her uncle's house. And now she had to leave.
original_ending: She was sad to leave her show, but she went with her mother.

endings.ending: She then asked if she could sleepover her uncle's house and she finished watching the show.
They left and Gina was quite annoyed with her mother.
She was so excited when her uncle offered to drive her home after the show was done.
To her surprise, she found her mom had recorded the same show, so she could watch it at home.
So she laid prone on the floor, refusing to move.
Her uncle promised to tape the show and let her watch it next time she visited.

story: On our way to a party the car stopped dead on an isolated road. We got out to relax by the creek while waiting for someone to pass by. We got hungry so we made picnic from the food we had for the party. Robert's brother played his guitar while his girlfriend sang.
original_ending: The car started right up and made it home like nothing was wrong.

endings.ending: We remembered the party and got back on track.
The weather was so good that we stayed there until sunset.
We were having so much fun that when a car finally came we just let it pass by.
Finally a car came by and we invited the driver to come to the party with us.
We all heard some eerie noises in the woods nearby and decided to lock the car and run to the party!
We all enjoyed ourselves so much that we decided to camp there for the night and forgot all about the party!

story: Rowan walked happily down the block. It was the last day of school and he was walking home finally. He walked passed the park and the little creek in front of the park. He walked passed the neighbors house and waved to Steve, the neighbor.
original_ending: Finally, he reached home and was ready to start summer vacation.

endings.ending: Rowan tripped and fell, breaking his arm, and ended up spending the summer in a cast.
Steve told him that his son would be doing summer school with Rowan.
When he got home he made himself a cooler and went back to have a picnic by the creek.
Steve invited him for a BBQ which was a perfect way to start the summer break!
Steve invited him to play for the remainder of the day.
Yet, when Rowan came home he discovered a list of chores waiting for him.

story: I called my mom to pick me up from school. She said that she had an important meeting and wasn't able to come. A few hours later, the school closed down. A teacher asked me if I needed a ride home.
original_ending: I told her yes and she was kind enough to take me home.

endings.ending: I told her no and kept waiting for my mom who eventually showed up 6 hours late.
The teacher wasn't able to drive me because she lived in the wrong direction, but she did call an Uber for me and I got home safely.
When I said yes, she laughed and told me that's what school buses are for.
I lied and said no because I was embarrassed.
I turned the teacher down and ended up making tater tots in the school cafeteria for dinner that night.
Now, I live in foster care and only see my mom once a month.

story: Jenny hadn't seen her friend in ages. She had two weeks vacation saved up and decided to go visit him. Jenny didn't think her car would make the long trip. When she told her friend this he offered to come and get her.
original_ending: Everything worked out and the two had a great vacation together.

endings.ending: On his way there, her friends car broke down and they had to take a bus to the nearest mechanic.
Jenny refused because she remembered she had extra airline miles on her credit card that she could use to book a flight.
Sadly, his car broke down on his way to come and get her.
Once he showed up, they decided to just stay at her house and visit for the two weeks there.
She agreed and he picked her up.
She said no and decided take a bus

story: Sophia was on a soccer team. They were in the middle of a game. The team had been losing and the game was almost over. Suddenly, Sophia had the ball and decided to try for a goal.
original_ending: She made the shot and her team gained enough points to win.

endings.ending: She kicked the ground before the ball and tripped just as the whistle blew to signal the end of the game.
Just as she went to take the shot, a defender tackled her and stole the ball.
