Despite her best efforts, the chore list was so long that she failed to finish before her friend arrived.
Carelessly, while hurriedly dusting, she knocked a vase on the floor and it shattered into a hundred pieces.

story: On Monday, I had to board a plane at 6 pm. Not wanting to be late, I asked Tom to give me a ride there by 5 pm. Tom told his boss he needed to get me to the airport by 4 pm. On Monday, Tom showed up at my house at 3 pm to pick me up.
original_ending: We got to the airport at 3:30 pm where I waited for over 2 hours.

endings.ending: Then we got into his car and it did not start.
There was a huge traffic jam and we were still late.
We had a flat tire just a few blocks from my house and I missed my flight.
He got me there with plenty of time to spare and I had a great trip!
Thankfully we got there early because the boarding was early as well.
Unfortunately, the flight was cancelled and i needed to get a ride back home.

story: When I was a child, me and my cousins used to stay at my grandparents. We would stay all summer long, having the times of our lives. One year, my oldest boy cousin was on a ladder picking cherries. I was feeling onry, so I knocked him off the ladder by shaking it.
original_ending: My cousin chased me around with a baseball bat for an hour.

endings.ending: He fell and broke his arm and I felt really terrible about it.
His parents were so mad that they had me arrested for attempted murder.
My cousin broke his arm when he fell.
I was then grounded for a month by my parents.
When he broke his arm and had to go to the hospital, I felt horrible, and never engaged in horseplay again.
He tackled me and made me eat three rotten cherries which made my stomach ache the rest of the day.

story: Once, when I was younger, my friends and I were in the car. My friend Dan was driving us to our friend John's house. Dan decided he wanted to "spin the car out really slowly", for fun. Of course, the car got stuck in the snow.
original_ending: We all had to dig it out, but we all had a good laugh.

endings.ending: There was a police car sitting nearby watching traffic that saw the whole thing. We  ended up getting a ticket.
We had to call emergency services to help us get the car out.
We had to stay the night in the car trying to stay warm until someone came to help the next day.
We all got angry at Dan and never spoke to him again.
I vowed never to ride with Dan again.
I had to call my parents to come get us.

story: I once bought myself a basketball because I loved to play. I use to take that basketball everywhere. The basketball was like my best friend. I had it for three years.
original_ending: So when I lost the basketball I was very sad like I lost a friend.

endings.ending: When I finished my college, I lost interest in basket ball and gave it to my brother.
My friend stole it from me when we got into a misunderstanding and till now not able to get back my basket ball.
One day the ball went into the street and got crushed by a car.
Finally I bought a new one that I liked even better.
After two months of losing the ball, it came out of nowhere when I saw the kids in the basketball field on the street playing with my ball, then I became happy again to see them.
Even though it saddened me a while and I still miss it, I decided to buy another ball from the same brand and I'm happier than ever with my choice.

story: Cora was starting her job as a kindergarten teacher. She worked that her young students wouldn't like her. But her first day went very well. All the kids had a great time.
original_ending: At the end of the day, they all told her how much they liked her!

endings.ending: Cora died on the way to the hospital in an ambulance after getting in a car accident on her way home from work that night.
Cora was fired from her job after the children alleged that she had touched them innapropriately.
However Cora was still dealing with her confidence issues.
Cora was so happy to hear this so she brought all the students cupcakes the next day.
The children sang a song to her as they left that day.
One of the children ran up and gave her a big hug when they left.

story: My cousin Tony wanted to do a mac & cheese. Tony said he could make the best of the family. My aunt Jean made a mac & cheese as well. The family gathered for dinner to taste.
original_ending: It turns out that no one could do it right like aunt Jean does.

endings.ending: Tony's mac & cheese by far better and he boasted to everyone.
Both tasted identical and they realized they both used the same recipe!
Well, this time Tony won handly.
Tony might have won if he hadn't forgotten about the salt.
Everyone was impressed with Tony's mac & cheese including aunt Jean.
It turns out nobody liked either mac & cheese.

story: Lisa was learning how to use roller blades outside of her house. But a small dog began to chase her. Lisa didn't have time to take off her roller blades. So she tried to skate as fast as she could.
original_ending: When she turned around, she was surprised by how far away the dog was.

endings.ending: She skated towards someone she saw on the street that helped her stop the dog from chasing her.
Lisa ended up falling and the dog started licking her and barking.
She didn't look up and crashed straight into a street sign.
The dog caught her up and started running alongside her for fun.
Lisa fell and scraped her knee.
The dog eventually caught up with her.

story: Bobby and Susie were best friends in first grade. Their parents came to pick them up from school one day. Susie asked if Bobbi could come over for a playdate. Susie's dad said it would be fine if Bobby came over for a while.
original_ending: Bobby and Susie then had a great time playing at her house!

endings.ending: Unfortunately, it was the same day Susie's relatives came to visit and it was chaotic.
While Bobby was there, he finds out his mom wasn't feeling well so he had to leave right away.
Bobby had to be home for something important that day, so they scheduled the playdate for tomorrow instead.
Bobby was ecstatic and this solidified their long lasting friendship.
On the day of the playdate, Bobby woke up with a cold and had to cancel their date.
Once Bobby arrived, he and Susie got in a big fight over one of Bobby's toys.

story: Tim's father baked a cake for Tim's birthday. Tim brought the cake to school. And he told his teacher that it was his birthday. At lunch, students were allowed to line up to eat the cake.
original_ending: After school, Tim found the cake in a trash can.

endings.ending: By the time it was Tim's turn the cake was all gone!
Tim got to be first in line since it was his birthday.
Everyone loved the cake and Tim told his father when he got home.
There was not enough cake for everyone and some of the students were disappointed.
Kids loved the cake and Tim's father got many letter asking him to bake a cake for their children's birthday party.
Kids hated the cake, and teacher found  it in a trash can, but luckily she hided it from Tim to avoid the disappointment.

story: Jon's phone broke, so he had to get a new one. He spent several hours driving to the nearest Apple store. When he got there, he found out what the prices of the phones were. He ended up paying, begrudgingly.
original_ending: In the end, he felt that it was worth it.

endings.ending: Being an Apple loyalist, he felt he had no choice in the matter.
As fate would have it, his new phone broke only two weeks later.
This time he bought phone insurance and wished he had done it the first time.
Later Jon realized he could have had his phone repaired for half the price and instantly regretted buying the new phone.
He wasn't happy with his new phone but decided to keep it anyway.
He drove home bitter about all the money he had spent.

story: Jane wanted to surprise her husband who was coming home from the army. She thought of what her husband would want. She bought him a new tv because she knew that he watched a lot of tv. John came home and was surprised at the new tv.
original_ending: However, John had bad news which was he had to go back in a month.

endings.ending: John loved the new TV and thanked her for it.
She later found out John had started a new hobby and did not watch TV as much as he used to.
He had been trying to save up for one for many years.
The new television, though, had a crack in the screen.
He watched a war movie and started crying.
He was grateful that he had a good wife.

story: I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar. My dad gave me his old guitar but it just sits in my room. I asked a buddy of mine to give me private lessons. He spent all summer teaching me how to play.
original_ending: Now I'm just as good as he is at playing!

endings.ending: Unfortunately, guitar just wasn't my thing and i never got the hang of it.
Although i didn't have enough time to practice because of school, i gave the guitar to my brother.
Later in the year, at the school talent show, I was able to wow all of my friends.
Despite his lessons, I simply had no talent for the guitar and promptly gave up.
I just wasn't picking it up, though, so I decided to stop playing.
We formed a band together and we play every weekend.

story: Joey was excited that a new family was moving in next door. He took his basketball over when he saw there were two boys. The three kids went to the playground and played hoops for an hour. Joey invited them over for dinner since they hadn't unpacked boxes.
original_ending: The three boys became the best of friends that first day.

endings.ending: But their mom forbid them to go into Joey's house.
The kids ate a meal then went to play D&D in the basement for hours.
They boy's were rude to Joey's mom and told her that the food was bad.
The boy's parents wouldn't let them stay and told them to come home.
Unfortunately, the food was bad and made all of them sick the next day.
It was then that Joey realized the must have sprained his ankle.

story: Jeff showed up to school with very messy hair. His teacher handed him a brush and sent him to the bathroom. Jeff brushed his hair for nearly 10 minutes. When he came back the teacher was pleased.
original_ending: She told Jim to hold on to the brush just in case.

endings.ending: Five minutes passed and Jeff's hair went back to being messy again.
Jeff found a new passion for styling hair and dropped out of school to become a hairdresser.
The teacher asked all of the students to give Jeff a round of applause.
Jeff promised to put more effort into his grooming in the future.
The teacher asked Jeff out on a date and the two of them really hit it off.
The teacher was not pleased with Jeff's homework though, and Jeff spent the afternoon in detention where he contracted COVID19.

story: Tina went to a birthday party. At the party, there was a great variety of snacks. She ate several helpings of her favorite kind of chips. When she got home, her stomach hurt terribly.
original_ending: She realized it was a bad idea to eat so many chips.

endings.ending: The pain was so terrible that she went to the ER, it was appendicitis.
The pain relieved after a while, and Tina decided to go out and buy more chips.
She don't regreat anything.
She will don't do that again.
She later found out that one of the bags of chips had gone bad and that may of been the cause.
She decided to never eat chips again.

story: Gina had been trying to like the 2nd song on a single she bought. It was from an artist she liked. But the song just wasn't her style. She finally gave up and played the other song on the CD.
original_ending: Gina realized she may not want to buy a whole album from this artist.

endings.ending: The other song ended up being the continuation of 2nd song from the single, leaving her displeased.
The other song didn't let her down and she enjoyed it to the fullest.
While she didn't like the single, the other song was even worse than that, so she decided to give the single and the artist one more chance.
She realized that it was a relief indeed when she stopped to play, and the other song gave her a bit more relaxation after the distress.
Gina loved the other song and shared it with all of her friends.
Gina started dancing around the living room until her parents walked in.

story: Monica was putting her baby down for a nap. She laid the baby in it's crib and tried to leave. The baby started crying immediately. Monica had so stay with the baby or else he would cry.
original_ending: It took nearly thirty minutes to get him to go to sleep.

endings.ending: Monica shortly discovered the baby was crying because it was hungry so she fed it.
Monica was so tired she crawled into the crib with the baby and they both slept all night.
This went on all week and she finally realized her baby was teething.
She really needed to get some work done though, so she put a life-sized mannikin in the room with the baby hoping to distract it just long enough.
Monica then knew it was time for her to get a babysitter.
Monica didn't get any sleep that night.

story: Zoey's mom told her they could go pick out a new dog today. Zoey was so excited she ran to the car. They got to the pet store in no time. Zoey found a beautiful French Bulldog that she loved.
original_ending: Zoey's mom paid for the French Bulldog and they took him home!

endings.ending: But the bulldog hated her and started to bark and growl at her.
It belonged to the owner so she had to settle for a cat instead.
as he was too expensive Zoey couldn't keep him.
unfortunately he already had an owner and Zoey was sad.
Zoey's mom looked at the price of the French Bulldog and decided they couldn't afford it, so she got a poodle.
They ended up buying the French Bulldog and liked it so much they bought four more the next day.

story: Jacky is out doing some shopping one day. She decided to stop by a clothing store in the mall. As she leaves the store she sees a dog in the window of a pet shop. She decides to go inside and look around.
original_ending: She falls in love with the dog and takes him home.

endings.ending: As she reaches down to pet him, he bit her!
However, when she walked in, the smell of the store was so disgusting, she decided to leave immediately.
It turned out that the dog was her best friend's which had run away from home!
For some reason, the dog would only growl at her so she thought it better not to adopt it.
Jacky hates dogs.
Jacky notices that this was her dog that was lost for 1 month!

story: Gina was at the CVS near her home. She waited in line to purchase her candy bars. The woman in front of her was purchasing candy. As she spoke Gina recognized her voice.
original_ending: But the woman was gone before she realized it was an old friend.

endings.ending: When Gina realized it was her bully from high school, Gina hid in a nearby aisle until the woman left.
It was her old piano teacher, and Gina set up a date to catch up with her later.
Gina approached the woman in front and started a conversation.
Gina left the store ignoring the familiar voice behind her.
AS the woman turned around, Gina recognized her as her neighbor.
The woman was a local TV personality, and Gina recognized her immediately.

story: Ashley likes to take her dog Cora for a walk in the afternoons. Cora minds really well, so Ashley doesn't use a leash. Last Saturday, Cora saw a squirrel and ran out in the road. Luckily she didn't get hit by a car.
original_ending: Ashley now puts Cora on a leash when she takes her outside.

endings.ending: So Ashley decided she would bring treats next time to get Cora's attention.
Ashley wanted to make sure Cora is only paying attention to her before she leaves Cora unleashed.
After nearly being hit, Cora no longer runs into the street.
Now Cora keeps her dog further away from the street during their walks.
Ashley decided in the future that she will only let Cora run within her fenced in yard.
Cora caught the squirrel, and proudly ran back with it and tried to give it to Ashley.

story: One day Jordyn was watching her fish, Richard, swim in his tank. She decided that Richard must be lonely all by himself. Grabbing her purse, Jordyn ran to her car and drove to the petstore. At the petstore they had so many colorful fish to chose from!
original_ending: The lady at the store helped her find the perfect new fish.

endings.ending: She excitedly chose the biggest and most colorful one of all, but when she got it home it immediately swallowed poor Richard.
She couldn't make her mind up between all the possible selections so she purchased a 20 gallon tank and bought some of each to keep Richard company.
She couldn't decide so bought a parrot instead.
She bought a bigger tank and ten new fish for him to be friends with.
When she returned with a colorful fish, she couldn't find Richard in its tank.
She found a fish that could change its color and bought it immediately.

story: One morning, two friends decided to go to a horse show. They weren't very experienced at riding but one day hoped to compete. They saw a wide variety of horses of different sizes and colors. The two friends had a lot of fun watching the different events.
original_ending: At the end of the day they left the show very excited about riding.

endings.ending: Then they discussed which where their favorite horses.
Then the two friends got into a fight on the way home.
One of the jockeys invited them to try out riding, and they got to experience racing on a horse.
After the horse show they went home and signed up for riding lessons.
They decided to steal one of the horses so they could train.
One of the people competing let them ride a horse and compete themselves!

story: Last day of school in Kindergarten all the students were given a toy. My toy was a little package that said 'Rattlesnake Eggs.'. It came with a rubber band and a piece of plastic. I did not understand how the toy worked and I was very upset.
original_ending: When I got home my Dad showed me how to set up my toy and I was happy.

endings.ending: I threw the toy out.
One of my friends offered to trade toys with me and then I was happy.
It turns out there were real rattlesnakes in them!
I threw the toy away.
So I decided to change it for my friend's toy without him knowing.
I explained the situation and asked for a new toy, my request was granted, and now I am happy.

story: The other day I took a train ride into the city. When I showed up at the train station it was very busy. It took a long time to find my seat on the train. When I got on the train it took forever to get moving.
original_ending: Once the train got moving the trip wasn't so bad.

endings.ending: The old man next to me fell asleep.
I decided to read a book to past the time.
I ended up playing games on my phone and missed my stop.
A funny lady started talking to me on the train and we ended up having a great conversation.
The train trip was miserable, I got motion sickness.
I was so tired that I ended up sleeping the entire trip.

story: George was nervous about going to school. He had never been away from his mom for a long time like that. His mom tried to make him feel more comfortable but it didn't help. When it was time to go to school George saw his teacher.
original_ending: She looked so nice that he forgot he was even scared to begin with.

endings.ending: She was old and very scary looking and George started to cry.
His teacher was a giant armadillo and George was very excited to go to class!
Then he ran crying back to his mom.
She looked like she had never had a days fun in her life, which scared little George more.
The teacher was a little scary which made George even more uncomfortable, and he started crying.
To George's surprise the teacher was his old nanny, so he felt comfortable going to school.

story: Jacob had never been to a bris before. He was very nervous especially because he had to hold the baby. When it was time for the ceremony to begin, he fainted. And when he came back to, it was over.
original_ending: Since then his friends make fun of him, but he's happy he was out.

endings.ending: The baby demanded to know why Jacob had allowed the ceremony to be performed.
Jacob admired his wife for being able to carry on when he was unable.
But the rabbi was hovering over him with concern while his cousin held the now bawling baby.
He vowed to close his eyes during the main event if he ever had to attend another ceremony like this one.
And this scene will always be remembered at parties.
When he woke up he was in a bed being medicated, his pressure had dropped.

story: Jessica and Robert had the day off from work. They had tickets for Disneyland and decided to go and take their son. They took their son on all the rides until they were all tired. They went on one last ride and left the park to go home.
original_ending: They talked about how much fun they had and then went to sleep.

endings.ending: They couldn't wait to come back again tomorrow for day two of their Disneyland vacation.
Robert then suggested they do this more often since they live close to Disneyland.
There son talked all next week to his friends about the trip he had at Disneyland.
They decided they were going to get season passes to Disneyland and go more often.
On the way home they stopped for dinner and dessert.
They took the long way home to feel the cool breeze in the car.

story: Sam can't sleep at night. He is afraid of the monsters under the bed. Dad tells him there is no such thing as monsters but it doesn't help. So Dad gives him a blanket and tells him that it's a magic blanket.
original_ending: Sam believes that he is protected by the blanket and he sleeps well.

endings.ending: Sam doesn't believe his Dad, and asks him to sleep in Sam's room to guard him.
Sam wraps the blanket around his feet, and goes fishing off the edge of the bed to bait the monster.
Sam laughs at his dad and says magic isn't real.
Sam thanks his dad and instantly wraps the blanket around himself.
Sam told this story to his own child when he passed down the beloved blanket when his son had a nightmare, too.
When the magic blanket ended up getting left behind on a vacation, Sam's dad had to frantically search for a replacement one to buy.

story: Hallee and her friends are excited there is a big snowstorm coming. While they are in school, it starts to snow. Their teacher tells them there will be no school the next day. Hallee and her friends are so excited for a snow day the next day!
original_ending: After school, they go outside and play in the snow!

endings.ending: They decide to meet up at Hallee's house and spend the whole day playing video games together!
Hallee and her friends were working on a big project for science class, and were grateful for the extra day to finish it.
Halle’s friend brought a sled and crashed into a tree stump.
It snowed so hard that nobody could leave the house
The next day it didn't snow at all.
The next day there was a tornado not a snowstorm.

story: I have been skipping rocks at the lake. At first I was not very good. I have been practicing and I am becoming very good at it. I can skip the rock eight times before it sinks.
original_ending: My goal is to skip a rock ten times before the end of the summer.

endings.ending: I decided that this was a fantastic waste of time and never skipped rocks again.
Then, I made it across the lake and hit a woman on the other side.
I learned that the flatter the rock, the more times it skips.
It's getting boring so I will probably stop trying to skip rocks before the summer ends.
I skipped the rock once thirteen times but couldn't do it again however hard I tried.
My boyfriend was quite impressed and wanted to try it.

story: Dan was glad to see the sun shining after the rain storm last night. Dan decided he would go outside and enjoy the sunny day. However, when Dan got outside, he knew he was going back inside. While it was a sunny day, it was a cold day as well.
original_ending: Dan was mad that he could not enjoy the sunny day like he planned.

endings.ending: Dan decided to binge watch a new TV series instead.
Dan hoped that it would be warmer tomorrow.
Before Dan could return indoors, he noticed that it had started snowing.
It was in fact so chilly that Dan came down with a cold for the remainder of the week.
Then dark clouds began forming in the sky overhead.
Suddenly, thunder erupted and it began raining.

story: Tori decided to take her dog on a walk. They walked 4 miles in the cold weather. She froze the whole time. When she got home, she felt like she was getting a cold.
original_ending: Tori decided that she was going to wear more layers next time.

endings.ending: Tori made herself a hot tea and got under a comfortable blanket.
She took some vitamins and made sure her dog was warm.
She made an appointment with her doctor the next morning.
She made hot tea and drank it by the fireplace.
The next morning, Tori didn't wake up.
Her dog cuddled up to her and Tori started to feel warm.

story: I thought it would be nice to drop in on family last weekend. I drove an hour away to where my aunt lives. When I got there nobody was home. I called to see what was going on.
original_ending: Apparently they had the same idea and were visiting me at home.

endings.ending: My aunt picked up the phone and told me they were on the beach.
They told me they had gone to the store and would be back soon.
It turned out that they had moved to a new home and I had heard about it which made me feel left out.
My aunt said that she was out shopping but would hurry home to see me and that made me happy.
I found out my Aunt had moved to Florida the week before but no one had told me yet.
There were hanging out in the backyard and had not heard the doorbell ring.

story: Joe never had grown anything before, he planted seeds for sunflowers. Joe was so excited when they grew. Joe watched them everyday and was proud of them. Eventually they became so tall they were 7 ft tall.
original_ending: They grew so much the weight of the flowers made them fall over broken.

endings.ending: Joe was featured in a local paper for his amazing sunflowers.
Joe was very proud, and took pictures to show everyone.
They kept growing and growing until he couldn't see the top of them anymore.
All of a sudden they started talking to him.
Instead of sunflowers, they gave out hibiscus which confused him greatly.
He won the prize for the tallest sunflower plants in the country.

story: Alice had very long hair. One day, she decided to get it cut. She was nervous because she'd never had short hair before. The whole time she was in the barber's chair, she was nervous.
original_ending: However, when she saw her new short hair, she loved it!

endings.ending: After the haircut, Alice saw herself and freaked out because her hair was so short now!
Alice tripped and fell on pieces of her cut hair after the trim was done due to nervousness but ended up feeling okay with her new short hair.
She was so nervous that she ended up passing out and had to be awakened by a paramedic.
She was surprised to see that her hair had been cut into a mohawk, and began to laugh at herself.
Just as she'd feared, the new cut made her look like she'd escaped from prison!
The barber sensed her tension and was extra gentle while cutting her hair.

story: Jack got really sick. He had to stay in bed for three days. He could not leave the house for another week after he got out of bed. Jack really wanted to get out of the house.
original_ending: Jack made sure he would wash his hands so he would not get sick again.

endings.ending: He had no groceries and was close to starving to death.
He hadn't seen his girlfriend that whole week and had planned on proposing to her the day he got sick.
So he went out on the town even though he was sick
He managed to get somebody to come and take care of him so that he could leave the house
He snuck out while his wife wasn't looking to get some fresh air.
He decided to sit in front of the living room window to watch people pass by.

story: Sam was only four years old when he decided to plant a tree. His mom helped him plant it in the front yard and take care of it. Over the years Sam's tree grew with him. Many years later Sam was an old man and had grandchildren.
original_ending: He gathered his family by the tree and had a photograph taken.

endings.ending: The old tree had rotted and died but Sam was still going strong!
Sam decided to plant a tree with each of his grandchildren to teach them valuable life lessons.
When he passed away, his grandchildren constructed a memorial bench around the tree.
Sam made a tire swing in the tree for his grandchildren and they loved the tree as much as Sam did.
They built a treehouse on that tree, which is used by his grandchildren.
Sadly, the tree fell over during a recent storm, devastating the family.

story: Blake was out late last night. He was partying until the wee hours of the morning. Blake crashed when he got home. He woke up to his alarm clock but it was 2 hours past his wake up time.
original_ending: Blake rushed to work and hoped he wasn't in trouble.

endings.ending: Blake got wake up at right time to go to work.
Blake got a permission from his manager for his delay.
He decided to sleep more and then he would think about how to solve it.
He called the boss and said he was on his way and it wouldn't happen again.
He was fired when he finally got to work.
He called in pretending he was sick.

story: Joe had his day off and was ready to relax. He got a call from his sister to see if he can take care of her kid. Joe said yes he can. His sister dropped off her kid .
original_ending: Joe took care of of the kid for the rest of the day.

endings.ending: Together, Joe and the kid then decided to go get some ice cream.
Joe then picked out a movie to watch with the kid.
But the kid did not want to stay with Joe at all.
They planed monopoly together and had a very fun day.
Joe was annoyed at having to take care of the child.
Joe called his mother and asked her to take care of the child in his place.

story: Ned lived in a quiet neighborhood without many kids. He always wished that there were more kids to play with outside. One day, he left his house and saw that a new family moved next door. He walked over and met a boy named Harry who was his same age.
original_ending: They spent the afternoon jumping on Harry's trampoline and had a ball!

endings.ending: However, Harry said he did not want to play and went inside.
Harry and Ned became best friends for the rest of their lives.
Unfortunately Harry's family didn't like how Ned dressed, and forbid Harry from playing with him.
Harry's family invited Ned inside for a sandwich, and then they played video games.
But Harry was strange and often mysteriously spoke in bleeps and boops, for Harry was not a real boy but a sometimes malfunctioning android.
They became fast friends after discovering their mutual love for exploring the surrounding wild fields and forests.

story: When I was 6 years old, a dog followed me home from school. This dog became my best friend of all time. Her breed was a Boxer, which is a protective, family oriented dog. Unfortunately, someone stole her from our backyard when I was 12.
original_ending: I will always wonder what happened to Gertrude the Boxer dog.

endings.ending: I have hope to find her soon.
I am asking help to my parents to trace her.
We managed to find and get her back
Fortunately the police found her for us
I still miss that dog to this day and hope she is okay.
I got a new dog to replace my missing dog and I love him so much.

story: Becca really wanted a kitten for Christmas. She wrote a letter to Santa saying a new kitten was all she wanted. She hinted about a kitten to her parents every day. Becca even drew pictures of kittens and hung them all over the house.
original_ending: On Christmas morning, she awoke to a little kitten in her bed.

endings.ending: Sadly, though, Becca was allergic to cats and so could never have one.
Unfortunately, Becca's parents got divorced just before Christmas so they all forgot about it.
Her father got her a dog instead because he was allergic to cats.
Becca threw a tantrum when her parents said she was too irresponsible to care for a pet.
Becca was a sad child that Christmas morning because there was no kitten.
Becca's mom was allergic to cats so she told her that she would not let Santa bring her a kitten.

story: Ted took his entire family to the park for a fun day. The family decided to go canoeing down the park's main river. While in the canoe, Ted's youngest daughter fell out. Ted saw an alligator approaching as he tried to rescue his daughter.

endings.ending: She almost drown before a brave park ranger dove in to save her.

He was relieved to see that it was just a wooden log.
The alligator came near the daughter but mysteriously went away leaving her to be rescued by Ted.
He managed to jump in front of her to save her
He grabbed her at the last moment but her shoes got eaten

story: Mattie could not wait to get her very first library card. As soon as she ran into the library, the librarian gave her first card Mattie ran up and down the library aisles to find the perfect books. It must have taken hours for Mattie to decide on what she wanted.
original_ending: By the time she walked out the door, she had 10 books in her bag.

endings.ending: When she left, she had one perfect book.

She had a great big pile of books she wanted to check out, but decided to only take a few with her for now.

She was so exhausted from the excitement that she found a corner and took a nap.
When she went to check out, the librarian gave her a special bookmark to commemorate the occasion.

story: I got up from a nap feeling very hungry. I walked into my kitchen and began to look for a snack. Suddenly I saw a rat running through my cabinet. I closed the cabinet and quickly called an inspector.
original_ending: After the inspector arrived and killed the rats, I felt very happy.

endings.ending: The rat had eaten all the food in the cabinet, so I went a restaurant to eat instead.
Before the inspector arrived, my cat found the rat and killed it.

I'm terribly afraid of rats, so I decided to stay with a friend until the inspector ensured me the rats were totally eradicated.

But the inspector showed up drunk and without his tools.

story: She begged her mommy not to do it. Her mom told her it was okay, and that it wouldn't hurt. She loved her mommy so much, she kept crying over and over. Her mom told her to stop crying it would be over soon.
original_ending: The little girl couldn't look as mom's long pretty hair was cut short.

endings.ending: It turned out getting her ears pierced didn't hurt as much as she thought.
Pulling the band-aid off quickly didn't hurt at all!
The little girl got her hair cut and it wasn't painful just like her mom said.
The mom held the little girl on her lap so she would sit still for the hair cut.

story: Maya looked at her arms and felt they looked blank. She went to a tattoo parlor to make them look better. For her left arm she got a green tiger. On her left arm she got an image of a lightning bolt.

endings.ending: She became sad when she realized her shirt's were all long sleeve and no one could see that tattoo's.

And every month she makes a new drawing.
Unfortunately at work she has to cover the drawings.
The tattoos came out looking so go she ended up going in next week to tattoo her legs.

story: Ben saw a squirrel in his yard. He went into the kitchen and found peanuts. He went to the squirrel and fed it peanuts. He continued to feed the squirrel until the peanuts were gone.
original_ending: Ben's mom was shocked to see that there were no more peanuts.

endings.ending: The squirrel looked like it had a tummy ache and climbed a tree and slept the rest of the day.
He looked around the kitchen but couldn't find anything else to fee the squirril.
The squirrel came back the next day looking for more peanuts but Ben didn't have any more.
The squirrel returned to his tree fat and happy.
Little did he know the squirrel was hiding the peanuts in a secret place nearby.
The squirrel got so full he didn't eat for the next three days.

story: Jake was a good dancer but he was shy. He wanted to ask Mary to the school dance. Every time he saw her he got shy and didn't ask. The day before the dance Mary asked Jake.
original_ending: Jake said yes and he showed Mary how to dance.

endings.ending: Jake said "no" because he was too shy about actually going to the dance.
Jake said yes and then Mary revealed it was just a prank.
Jake was still too shy and he told her he couldn't help.
The two soon fell in love and started dating.

Jake's friends laughed at him for letting a girl ask him to the dance, but Jake was too smart to listen to them and said yes.

story: I went to a piano concert and fell in love with the instrument. I decided to take lessons so that I could play as beautifully. I practiced every day for years. My instructor said I had become a great pianist.
original_ending: I finally had my own piano concert after all that work.

endings.ending: I performed in front of family and friends and they loved it.
I now teach some children freely who loves to play piano.
I decided I wanted to expand my musical abilities by learning how to play the guitar, as well.
I ended up playing a song I wrote for my significant other at our wedding.

story: Sally's child lost her toy teddy bear at the mall. Sally called the stores in the mall where they visited. One of the stores had the bear. Sally and her child drove to the mall and got the bear.
original_ending: They drove home and had dinner and went to bed.

endings.ending: The bear had an eye missing and Sally's child burst out crying.
Sally was so happy she gave the store owner a $10 reward.
Sally was so happy she began to cry.
On the way home, they got in a fender bender.
That night the bear started talking to Sally.
It was the wrong bear and Sally threw a fit.

story: John saw a woman attempting to change a tire on the side of the road. John pulled over, getting out of his car to ask if he could help. The woman asked him if he could change the tire for her. John began to do this when he realized the woman got in his car.
original_ending: She drove away with John's car and wallet and pride.

endings.ending: He was angry, but the he realized his car was warmer, since it was cold out.
She apologized, also explaining she had locked herself out of her car and wanted to stay out of the sun.
John quickly got in the girls car and they both had a new for the day.
She was just exhausted from trying to change the tire and needed a place to sit and rest without disturbing her car while John changed the tire.
John lost himself and he accidentally shot the woman which led to serious injuries.
The woman regretted immediately because she found out John's brother was sleeping on the back seat.

story: Addie was at the zoo with her family. They were looking at giraffes when one came up to the fence. Addie pulled up some long grass to feed the giraffe. She was shocked by its long purple tongue.
original_ending: It wrapped it around the grass, taking it from her hand.

endings.ending: She started crying because she got scared as soon as the tongue got close to her.
Addie laughed as the tongue tickled her arm as the giraffe went for the grass.
The giraffe's tongue automatically went toward her hair since it thought it was grass and Addie's hair got all slimy.
The giraffe had enough to eat and ignored the grass, making Addie sad.
She cried after being so shocked by the tongue.
She refused to touch the giraffe's tongue and made her mom feed the giraffe.

story: My son and I woke up late this morning. He was hungry so I made him breakfast. While we ate we played a game together. I had some good moves but my son had even better ones.
original_ending: I lost so that meant that I had to clean up afterwards.

endings.ending: However, I was able to beat him in the end and he got really mad.
When he beat me I threw my toast at him as a joke.
I was patient though and ended up winning the game.
I had my son teach me some new moves he had learned from his friends.
He gloated about his win all day.
As the winner, I told him I would take him shopping at the mall.

story: My friend told me about a new bar in town. We drove around trying to find it and saw it was packed. We parked and went inside the bar. My friend saw a handsome man who she liked.
original_ending: The man walked up to my friend and gave her his number.

endings.ending: After approaching him and chatting him up she realized he was transgender, which made her challenge her own thoughts on the issue, would she still pursue him or not?
She approached him and chatted him up, he flirted with her mercilessly, but then revealed he was the boyfriend of an old friend of hers:  what would she decide to do, she wondered?
She ended up asking him on a date and he said yes.
Sadly the man had no interest in her and ignored her all night.
She was to embarrassed to talk to him that night but made me promise we would go back next weekend.
She started to talk with him but he had bad breath and she lost interest in the man.

story: I have a huge Disney bag that I bought five years ago. I've been using it ever since I bought it, and it hasn't even faded. I keep it in my closet when I'm not using it that day. I want a new one, but I love this one too much.
original_ending: I am keeping the bag to give to my daughter someday.

endings.ending: Then one day the bag ripped open.
One day someone stole the bag from me.
I will probably use this one until it wears out.
I will get a new one and use both.
My siblings snicker and say I’m too nostalgic.
Later in life, I realized that bag started my hoarding tendencies.

story: Sally had a birthday coming up. She was excited about her party and gifts. When she got to her party there was a table full of gifts. She could not wait to open the biggest one.
original_ending: It in was the most perfect purse and she was so happy.

endings.ending: The biggest one had a microwave in it but she already has a microwave.
The gift was a new stereo and they all danced to the music.
It was simply the biggest TV ever!
It was the worst gift ever, a pair of socks!
Sally unfortunately got a microwave from someone when she already had one.
Sally got a big record player and was disappointed since she never uses records.

story: Shelly's aunt had sent her a nice package. Inside the box was a ton of packing styrofoam. When Shelly wasn't looking her children dug into the box. Soon there were bits of styrofoam all over the place.
original_ending: It took Shelly weeks to clean and still little pieces were left.

endings.ending: Shelly screamed at her children and sent them to their rooms.
She decided to turn it into a game and soon everyone was playing with pretend snow.
It looked like snow and Shelly took nice pictures of the room.
Shelly decided to return the package to her aunt but ended up shipping the children along with it.
Then she heard the youngest child choking, and realized he must have swallowed one!
Shelly was surprised to find that there was nothing else in the box other than the styrofoam.

story: I went to the hardware store to buy some wood. I bought enough wood to build my own house. The wood had to be delivered by truck to my plot. I began to make walls with the biggest boards.
original_ending: After the walls were finished I put a roof on it and it was done.

endings.ending: Unfortunately the truck did not deliver all the wood.
A storm prevented me from finishing the construction of the house.
The wood started to break tho, and I realized that I was scammed with rotten wood.
When I was nailing one of the woods, I nailed my finger instead and needed to go to an ER.
I did not know the wood was from a magical forest and it began to transform itself into a castle.
It turned out I only had enough wood for one wall and went back to the hardware store.

story: I was in my friend's backyard by a pool. I put on a silly voice and jumped into the pool. After jumping in, I remembered that I left my phone in my pocket. I climbed out of the water to check on my phone, but it was broken.
original_ending: I had to leave my friend's house to get a new phone.

endings.ending: I used my friends phone to call my mom and have her pick me up.
I dried off and drove to the phone repair store to drop it off.
I saw my friend's phone on a chair and stole it while they weren't looking.
Luckily I'm rich and have three more just like it.
Luckily my friend had a spare phone and told me i could have it.
Fortunately my friend's dad knew how to fix phones and helped me fix it right away!

story: Jeff has to fire Scott because he never shows up to work. At first Jeff was nervous and didn't want to upset Scott. The day that Scott was to get fired he called in sick. This upset Jeff because he needed Scott to be at work that day.
original_ending: This made Jeff's job a lot easier to fire him because he was mad.

endings.ending: Scott ended up quitting the next day.
It turns out Scott was suffering from cancer and didn't want to let Jeff know.
Jeff decided to give Scott one more chance to prove himself.
Jeff drove over to Scott's house and told him that he would be fired, and that his decision was final.
Jeff fired Scott immediately but he felt regretful after hearing that Scott's wife was in ICU that day.
Surprisingly Scott called Jeff to quit that day, saying that he no longer needed to work because he just won the jackpot.

story: Amy and her friend were riding bikes on a summer afternoon. They decided to ride to her friend's cousin's house. There was a steep hill which was hard to ride up. Amy was sweating and panting as she rode up the hill.
original_ending: Amy ended up walking the bike up the hill instead of riding.

endings.ending: She ended up making it to the top and felt accomplished.
Amy almost passed out upon completion.
She pushed herself to the point of break and passed out before making it to the top.
Amy believed in herself and made it over the hill, though she really needed to do laundry afterward.
Amy realized that she needed to lose weight.
Amy's friend's cousin offered them some water as soon as they got to her house.

story: Bill sat in his favorite chair in his living room reading a book. Out of nowhere, he wondered if the oven was still on. He put his book down and went to the kitchen. Bill opened the oven and jiggled the oven dial.
original_ending: The oven was off but he was glad that he checked.

endings.ending: He caught it just in time as it had been on for so long that it nearly started a fire!
The dial broke off in his hand and now he had an even bigger problem to worry about!
It turned out the oven had been on, and he was thankful for remembering.
The cookies he had been baking turned out perfectly.
The oven appeared off but Bill smelled gas so as a precaution he left the house and called the fire department.
The oven turned out to be on and Bill was relieved that he had checked so he could shut it off.

story: Laura wanted to swim. She was told not to go in the lake because it was too cold. Laura thought it was warm enough, so she jumped in the lake. The lake was very cold and she got chilled.
original_ending: Laura ended up shivering, wrapped in a blanket for hours.

endings.ending: She quickly swam a few laps to warm her body up, then jumped out and dried off.
She got out quickly, redressed and pretended like she had never been in the water.
Laura ended  up getting sick because she did not think carefully
A lifeguard had to save her out of the water.
She ended up getting hypothermia and had to go to the hospital.
When she came out of the lake she had ice all over her bathing suit.

story: Jack and Diane decided to catch fireflies together. They both grabbed two jars and poked holes in the top. they placed hundreds of fireflies into the jars, creating lanterns. They ran around in the field, using the lanterns as flashlights.
original_ending: At the end of the night, they let the fireflies go.

endings.ending: When they saw the fireflies were all dead in the morning, they vowed to never capture them in jars again.

The light was weak and they could only see in front of then, and they soon got lost.
After a long night they realized they were now far away from home, in a strange place they never been before and and an old giant person greeted then in an unknown language.
All the fireflies die.
He keep the fireflies to herself.

story: To the horse lay on his side in the midday sun. Sarah went in for a few minutes and then came back outside. Teo was lying half way out of his corral! Sarah watched as Two inched along on the sand.
original_ending: Minutes later and Two was out, shaking off the dust out of his mane!

endings.ending: Soon the horse breathed its last and died right then and there.
A car came along and hit the horse.

Teo dove back into water and swam with a shark.

story: I was riding on the bus today. A person bumped into me. The person who bumped into me started to hurry off the bus with my pur I screamed to the bus driver to not let him off.
original_ending: The bus driver kept the door closed till the police came.

endings.ending: But he got away and I never saw that purse again.
When the bus driver tried to stop the thief, the thief threw my purse at him and ran off!
The thief ran out the door before it was closed and I never saw my purse again.
The thief ran out the door but was later apprehended for robbing a store.
Passengers helped to catch the person.
The person asked excuse to me and return my thing.

story: Bob collects old model cars as a hobby. He told me he doesn't have a favorite but I'm not sure that's true. Yesterday I heard him talking with his friend on the phone about cars. Bob told his friend that a 57 Chevy was his favorite car.
original_ending: I wonder why Bob didn't want to tell me that.

endings.ending: I think Bob must have a really bad memory.
Bob must have been trying to impress his friend for some reason.
I realised that Bob was lying to me to hide his favourite car.
I stopped talking with Bob as he lied to me.
I think maybe Bob is starting to get a little senile.
I bet his friend has a 57 chevy and he just wanted to fit in.

story: Mike wanted to earn a pizza party at school. In order to do so, he needed to get good grades. His grades so far had been not so great. That month, he worked as hard as he could.
original_ending: Luckily, he got his grade up high enough and earned the pizza.

endings.ending: But still he couldn't get good grades and he started to hate pizza.

He asked his teacher the type of pizza she liked and when he got the pizza he told his teacher they were on a date.

story: Today I have been working on the alphabet with my son. He has learned the first three letters. Today we are working on the fourth and fifth letters. He has been a little frustrated, but he keep on trying.
original_ending: By the end of the day he had learned the new letters.

endings.ending: He is a quick learner and I am sure he will catch on soon.
Imagine my surprise when he walked into the room and recited the entire alphabet.
So I stopped for an hour and we were playing, until he asked to come back and managed to do the new lyrics.
So we go back to practice only the ones he can already do.
He learned the next two letters by the end of the day, but when we went back to review the first three, he had forgotten them!
Since he's so young, his attention span is short, so after a few more minutes, we stopped and decided to play with blocks.

story: Jim was excited to buy himself a new toy. He had 22 dollars and rode his bike to the toy store. Jim picked out a toy that cost 21 dollars and fifty cents. When he got to the register, they wanted 22 dollars and ten cents!
original_ending: Jim had forgotten about tax, luckily a nice man gave him a dime.

endings.ending: Luckily the seller gave him a discount and he can afford it.
He asked to save his purchase, he ran home and asked his mother to find out what was missing, so he came back and could buy it.
Jim argued about the price but got disowned by the owner saying that it was a old discounted price, and he has to leave the store empty handed.
But to his surprise the owner offer a special discount of ten cents just for him and he left the store with a big smile on his face.
The store owner was kind and sold it to him for $21.50.
He came back the next week with enough money to afford the toy.

story: Logan was a rat terrier dog who was pretty large in size. He was a grumpy dog who thought the world revolved around him. When he got old he forgot that he could jump on the furniture. He wanted his owner, Bob to pick him up and set him in the chair.

story: Claire wasn't sure what to buy her dad for Christmas. She thought long and hard. Then she decided to get him a fancy new tie. On Christmas she happily handed her dad his gift.
original_ending: He told Claire it was the nicest tie he'd ever owned!

endings.ending: Claire was lazy and didn't know how to wrap gifts.
Claire's dad smiled even though he hated receiving ties.
She was disappointed to see that her did wasn't as impressed with the gift as she'd expected.

Her father very happy and hug her daughter at this moment.

story: Nick saw how hard his single mom worked to care for her two sons. So one week, he decided to help her out. Every night he bagged up the trash and took it out to the can. At the end of the week he took the can to to curb.
original_ending: Nick's mom thanked him for the work he'd done all week for her!

endings.ending: Nick decided he would start helping with dishes too.
One night Nick saw a dog eating the trash outside their house.
But he accidentally tipped over the trash can, spilling trash everywhere.
His mother never once expressed appreciation for it, though.
Nick also planned to cook his mom an elaborate dinner.
Nick knew that if he helped his mom she would give him money to go to the movies.

story: Ava and her brother were playing baseball in the backyard. Ava's bat smashed the ball - which broke the window next door! No one saw it happen, but Ava decided she had to do the right thing. She left a note explaining and apologizing.
original_ending: Later, the neighbor came over to thank Ava for her honesty.

endings.ending: Ava never heard anything back from the neighbor.
The neighbor was furious and demanded the kids pay for the damage.
The neighbor was incredibly angry at Ava's carelessness and sued her family for thousands of dollars, which depleted her college fund.
She never heard anything back because when her neighbor went on vacation the day before, his plane crashed and he died immediately on impact.
The neighbor then sent Ava's parent's the bill for a new window.
The neighbor was upset and scolded Ava.

story: I took tap dancing up when I was a young girl. My first dance recital was coming up, and I was scared. I was too young to know how to mentally prepare. On the day of the recital, my mom gave me a good pep talk.
original_ending: This prepared me for the recital, and I did really well.

endings.ending: It turns out my concerns were valid as I bombed the recital, but I never lost my composure thanks to my mom.
My fears immediately subsided, and I suddenly understood the impact my mental outlook has on my feelings.
Unfortunately my anxiety took the best of me and everything she said came out the other ear.
The talk didn't really help me but i forced myself to do it anyway and did a great job.
Yet, the pep talk actually made me more nervous than anything else.
As a result, I ended up being cast by a Hollywood scout who was in the audience.

story: Lisa's mom promised her a new bike if she got all A's. She worked harder than ever. When she got her report card, she had four As and one B plus. She was so disappointed she wouldn't be getting her bike.
original_ending: Her mom was still proud of her grades, so she got it anyway.

endings.ending: She had to settle for a scooter, instead.
She vowed to get better grades the next year!
However, she knew that a deal was a deal, and she accepted that her Mom would not buy her the bike because of the one B.
So, Lisa decided to steal a bike from the store instead.
She cried herself to sleep that night but stubbornly vowed that her next report would have the grades she needed.
But she made a new deal with her mom, that if she worked even harder and earned the A's on her next report, she'd get an even better bike than the one first promised.

story: My mom wanted to go to the state fair with me. She wasn't sure if she'd get the time off from work so she was upset. When her schedule came out she was happy to see that she got it off! She also wanted to go with my girlfriend and me but that can't work.
original_ending: She decided to just go to the state fair with me instead!

endings.ending: So she get upset at the moment.
She was go to her state with girlfriend.
She insisted tho, and I needed to tell her that we broke up.
In the fair we encountered her there, it was a really good experience and I had nothing ot be afraid of.
My mom ended up going to the fair by herself.
She ended up asking a few of her friends and they all went to the fair together.

story: It was christmas time and we were ready to decorate our tree. We went to the nursery to pick a perfect tree for our home. When we were there, it was snowing a lot and very cold. This made picking a tree more difficult but we did it.
original_ending: We took our perfect tree home and decorated it that night.

endings.ending: It took a lot longer than we expected
It wasn't the best tree we've ever had but it was good enough
We didn't measure correctly and ended up with a tree taller than out ceiling!
We decided on a smaller tree that ended up to look a bit like Charlie Brown's tree by the time we got home.
When we set the tree up a squirrel ran out of us and surprised us all.
On the way home we stopped and had a big dinner at our favorite restaurant.

story: My son was nine when he figured out Santa Claus was not real. We were at a mall and I saw what he wanted for Xmas. I sent him to his mom and tried to buy the item. He saw me buying the toy and laughed.
original_ending: My son is an adult and likes to tell that story.

endings.ending: He said he'd suspected for years after he saw me drinking Santa's milk and eating his cookies one night.
He said he knew I was trying to trick him into not believing in Santa but it wouldn't work!
He is still mad at me about that, stating that I destroyed his sweet childhood by that reveal.
He got the best gifts for next few years by blackmailing us that he'll reveal the secret to his younger sister also.
Then he saw me give the toy to Santa Claus and realized that I was actually an elf.
He told me to buy a more expensive toy or he would tell his mom I had been caught.

story: Tom wanted to go on a trip with his friends. He asked his parents but they said no. His grades were too low. That week, he worked really hard to bring his grades up.
original_ending: When they improved, his parents let him go on the trip.

endings.ending: His grades improved but the trip was cancelled due to the weather.
Even though he worked hard, his grades didn't improve much so he missed the trip.
He didn't get them high enough, and had to stay home.
He didn't pass the test, but Tom secretly went on the trip anyways.
But the parents still don't late he go.
But it's not enough.

story: It was month of april when i first saw her. She's beautiful and i want to know her. That's why i decided to ask her name. I find her name in facebook and i message her.
original_ending: Luckily,she replied and we started talking and going out together.

endings.ending: She never answered me.
She responded by saying that she has a boyfriend and doesn't want to make new friends.
She responded with "I'm married"
She saw my message but never responded to it.
She responded but after talking I decided she was dull.
She blocked me and reported me for online stalking.

story: Rochelle walked outside on an icy December night. The pavement was covered with snow. Rochelle slipped on a patch of ice underneath the snow. She fell down and went face first into the ice and snow.
original_ending: She earned the nickname Rudolph because she scraped her nose.

endings.ending: Nearby people called an ambulance for Rochelle.
She lost her two front teeth from the fall.
This led to Rochelle falling into a deep, 20 year coma.
Thankfully, a man (and her future husband), was there to help her to her feet.
Deciding to make the most of it, Rochelle made a snow angel on the ground.
Rochelle couldn't believe it when she found the ring she'd dropped in the snow a week earlier.

story: One day my sister and I were riding our bikes outside. Some kids decided to bully us and take our bikes away. We told our mom and she came charging outside. Yelling, she sprayed the bullies with her hose until they surrendered.
original_ending: We got our bike back and no one ever bullied us again!

endings.ending: In the next day the same bullies came and took our bikes, but we knew the trick and started to spraying water on then until they desisted.
One of the bullies fell to the ground with the water tho, and one of the bikes frame got dented.
But their parents came by and started to yell at our mom.
The bikes also got drenched in water which ruined them.
They walked away, crying and embarrassed.
Unfortunately they started bullying us again the next day.

story: Today was the biggest test of the year. Mike and Ike were not ready for the test. They decided to skip school and go to the movies. They went to school the next day, and were wrong about yesterday.
original_ending: The test was actually today, and they had to take it now.

endings.ending: They were totally unprepared for the test and ended up failing it.
They had to take the test today but to their dismay the test was pretty manageable because it was open book.
They were actually much more prepared for the test than they expected and both completed it easily.
The test actually wasn't scheduled until next week so they still had time to study.
The test had actually been canceled.
They found out because they had not been there, they had been given a failing grade.

story: Amy was the only one of her friends to have a job in high school. When Christmas came she decided to buy her friends gifts. She spent most of a check getting thoughtful gifts. Everyone liked what she gave them.
original_ending: But since they had no jobs, she received nothing in return.

endings.ending: They all pitched in together to buy her a nice scarf as thanks.
Motivated to return the favor, they all got jobs of their own so they could buy gifts as well.
Her friends didn't have so much money, but they all joined together to buy her a nice gift too.
She then got a huge tax bill and wished she hadn't been quite so generous.
Later she felt bad - would they think she was flaunting her job?
She was able to get her mother and father gifts as well.

story: I sat to eat an egg salad sandwich when I got a text. MY girlfriend told me she was coming over. So I scarf down my sandwich and just in the shower. I get out and notice a foul smell, egg salad.
original_ending: Right as I'm going for a spray she walks in, she thought it was me.

endings.ending: Someone else was eating in the house.
My girlfriend said, "It's over."
Luckily the smell didn't come from my house, it was the neighbor who by coincidence also had an egg salad sandwich.
I quickly splashed on a mixture of perfume and deodorant and managed to mask the smell.
She found the smell of egg salad.
They are going to eat egg salad.

story: Kevin was hungry and he needed to eat lunch. He rushed to the refrigerator and found nothing. He dug through the cabinets. Finally, he hopped in his car and ordered from a restaurant.
original_ending: Kevin is now enjoying his complete meal and is no longer hungry.

endings.ending: When he got his food, Kevin was disappointed because everything was so bland.
The restaurant took forever to get his order ready and by the time he got his food, it was all cold.
His order was very late and slow, and didn't have the burger that he wanted.
His debit card didn't work, so he had to go back home.
The restaurant took so long that Kevin collapsed from hunger.
When he went to the counter to pay for his order he found that they didn't accept credit cards and left hungrier.

story: Rachel was lying in bed, scared of the dark. She tried to calm down and go to sleep. She was just too scared, and jumped out of bed. She decided to sneak into her sister's room.
original_ending: She quietly crept in and then laid on the floor and fell asleep.

endings.ending: Rachel laid in bed with her sister without waking her.
Rachel quietly waked her sister and told her she was scared and fell asleep in her bed.
Her sister was awake and offered Rachel to sleep with her.
Her sister screamed at the sound of her opening the door and then they both started laughing.
She tried crawling in quietly along with her sister but unfortunately woke her up
She found her sister's room also dark and decided to go back to her room.

story: I had a favorite stuffed animal when I was younger. It was a tiger named Tigey. I always played with Tigey, but one day I forgot him outside. It rained that night and one of Tiger's eyes fell out.
original_ending: I learned to take care of my things If I want to keep them nice.

endings.ending: Luckily my mother helped me stitch the eye back onto Tigey.
I never found the lost eye, but I still loved my Tigey.
My mother was able to sew his eye back on.
I used a jelly bean to replace his missing eye.
I cried really hard until my mom found a new button to sew in for his new eye.
My parents scolded me for leaving my belongings around carelessly, and to teach me a lesson, they threw Tigey away.

story: Bryant went skiing for the first time ever. His wife tried to make him go down the intermediate slope. Bryant got to the top of the hill and decided to walk back down. He got to the bottom and swore he'd never go up there again.
original_ending: He spent the rest of the day on the bunny slopes.

endings.ending: Bryant fell and rolled down the hill as he was walking down.
Bryant love the view so much, he wanted to climb another mountain
He became convinced  and utterly paranoid that his wife wanted to see him break a leg or even worse.
He went back to the lodge and ordered Bloody Marys, one after another, trying to forget his anxiety and the slopes.
After a few beers, Bryant was feeling more confident and was able to master the most difficult ski slope at the mountain.
His wife was disgusted by his fearfulness and decided to divorce him that very day.

story: I think about balls all the time. I used to have small and large balls. Once, a large ball got stuck in a tree. I took a small ball and used it to get the big ball down.
original_ending: I only throw the small balls at the trees, now.

endings.ending: A squirrel ran down the tree to chase the small ball.
An apple fell with the balls.
I hit a squirrel, though, and felt so bad about that that I never threw balls outside again.
The ball hit my head and caused a concussion.
The ball fell on an old woman's head and she yelled at me until I went inside.
Then the small ball got stuck and I had to climb the tree to get it.

story: Lucy had just moved to a new school. She was upset about the change and not into the school. On her birthday, her mom got her some school spirit wear. Lucy was unhappy about the gift and stormed off.
original_ending: Her mom took the gift back and decided not to press the issue.

endings.ending: Her mom was upset and started a huge argument with her.
Lucy calmed down and realized with the gift that she really should have a different view about her school.
Her mom followed, wanting to talk.
Lucy was expecting something much better, and was disappointed in the spirit gear.
Lucy felt bad that she didn't accept the gift from her mom but wanted nothing to do with her new school.
Lucy's mom got angry and went out and bought additional school spirit wear and put them on Lucy's bed.

story: I went to kindergarten today. My teacher taught the class about the color red. I saw a red truck on the way home from school after class. Then I saw a woman in a red dress.
original_ending: When I got home I told my mom about what I had learned.

endings.ending: I wanted to learn more about colors, so I asked about the color purple next.
I wanted to see more red things, so I asked my teacher more about it.
When I left I was looking everywhere looking for red objects.
My father picked me up in a red car and I was impressed.
Then I saw my house and it was painted red.
My mom asked what is my favorite color and I said: red!

story: On Christmas morning, Ben's stocking was full of gold coins. Santa rewarded his good behavior with cold hard cash! A few days later he went to the candy store with some of his coins. When he went to pay the worker burst out laughing.
original_ending: The coins he had were chocolate covered in gold foil.

endings.ending: The worker could not believe their good fortune, and pocketed some of the gold.
At first, the worker thought the gold coins were a joke; as they had never seen gold in-person.
The worker showed Ben that the coins were actually tokens for the arcade games next door.
The coins Ben had were actually part of a board game, and the worker taught Ben how to play.
They were Albanian leks and worth next to nothing at the candy shop.
"Why are you trying to buy candy with chocolate?!" He chortled.

story: I was waiting in line for a very long time one day. Someone tried to cut in front of me, but I said no. They got angry and started saying how they really needed to. I wasn't sure whether to let them or not.
original_ending: At the end I just let them cut in front of me and they were thankful.

endings.ending: Because they were unkind, I decided to stubbornly hold on to my spot and threatened to spread their photo on social media if they persisted in this assholery.
After showing me the photo of their wife in the hospital I felt contrition for not acquiescing sooner and offered to pay for their items.
I told them they should have got in line earlier.
They pulled out a knife and I quickly let them ahead of me.
However, I was also in a hurry to get home to my wife, so I said, "no, you will have to wait in line just like all the rest of us".
But before I had a chance to make up my mind, her huge boyfriend came over and punched me, and then they just took my spot in line.

story: Bill does odd jobs all summer. He saves up all his money and buys a PS4. Just three weeks later the PS4 breaks. The store won't exchange it the PS4 for him.
original_ending: So he has to send it in to Sony and wait two weeks to get it back.

endings.ending: Bill is so frustrated that he foreswears video games entirely.
Bill gets angry and decides to pursue a claim against the store in court.
He cries in the store until they exchange it for him.
Bill throws a tantrum in the store and the police are called.
He has to save up and buy a new one.
He breaks into the store when they are closed and steals one.

story: I was so tall that I didn't fit my hospital bed. The doctor wheeled me down the hallway. On the way, my feet kept hitting the doorways. He laughed and made fun of my height.
original_ending: He told me next time to let him know so he could order a longer bed.

endings.ending: I attempted suicide later that night because I was so upset about the doctor making fun of me.
Luckily I was in the hospital already because a bone in my foot broke from being wheeled into a locked door.
I had a rare disease that made me the tallest person in the world.
He didn't realize that someone else was in the bed with me.
But I feel very bad with the situation.
But the situation is nothing funny.

story: Libby loves to go swimming at the beach. As she gets ready to go, she feels like she is forgetting something. She decides to leave anyway, and drives to the beach. After swimming for about an hour, she goes to find her towel.
original_ending: Her towel is nowhere to be found, and now she knows what she forgot!

endings.ending: On the way, she suddenly realizes that she forgot sunscreen.
She spots a cute boy while she's looking and suddenly can't remember what she's looking for.
Luckily, she finds the towel but realizes that she forgot her sandals.
As she dries off, she sees a cute boy and starts chatting with him.
She was very red all over and realized that she forgot her sunscreen.
She looks for her little brother, and remembers that he is still at home in his room.

story: Lisa was swinging on her swing. All of a sudden, her sister jumped out in front of her. Lisa could not stop herself in time. She kicked her sister and kicked her in the head hard.
original_ending: To this day, she has a hard time enjoying a swing.

endings.ending: Her sister got knocked out and fell to the floor.
Her sister got angry and pulled Lisa off the swing.
Her sister fell to the ground crying while several onlookers rushed over to help.
The gash ended up needing 18 stitches, and Lisa's parents sent the swing set to the trash dump.
Somehow her sister wasn't that badly hurt, and soon forgave her.
Everyone else realised it had been an accident, and eventually the two siblings got over it.

story: Eli heard a scary noise from the living room! It sounded like a rodent scratching or something. He rushed out to see what it was. The lid to the coffee maker wasn't down all the way.
original_ending: Eli watched it hiss and then put a pan on top of it.

endings.ending: He decided he was going to buy his coffee on the way to work from now on.
He saw the coffee was ready and he poured a cup and wiped the machine down with a rag.
Coffee shot out from the top all over the counters.
He finally calmed down and poured himself a fresh cup of coffee.
It was not a mouse, it was a cat!
There was nothing there, though, and he questioned his own sanity.

story: Kim wanted to purchase new living room furniture. She decided to go to Ikea to buy furniture. Kim found stuff she liked, but wanted to look around more. When she found nothing else she went to look for the ones she chose.
original_ending: The store was so big it took her an hour the original set she chose.

endings.ending: But she was not satisfied with the new furniture.
And she was shocked to see the long queue in the billing counter.
Unfortunately, Kim then found out that they were sold out of her favorite furniture.
Kim happily purchased her new living room furniture.
When she returned the store was closed.
When looking for it he found that someone had already bought it.

story: All of Seth's friends at school drive their own cars. He feels ashamed that he doesn't have a car of his own. Seth works very hard to save money for a car. Finally he has enough money to buy a car.
original_ending: Seth is happy that he finally has a car like all his friends.

endings.ending: He went online to research his dream car.
He scheduled an appointment with the local dealership.
He purchased a new car and went for a long drive.
Unfortunately, he was robbed on the way and lost all of his money.
Unfortunately Seth's father got sick and he used the money for his treatment.
Seth took the car and in the first turn ended up crashing it.

story: I felt tired after work and decided to take a bath. I went to the bathroom and turned on the bath water. I began to take my clothes off and get into the bath. When I stuck my toes in the water, I was burned on accident.
original_ending: I lowered the temperature of the water and went back into the tub.

endings.ending: I needed to go to the hospital.
I had a minor wound, so I postponed the bath.
I reached for my small kit and put a band aid on the spot that was burned.
It was a small burn so i did not tend to it until later that night.
It hurt so badly that I decided not to take a bath and put some burn cream on my toes.
I let the bath cool down for about 10 minutes before I got in.

story: Tim was riding his bike to school one day. He was going very fast and didn't see a crack in the sidewalk. He ran it over and flipped his bike and fell off. He got up and brushed himself off.
original_ending: Tim slowed down and paid more attention the rest of the way.

endings.ending: When he looked at his bike he realized it was broken, and he walked to school carrying it.
Tim hopped on his bike and sped off again, learning nothing.
Tim got back on his bike and realized his front tire was now flat.
Tim decided to walk the bike all the way to school.
He noticed the front wheel of his bike was bent.
He was grateful he didn't hurt himself.

story: Tessa worked on writing her own book for a school project. She submitted her book to the school's writing competition. Tessa won two young author awards for her book. She was amazed by her own abilities.
original_ending: Tessa went on to write three complete books that year.

endings.ending: She decided that she wanted to be a professional author one day.
She told her parents about her win and they bought her a book collection.
She was offered a scholarship to continue refining her creative writing skills.
She later became known as one of the top authors in science fiction.
Critics liked her books, but audiences hated them, which made her family sad.
She decided that she would try writing a screenplay.

story: Ida took her son to a petting zoo. There, he pet cows and goats, sheep and rabbits. He even saw a cow being milked! When he got home, all he could talk about was the zoo!
original_ending: Ida was glad she'd given her son such a wonderful time.

endings.ending: He ended up going many more times that year.
He decided to write a story about the zoo, which Ida was so proud of.
For Halloween he decided to dress up as a zookeeper.
He asked his mother if they could get a cow of their own, but unfortunately she said no.
John was so excited that he asked his mom if they could go back to the zoo tomorrow.
With the zoo animals still on his mind John said he wanted his mom to buy him a puppy.

story: Kelly's toddler was suffering from a horrible cough. It was keeping her awake at night. Finally, the baby fell asleep in a semi-sitting position on the couch. Kelly was relieved to see that the child wasn't coughing.
original_ending: She decided to leave the child where she was, so she could get rested.

endings.ending: She called the doctor and got an appointment for the next day so that her toddler wouldn't have to keep suffering.
She gently moved the peaceful child into bed and covered her up with a blanket, hoping she'd sleep off her illness.
Her child was drowsy and feverish for a couple of days but eventually made a full recovery.
The next day, Kelly started to cough, because her kid had passed on their illness to her.
The toddler woke up as soon as Kelly dozed off.
Kelly took turns with her husband watching the baby sleep that night.

story: Gina's mother wouldn't allow her to keep a stray dog. But she let her keep him in the yard for the night. Gina sat outside and talked to him. The dog stared at her face eagerly.
original_ending: Gina's heart broke to think she had to let him go.

endings.ending: While staring at her eyes, he started to answer her questions.
Gina then decided to run away with the dog to find him a home.
Gina was disgusted to see the dog begin pooping on the grass.
Gina got very hungry and decided to eat the dog for supper.
The dog then asked, "Is this my new home?", and Gina froze.
