story: Peggy loves parakeets and she already has three little birds. One day Peggy decided she wanted a new parakeet. Peggy went to the pet store to look at the little birds. One small bird was singing so sweetly to Peggy she decided to buy him.
original_ending: She took the new bird home and he fit right in with her flock.

endings.ending: When she got the bird home the other birds made so much fuss she decided to let the new bird fly off.
Peggy taught the new parakeet a dozen new words that night!
When she got home the bird started speaking to her.
It turns out that there was a human trapped inside of the bird!
She decided to take this bird, but she didn't hold back and took another one.
She took the bird home but he didn't adapt at first with the others.

story: Dan made a bet with a co-worker. He bet that he could close more sales that day than his co-worker. Dan started his work early the next day. Dan went the extra mile on every call.
original_ending: By the end of the day, Dan had won the bet!

endings.ending: Dan didn't perform as well as he expected and lost the bet.
A power outage affected the building before either could close a sale, so neither of them won the bet.
However, the people he tried to sell to were very stubborn, and Dan still ended up losing the bet.
Dan's coworker also worked hard, and when they tallied up their results at the end of the day, they were both locked in a tie!
Unfortunately Dan's efforts went to waste because his co-worker still made more sales than him.
In a weird twist of events, both Dan and his co-worker ended the day with the same amount of sales.

story: Alex was talking to his girlfriend on the phone. His little sister came on the line and began teasing him. Alex was so mad that he ran to her room to deal with her. She quickly shut her door and Alex kicked it angrily.
original_ending: A hole went in the door and Alex got into huge trouble.

endings.ending: But for a split second, Alex realized her sister was only a child and everything was alright.
Alex decided to take revenge and hid all her little sister's favorite toys.
She continued to taunt him from the other side until he eventually gave up and went back to his room.
He kicked it so hard he accidentally broke his toe.
The sounds of all this commotion made Alex's girlfriend reconsider their relationship.
Alex heard his girlfriend laughing at the situation on the other end of the telephone and calmed down.

story: One day Tammy decided to take her dog on a walk. She had never done that before, so she didn't use a leash. As they were walking, her dog got excited and ran away. It took Tammy two hours to finally find her dog.
original_ending: Now whenever she walks her dog, she makes sure to use a leash.

endings.ending: The dog ran away again by jumping the fence as it loved the independence it had for two hours.
But the dog came back with another dog with which he had puppies.
When she did, her dog was covered in dirt; which took her all evening to clean via a bath.
Rather liking the adventure, Tammy decided she would not use a leash the next time she went out walking.
When she finally found him he was under a neighbors garage.
Tammy got mad and smacked the dog on his butt for running away.

story: The Smith family had always loved boating. They regularly rented speedboats for a day out on the water. Eventually, they decided to take the plunge and get their own boat. After saving for months, the Smiths were able to buy their boat.
original_ending: They couldn't wait to take it out on the water for the first time!

endings.ending: They boat they wanted to buy was not for sale anymore.
Instead of buying a boat they bought two jet skis instead.
They decided to take the boat out for a spin only to realize it didn't start due to a motor issue.
They took it out for a spin right away and were very pleased with their new boat!
The first day on the water the had an accident and totaled the boat.
They made plans the following weekend to go fishing.

story: The Omaha zoo was getting new elephants in their zoo. The family drove one hour to go to see the elephants. Once they got their they had to walk to the back of the zoo. One of the elephants was hiding behind the feeding shed.
original_ending: The other four elephants were out and enjoying the sun and visitors.

endings.ending: It had been frightened by a zoo visitor.
The elephant was just extraordinarily shy.
The family waited 20 minutes for the elephant to finally come out so they could get a picture of all of the elephants together.
The zookeeper told the family the elephant wasn't feeling well and probably wouldn't come out today.
It was more shy than the others so it rarely came out from behind the feeding shed.
It turned out the elephant wasn't hiding, it was sick so the zoo keeper's separated it from the others.

story: Two friends were painting their bedroom. First they had to paint all of the edges of the room. Then, they used paint rollers to cover the walls. After that, they put on a final finishing coat.
original_ending: When they were done, the room was a nice yellow color.

endings.ending: Right at the end the cat came in and spilled paint all over the wall.
They were then complimented by their neighbor of what  great job they did.
Once the painting was done, they realized they hated the yellow walls.
They forgot to let the paint dry before hanging up photos.
When they were done, the room was horrible.
They hated the color and decided to paint it another.
